original: vāgarthāv iva saṃpṛktau vāgarthapratipattaye /
analyzed: vāc arthau iva saṃpṛktau vāc artha pratipattaye

original: jagataḥ pitarau vande pārvatīparameśvarau // Ragh_1.1 //
analyzed: jagataḥ pitarau vande pārvatī parameśvarau

original: kva sūryaprabhavo vaṃśaḥ kva cālpaviṣayā matiḥ /
analyzed: kva sūrya prabhavaḥ vaṃśaḥ kva ca alpa viṣayā matiḥ

original: titīrṣur dustaram mohād uḍupenāsmi sāgaram // Ragh_1.2 //
analyzed: titīrṣuḥ dustaram mohāt uḍupena asmi sāgaram

original: mandaḥ kaviyaśaḥ prārthī gamiṣyāmy upahāsyatām /
analyzed: mandaḥ kavi yaśaḥ prārthī gamiṣyāmi upahāsya tām

original: prāṃśulabhye phale lobhād udbāhur iva vāmanaḥ // Ragh_1.3 //
analyzed: prāṃśu labhye phale lobhāt udbāhuḥ iva vāmanaḥ

original: atha vā kṛtavāgdvāre vaṃśe 'smin pūrvasūribhiḥ /
analyzed: atha vā kṛta vāgdvāre vaṃśe smin pūrva sūribhiḥ

original: maṇau vajrasamutkīrṇe sūtrasyevāsti me gatiḥ // Ragh_1.4 //
analyzed: maṇau vajra samutkīrṇe sūtrasya iva asti me gatiḥ

original: so 'ham ājanamaśuddhānām āphalodayakarmaṇām /
analyzed: saḥ ham ājanam aśuddhānām ā phala udaya karmaṇām

original: āsamudrakṣitīśānām ānākarathavartmanām // Ragh_1.5 //
analyzed: ā samudra kṣitīśānām ā nāka ratha vartmanām

original: yathāvidhihutāgnīnāṃ yathākāmārcitārthinām /
analyzed: yathāvidhi huta agnīnām yathākāma arcita arthinām

original: yathāparādhadaṇḍānāṃ yathākālaprabhodhinām // Ragh_1.6 //
analyzed: yathā aparādha daṇḍānām yathā kāla prabhodhinām

original: tyāgāya saṃbhṛtārthānāṃ satyāya mitabhāṣiṇām /
analyzed: tyāgāya saṃbhṛta arthānām satyāya mita bhāṣiṇām

original: yaśase vijigīṣuṇāṃ prajāyai gṛhamendhinām // Ragh_1.7 //
analyzed: yaśase vijigīṣuṇām prajāyai gṛham endhinām

original: śaiśave 'bhyastavidyānāṃ yauvane viṣayaiṣiṇām /
analyzed: śaiśave bhyasta vidyānām yauvane viṣaya eṣiṇām

original: vārdhhake munivṛttīnāṃ yogenānte tanutyajām // Ragh_1.8 //
analyzed: vārdhhake muni vṛttīnām yogena ante tanutyajām

original: raghūṇām anvayaṃ vakṣye tanuvāgvibhavo 'pi san /
analyzed: raghūṇām anvayam vakṣye san

original: tadguṇaiḥ karṇam āgatya cāpalāya pracoditaḥ // Ragh_1.9 //
analyzed: tad guṇaiḥ karṇam āgatya cāpalāya pracoditaḥ

original: taṃ santaḥ śrotum arhanti sadasadvyaktihetavaḥ /
analyzed: tam santaḥ śrotum arhanti sat asat vyakti hetavaḥ

original: hemnaḥ saṃlakṣyate hy agnau viśuddhiḥ śyāmikāpi vā // Ragh_1.10 //
analyzed: hemnaḥ saṃlakṣyate hi agnau viśuddhiḥ śyāmikā api vā

original: vaivasato manur nāma mānanīyo manīṣiṇām /
analyzed: vaivasataḥ manuḥ nāma mānanīyaḥ manīṣiṇām

original: āsīn mahīkṣitām ādyaḥ praṇavaś chandasām iva // Ragh_1.11 //
analyzed: āsīt mahīkṣitām ādyaḥ praṇavaḥ chandasām iva

original: tadanvaye śuddhimati prasūtaḥ śuddhimattaraḥ /
analyzed: tad anvaye śuddhimati prasūtaḥ śuddhimattaraḥ

original: dilīpa iti rājendur induḥ kṣīranidhāv iva // Ragh_1.12 //
analyzed: dilīpaḥ iti rājā induḥ induḥ kṣīranidhau iva

original: vyūḍhorasko vṛṣaskandhaḥ śālaprāṃśur mahābhujaḥ /
analyzed: vyūḍha uraskaḥ vṛṣa skandhaḥ śāla prāṃśuḥ mahā bhujaḥ

original: ātmakarmakṣamaṃ dehaṃ kṣātro dharma ivāśritaḥ // Ragh_1.13 //
analyzed: ātma karma kṣamam deham kṣātraḥ dharmaḥ iva āśritaḥ

original: sarvātiritasāreṇa sarvatejo'bhibhāvinā /
analyzed: sarva atirita sāreṇa sarva tejobhi bhāvinā

original: sthitaḥ sarvonnatenorvīṃ krāntvā merur ivātmanā // Ragh_1.14 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ sarva unnatena urvīm krāntvā meruḥ iva ātmanā

original: ākārasadṛśaprajñaḥ prajñayā sadṛśāgamaḥ /
analyzed: ākāra sadṛśa prajñaḥ prajñayā sadṛśa āgamaḥ

original: āgamaiḥ sadṛśārambha[ḥ] ārambhasadṛśodayaḥ // Ragh_1.15 //
analyzed: āgamaiḥ sadṛśa ārambhaḥ ārambha sadṛśa udayaḥ

original: bhīmakāntair nṛpaguṇaiḥ sa bhabhūvopajīvinām /
analyzed: bhīma kāntaiḥ nṛpa guṇaiḥ sa bhabhūva upajīvinām

original: adhṛṣyaś cābhi gamyaś ca yādhoratnair ivārṇavaḥ // Ragh_1.16 //
analyzed: adhṛṣyaḥ ca abhi gamyaḥ ca yā adhaḥ ratnaiḥ iva arṇavaḥ

original: rekhāmātram api kṣuṇṇād ā manor vartmanaḥ param /
analyzed: rekhā mātram api kṣuṇṇāt ā manoḥ vartmanaḥ param

original: na vyatīyuḥ prajās tasya niyantur nemivṛttayaḥ // Ragh_1.17 //
analyzed: na vyatīyuḥ prajāḥ tasya niyantuḥ nemi vṛttayaḥ

original: prajānām eva bhūty arthaṃ sa tābyho balim agrahīt /
analyzed: prajānām eva bhūti artham sa tābyhaḥ balim agrahīt

original: sahasraguṇam utsraṣṭum ādatte hi rasaṃ raviḥ // Ragh_1.18 //
analyzed: sahasraguṇam utsraṣṭum ādatte hi rasam raviḥ

original: senā paricchadas tasya dvayam evārthasādhanam /
analyzed: senā paricchadaḥ tasya dvayam eva artha sādhanam

original: śāstreṣv akuṇṭhitā buddhir maurvī dhanuṣi cātatā // Ragh_1.19 //
analyzed: śāstreṣu akuṇṭhitā buddhiḥ maurvī dhanuṣi cāta tā

original: tasya saṃvṛtamantrasya gūdhākāreṅgitasya ca /
analyzed: tasya saṃvṛta mantrasya gūdha ākāra iṅgitasya ca

original: phalānumeyāḥ prārambhāḥ saṃskārāḥ prāktanā iva // Ragh_1.20 //
analyzed: phala anumeyāḥ prārambhāḥ saṃskārāḥ prāktanāḥ iva

original: jugopātmānam atrasto bheje dharmam anāturaḥ /
analyzed: jugopa ātmānam atrastaḥ bheje dharmam anāturaḥ

original: agṛdhnur ādade so 'rtham asaktaḥ sukham anvabhūt // Ragh_1.21 //
analyzed: agṛdhnuḥ ādade saḥ ṛtham asaktaḥ sukham anvabhūt

original: jñāne maunaṃ kṣamā śaktau tyāge ślāghāviparyayaḥ /
analyzed: jñāne maunam kṣamā śaktau tyāge ślāghā viparyayaḥ

original: guṇā guṇānubandhitvāt tasya saprasavā iva // Ragh_1.22 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ guṇa anubandhi tvāt tasya sa prasavāḥ iva

original: anākṛṣṭasya viṣayair vidyānāṃ pāradṛśvanaḥ /
analyzed: an ākṛṣṭasya viṣayaiḥ vidyānām pāra dṛśvanaḥ

original: tasya dharmarater āsīd vṛddhatvaṃ jarasā vinā // Ragh_1.23 //
analyzed: tasya dharma rateḥ āsīt vṛddha tvam jarasā vinā

original: prajānāṃ vinayādhānād rakṣaṇād bharaṇād api /
analyzed: prajānām vinaya ādhānāt rakṣaṇāt bharaṇāt api

original: sa pitā pitaras tāsāṃ kevalaṃ janmahetavaḥ // Ragh_1.24 //
analyzed: sa pitā pitaraḥ tāsām kevalam janma hetavaḥ

original: sthityai daṇḍayato daṇḍyān pariṇetuḥ prasūtaye /
analyzed: sthityai daṇḍayataḥ daṇḍyān pariṇetuḥ prasūtaye

original: apy arthakāmau tasyāstāṃ dharma eva manīṣiṇaḥ // Ragh_1.25 //
analyzed: api artha kāmau tasya āstām dharme eva manīṣiṇaḥ

original: dudhoha gāṃ sa yajñāya sasyāya maghavā divam /
analyzed: dudhoha gām sa yajñāya sasyāya maghavā divam

original: saṃpadvinimayenobhau dadhatur bhuvanadvayam // Ragh_1.26 //
analyzed: saṃpad vinimayena ubhau dadhatuḥ bhuvana dvayam

original: na kilānuyayus tasya rājāno rakṣitur yaśaḥ /
analyzed: na kila anuyayuḥ tasya rājānaḥ rakṣituḥ yaśaḥ

original: vyāvṛtta yat parasvebhyaḥ śrutau taskaratā sthitā // Ragh_1.27 //
analyzed: vyāvṛtta yat para svebhyaḥ śrutau taskara tā sthitā

original: dveṣyo 'pi saṃmataḥ śiṣṭas tasyārtasya yathauṣadham /
analyzed: dveṣyaḥ pi saṃmataḥ śiṣṭaḥ tasya ārtasya yathā auṣadham

original: tvājyo duṣṭaḥ priyo 'py āsīd aṅgulīvoragakṣatā // Ragh_1.28 //
analyzed: tu ājyaḥ duṣṭaḥ priyaḥ pi āsīt aṅgulī iva uraga kṣatā

original: taṃ vedhā vidadhe nūnaṃ mahābhūtasamādhinā /
analyzed: tam vedhāḥ vidadhe nūnam mahā bhūta samādhinā

original: tathā hi sarve tasyāsan parārthaikaphalā guṇāḥ // Ragh_1.29 //
analyzed: tathā hi sarve tasya āsan parārtha eka phalāḥ guṇāḥ

original: sa velāvapravalayāṃ parikhīkṛtasāgarām /
analyzed: sa velā vapra valayām parikhīkṛta sāgarām

original: ananyāśāsanām urvīṃ śaśāsaikapurīm iva // Ragh_1.30 //
analyzed: an anya āśāsanām urvīm śaśāsa eka purīm iva

original: tasya dākṣiṇyaruḍhena nāmnā magadhavaṃśajā /
analyzed: tasya dākṣiṇyaruḍhena nāmnā magadha vaṃśa jā

original: patnī sudakṣiṇety āsīd adhvarasyeva dakṣiṇā // Ragh_1.31 //
analyzed: patnī su dakṣiṇā iti āsīt adhvarasya iva dakṣiṇā

original: kalatravantam ātmānam avarodhe mahaty api /
analyzed: kalatravantam ātmānam avarodhe mahati api

original: tayā mene manasvinyā lakṣmyā ca vasudhādhipaḥ // Ragh_1.32 //
analyzed: tayā mene manasvinyā lakṣmyā ca vasudhādhipaḥ

original: tasyām ātmānurūpāyām ātmajanmasamutsukaḥ /
analyzed: tasyām ātma anurūpāyām ātmajanma samutsukaḥ

original: vilambitaphalaiḥ kālaṃ sa nināya manorathaiḥ // Ragh_1.33 //
analyzed: vilambita phalaiḥ kālam sa nināya manorathaiḥ

original: saṃtānārthāya vidhaye svabhujād avatāritā /
analyzed: saṃtāna arthāya vidhaye sva bhujāt avatāritā

original: tena dhūr jagato gurvī saciveṣu nicikṣipe // Ragh_1.34 //
analyzed: tena dhūḥ jagataḥ gurvī saciveṣu nicikṣipe

original: gaṅgāṃ bhagīratheneva pūrveṣāṃ pāvanakṣamām /
analyzed: gaṅgām bhagīrathena iva pūrveṣām pāvana kṣamām

original: icchatā saṃtatiṃ nyastā tena mantriṣu kosalā // Ragh_1.34* //
analyzed: icchatā saṃtatim nyastā tena mantriṣu kosalā

original: athābhyarcya vidhātāraṃ prayatau putrakāmyayā /
analyzed: atha abhyarcya vidhātāram prayatau putra kāmyayā

original: tau daṃpatī vasiṣṭhasya guror jagmatur āśramam // Ragh_1.35 //
analyzed: tau daṃpatī vasiṣṭhasya guroḥ jagmatuḥ āśramam

original: snigdhagambhīranirghoṣam ekaṃ syandanam āsthitau /
analyzed: snigdha gambhīra nirghoṣam ekam syandanam āsthitau

original: prāvṛṣeṇyaṃ payovāhaṃ vidyudairāvatāv iva // Ragh_1.36 //
analyzed: prāvṛṣeṇyam payaḥ vāham vidyut airāvatau iva

original: mā bhūd āśramapīḍeti parimeyapuraḥsarau /
analyzed: mā bhūt āśrama pīḍā iti parimeya puraḥsarau

original: anubhāvaviśeṣāt tu senāparivṛtāv iva // Ragh_1.37 //
analyzed: anubhāva viśeṣāt tu senā parivṛtau iva

original: sevyamānau sukhasparśaiḥ śālaniryāsagandhibhiḥ /
analyzed: sevyamānau sukha sparśaiḥ śāla niryāsa gandhibhiḥ

original: puṣpareṇūtkirair vātair ādhūtavanarājibhiḥ // Ragh_1.38 //
analyzed: puṣpa reṇu utkiraiḥ vātaiḥ ādhūta vana rājibhiḥ

original: mano'bhirāmāḥ śṛṇvantau rathanemisvanonmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: manobhirāmāḥ śṛṇvantau ratha nemi svana unmukhaiḥ

original: ṣaḍjasaṃvādinīḥ kekā dvidhā bhinnāḥ śikhaṇḍibhiḥ // Ragh_1.39 //
analyzed: ṣaḍja saṃvādinīḥ kekāḥ dvidhā bhinnāḥ śikhaṇḍibhiḥ

original: paraparākṣisādṛśyam adūrojjhitavartmasu /
analyzed: para para akṣi sādṛśyam adūra ujjhita vartmasu

original: mṛgadvandveṣu paśyantau syandanābaddhadṛṣṭiṣu // Ragh_1.40 //
analyzed: mṛga dvandveṣu paśyantau syandana ābaddha dṛṣṭiṣu

original: śreṇībandhād vitanvadbhir astambhāṃ toraṇasrajam /
analyzed: śreṇībandhāt vitanvadbhiḥ a stambhām toraṇa srajam

original: sārasaiḥ kalanirhrādhaiḥ kvacid unnamitānanau // Ragh_1.41 //
analyzed: sārasaiḥ kala nirhrādhaiḥ kvacid unnamita ānanau

original: pavanasyānukūlatvāt prārthanāsiddhiśaṃsinaḥ /
analyzed: pavanasya anukūla tvāt prārthanā siddhi śaṃsinaḥ

original: rajobhis turagotkīrṇair aspṛṣṭālaveṣṭanau // Ragh_1.42 //
analyzed: rajobhiḥ turaga utkīrṇaiḥ a spṛṣṭa alaveṣṭanau

original: sarasīṣv aravindānāṃ vīcivikṣobhaśītalam /
analyzed: sarasīṣu aravindānām vīci vikṣobha śītalam

original: āmodam upajighrantau svaniḥśvāsānukāriṇam // Ragh_1.43 //
analyzed: āmodam upajighrantau sva niḥśvāsa anukāriṇam

original: grāmeṣv ātmaviṣṛṭeṣu yūpacihneṣu yajvanām /
analyzed: grāmeṣu ātma viṣṛṭeṣu yūpa cihneṣu yajvanām

original: amoghāḥ pratigṛhṇantāv arghyānupadam āśiṣaḥ // Ragh_1.44 //
analyzed: amoghāḥ pratigṛhṇantau arghya anupadam āśiṣaḥ

original: haiyaṃgavīnam ādāya ghoṣavṛddhān upasthitān /
analyzed: haiyaṃgavīnam ādāya ghoṣa vṛddhān upasthitān

original: nāmadheyāni pṛcchantau vanyānāṃ mārgaśākhinām // Ragh_1.45 //
analyzed: nāmadheyāni pṛcchantau vanyānām mārgaśākhinām

original: kāpy abhikhyā tayor āsīd vrajatoḥ śuddhaveṣayoḥ /
analyzed: kā api abhikhyā tayoḥ āsīt vrajatoḥ śuddha veṣayoḥ

original: himanirmuktayor yoge citrācandramsor iva // Ragh_1.46 //
analyzed: hima nirmuktayoḥ yoge citrā candramsoḥ iva

original: tat tad bhūmipatiḥ patnyai darśayan priyadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: tat tat bhūmipatiḥ patnyai darśayan priya darśanaḥ

original: sāyaṃ saṃyaminas tasya maharṣer mahiṣīsakhaḥ // Ragh_1.47 //
analyzed: sāyam saṃyaminaḥ tasya mahā ṛṣeḥ mahiṣī sakhaḥ

original: sa duṣprāpayaśāḥ prāpad āśramaṃ śrāntavāhanaḥ /
analyzed: sa duṣprāpa yaśāḥ prāpat āśramam śrānta vāhanaḥ

original: sāyaṃ saṃyaminas tasya maharṣer mahiṣīsakhaḥ // Ragh_1.48 //
analyzed: sāyam saṃyaminaḥ tasya mahā ṛṣeḥ mahiṣī sakhaḥ

original: vanāntarād upāvṛttaiḥ samitkuśaphalaharaiḥ /
analyzed: vana antarāt upāvṛttaiḥ samidh kuśa phala haraiḥ

original: pūryamāṇam adṛśyāgnipratyudyātais tapasvibhiḥ // Ragh_1.49 //
analyzed: pūryamāṇam adṛśya agni pratyudyātaiḥ tapasvibhiḥ

original: ākīrṇam ṛṣipatnīnām uṭajadvārarodhibhiḥ /
analyzed: ākīrṇam ṛṣi patnīnām uṭaja dvāra rodhibhiḥ

original: apatyair iva nīvārabhāgadheyocitair mṛgaiḥ // Ragh_1.50 //
analyzed: apatyaiḥ iva nīvāra bhāgadheya ucitaiḥ mṛgaiḥ

original: sekānte munikanyābhis tatkṣaṇojjhitavṛkṣakam /
analyzed: seka ante muni kanyābhiḥ tad kṣaṇa ujjhita vṛkṣakam

original: viśvāsāya vihaṃgānām ālavālāmbupāyinām // Ragh_1.51 //
analyzed: viśvāsāya vihaṃgānām ālavāla ambu pāyinām

original: ātapātayasaṃkśiptanīvārāsu niṣādibhiḥ /
analyzed: ātapa ataya saṃkśipta nīvārāsu niṣādibhiḥ

original: mṛgair vartitaromantham uṭajāṅganabhūmiṣu // Ragh_1.52 //
analyzed: mṛgaiḥ vartita romantham uṭaja aṅgana bhūmiṣu

original: abhyutthitāgnipiśunair atithīn āśramonmukhān /
analyzed: abhyutthita agni piśunaiḥ atithīn āśrama unmukhān

original: punānaṃ pavanoddhūtair dhūmair āhutigandhibhiḥ // Ragh_1.53 //
analyzed: punānam pavana uddhūtaiḥ dhūmaiḥ āhuti gandhibhiḥ

original: atha yantāram ādiṣya dhuryān viśramayeti saḥ /
analyzed: atha yantāram ādiṣya dhuryān viśramaya iti saḥ

original: tām avāropayat patnīṃ rathād avatatāra ca // Ragh_1.54 //
analyzed: tām avāropayat patnīm rathāt avatatāra ca

original: tasmai sabhyāḥ sabhāryāya goptre guptatamendriyāḥ /
analyzed: tasmai sabhyāḥ sa bhāryāya goptre guptatama indriyāḥ

original: arhaṇām arhate cakrur munayo nayacakṣuṣe // Ragh_1.55 //
analyzed: arhaṇām arhate cakruḥ munayaḥ naya cakṣuṣe

original: vidheḥ sāyantanasyānte sa dadarśa tapondhim /
analyzed: vidheḥ sāyantanasya ante sa dadarśa tapondhim

original: anvāsitam arundhatyā svāhayeva havirbhujam // Ragh_1.56 //
analyzed: anvāsitam arundhatyā svāhayā iva havirbhujam

original: tayor jagṛhatuḥ pādān rājā rājñī ca māgadhī /
analyzed: tayoḥ jagṛhatuḥ pādān rājā rājñī ca māgadhī

original: tau gurur gurupatnī ca prītyā pratinanandatuḥ // Ragh_1.57 //
analyzed: tau guruḥ guru patnī ca prītyā pratinanandatuḥ

original: tam ātithyakriyāśāntarathakṣobhapariśramam /
analyzed: tam ātithya kriyā śānta ratha kṣobha pariśramam

original: papraccha kuśalaṃ rājye rājyāśramamuniṃ muniḥ // Ragh_1.58 //
analyzed: papraccha kuśalam rājye rājya āśrama munim muniḥ

original: ath' ātharvanidhes tasya vijitāripuraḥ puraḥ /
analyzed: atha ātharva nidheḥ tasya vijita ari puraḥ puraḥ

original: arthyām arthapatir vācam ādade vadatāṃ varaḥ // Ragh_1.59 //
analyzed: arthyām arthapatiḥ vācam ādade vadatām varaḥ

original: upapannaṃ nanu śivaṃ saptasv aṅgeṣu yasya me /
analyzed: upapannam nanu śivam saptasu aṅgeṣu yasya me

original: daivīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca pratihartā tvam āpadām // Ragh_1.60 //
analyzed: daivīnām mānuṣīṇām ca pratihartā tvam āpadām

original: tava mantrakṛto mantrair dūrāt prāsamitāribhiḥ /
analyzed: tava mantra kṛtaḥ mantraiḥ dūrāt prāsamita aribhiḥ

original: pratyādiśyanta iva me dṛṣtalakṣabhidaḥ śarāḥ // Ragh_1.61 //
analyzed: pratyādiśyante iva me dṛṣta lakṣa bhidaḥ śarāḥ

original: havir āvarjitaṃ hotas tvayā vidhivad agniṣu /
analyzed: haviḥ āvarjitam hotar tvayā vidhivat agniṣu

original: vṛṣṭir bhavati sasyānām avagrahaviśoṣiṇām // Ragh_1.62 //
analyzed: vṛṣṭiḥ bhavati sasyānām avagraha viśoṣiṇām

original: puruṣāyuṣajīvinyo nirātaṅkā nirītayaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣa āyuṣa jīvinyaḥ nirātaṅkāḥ nirītayaḥ

original: yan madīyāḥ prajās tasya hetus tvadbrahmavarcasam // Ragh_1.63 //
analyzed: yat madīyāḥ prajāḥ tasya hetuḥ tvad brahmavarcasam

original: tvayaivaṃ cintyamānasya guruṇā brahmayoninā /
analyzed: tvayā evam cintyamānasya guruṇā brahma yoninā

original: sānubandhāḥ kathaṃ na syuḥ saṃpado me nirāpadaḥ // Ragh_1.64 //
analyzed: sa anubandhāḥ katham na syuḥ saṃpadaḥ me nirāpadaḥ

original: kiṃ tu vadhvāṃ tavaitasyām adṛṣṭasadṛśaprajam /
analyzed: kim tu vadhvām tava etasyām adṛṣṭa sadṛśa prajam

original: na mām avati sadvīpā ratnasūr api medinī // Ragh_1.65 //
analyzed: na mām avati sa dvīpā ratna sūḥ api medinī

original: nūnaṃ mattaḥ paraṃ vaṃśyāḥ piṇḍavicchedadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: nūnam mattaḥ param vaṃśyāḥ piṇḍa viccheda darśinaḥ

original: na prakāmabhujaḥ śrāddhe svadhāsaṃgrahatatparāḥ // Ragh_1.66 //
analyzed: na prakāma bhujaḥ śrāddhe svadhā saṃgraha tatparāḥ

original: matparaṃ durlabham matvā nūnam āvarjitaṃ mayā /
analyzed: mad param durlabham matvā nūnam āvarjitam mayā

original: payaḥ pūrvaiḥ svaniḥśvāsaiḥ kavoṣṇam upabhujyate // Ragh_1.67 //
analyzed: payaḥ pūrvaiḥ sva niḥśvāsaiḥ kavoṣṇam upabhujyate

original: so 'ham ijyāviśuddhātmā prajālopanimīlitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ham ijyā viśuddha ātmā prajā la upanimīlitaḥ

original: prakāśaś cāprakāśas ca lokāloka ivācalaḥ // Ragh_1.68 //
analyzed: prakāśaḥ ca aprakāśaḥ ca lokālokaḥ iva acalaḥ

original: lokāntarasukhaṃ puṇyaṃ tapodānasamudbhavam /
analyzed: loka antara sukham puṇyam tapaḥ dāna samudbhavam

original: saṃtatiḥ śuddhavaṃśyā hi paratreha ca śarmaṇe // Ragh_1.69 //
analyzed: saṃtatiḥ śuddha vaṃśyā hi paratra iha ca śarmaṇe

original: tayā hīnaṃ vidhātar māṃ kathaṃ paśyan na dūyase /
analyzed: tayā hīnam vidhātar mām katham paśyan na dūyase

original: siktaṃ svayam iva snehād vandhyam āśramavṛkṣakam // Ragh_1.70 //
analyzed: siktam svayam iva snehāt vandhyam āśrama vṛkṣakam

original: asahyapīḍaṃ bhagavann ṛṇam antyam avehi me /
analyzed: asahya pīḍam bhagavan ṛṇam antyam avehi me

original: aruṃtudam ivālānam anirvāṇasya dantinaḥ // Ragh_1.71 //
analyzed: aruṃtudam iva ālānam anirvāṇasya dantinaḥ

original: tasmān mucye yathā tāta saṃvidhātuṃ tathārhasi /
analyzed: tasmāt mucye yathā tāta saṃvidhātum tathā arhasi

original: ikṣvākūṇāṃ durāpe 'rthe tvadadhīnā hi siddhayaḥ // Ragh_1.72 //
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām durāpe rthe tvad adhīnāḥ hi siddhayaḥ

original: iti vijñāpito rājñā dhyānastimitalocanaḥ /
analyzed: iti vijñāpitaḥ rājñā dhyāna stimita locanaḥ

original: kṣaṇamātram ṛṣis tasthau suptamīna iva hradaḥ // Ragh_1.73 //
analyzed: kṣaṇa mātram ṛṣiḥ tasthau supta mīnaḥ iva hradaḥ

original: so 'paśyat praṇidhānena saṃtateḥ stambhakāraṇam /
analyzed: saḥ paśyat praṇidhānena saṃtateḥ stambha kāraṇam

original: bhāvitātmā bhuvo bhartur athainaṃ pratyabodhayat // Ragh_1.74 //
analyzed: bhāvitātmā bhuvaḥ bhartuḥ atha enam pratyabodhayat

original: purā śakram upasthāya tavorvīṃ prati yāsyataḥ /
analyzed: purā śakram upasthāya tava urvīm prati yāsyataḥ

original: āsīt kalpatarucchāyām āśritā surabhiḥ pathi // Ragh_1.75 //
analyzed: āsīt kalpataru chāyām āśritā surabhiḥ pathi

original: dharmalopabhayād rājñīm ṛtusnātām imāṃ smaran /
analyzed: dharma lopa bhayāt rājñīm ṛtusnātām imām smaran

original: pradakṣiṇakriyārhāyāṃ tasyāṃ tvaṃ sādhu nācaraḥ // Ragh_1.76 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa kriyā arhāyām tasyām tvam sādhu na acaraḥ

original: avajānāsi māṃ yasmād atas te na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: avajānāsi mām yasmāt atas te na bhaviṣyati

original: matprasūtim anārādhya prajeti tvāṃ śaśāpa sā // Ragh_1.77 //
analyzed: mad prasūtim an ārādhya prajā iti tvām śaśāpa sā

original: sa śāpo na tvayā rājan na ca sārathinā śrutaḥ /
analyzed: sa śāpaḥ na tvayā rājan na ca sārathinā śrutaḥ

original: nadaty ākāśaṅgāyāḥ srotasy uddāmadiggaje // Ragh_1.78 //
analyzed: nadati ākāśaṅgāyāḥ srotasi uddāma diggaje

original: īpsitaṃ tadavajñānād viddhi sārgalam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: īpsitam tad avajñānāt viddhi sa argalam ātmanaḥ

original: pratibadhnāti hi śreyaḥ pūjyapūjāvyatikramaḥ // Ragh_1.79 //
analyzed: pratibadhnāti hi śreyaḥ pūjya pūjā vyatikramaḥ

original: haviṣe dīrghasattrasya sā cedānīṃ pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: haviṣe dīrghasattrasya sā ca idānīm pracetasaḥ

original: bhujaṃgapihitadvāraṃ pātālam adhitiṣṭhati // Ragh_1.80 //
analyzed: bhujaṃga pihita dvāram pātālam adhitiṣṭhati

original: sutāṃ tadīyāṃ surabheḥ kṛtvā pratinidhiṃ śuciḥ /
analyzed: sutām tadīyām surabheḥ kṛtvā pratinidhim śuciḥ

original: ārādhaya saptnīkaḥ prītā kāmadughā hi sā // Ragh_1.81 //
analyzed: ārādhaya sa ptnīkaḥ prītā kāmadughā hi sā

original: iti vādina evāsya hotur āhutisādhanam /
analyzed: iti vādinaḥ eva asya hotuḥ āhuti sādhanam

original: anindyā nandinī nāma dhenur āvavṛte vanāt // Ragh_1.82 //
analyzed: anindyā nandinī nāma dhenuḥ āvavṛte vanāt

original: lalāṭodayam ābhugnaṃ pallavasnigdhapāṭalā /
bibhratī śvetaromāṅkaṃ saṃdhyeva śaśinaṃ navam // Ragh_1.83 //
analyzed: bibhratī śveta roma aṅkam saṃdhyā iva śaśinam navam

original: bhuvaṃ koṣṇena kuṇśodhnī medhyenāvabhṛthād api /
analyzed: bhuvam koṣṇena kuṇśodhnī medhyena avabhṛthāt api

original: pasraveṇābhivarṣantī vatsālokapravartinā // Ragh_1.84 //
analyzed: pasraveṇa abhivarṣantī vatsa āloka pravartinā

original: rajaḥkaṇaiḥ khuroddhūtaiḥ spṛśadbhir gātram antikāt /
analyzed: rajaḥ kaṇaiḥ khura uddhūtaiḥ spṛśadbhiḥ gātram antikāt

original: tīrthābhiṣekajāṃ śuddhim ādadhānā mahīkṣitaḥ // Ragh_1.85 //
analyzed: tīrtha abhiṣeka jām śuddhim ādadhānāḥ mahīkṣitaḥ

original: tāṃ puṇyadarśanāṃ dṛṣtvā nimittajñas taponidhiḥ /
analyzed: tām puṇya darśanām dṛṣtvā nimitta jñaḥ tapaḥ nidhiḥ

original: yājyam āśaṃsitāvandhya prārthanaṃ punar abravīt // Ragh_1.86 //
analyzed: yājyam āśaṃsita avandhya prārthanam punar abravīt

original: adūravartinīṃ siddhiṃ rājan vigaṇayātmanaḥ /
analyzed: adūra vartinīm siddhim rājan vigaṇaya ātmanaḥ

original: upasthiteyaṃ kalyāṇī nāmni kīrtita eva yat // Ragh_1.87 //
analyzed: upasthitā iyam kalyāṇī nāmni kīrtitaḥ eva yat

original: vanyavṛttir imāṃ śaśvad (?)
analyzed: vanya vṛttiḥ imām śaśvat

original: ātmānugamanena gām /
analyzed: ātma anugamanena gām

original: vidyām abhyasaneneva prasādayitum arhasi // Ragh_1.88 //
analyzed: vidyām abhyasanena iva prasādayitum arhasi

original: prasthitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhethāḥ sthitāyāṃ sthitim ācareḥ /
analyzed: prasthitāyām pratiṣṭhethāḥ sthitāyām sthitim ācareḥ

original: niṣaṇṇāyāṃ niṣīdāsyāṃ pītāmbhasi piber apaḥ // Ragh_1.89 //
analyzed: niṣaṇṇāyām niṣīda asyām pīta ambhasi pibeḥ apaḥ

original: vadhūr bhaktimatī cainām arcitām ā tapovanāt /
analyzed: vadhūḥ bhaktimatī ca enām arcitām ā tapaḥ vanāt

original: prayatā prātar anvetu piteva dhuri putriṇām // Ragh_1.91 //
analyzed: prayatā prātar anvetu pitā iva dhuri putriṇām

original: ity ā prasādād asyās tvaṃ paricaryāparo bhava /
analyzed: iti ā prasādāt asyāḥ tvam paricaryā paraḥ bhava

original: avighnam astu te stheyāḥ sāyaṃ pratudvrajed api // Ragh_1.90 //
analyzed: avighnam astu te stheyāḥ sāyam pratudvrajet api

original: tatheti pratijagrāha prītimān saparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: tathā iti pratijagrāha prītimān sa parigrahaḥ

original: ādeśaṃ deśakālajñaḥ śiṣyaḥ śāsitur ānataḥ // Ragh_1.92 //
analyzed: ādeśam deśa kāla jñaḥ śiṣyaḥ śāsituḥ ānataḥ

original: atha pradoṣe doṣajñaḥ saṃveśāya viśaṃpatim /
analyzed: atha pradoṣe doṣa jñaḥ saṃveśāya viśaṃpatim

original: sūnuḥ sūnṛtavāk sraṣṭur visasarjodita sriyam // Ragh_1.93 //
analyzed: sūnuḥ sūnṛta vāc sraṣṭuḥ visasarja udita sriyam

original: satyām api tapaḥsiddhau niyamāpekṣayā muniḥ /
analyzed: satyām api tapaḥ siddhau niyama apekṣayā muniḥ

original: kalpavit kalpayām āsa vanyām evāsya saṃvidhām // Ragh_1.94 //
analyzed: kalpa vid kalpayām āsa vanyām eva asya saṃvidhām

original: nirdiṣṭāṃ kulapatinā sa parṇaśālām adhyāsya prayataparigrahadvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: nirdiṣṭām kula patinā sa parṇa śālām adhyāsya prayata parigraha dvitīyaḥ

original: tacchiṣyādhyayananiveditāvasānāṃ saṃviṣṭaḥ kuśaśayane niśāṃ nināya // Ragh_1.95 //
analyzed: tad śiṣya adhyayana nivedita avasānām saṃviṣṭaḥ kuśa śayane niśām nināya

original: atha prajānmām adhipaḥ prabhāte jāyāpratigrāhitagandhamālyām /
analyzed: atha prajān mām adhipaḥ prabhāte jāyā pratigrāhita gandha mālyām

original: vanāya pītapratibaddhavatsāṃ yaśodhano dhenum ṛṣer mumoca // Ragh_2.1 //
analyzed: vanāya pīta pratibaddha vatsām yaśaḥ dhanaḥ dhenum ṛṣeḥ mumoca

original: tasyāḥ khuranyāsapavitrapāṃsum apāṃsulānāṃ dhuri kīrtanīyā /
analyzed: tasyāḥ khura nyāsa pavitra pāṃsum a pāṃsulānām dhuri kīrtanīyā

original: mārgaṃ manuṣyeśvaradharmapatnī śruter ivārthaṃ smṛtir anvagacchat // Ragh_2.2 //
analyzed: mārgam manuṣya īśvara dharma patnī śruteḥ iva artham smṛtiḥ anvagacchat

original: nivartya rājā dayitāṃ dayālus tāṃ saurabheyīṃ surabhir yaśobhiḥ /
analyzed: nivartya rājā dayitām dayāluḥ tām saurabheyīm surabhiḥ yaśobhiḥ

original: payodharībhūtacatuḥsamudrāṃ jugopa gorūpadharām ivorvīm // Ragh_2.3 //
analyzed: payodharībhūta catur samudrām jugopa go rūpa dharām iva urvīm

original: vratāya tenānucareṇa dhenor nyaṣedhi śeṣo 'py anuyāyivargaḥ /
analyzed: vratāya tena anucareṇa dhenoḥ nyaṣedhi śeṣaḥ u pi anuyāyi vargaḥ

original: na cānyatas tasya śarīrarakṣā svavīryaguptā hi manoḥ prasūtiḥ // Ragh_2.4 //
analyzed: na ca anyatas tasya śarīra rakṣā sva vīrya guptā hi manoḥ prasūtiḥ

original: āsvādavadbhiḥ kavalais tṛṇānaṃ kaṇḍūyanair daṃśanivārṇaiś ca /
analyzed: āsvādavadbhiḥ kavalaiḥ kaṇḍūyanaiḥ ca

original: avyāhataiḥ svairagataiḥ sa tasyāḥ samrāṭ samārādhantatparo 'bhūt // Ragh_2.5 //
analyzed: avyāhataiḥ svaiḥ agataiḥ sa tasyāḥ samrāj samārādhan tad paraḥ bhūt

original: sthitaḥ sthitām uccalitaḥ prayātāṃ niṣeduṣīm āsanabandha dhīraḥ /
analyzed: sthitaḥ sthitām uccalitaḥ prayātām niṣeduṣīm āsana bandha dhīraḥ

original: jalābhilāṣī jalam ādadhānāṃ chāveya tāṃ bhūpati anvagacchat // Ragh_2.6 //
analyzed: jala abhilāṣī jalam ādadhānām chāveya tām bhūpatiḥ anvagacchat

original: sa nyastacihnām api rājalakṣmīṃ tejoviśeṣānumitāṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: sa nyasta cihnām api rāja lakṣmīm tejaḥ viśeṣa anumitām dadhānaḥ

original: āsīd anāviṣkṛtadānarājir antarmadāvastha iva dvipendraḥ // Ragh_2.7 //
analyzed: āsīt an āviṣkṛta dāna rājiḥ antar mada avasthaḥ iva dvipa indraḥ

original: latāpratānodgrathitaiḥ sa kiśair adhijaydhanvā vicacāra dāvam /
analyzed: latā pratāna udgrathitaiḥ sa kiśaiḥ adhijaydhanvā vicacāra dāvam

original: rakṣāpadeśān munihomadhenor vanyān vineṣyann iva duṣṭasattvān // Ragh_2.8 //
analyzed: rakṣā apadeśāt muni homadhenoḥ vanyān vineṣyan iva duṣṭa sattvān

original: c: (^d guru^ C)
analyzed: c d guru c

original: viṣṛṣṭapārśvānucarasya tasya pārśvadrumāḥ pāśabhṛtā samasya /
analyzed: viṣṛṣṭa pārśva anucarasya tasya pārśva drumāḥ pāśabhṛtā samasya

original: udīrayām āsur ivonmadānām ālokaśabdaṃ vayasāṃ virāvaiḥ // Ragh_2.9 //
analyzed: udīrayām āsuḥ iva unmadānām āloka śabdam vayasām virāvaiḥ

original: marutprayuktāś ca marutsakhābhaṃ tam arcyam ārād abhivartamānam /
analyzed: marut prayuktāḥ ca marut sakhā ābham tam arcyam ārāt abhivartamānam

original: avākiran bālalatāḥ prasūnair ālokaśabdaṃ vayasāṃ virāvaiḥ // Ragh_2.10 //
analyzed: avākiran bāla latāḥ prasūnaiḥ āloka śabdam vayasām virāvaiḥ

original: dhanurbhṛto 'py asya dayārdrabhāvam ākhyātam antaḥkaraṇair viśaṅkaiḥ /
analyzed: pi asya dayā ārdra bhāvam ākhyātam antaḥkaraṇaiḥ viśaṅkaiḥ

original: vilokayantyo vapur āpur akṣṇāṃ prakāmavistāraphalaṃ hariṇyaḥ // Ragh_2.11 //
analyzed: vilokayantyaḥ vapuḥ āpuḥ akṣṇām prakāma vistāra phalam hariṇyaḥ

original: sa kīcakair mārutapūrṇarandhraiḥ kūjadbhir āpāditavaṃśkṛtyam /
analyzed: sa kīcakaiḥ māruta pūrṇa randhraiḥ kūjadbhiḥ āpādita vaṃśkṛtyam

original: śuśrāva kuñjeṣu yaśaḥ svam uccair udgīyamānaṃ vanadevatābhiḥ // Ragh_2.12 //
analyzed: śuśrāva kuñjeṣu yaśaḥ svam uccais udgīyamānam vana devatābhiḥ

original: ṛktas tuśārair girinirjharāṇām anokahākamptapuṣpagandhī /
analyzed: ṛktaḥ tuśāraiḥ giri nirjharāṇām anokaha a kampta puṣpa gandhī

original: tam ātapaklāntam anātapatram ācārapūtaṃ pavanaḥ siṣeve // Ragh_2.13 //
analyzed: tam ātapa klāntam an ātapatram ācāra pūtam pavanaḥ siṣeve

original: śaśāma vṛṣṭyāpi vinā davāgnir āsīd viśeṣā phalapuṣpavṛddhiḥ /
analyzed: śaśāma vṛṣṭyā api vinā dava agniḥ āsīt viśeṣā phala puṣpa vṛddhiḥ

original: ūnaṃ na sattveṣv adhiko babādhe tasmin vanaṃ gopatri gāhamāne // Ragh_2.14 //
analyzed: ūnam na sattveṣu adhikaḥ babādhe tasmin vanam go patri gāhamāne

original: saṃcārapūtāni digantarāṇi kṛtvā dinānte nilayāya gantum /
analyzed: saṃcāra pūtāni digantarāṇi kṛtvā dina ante nilayāya gantum

original: pracakrame pallavarāgatāmrā tasmin vanaṃ gopatri gāhamāne // Ragh_2.15 //
analyzed: pracakrame pallava rāga tāmrā tasmin vanam go patri gāhamāne

original: tāṃ devatāpitratithikriyārthām anvag yayau madhyamalokapālaḥ /
analyzed: tām devatā pitṛ atithi kriyā arthām yayau madhyama lokapālaḥ

original: babhau ca sā tena satāṃ matena śraddheva sākṣād vidhinopapannā // Ragh_2.16 //
analyzed: babhau ca sā tena satām matena śraddhā iva sākṣāt vidhinā upapannā

original: sa palvalottīrṇavarāhayūthāny āvāsavṛkṣonmukhabarhiṇāni /
analyzed: sa palvala uttīrṇa varāha yūthāni āvāsa vṛkṣa unmukha barhiṇāni

original: yayau mṛgādhyāsitaśādvalāni śyāmāyamānāni vanāni paśyan // Ragh_2.17 //
analyzed: yayau mṛga adhyāsita śādvalāni śyāmāyamānāni vanāni paśyan

original: āpīnabhārodvahanaprayatnād gṛṣṭir gurutvād vapuṣo narendraḥ /
analyzed: āpīna bhāra udvahana prayatnāt gṛṣṭiḥ guru tvāt vapuṣaḥ narendraḥ

original: ubhāv alaṃcakratur añcitābhyāṃ tapovanāvṛttipathaṃ gatābhyām // Ragh_2.18 //
analyzed: ubhau alaṃcakratuḥ añcitābhyām tapaḥ vana āvṛtti patham gatābhyām

original: vasiṣṭhadhenor anuyāninaṃ tam āvartamānaṃ vanitā vanāntāt /
analyzed: vasiṣṭhadhenoḥ anuyāninam tam āvartamānam vanitā vanāntāt

original: papau nimeṣālasapakṣmapaṅktir upoṣitābhyām iva locanābhyām // Ragh_2.19 //
analyzed: papau nimeṣa alasa pakṣma paṅktiḥ upoṣitābhyām iva locanābhyām

original: puraskṛtā vartmani pārthivena pratyudgatā pārthivadharmpatnyā /
analyzed: puraskṛtā vartmani pārthivena pratyudgatā pārthiva dharma patnyā

original: tadantare sā virarāja dhenur dinakṣapāmadhyagateva saṃdhyā // Ragh_2.20 //
analyzed: tad antare sā virarāja dhenuḥ dina kṣapā madhya gatā iva saṃdhyā

original: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya payasvinīṃ tāṃ sudakṣiṇā sākṣatapātrahastā /
analyzed: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya payasvinīm tām su dakṣiṇā sa akṣata pātra hastā

original: praṇamya cānarca viśālam asyāḥ śṛṅgāntaraṃ dvāram ivārthasiddheḥ // Ragh_2.21 //
analyzed: praṇamya ca anarca viśālam asyāḥ śṛṅga antaram dvāram iva artha siddheḥ

original: vatsotsukāpi stimitā saparyāṃ pratyagrahīt seti nanandatus tau /
analyzed: vatsa utsukā api stimitā saparyām pratyagrahīt sā iti nanandatuḥ tau

original: bhaktyopapanneṣu hi tavidhānāṃ prasādacihnāni puraḥphalāni // Ragh_2.22 //
analyzed: bhaktyā upapanneṣu hi tavidhānām prasāda cihnāni puras phalāni

original: guroḥ sadārasya nipīḍya pādau samāpya sāṃdhyaṃ ca vidhiṃ dilīpaḥ /
analyzed: guroḥ sa dārasya nipīḍya pādau samāpya sāṃdhyam ca vidhim dilīpaḥ

original: dohāvasāne punar eva dogdhrīṃ bheje bhujocchinnaripur niṣaṇṇām // Ragh_2.23 //
analyzed: doha avasāne punar eva dogdhrīm bheje bhuja ucchinna ripuḥ niṣaṇṇām

original: tām antikanyastabalipradīpām anvāsya goptā gṛhiṇīsahāyaḥ /
analyzed: tām antika nyasta bali pradīpām anvāsya goptā gṛhiṇī sahāyaḥ

original: krameṇa suptām anu saṃviveśa suptotthitāṃ prātar an'(?)
analyzed: krameṇa suptām anu saṃviveśa supta utthitām prātar an

original: ūdatiṣṭhat // Ragh_2.24 //
analyzed: ūdatiṣṭhat

original: itthaṃ vrataṃ dhārayataḥ prajārthaṃ samaṃ mahiṣyā mahanīyakīrteḥ /
analyzed: ittham vratam dhārayataḥ prajā artham samam mahiṣyāḥ mahanīya kīrteḥ

original: sapta vyatīyus triguṇāni tasya dināni dīnoddharaṇocitasya // Ragh_2.25 //
analyzed: sapta vyatīyuḥ triguṇāni tasya dināni dīna uddharaṇa ucitasya

original: anyedyur ātmānucarasya bhāvaṃ jijñāsamānā munihomadhenuḥ /
analyzed: anyedyus ātma anucarasya bhāvam jijñāsamānā muni homadhenuḥ

original: gaṅgāprapātāntavirūḍhaśaṣpaṃ gaurīguror gahvaram āviveṣa // Ragh_2.26 //
analyzed: gaṅgā prapāta anta virūḍha śaṣpam gaurī guroḥ gahvaram āviveṣa

original: ity adriṣobhāprahitekṣaṇena ity adriṣobhāprahitekṣaṇena /
analyzed: iti adri sobhā prahita īkṣaṇena iti adri sobhā prahita īkṣaṇena

original: alakṣitābhyutpatano nṛpeṇa prasahya siṃhaḥ kila tāṃ cakarṣa // Ragh_2.27 //
analyzed: alakṣita abhyutpatanaḥ nṛpeṇa prasahya siṃhaḥ kila tām cakarṣa

original: tadīyam ākranditam ārtasādhor guhānibaddhapratiśabdadīrgham /
analyzed: tadīyam ākranditam ārta sādhoḥ guhā nibaddha pratiśabda dīrgham

original: raśmiṣv ivādāya nagendrasaktāṃ nivartayām āsa nṛpasya dṛṣṭim // Ragh_2.28 //
analyzed: raśmiṣu iva ādāya naga indra saktām nivartayām āsa nṛpasya dṛṣṭim

original: sa pāṭalāyāṃ gavi tasthivāṃsaṃ dhanurdharaḥ kesariṇaṃ dadarśa /
analyzed: sa pāṭalāyām gavi tasthivāṃsam dhanuḥ dharaḥ kesariṇam dadarśa

original: adhityakāyām iva dhātumayyāṃ lodhradrumaṃ sānumataḥ praphullam // Ragh_2.29 //
analyzed: adhityakāyām iva dhātu mayyām lodhra drumam sānumataḥ praphullam

original: tato mṛgendrasya mṛgendragāmī vadhāya vadhyasya śaraṃ śaraṇyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas mṛgendrasya mṛgendra gāmī vadhāya vadhyasya śaram śaraṇyaḥ

original: jātābhiṣaṅgo nṛpatir niṣaṅgād uddhartum aicchat prasabhoddhṛtāriḥ // Ragh_2.30 //
analyzed: jāta abhiṣaṅgaḥ nṛpatiḥ niṣaṅgāt uddhartum aicchat prasabha uddhṛta ariḥ

original: vāmetaras tasya karaḥ prahartur nakhaprabhābhūṣitakaṅkapattre /
analyzed: vāmetaraḥ tasya karaḥ prahartuḥ nakha prabhā bhūṣita kaṅka pattre

original: saktāṅguliḥ sāyakapuṅkha eva citrārpitārambha invāvatasthe // Ragh_2.31 //
analyzed: sakta aṅguliḥ sāyaka puṅkhaḥ eva citra arpita ārambhaḥ invā avatasthe

original: bāhupratiṣṭambhavivṛddhamanyur abhyarṇam āgaskṛtam aspṛśadbhiḥ /
analyzed: bāhu pratiṣṭambha vivṛddha manyuḥ abhyarṇam āgaskṛtam a spṛśadbhiḥ

original: rājā svatejobhir adahyatāntar bhogīva mantrauṣadhiruddhavīryaḥ // Ragh_2.32 //
analyzed: rājā sva tejobhiḥ adahyata antar bhogī iva mantra oṣadhi ruddha vīryaḥ

original: tam āryagṛhyaṃ nigṛhītadhenur manuṣyavācā manuvaṃśaketum /
analyzed: tam ārya gṛhyam nigṛhīta dhenuḥ manuṣya vācā manu vaṃśa ketum

original: vismāyayan vismitam ātmavṛttau siṃhorusattvaṃ nijagāda siṃhaḥ // Ragh_2.33 //
analyzed: vismāyayan vismitam ātma vṛttau siṃha ūru sattvam nijagāda siṃhaḥ

original: alaṃ mahīpāla tava śrameṇa prayuktam apy astram ito vṛthā syāt /
analyzed: alam mahīpāla tava śrameṇa prayuktam api astram itas vṛthā syāt

original: na pādaponmūlanaśakti raṃhaḥ śiloccaye mūrchati mārutasya // Ragh_2.34 //
analyzed: na pādapa unmūlana śakti raṃhaḥ śiloccaye mūrchati mārutasya

original: kailāsagauraṃ vṛam ārurukṣoḥ pādārpaṇānugrahapūtapṛṣṭam /
analyzed: kailāsa gauram vṛam ārurukṣoḥ pāda arpaṇa anugraha pūta pṛṣṭam

original: avehi māṃ kiṃkaram aṣṭamūrteḥ kumbhodaraṃ nāma nikumbhamitram // Ragh_2.35 //
analyzed: avehi mām kiṃkaram aṣṭamūrteḥ kumbhodaram nāma nikumbha mitram

original: amuṃ puraḥ paśyasi devadāruṃ putrīkṛto 'sau vṛṣabhadhvajena /
analyzed: amum puras paśyasi devadārum sau vṛṣabhadhvajena

original: yo hemakumbhastananiḥsṛtānāṃ skandasya mātuḥ payasāṃ rasajñaḥ // Ragh_2.36 //
analyzed: yaḥ hema kumbha stana niḥsṛtānām skandasya mātuḥ payasām rasajñaḥ

original: kaṇḍūyamānena kaṭaṃ kadācid vanyadvipenonmathitā tvag asya /
analyzed: kaṇḍūyamānena kaṭam kadācid vanya dvipena unmathitā tvac asya

original: athainam adres tanayā śuśoca senānyam ālīḍham ivāsurāstraiḥ // Ragh_2.37 //
analyzed: athā enam adreḥ tanayā śuśoca senānyam ālīḍham iva asura astraiḥ

original: tadā prabhṛty eva vanadvipānāṃ trāsārtham asminn aham adikukṣau /
analyzed: tadā prabhṛti eva vana dvipānām trāsa artham asmin aham adi kukṣau

original: vyāpāritaḥ śūlabhṛtā vidhāya siṃhatvam aṅkāgatasattvavṛtti // Ragh_2.38 //
analyzed: vyāpāritaḥ śūlabhṛtā vidhāya siṃha tvam aṅka āgata sattva vṛtti

original: tasyālam eṣā kṣudhitasya tṛptyai pradiṣṭakālā parameśvareṇa /
analyzed: tasya alam eṣā kṣudhitasya tṛptyai pradiṣṭa kālā parameśvareṇa

original: upasthitā śoṇitapāraṇā me suradviṣaś cāndramasī sudheva // Ragh_2.39 //
analyzed: upasthitā śoṇita pāraṇā me suradviṣaḥ cāndramasī sudhā iva

original: sa tvaṃ nivartasva vihāya lajjāṃ guror bhavān darśitaśiṣyabhaktiḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam nivartasva vihāya lajjām guroḥ bhavān darśita śiṣya bhaktiḥ

original: śastreṇa rakṣyaṃ yad aśakyarakṣaṃ na tad yaśaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ kṣiṇoti // Ragh_2.40 //
analyzed: śastreṇa rakṣyam yat a śakya rakṣam na tat yaśaḥ śastrabhṛtām kṣiṇoti

original: iti pragalbhaṃ purusādhirājo mṛgādhirājasya vaco niśamya /
analyzed: iti pragalbham purusādhirājaḥ mṛgādhirājasya vacaḥ niśamya

original: pratyāhatāstro giriśaprabhāvād ātmany avajñāṃ śithilīcakāra // Ragh_2.41 //
analyzed: pratyāhata astraḥ giriśa prabhāvāt ātmani avajñām śithilīcakāra

original: pratyabravīc cainam iṣuprayoge tatpūrvasaṅge vitathaprayatnaḥ /
analyzed: pratyabravīt ca enam iṣu prayoge tad pūrva saṅge vitatha prayatnaḥ

original: jaḍīkṛtas tryambakavikṣaṇena vajraṃ mumukṣann iva vajrapāṇiḥ // Ragh_2.42 //
analyzed: jaḍīkṛtaḥ tryambaka vikṣaṇena vajram mumukṣan iva vajrapāṇiḥ

original: pratyāha vainaṃ śaramokṣavandhyo mā pattraparvāt svarabhedam āptaḥ /
analyzed: pratyāha vā enam śara mokṣa vandhyaḥ mā pattra parvāt svarabhedam āptaḥ

original: prahīṇapūrvadhvaninādhirūḍhas tulām asārena śaradghanena // Ragh_2.42* //
analyzed: prahīṇa pūrva dhvaninā adhirūḍhaḥ tulām asārena śarad ghanena

original: saṃruddhaceṣṭasya hetuḥ hāsyaṃ vacas tad yad ahaṃ vivakṣuḥ /
analyzed: saṃruddha ceṣṭasya hetuḥ hāsyam vacaḥ tat yat aham vivakṣuḥ

original: antargataṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ hi veda sarvaṃ bhavān bhāvam ato 'bhidhāsye // Ragh_2.43 //
analyzed: antargatam prāṇabhṛtām hi veda sarvam bhavān bhāvam atas bhidhāsye

original: mānyaḥ sa me sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ sargasthitipratyavahārahetuḥ /
analyzed: mānyaḥ sa me sthāvara jaṅgamānām sarga sthiti pratyavahāra hetuḥ

original: guror apīdaṃ dhanam āhitāgner naśyat purastād anupekṣaṇīyam // Ragh_2.44 //
analyzed: guroḥ api idam dhanam āhitāgneḥ naśyat purastāt an upekṣaṇīyam

original: sa tvaṃ madīyena śarīravṛttiṃ dehena nirvartayituṃ prasīda /
analyzed: sa tvam madīyena śarīra vṛttim dehena nirvartayitum prasīda

original: dināvasānotsukabālavatsā visṛjyatāṃ dhenur iyaṃ maharṣeḥ // Ragh_2.45 //
analyzed: dina avasāna utsuka bāla vatsā visṛjyatām dhenuḥ iyam mahā ṛṣeḥ

original: athāndhakāraṃ girigahvarāṇāṃ daṃṣṭrāmayūkhaiḥ śakalāni kurvan /
analyzed: atha andhakāram giri gahvarāṇām daṃṣṭrā mayūkhaiḥ śakalāni kurvan

original: bhūyaḥ sa bhūteśvarapārśvavartī kiṃcid vihasyārthapatiṃ babhāṣe // Ragh_2.46 //
analyzed: bhūyas sa bhūteśvara pārśva vartī kiṃcid vihasya arthapatim babhāṣe

original: ekātapatraṃ jagataḥ prabhutvaṃ navaṃ yayaḥ kāntam idaṃ vapuś ca /
analyzed: eka atapatram jagataḥ prabhu tvam navam yayaḥ kāntam idam vapuḥ ca

original: alpasya hetor bahu hātum icchan vicāramūdhaḥ pratibhāsi me tvam // Ragh_2.47 //
analyzed: alpasya hetoḥ bahu hātum icchan vicāra mūdhaḥ pratibhāsi me tvam

original: bhūtānukampā tava ced iyaṃ gaur ekā bhavet svastimatī tvadante /
analyzed: bhūta anukampā tava ced iyam gauḥ ekā bhavet svastimatī tvad ante

original: jīvan punaḥ śaśvad upaplavebhyaḥ prajāḥ prajānātha piteva pāsi // Ragh_2.48 //
analyzed: jīvan punar śaśvat upaplavebhyaḥ prajāḥ prajānātha pitā iva pāsi

original: athaikadhenor aparādhacaṇḍād guroḥ kṛṣānupratimād bibheṣi /
analyzed: atha eka dhenoḥ aparādha caṇḍāt guroḥ kṛṣā anu pratimāt bibheṣi

original: śakyo 'sya manyur bhavatā vinetuṃ gāḥ koṭiśaḥ sparśayatā ghaṭodhnīḥ // Ragh_2.49 //
analyzed: śakyaḥ sya manyuḥ bhavatā vinetum gāḥ koṭiśas sparśayatā ghaṭa udhnīḥ

original: tad rakṣa kalyāṇaparaṃparāṇāṃ bhoktāram ūrjasvalam ātmadeham /
analyzed: tat rakṣa kalyāṇa paraṃparāṇām bhoktāram ūrjasvalam ātma deham

original: mahītalasparśanamātrabhinnam ṛddhaṃ hi rājyaṃ padam aindram āhuḥ // Ragh_2.50 //
analyzed: mahī tala sparśana mātra bhinnam ṛddham hi rājyam padam aindram āhuḥ

original: etāvad uktvā virate mṛgendre pratisvanenāsya guhāgatena /
analyzed: etāvat uktvā virate mṛgendre pratisvanena asya guhā gatena

original: śiloccayo 'pi kṣitipālam uccaiḥ prītyā tam evārtham abhāṣateva // Ragh_2.51 //
analyzed: śiloccayaḥ pi kṣitipālam uccais prītyā tam evā artham abhāṣata iva

original: niśamya devānucarasya vācaṃ manuṣyadevaḥ punar apy uvāca /
analyzed: niśamya deva anucarasya vācam manuṣyadevaḥ punar api uvāca

original: dhenvā tadadhyāsitakātarākṣyā nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sutarāṃ dayāluḥ // Ragh_2.52 //
analyzed: dhenvā tad adhyāsita kātara akṣyā nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sutarām dayāluḥ

original: kṣatāt kila trāyata ity udagraḥ kṣatrasya śabdo bhuvaneṣu rūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: kṣatāt kila trāyate iti udagraḥ kṣatrasya śabdaḥ bhuvaneṣu rūḍhaḥ

original: rājyena kiṃ tadviparītavṛtteḥ prāṇair upakrośamalīmasair vā // Ragh_2.53 //
analyzed: rājyena kim tad viparīta vṛtteḥ prāṇaiḥ upakrośa malīmasaiḥ vā

original: kathaṃ nu śakyo 'nunayo maharṣer viśrāṇanāc cānyapayasvinīnām /
analyzed: katham nu śakyaḥ nunayaḥ mahā ṛṣeḥ viśrāṇanāt ca anya payasvinīnām

original: imām anūnāṃ surabher avehi rudraujasā tu pahṛtaṃ tvayāsyām // Ragh_2.54 //
analyzed: imām anūnām surabheḥ avehi rudra ojasā tu pahṛtam tvayā asyām

original: seyaṃ svadehārpaṇaniṣkrayeṇa nyāyyā mayā mocayituṃ bhavattaḥ /
analyzed: sā iyam sva deha arpaṇa niṣkrayeṇa nyāyyā mayā mocayitum bhavattaḥ

original: na pāraṇā syād vihatā tavaivaṃ bhaved aluptaś ca muneḥ kriyārthaḥ // Ragh_2.55 //
analyzed: na pāraṇā syāt vihatā tava evam bhavet aluptaḥ ca muneḥ kriyā arthaḥ

original: bhavān apīdaṃ paravān avaiti mahān hi yatnas tava devadārau /
analyzed: bhavān api idam paravān avaiti mahān hi yatnaḥ tava devadārau

original: sthātuṃ niyoktur na hi śakyam agre vināśya rakṣyaṃ svayam akṣatena // Ragh_2.56 //
analyzed: sthātum niyoktuḥ na hi śakyam agre vināśya rakṣyam svayam akṣatena

original: kim apy ahiṃsyas tava cen mato 'haṃ yaśaḥśarīre bhava me dayāluḥ /
analyzed: kim api a hiṃsyaḥ tava ced mataḥ ham yaśaḥ śarīre bhava me dayāluḥ

original: ekāntavidhaṃsiṣu madvidhānāṃ piṇḍeṣv anāsthā khalu bhautikeṣu // Ragh_2.57 //
analyzed: ekānta vidhaṃsiṣu madvidhānām piṇḍeṣu anāsthā khalu bhautikeṣu

original: saṃbandham ābhāṣaṇapūrvam āhur vṛttaḥ sa nau saṃgatayor vanānte /
analyzed: saṃbandham ābhāṣaṇa pūrvam āhuḥ vṛttaḥ sa nau saṃgatayoḥ vana ante

original: tad bhūtanāthānuga nārhasi tvaṃ saṃbandhino me praṇayaṃ vihantum // Ragh_2.58 //
analyzed: tat bhūtanātha anuga nā arhasi tvam saṃbandhinaḥ me praṇayam vihantum

original: tatheti gām uktavate dilīpaḥ sadyaḥ pratiṣṭambhavimuktabāhuḥ /
analyzed: tathā iti gām uktavate dilīpaḥ sadyas pratiṣṭambha vimukta bāhuḥ

original: sa nyasta śastro haraye svadeham upānayat piṇḍam ivāmiṣasya // Ragh_2.59 //
analyzed: sa nyasta śastraḥ haraye sva deham upānayat piṇḍam iva āmiṣasya

original: tasmin kṣaṇe pālayituḥ prajānām utpaśyataḥ siṃhanipātam ugram /
analyzed: tasmin kṣaṇe pālayituḥ prajānām utpaśyataḥ siṃhanipātam ugram

original: avāṅmukhasy'opari puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta vidyādharahastamuktā // Ragh_2.60 //
analyzed: avāṅmukhasya upari puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ papāta vidyādhara hasta muktā

original: uttiṣṭha vatsety amṛtāyamānaṃ vaco niśamyotthitam utthitaḥ san /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha vatsa iti amṛtāyamānam vacaḥ niśamya utthitam utthitaḥ san

original: dadarśa rājā jananīm iva svāṃ gām agrataḥ prasraviṇīṃ na siṃham // Ragh_2.61 //
analyzed: dadarśa rājā jananīm iva svām gām agratas prasraviṇīm na siṃham

original: taṃ vismitaṃ dhenur uvāca sādho māyāṃ mayodhbhāvya parīkṣito 'si /
analyzed: tam vismitam dhenuḥ uvāca sādho māyām mayā udhbhāvya si

original: ṛṣiprabhāvān mayi nāntako 'pi prabhuḥ prahartuṃ kim utānyahiṃsrāḥ // Ragh_2.62 //
analyzed: ṛṣi prabhāvāt mayi prabhuḥ prahartum kim uta anya hiṃsrāḥ

original: bhaktyā gurau mayy anukampāya ca prītāsmi te putra varaṃ vṛṇīṣva /
analyzed: bhaktyā gurau mayi anukampāya ca prītā asmi te putra varam vṛṇīṣva

original: na kevalānāṃ payasāṃ prasūtim avehi māṃ kāmadughāṃ prasannām // Ragh_2.63 //
analyzed: na kevalānām payasām prasūtim avehi mām kāmadughām prasannām

original: tataḥ samānīya samānitārthī hastau svahastārjitavīraśabdaḥ /
analyzed: tatas samānīya samānita arthī hastau sva hasta arjita vīra śabdaḥ

original: vaṃśasya kartāram anantakīrtiṃ sudakṣiṇāyāṃ tanayaṃ yayāce // Ragh_2.64 //
analyzed: vaṃśasya kartāram ananta kīrtim sudakṣiṇāyām tanayam yayāce

original: saṃtānakāmāya tatheti kāmaṃ rājñe pratiśrutya payasvinī sā /
analyzed: saṃtāna kāmāya tathā iti kāmam rājñe pratiśrutya payasvinī sā

original: dugdhvā payaḥ pattrapuṭe madīyaṃ putr' opabhuṅkṣv' eti tam ādideśa // Ragh_2.65 //
analyzed: dugdhvā payaḥ pattra puṭe madīyam putra ā upabhuṅkṣu ā iti tam ādideśa

original: vatsasya homārthavidheś ca śeṣam ṛṣer anujñām adhigamya mātaḥ /
analyzed: vatsasya homa artha vidheḥ ca śeṣam ṛṣeḥ anujñām adhigamya mātar

original: ūdhasyam icchāmi tavopabhoktumyaṃ ṣaṣṭhāmśam urvyā iva rakṣitāyāḥ // Ragh_2.66 //
analyzed: ūdhasyam icchāmi tava upabhoktumyam ṣaṣṭhāmśam urvyāḥ iva rakṣitāyāḥ

original: itthaṃ kṣitīśena vasiṣṭhadhenur vijñāpitā prītatarā babhūva /
analyzed: ittham kṣitīśena vasiṣṭha dhenuḥ vijñāpitā prītatarā babhūva

original: tadanvitā haimavatāc ca kukṣeḥ pratyāyayāv āśramam aśrameṇa // Ragh_2.67 //
analyzed: tad anvitā haimavatāt ca kukṣeḥ pratyāyayau āśramam aśrameṇa

original: tasyāḥ prasannendumukhaḥ prasādaṃ gurur nṛpāṇāṃ gurave nivedya /
analyzed: tasyāḥ prasanna indu mukhaḥ prasādam guruḥ nṛpāṇām gurave nivedya

original: praharṣacihnānumitaṃ priyāyai śaśaṃsa vācā punaruktayeva // Ragh_2.68 //
analyzed: praharṣa cihna anumitam priyāyai śaśaṃsa vācā punar uktayā iva

original: sa nandinīstanyam aninditātmā sadvatsalo vatsahutāvaśeṣam /
analyzed: sa nandinī stanyam anindita ātmā sat vatsalaḥ vatsa huta avaśeṣam

original: papau vasiṣṭhena kṛtābhyanujñaḥ śubhraṃ yaśo mūrtam ivātitṛṣṇaḥ // Ragh_2.69 //
analyzed: papau vasiṣṭhena kṛta abhyanujñaḥ śubhram yaśaḥ mūrtam iva atitṛṣṇaḥ

original: prātar yathoktavratapāraṇānte prāsthānikaṃ svastyayanaṃ prayuja /
analyzed: prātar yathā ukta vrata pāraṇa ante prāsthānikam svastyayanam

original: tau daṃpatī svāṃ prati rājadhānīṃ prasthāpayām āsa vaśī vasiṣṭhaḥ // Ragh_2.70 //
analyzed: tau daṃpatī svām prati rājadhānīm prasthāpayām āsa vaśī vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya hutaṃ hutāśam anantaraṃ bhartur arundhatīṃ ca /
analyzed: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya hutam hutāśam anantaram bhartuḥ arundhatīm ca

original: dhenuṃ savatsāṃ ca nṛpaḥ pratasthe sanmaṅgalodagrataraprabhāvaḥ // Ragh_2.71 //
analyzed: dhenum sa vatsām ca nṛpaḥ pratasthe sat maṅgala udagratara prabhāvaḥ

original: śrotābhirāmadhvaninā rathena sa dharmapatnīsahitaḥ sahiṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: śrota abhirāma dhvaninā rathena sa dharma patnī sahitaḥ sahiṣṇuḥ

original: yayāv anudghātasukhena mārgaṃ sveneva pūrṇena manorathena // Ragh_2.72 //
analyzed: yayau an udghāta sukhena mārgam svena iva pūrṇena manorathena

original: tam āhitautsukyam adarśanena prajāḥ prajārthavratakarśitāṅgam /
analyzed: tam āhita autsukyam adarśanena prajāḥ prajā artha vrata karśita aṅgam

original: netraiḥ papus tṛptim anāpnuvadbhir navodayaṃ nātham ivauṣadhīnām // Ragh_2.73 //
analyzed: netraiḥ papuḥ tṛptim an āpnuvadbhiḥ nava udayam nātham iva oṣadhīnām

original: puraṃdaraśrīḥ puram utpatākaṃ praviśya paurair abhinandyamānaḥ /
analyzed: puraṃdara śrīḥ puram utpatākam praviśya pauraiḥ abhinandyamānaḥ

original: bhuje bhuaṃgendrasamānasāre bhūyaḥ sa bhūmer dhuram āsasañja // Ragh_2.74 //
analyzed: bhuje bhuaṃga indra samāna sāre bhūyas sa bhūmeḥ dhuram āsasañja

original: atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotir atrer iva dyauḥ surasarid iva tejo vahniniṣṭhyūtam aiśam /
analyzed: atha nayana samuttham jyotiḥ atreḥ iva dyauḥ surasarit iva tejaḥ vahni niṣṭhyūtam aiśam

original: narapatikulabhūtyai garbham ādhatta rājñī gurubhir abhiniviṣṭaṃ lokapālānubhāvaiḥ // Ragh_2.75 //
analyzed: narapati kula bhūtyai garbham ādhatta rājñī gurubhiḥ abhiniviṣṭam lokapāla anubhāvaiḥ

original: athepsitaṃ bhartur upasthitodayaṃ sakhījanodvīkṣaṇakaumudīmukham /
analyzed: athā īpsitam bhartuḥ upasthita udayam sakhī jana udvīkṣaṇa kaumudī mukham

original: nidānam ikṣvākukulasya saṃtateḥ sudakṣiṇā daurhṛdalakṣaṇaṃ dadhau // Ragh_3.1 //
analyzed: nidānam ikṣvāku kulasya saṃtateḥ sudakṣiṇā daurhṛda lakṣaṇam

original: śarīrasādād asamagrabhūṣaṇā mukhena sālakṣyata lodhrapāṇḍunā /
analyzed: śarīra sādāt asamagra bhūṣaṇā mukhena sā alakṣyata lodhra pāṇḍunā

original: tanuprakāśena viceyatārakā prabhātakalpā śaśineva śarvarī // Ragh_3.2 //
analyzed: tanu prakāśena viceya tārakā prabhāta kalpā śaśinā iva śarvarī

original: tato viśāṃpatyur ananyasaṃtater manorathaṃ kiṃcid ivodayonmukham /
analyzed: tatas viśām patyuḥ an anya saṃtateḥ manoratham kiṃcid iva udaya unmukham

original: ananyasauhārdarasasya dohadaṃ priyā prapede prakṛtipriyaṃvadā // Ragh_3.2A //
analyzed: ananya sauhārda rasasya dohadam priyā prapede prakṛti priyaṃvadā

original: mukhena sā ketakapattrapāṇḍunā kṛśāṅgayaṣṭiḥ parimeyabhūṣaṇā /
analyzed: mukhena sā ketaka pattra pāṇḍunā kṛśa aṅgayaṣṭiḥ parimeya bhūṣaṇā

original: sthitālpatārāṃ karuṇendumaṇḍalāṃ vibhātakalpāṃ rajanīṃ vyaḍambayat // Ragh_3.2B //
analyzed: sthita alpa tārām karuṇa indu maṇḍalām vibhāta kalpām rajanīm vyaḍambayat

original: tadānanaṃ mṛtsurabhi kṣitīśvaro rahasy upāghrāya na tṛptim āyayau /
analyzed: tad ānanam mṛd surabhi kṣitīśvaraḥ rahasi upāghrāya na tṛptim āyayau

original: karīva siktaṃ pṛṣataiḥ payomucāṃ śucivyapāye vanarājipalvalam // Ragh_3.3 //
analyzed: karī iva siktam pṛṣataiḥ payomucām śuci vyapāye vana rāji palvalam

original: divaṃ marutvān iva bhokṣyate bhuvaṃ digantaviśrāntaratho hi tat sutaḥ /
analyzed: divam marutvān iva bhokṣyate bhuvam diganta viśrānta rathaḥ hi tat sutaḥ

original: ato 'bhilāṣe prathamaṃ tathāvidhe mano babandhānyarasān vilaṅghya sā // Ragh_3.4 //
analyzed: atas bhilāṣe prathamam tathāvidhe manaḥ babandha anya rasān vilaṅghya sā

original: na me hriyā śaṃsati kiṃcid īpsitaṃ spṛhāvatī vastuṣu keṣu māgadhī /
analyzed: na me hriyā śaṃsati kiṃcid īpsitam spṛhāvatī vastuṣu keṣu māgadhī

original: na hīṣṭam asya tridive 'pi bhūpater priyāsakhīr uttarakosaleśvaraḥ // Ragh_3.5 //
analyzed: na hi iṣṭam asya tridive bhūpateḥ priyā sakhīḥ uttarakosala īśvaraḥ

original: upetya sā dohadaduḥkhaśīlatāṃ yad eva vavre tad apaśyad āhṛtam /
analyzed: upetya sā dohada duḥkha śīla tām yat eva vavre tat apaśyat āhṛtam

original: na hīṣṭam asya tridive 'pi bhūpater abhūd anāsādyam adhijyadhanvanaḥ // Ragh_3.6 //
analyzed: na hi iṣṭam asya tridive pi bhūpateḥ abhūt an āsādyam adhijya dhanvanaḥ

original: krameṇa nistīrya ca dohadavyathāṃ pracīyamānāvayavā rarāja sā /
analyzed: krameṇa nistīrya ca dohada vyathām pracīyamāna avayavā rarāja sā

original: purāṇapattrāpagamād anantaraṃ lateva saṃnaddhamanojñapallavā // Ragh_3.7 //
analyzed: purāṇa pattra apagamāt anantaram latā iva saṃnaddha manojña pallavā

original: dineṣu gacchatsu nitāntapīvaraṃ tadīyam ānīlamukhaṃ stanadvayam /
analyzed: dineṣu gacchatsu nitānta pīvaram tadīyam ānīla mukham stana dvayam

original: tiraścakāra bhramarābhilīnayoḥ sujātayoḥ paṅkajakośayoḥ śriyam) // Ragh_3.8 //
analyzed: tiras cakāra bhramara abhilīnayoḥ sujātayoḥ paṅkaja kośayoḥ śriyam

original: nidhānagarbhām iva sāgarāmbarāṃ śamīm ivābhyantaralīnapāvakām /
analyzed: nidhāna garbhām iva sāgara ambarām śamīm iva abhyantara līna pāvakām

original: nadīm ivāntaḥsalilāṃ sarasvatīṃ nṛpaḥ sasattvāṃ mahiṣīm amanyata // Ragh_3.9 //
analyzed: nadīm iva antar salilām sarasvatīm nṛpaḥ sa sattvām mahiṣīm amanyata

original: priyānurāgasya manaḥsamunnater bhujārjitānāṃ ca digantasaṃpadām /
analyzed: priya anurāgasya manaḥ samunnateḥ bhuja arjitānām ca diganta saṃpadām

original: yathākramaṃ puṃsavanādikāḥ kriyā dhṛteś ca dhīraḥ sadṛśīr vyadhatta saḥ // Ragh_3.10 //
analyzed: yathākramam puṃsavana ādikāḥ kriyāḥ dhṛteḥ ca dhīraḥ sadṛśīḥ vyadhatta saḥ

original: surendramātrāśritagarbhagauravāt prayatnamuktāsanayā gṛhāgataḥ /
analyzed: sura indra mātra āśrita garbha gauravāt prayatna mukta āsanayā gṛha āgataḥ

original: tayopacārāñjalikhinnahastayā nananda pāriplavanetrayā nṛpaḥ // Ragh_3.11 //
analyzed: tayā upacāra añjali khinna hastayā nananda pāriplava netrayā nṛpaḥ

original: kumārabhṛtyākuśalair anuṣṭhite bhiṣagbhir āptair atha garbhabharmaṇi /
analyzed: kumāra bhṛtyā kuśalaiḥ anuṣṭhite bhiṣagbhiḥ āptaiḥ atha garbha bharmaṇi

original: patiḥ pratītaḥ prasavonmukhīm priyāṃ dadarśa kāle divam abhrītam iva // Ragh_3.12 //
analyzed: patiḥ pratītaḥ prasava unmukhīm priyām dadarśa kāle divam a bhrītam iva

original: grahais tataḥ pañcabhir uccasaṃśrayair asūryagaiḥ sūcitabhāgyasaṃpadam /
analyzed: grahaiḥ tatas pañcabhiḥ ucca saṃśrayaiḥ a sūrya gaiḥ sūcita bhāgya saṃpadam

original: asūta putraṃ samaye śacīsamā trisādhanā śaktir ivārtham akṣayam // Ragh_3.13 //
analyzed: asūta putram samaye śacī samā tri sādhanā śaktiḥ iva artham akṣayam

original: diśaḥ prasedur maruto vavuḥ sukhāḥ pradakṣiṇārcir havir agnir ādade /
analyzed: diśaḥ praseduḥ marutaḥ vavuḥ sukhāḥ pradakṣiṇa arciḥ haviḥ agniḥ ādade

original: babhūva sarvaṃ śubhaśaṃsi tatkṣaṇaṃ bhavo hi lokābhyudayāya tādṛśām // Ragh_3.14 //
analyzed: babhūva sarvam śubha śaṃsi tad kṣaṇam bhavaḥ hi loka abhyudayāya tādṛśām

original: ariṣṭaśayyāṃ parito visāriṇā sujanmanas tasya nijena tejasā /
analyzed: ariṣṭa śayyām paritas visāriṇā su janmanaḥ tasya nijena tejasā

original: niśīthadīpāḥ sahasā hatatviṣo babhūvur ālekhyasamarpitā iva // Ragh_3.15 //
analyzed: niśītha dīpāḥ sahasā hata tviṣaḥ babhūvuḥ ālekhya samarpitāḥ iva

original: janāya śuddhāntacarāya śaṃsate kumārajanmāmṛtasaṃmitākṣaram /
analyzed: janāya śuddhānta carāya śaṃsate kumāra janma amṛta saṃmita akṣaram

original: adeyam āsīt trayam eva bhūpateḥ śaśiprabhaṃ chattram ubhe ca cāmare // Ragh_3.16 //
analyzed: adeyam āsīt trayam eva bhūpateḥ śaśi prabham chattram ubhe ca cāmare

original: samīkṣya putrasya cirān mukhaṃ pitā nidhānakumbhasya yuveva durgataḥ /
analyzed: samīkṣya putrasya cirāt mukham pitā nidhāna kumbhasya yuvā iva durgataḥ

original: mudā śarīre prababhūva nātmanaḥ payodhir indūdayamūrchito yathā // Ragh_3.16* //
analyzed: mudā śarīre prababhūva nā ātmanaḥ payodhiḥ indu udaya mūrchitaḥ yathā

original: nivātapadmastimitena cakṣuṣā nṛpasya kāntaṃ pibataḥ sutānanam /
analyzed: nivāta padma stimitena cakṣuṣā nṛpasya kāntam pibataḥ suta ānanam

original: mahodadheḥ pūra ivendudarśanād guruḥ praharṣaḥ prababhūva nātmani // Ragh_3.17 //
analyzed: mahodadheḥ pūraḥ iva indu darśanāt guruḥ praharṣaḥ prababhūva na ātmani

original: sa jātakarmaṇy akhile tapasvinā tapovanād etya purodhasā kṛte /
analyzed: sa jātakarmaṇi akhile tapasvinā tapaḥ vanāt etya purodhasā kṛte

original: dilīpasūnur maṇir ākarodbhavaḥ prayuktasaṃskāra ivādhikaṃ babhau // Ragh_3.18 //
analyzed: dilīpa sūnuḥ maṇiḥ ākara udbhavaḥ prayukta saṃskāraḥ iva adhikam babhau

original: sukhaśravā maṅgalatūryanisvanāḥ pramodanṛtyaiḥ saha vārayoṣitām /
analyzed: sukha śravāḥ maṅgala tūrya nisvanāḥ pramoda nṛtyaiḥ saha vāra yoṣitām

original: na kevalaṃ sadmani māgadhīpateḥ pathi vyajṛmbhanta divaukasām api // Ragh_3.19 //
analyzed: na kevalam sadmani māgadhī pateḥ pathi vyajṛmbhanta divaukasām api

original: na saṃyatas tasya babhūva rakṣitur visarjayed yaṃ sutajanmaharṣitaḥ /
analyzed: na saṃyataḥ tasya babhūva rakṣituḥ visarjayet yam suta janma harṣitaḥ

original: ṛṇābhidhānāt svayam eva kevalaṃ tadā pitḥṇāṃ mumuce sa bandhanāt // Ragh_3.20 //
analyzed: ṛṇa abhidhānāt svayam eva kevalam tadā pitḥṇām mumuce sa bandhanāt

original: śutasya yāyād ayam antam arbhakas tathā pareṣāṃ yudhi ceti pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: śutasya yāyāt ayam antam arbhakaḥ tathā pareṣām yudhi ca iti pārthivaḥ

original: avekṣya dhātor gamanārtham arthavic cakāra nāmnā raghum ātmasaṃbhavam // Ragh_3.21 //
analyzed: avekṣya dhātoḥ gamana artham artha vid cakāra nāmnā raghum ātmasaṃbhavam

original: pituḥ prayatnāt sa samagrasaṃpadaḥ śubhaiḥ śarīrāvayavair dine dine /
analyzed: pituḥ prayatnāt sa samagra saṃpadaḥ śubhaiḥ śarīra avayavaiḥ dine dine

original: pupoṣa vṛddhiṃ haridaśvadīdhiter anupraveśād iva bālacandramāḥ // Ragh_3.22 //
analyzed: pupoṣa vṛddhim harit aśva dīdhiteḥ anupraveśāt iva bāla candramāḥ

original: umāvṛṣāṅkau śarajanmanā yathā yathā jayantena śacīpuraṃdarau /
analyzed: umā vṛṣāṅkau śara janmanā yathā yathā jayantena śacī puraṃdarau

original: tathā nṛpaḥ sā cu sutena māgadhī nanandatus tatsadṛśena tatsamau // Ragh_3.23 //
analyzed: tathā nṛpaḥ sā cu sutena māgadhī nanandatuḥ tad sadṛśena tad samau

original: rathāṅganāmnor iva bhāvabandhanaṃ babhūva yat prema parasparāśrayam /
analyzed: rathāṅga nāmnoḥ iva bhāva bandhanam babhūva yat prema paraspara āśrayam

original: vibhaktam apy ekasutena tat tayoḥ parasparasyopari paryacīyata // Ragh_3.24 //
analyzed: vibhaktam api eka sutena tat tayoḥ parasparasya upari paryacīyata

original: uvāca dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyām avalambya cāṅgulim /
analyzed: uvāca dhātryā prathama uditam vacaḥ yayau tadīyām avalambya ca aṅgulim

original: abhūc ca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā pitur mudaṃ tena tatāna so 'rbhakaḥ // Ragh_3.25 //
analyzed: abhūt ca namraḥ praṇipāta śikṣayā pituḥ mudam tena tatāna saḥ ṛbhakaḥ

original: tam aṅkam āropya śarīrayogajaiḥ sukhair niṣiñcantam ivāmṛtaṃ tvaci /
analyzed: tam aṅkam āropya śarīra yoga jaiḥ sukhaiḥ niṣiñcantam iva amṛtam tvaci

original: upāntasaṃmīlitalocano nṛpaś cirāt sutasparśarasjñatāṃ yayau // Ragh_3.26 //
analyzed: upānta saṃmīlita locanaḥ nṛpaḥ cirāt suta sparśa rasjña tām yayau

original: tam aṅkam āropya śarīrayogajaiḥ sthiter abhettā sthitimantam anvayam /
analyzed: tam aṅkam āropya śarīra yoga jaiḥ sthiteḥ a bhettā sthitimantam anvayam

original: svamūrtibhedena guṇāgryavartinā patiḥ prajānām iva sargam ātmanaḥ // Ragh_3.27 //
analyzed: sva mūrti bhedena guṇa agrya vartinā patiḥ prajānām iva sargam ātmanaḥ

original: sa vṛttacaulaś calakākapakṣakair amātyaputraiḥ savayobhir anvitaḥ /
analyzed: sa vṛtta caulaḥ cala kākapakṣakaiḥ amātya putraiḥ sa vayobhiḥ anvitaḥ

original: liper yathāvadgrahaṇena vāṅmayaṃ nadīmukheneva samudram āviśat // Ragh_3.28 //
analyzed: lipeḥ yathāvat grahaṇena vāc mayam nadī mukhena iva samudram āviśat

original: athopanītaṃ vidhivad vipaścito vininyur enaṃ guravo gurupriyam /
analyzed: atha upanītam vidhivat vipaścitaḥ vininyuḥ enam guravaḥ guru priyam

original: avandhyayatnāś ca babhūvur arbhake tatāra vidyāḥ pavanātipātibhir // Ragh_3.29 //
analyzed: avandhya yatnāḥ ca babhūvuḥ arbhake tatāra vidyāḥ pavana atipātibhiḥ

original: dhiyaḥ samagraiḥ sa guṇair udāradhīḥ kramāc catasraś caturarṇavopamāḥ /
analyzed: dhiyaḥ samagraiḥ sa guṇaiḥ udāra dhīḥ kramāt catasraḥ catur arṇava upamāḥ

original: tatāra vidyāḥ pavanātipātibhir diśo haridbhir haritām iveśvaraḥ // Ragh_3.30 //
analyzed: tatāra vidyāḥ pavana atipātibhiḥ diśaḥ haridbhiḥ haritām iva īśvaraḥ

original: tvacaṃ sa medhyāṃ paridhāya rauravīm aśikṣatāstraṃ pitur eva mantravat /
analyzed: tvacam sa medhyām paridhāya rauravīm aśikṣata astram pituḥ eva mantravat

original: na kevalaṃ tadgurur ekapārthivaḥ kṣitāv abhūd ekadhanurdharo 'pi saḥ // Ragh_3.31 //
analyzed: na kevalam tad guruḥ eka pārthivaḥ kṣitau abhūt eka dhanurdharaḥ saḥ

original: mahokṣatāṃ vatsataraḥ spṛśann iva dvipendrabhāvaṃ kalabhaḥ śrayann iva /
analyzed: mahā ukṣatām vatsataraḥ spṛśan iva dvipa indra bhāvam kalabhaḥ śrayan iva

original: raghuḥ kramād yauvanabhinnaśaiśavaḥ pupoṣa gāmbhīryamanoharaṃ vapuḥ // Ragh_3.32 //
analyzed: raghuḥ kramāt yauvana bhinna śaiśavaḥ pupoṣa gāmbhīrya manoharam vapuḥ

original: athāsya godānavidher anantaraṃ vivāhadīkṣāṃ niravartayad guruḥ /
analyzed: atha asya godāna vidheḥ anantaram vivāha dīkṣām niravartayat guruḥ

original: narendrakanyās tam avāpya satpatiṃ tamonudaṃ dakṣasutā ivābabhuḥ // Ragh_3.33 //
analyzed: narendra kanyāḥ tam avāpya sat patim tamonudam dakṣa sutāḥ iva ābabhuḥ

original: yuvā yugavyāyatabāhur aṃsalaḥ kapāṭavakṣāḥ pariṇaddhakaṃdharaḥ /
analyzed: yuvā yuga vyāyata bāhuḥ aṃsalaḥ kapāṭa vakṣāḥ pariṇaddha kaṃdharaḥ

original: vapuḥprakarṣād ajayad guruṃ raghus tathāpi nīcair vinayād adṛśyata // Ragh_3.34 //
analyzed: vapuḥ prakarṣāt ajayat gurum raghuḥ tathā api nīcaiḥ vinayāt adṛśyata

original: tataḥ prajānāṃ ciram ātmanā dhṛtāṃ nitāntagurvīṃ laghayiṣyatā dhuram /
analyzed: tatas prajānām ciram ātmanā dhṛtām nitānta gurvīm laghayiṣyatā dhuram

original: nisargasaṃskāravinīta ity asau nṛpeṇa cakre yuvarājaśabdabhāk // Ragh_3.35 //
analyzed: nisarga saṃskāra vinītaḥ iti asau nṛpeṇa cakre yuvarāja śabda bhāj

original: narendramūlāyatanād anantaraṃ ghanavyapāyena gabhastimān iva /
analyzed: narendra mūla āyatanāt anantaram ghana vyapāyena gabhastimān iva

original: agacchad aṃśena guṇābhilāṣiṇī navāvatāraṃ kamalād ivotpalam // Ragh_3.36 //
analyzed: agacchat aṃśena guṇa abhilāṣiṇī nava avatāram kamalāt iva utpalam

original: vibhāvasuḥ sārathineva vāyunā ghanavyapāyena gabhastimān iva /
analyzed: vibhāvasuḥ sārathinā iva vāyunā ghana vyapāyena gabhastimān iva

original: babhūva tenātitarāṃ suduḥsahaḥ kaṭaprabhedena karīva pārthivaḥ // Ragh_3.37 //
analyzed: babhūva tena atitarām su duḥsahaḥ kaṭa prabhedena karī iva pārthivaḥ

original: niyujya taṃ homaturaṃgarakṣaṇe dhanurdharaṃ rājasutair anudrutam /
analyzed: niyujya tam homa turaṃga rakṣaṇe dhanurdharam rāja sutaiḥ anudrutam

original: apūrṇam ekena śatakratūpamaḥ śataṃ kratūnā apavighnam āpa saḥ // Ragh_3.38 //
analyzed: a pūrṇam ekena śatakratu upamaḥ śatam kratūnām apavighnam āpa saḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ tena makhāya vajvanā turaṃgam utsṛṣṭam anargalaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: tatas param tena makhāya vajvanā turaṃgam utsṛṣṭam anargalam punar

original: dhanurbhṛtām agrata eva rakṣiṇāṃ jahāra śakraḥ kila gūḍhavigrahaḥ // Ragh_3.39 //
analyzed: dhanurbhṛtām agratas eva rakṣiṇām jahāra śakraḥ kila gūḍha vigrahaḥ

original: viṣādaluptapratipatti vismitaṃ mamaiva yeneha turaṃgam īkṣase /
analyzed: viṣāda lupta pratipatti vismitam mama eva yena iha turaṃgam īkṣase

original: dhenvā niśamyeti vacaḥ samīrtaṃ śrutaprabhāvā dadṛśe 'tha nandinī // Ragh_3.40 //
analyzed: dhenvāḥ niśamya iti vacaḥ samīrtam śruta prabhāvā dadṛśe nandinī

original: svedāmbunā mārjaya putra locane mamaiva yeneha turaṃgam īkṣase /
analyzed: sveda ambunā mārjaya putra locane mama eva yena iha turaṃgam īkṣase

original: dhenvā niśamyeti vacaḥ samīritaṃ mudaṃ parām āpa dilīpanandanaḥ // Ragh_3.40* //
analyzed: dhenvāḥ niśamya iti vacaḥ samīritam mudam parām āpa dilīpa nandanaḥ

original: tadaṅganisyandajalena locane pramṛjya puṇyena puraskṛtaḥ satām /
analyzed: tad aṅga nisyanda jalena locane pramṛjya puṇyena puraskṛtaḥ satām

original: atīndriyeṣv apy upapannadarśano babhūva bhāveṣu dilīpanandanaḥ // Ragh_3.41 //
analyzed: atīndriyeṣu api upapanna darśanaḥ babhūva bhāveṣu dilīpa nandanaḥ

original: sa pūrvataḥ parvatapakṣaśātanaṃ dadarśa devaṃ naradevasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: sa pūrvatas parvata pakṣa śātanam dadarśa devam naradeva saṃbhavaḥ

original: punaḥ punaḥ sūtaniṣiddhacāpalaṃ harantam aśvaṃ ratharaśmisaṃyatam // Ragh_3.42 //
analyzed: punar punar sūta niṣiddha cāpalam harantam aśvam ratha raśmi saṃyatam

original: sa pūrvataḥ parvatapakṣaśātanaṃ hariṃ viditvā haribhiś ca vājibhiḥ /
analyzed: sa pūrvatas parvata pakṣa śātanam harim viditvā haribhiḥ ca vājibhiḥ

original: avocad enaṃ gangaspṛśā raghuḥ svareṇa dhīreṇa nivartayann iva // Ragh_3.43 //
analyzed: avocat enam ganga spṛśā raghuḥ svareṇa dhīreṇa nivartayan iva

original: makhāṃśabhājāṃ prathamo manīṣibhis tvam eva devendra sadā nigadyase /
analyzed: makha aṃśa bhājām prathamaḥ manīṣibhiḥ tvam eva deva indra sadā nigadyase

original: ajasradīkṣāprayatasya madguroḥ kriyāvighātāya kathaṃ pravartase // Ragh_3.44 //
analyzed: ajasra dīkṣā prayatasya mad guroḥ kriyā vighātāya katham pravartase

original: trilokanāthena sadā makhadviṣas tvayā niyamyā nanu divyacakṣuṣā /
analyzed: triloka nāthena sadā makha dviṣaḥ tvayā niyamyāḥ nanu divya cakṣuṣā

original: sa cet svayaṃ karamasu dharmacāriṇāṃ tvam antarāyo bhavasi cyuto vidhiḥ // Ragh_3.45 //
analyzed: sa ced svayam karamasu dharma cāriṇām tvam antarāyaḥ bhavasi cyutaḥ vidhiḥ

original: tad aṅgam agryaṃ maghavan mahākrator amuṃ turaṃgaṃ pratimoktum arhasi /
analyzed: tat aṅgam agryam maghavan mahā kratoḥ amum turaṃgam pratimoktum arhasi

original: pataḥśruter darśayitāra īśvarā malīmasām ādadate na paddhatim // Ragh_3.46 //
analyzed: pataḥśruteḥ darśayitāraḥ īśvarāḥ malīmasām ādadate na paddhatim

original: iti pragalbhaṃ raghuṇā samīritaṃ vaco niśamyādhipatir divaukasām /
analyzed: iti pragalbham raghuṇā samīritam vacaḥ niśamya adhipatiḥ divaukasām

original: nivartayām āsa rathaṃ savismayaḥ pracakrame ca prativaktum uttaram // Ragh_3.47 //
analyzed: nivartayām āsa ratham sa vismayaḥ pracakrame ca prativaktum uttaram

original: yad āttha rājanyakumāra tat tathā yaśas tu rakṣyaṃ parato yaśodhanaiḥ /
analyzed: yat āttha rājanya kumāra tat tathā yaśaḥ tu rakṣyam paratas yaśaḥ dhanaiḥ

original: jagatprakāśaṃ tad aśeṣam ijyayā bhavadgurur laṅghayituṃ mamodyataḥ // Ragh_3.48 //
analyzed: jagat prakāśam tat aśeṣam ijyayā bhavadguruḥ laṅghayitum mama udyataḥ

original: harir yathaikaḥ puruśottamaḥ smṛto maheśvaras tryambaka eva nāparaḥ /
analyzed: hariḥ yathā ekaḥ puruśa uttamaḥ smṛtaḥ maheśvaraḥ tryambakaḥ eva na aparaḥ

original: tathā vidur māṃ munayaḥ śatakratuṃ dvitīyagāmī na hi śabda eṣa naḥ // Ragh_3.49 //
analyzed: tathā viduḥ mām munayaḥ śatakratum dvitīya gāmī na hi śabdaḥ eṣa naḥ

original: ato 'yam aśvaḥ kapilānukāriṇā pitus tvadīyasya mayāpahāritaḥ /
analyzed: atas yam aśvaḥ kapilā anukāriṇā pituḥ tvadīyasya mayā apahāritaḥ

original: alaṃ prayatnena tavātra mā nidhāḥ padaṃ padavyāṃ sagarasya saṃtateḥ // Ragh_3.50 //
analyzed: alam prayatnena tava atra mā nidhāḥ padam padavyām sagarasya saṃtateḥ

original: tataḥ prahasyāpabhayaḥ puraṃdaraṃ punar babhāṣe turagasya rakṣitā /
analyzed: tatas prahasya apabhayaḥ puraṃdaram punar babhāṣe turagasya rakṣitā

original: gṛhāṇa śastraṃ yadi sarga eṣa te na khalv anirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhavān // Ragh_3.51 //
analyzed: gṛhāṇa śastram yadi sargaḥ eṣa te na khalu a nirjitya raghum kṛtī bhavān

original: sa evam uktvā maghavantam unmukhaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ saśaram śarāsanam /
analyzed: saḥ evam uktvā maghavantam unmukhaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ sa śaram śarāsanam

original: atiṣṭhad ālīḍhaviśeṣaśobhinā vapuḥprakarṣeṇa viḍambiteśvaraḥ // Ragh_3.52 //
analyzed: atiṣṭhat ālīḍha viśeṣa śobhinā vapuḥ prakarṣeṇa viḍambita īśvaraḥ

original: raghor avaṣṭambhamayena pattriṇā hṛdi kṣato gotrabhid apy amarṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: raghoḥ avaṣṭambha mayena pattriṇā hṛdi kṣataḥ gotrabhid api amarṣaṇaḥ

original: navāmbudānīkamuhūrtalāñchane dhanuṣy amoghaṃ samadhatta sāyakam // Ragh_3.53 //
analyzed: nava ambuda anīka muhūrta lāñchane dhanuṣi amogham samadhatta sāyakam

original: dilīpasūnoḥ sa bṛhad (?)
analyzed: dilīpa sūnoḥ sa bṛhat

original: bhujāntaraṃ praviśya bhīmāsuraśoṇitocitaḥ /
analyzed: bhujāntaram praviśya bhīma asura śoṇita ucitaḥ

original: papāv anāsvāditapūrvam āśugaḥ kutūhaleneva manuṣyaśoṇitam // Ragh_3.54 //
analyzed: papau an āsvādita pūrvam āśu gaḥ kutūhalena iva manuṣya śoṇitam

original: hareḥ kumāro 'pi kumāravikramaḥ suradvipāsphālanakarkaśāṅgulau /
analyzed: kumāra vikramaḥ sura dvipa āsphālana karkaśa aṅgulau

original: bhuje śacīpattraviśeṣakāṅkite svanāmacihnaṃ nicakhāna sāyakam // Ragh_3.55 //
analyzed: bhuje śacīpattra viśeṣaka aṅkite sva nāma cihnam nicakhāna sāyakam

original: jahāra cānyena mayūrapattriṇā śareṇa śakrasya mahāśanidhvajam /
analyzed: jahāra ca anyena mayūra pattriṇā śareṇa śakrasya mahā aśani dhvajam

original: cukopa tasmai sa bhṛśaṃ suraśriyaḥ prasahaya keśavyaparopaṇād iva // Ragh_3.56 //
analyzed: cukopa tasmai sa bhṛśam sura śriyaḥ prasahaya keśa vyaparopaṇāt iva

original: tayor upāntasthitasiddhasainikaṃ garutmadāśīviśabhīmadarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ upānta sthita siddha sainikam garutmat āśīviśa bhīma darśanaiḥ

original: babhūva yuddhaṃ tumuulaṃ jayaiṣiṇor adhomukhair ūrdhvamukhaiś ca pattribhiḥ // Ragh_3.57 //
analyzed: babhūva yuddham tumuulam jaya eṣiṇoḥ adhomukhaiḥ ūrdhva mukhaiḥ ca pattribhiḥ

original: atiprabandhaprahitāstravṛṣṭibhis tam āśrayaṃ duṣprahasya tejasaḥ /
analyzed: ati prabandha prahita astra vṛṣṭibhiḥ tam āśrayam duṣprahasya tejasaḥ

original: śaśāka nirvāpayituṃ na vāsavaḥ svataś cyutaṃ vahnim ivādbhir ambudaḥ // Ragh_3.58 //
analyzed: śaśāka nirvāpayitum na vāsavaḥ svatas cyutam vahnim iva adbhiḥ ambudaḥ

original: tataḥ prakoṣṭhe haricandanāṅkite pramathyamānārṇavadhīra /
analyzed: tatas prakoṣṭhe haricandana aṅkite pramathyamāna arṇava dhīra

original: raghuḥ śaśāṅkārdhamukhena pattriṇā śarāsanajyām alunād viḍaujasaḥ // Ragh_3.59 //
analyzed: raghuḥ śaśāṅka ardha mukhena pattriṇā śarāsana jyām alunāt viḍaujasaḥ

original: sa cāpam utsṛjya vivṛddhamatsaraḥ praṇāśanāya prabalasya vidviṣaḥ /
analyzed: sa cāpam utsṛjya vivṛddha matsaraḥ praṇāśanāya prabalasya vidviṣaḥ

original: mahīdhrapakṣavyaparopaṇocitaṃ sphuratprabhāmaṇḍalam astram ādade // Ragh_3.60 //
analyzed: mahīdhra pakṣa vyaparopaṇa ucitam sphurat prabhā maṇḍalam astram ādade

original: raghur bhṛśaṃ vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainikāśrubhiḥ /
analyzed: raghuḥ bhṛśam vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainika aśrubhiḥ

original: nimeṣamātrād avadhūya tad vyathāṃ sahotthitaḥ sainikaharṣanisvanaiḥ // Ragh_3.61 //
analyzed: nimeṣa mātrāt avadhūya tat vyathām saha utthitaḥ sainika harṣa nisvanaiḥ

original: tathāpi śastravyavahāraniṣṭhure bipakṣabhāve ciram asya tasthuṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api śastra vyavahāra niṣṭhure bipakṣa bhāve ciram asya tasthuṣaḥ

original: tutoṣa vīryātiśayena vṛtrahā padaṃ hi sarvatra guṇair nidhīyate // Ragh_3.62 //
analyzed: tutoṣa vīrya atiśayena vṛtrahā padam hi sarvatra guṇaiḥ nidhīyate

original: asaṅgam adriṣv api sāravattayā na me tvadanyena visoḍham āyudham /
analyzed: asaṅgam adriṣu api sāravat tayā na me tvad anyena visoḍham āyudham

original: avehi māṃ prītam ṛte turaṃgamāt kim icchasīti sphuṭam āha vāsavaḥ // Ragh_3.63 //
analyzed: avehi mām prītam ṛte turaṃgamāt kim icchasi iti sphuṭam āha vāsavaḥ

original: tato niṣaṅgād asamagram uddhṛtaṃ suvarṇapuṅkhadyutirañjitāṅgulim /
analyzed: tatas niṣaṅgāt asamagram uddhṛtam suvarṇa puṅkha dyuti rañjita aṅgulim

original: narendrasūnuḥ pratisaṃharann iṣuṃ priyaṃvadaḥ pratyavadat sureśvaram // Ragh_3.64 //
analyzed: narendra sūnuḥ pratisaṃharan iṣum priyaṃvadaḥ pratyavadat sureśvaram

original: amocyam aśvaṃ yadi manyase prabho tataḥ samāpte vidhinaiva karmaṇi /
analyzed: amocyam aśvam yadi manyase prabho tatas samāpte vidhinā eva karmaṇi

original: ajasradīkṣāprayataḥ sa madguruḥ krator aśeṣeṇa phalena yujyatām // Ragh_3.65 //
analyzed: ajasra dīkṣā prayataḥ sa mad guruḥ kratoḥ aśeṣeṇa phalena yujyatām

original: yathā ca vṛttāntam imaṃ sadogatas trilocanaikāṃśatayā durāsadaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca vṛttāntam imam sadaḥ gataḥ trilocana eka aṃśa tayā durāsadaḥ

original: tavaiva saṃdeṣaharād viśaṃpatiḥ śṛṇoti lokeśa tathā vidhīyatām // Ragh_3.66 //
analyzed: tava eva saṃdeṣa harāt viśaṃpatiḥ śṛṇoti lokeśa tathā vidhīyatām

original: tatheti kāmaṃ pratiśuśruvān raghor yathāgataṃ mātalisārathir yayau /
analyzed: tathā iti kāmam pratiśuśruvān raghoḥ yathāgatam mātali sārathiḥ yayau

original: nṛpasya nātipramanāḥ sadogṛhaṃ sudakṣināsūnur api nyavartata // Ragh_3.67 //
analyzed: nṛpasya na ati pramanāḥ sadogṛham sudakṣinā sūnuḥ api nyavartata

original: tam abhyanandat prathamaṃ prabodhitaḥ prajeśvaraḥ śāsanahāriṇā hareḥ /
analyzed: tam abhyanandat prathamam prabodhitaḥ prajeśvaraḥ śāsana hāriṇā hareḥ

original: parāmṛśan harṣajaḍena pāṇinā tadīyam aṅgaṃ kuliśavraṇāṅkitam // Ragh_3.68 //
analyzed: parāmṛśan harṣa jaḍena pāṇinā tadīyam aṅgam kuliśa vraṇa aṅkitam

original: iti kṣitīśo navatiṃ navādhikāṃ mahākratūnāṃ mahanīyaśāsanaḥ /
analyzed: iti kṣitīśaḥ navatim nava adhikām mahā kratūnām mahanīya śāsanaḥ

original: samāraurukṣur divam āyuṣaḥ kṣaye tatāna sopānaparaṃparām iva // Ragh_3.69 //
analyzed: samāraurukṣuḥ divam āyuṣaḥ kṣaye tatāna sopāna paraṃparām iva

original: atha sa viṣavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ dattvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam /
analyzed: atha sa viṣa vyāvṛtta ātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpati kakudam dattvā yūne sita ātapa vāraṇam

original: munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasām ikṣvākūṇā idaṃ hi kulavrtam // Ragh_3.70 //
analyzed: muni vana taru chāyām devyā tayā saha śiśriye galita vayasām ikṣvākūṇām idam hi kula vrtam

original: sa rājyaṃ guruṇā dattaṃ pratipadyādhikaṃ babhau /
analyzed: sa rājyam guruṇā dattam pratipadya adhikam babhau

original: dinānte nihitaṃ tejaḥ savitreva hutāśanaḥ // Ragh_4.1 //
analyzed: dina ante nihitam tejaḥ savitrā iva hutāśanaḥ

original: nyastaśastraṃ dilīpaṃ ca taṃ ca śuśruvuṣāṃ patim /
analyzed: nyasta śastram dilīpam ca tam ca patim

original: rājñām uddhṛtanārāce hṛdi śalyam ivārpitam // Ragh_4.1* //
analyzed: rājñām uddhṛta nārāce hṛdi śalyam iva arpitam

original: dilīpānantaraṃ rājye taṃ niśamya pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: dilīpa anantaram rājye tam niśamya pratiṣṭhitam

original: pūrvaṃ pradūmito rājñāṃ hṛdaye 'gnir ivotthitaḥ // Ragh_4.2 //
analyzed: pūrvam pradūmitaḥ rājñām hṛdaye gniḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: puruhūtadhvajasyeva tasyonnayanapaṅktayaḥ /
analyzed: puruhūta dhvajasya iva tasya unnayana paṅktayaḥ

original: navābhyutthānadarśinyo nananduḥ sa prajāḥ prajāḥ // Ragh_4.3 //
analyzed: nava abhyutthāna darśinyaḥ nananduḥ sa prajāḥ prajāḥ

original: samam eva samākrāntaṃ tasyonnayanapaṅktayaḥ /
analyzed: samam eva samākrāntam tasya unnayana paṅktayaḥ

original: tena siṃhāsanaṃ pitryam akhilaṃ cārimaṇḍalaṃ // Ragh_4.4 //
analyzed: tena siṃhāsanam pitryam akhilam cāri maṇḍalam

original: chāyāmaṇḍalalakṣyena tam adṛśyā kila svayam /
analyzed: chāyā maṇḍala lakṣyena tam adṛśyā kila svayam

original: padmā padmātapatreṇa bheje sāmrājyadīkṣitam // Ragh_4.5 //
analyzed: padmā padma ātapatreṇa bheje sāmrājya dīkṣitam

original: parikalpitasāṃnidhyā kāle kāle ca bandiṣu /
analyzed: parikalpita sāṃnidhyā kāle kāle ca bandiṣu

original: stutyaṃ stutibhir arthyābhir upatasthe sarasvatī // Ragh_4.6 //
analyzed: stutyam stutibhiḥ arthyābhiḥ upatasthe sarasvatī

original: manuprabhṛtibhir mānyair bhuktā yady api rājabhiḥ /
analyzed: manu prabhṛtibhiḥ mānyaiḥ bhuktā yadi api rājabhiḥ

original: tathāpy ananyapūrveva tasminn āsīd vasuṃdharā // Ragh_4.7 //
analyzed: tathā api an anya pūrvā iva tasmin āsīt vasuṃdharā

original: sa hi sarvasya lokasya yuktadaṇḍatayā manaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi sarvasya lokasya yukta daṇḍa tayā manaḥ

original: ādade nātiśītoṣṇo nabhasvān iva dakṣiṇaḥ // Ragh_4.8 //
analyzed: ādade na ati śīta uṣṇaḥ nabhasvān iva dakṣiṇaḥ

original: mandotkaṇṭaḥ kṛtās tena guṇādhikatayā gurau /
analyzed: manda utkaṇṭaḥ kṛtāḥ tena guṇa adhika tayā gurau

original: phalena sahakārasya phuṣpodgama iva prajāḥ // Ragh_4.9 //
analyzed: phalena sahakārasya phuṣpa udgamaḥ iva prajāḥ

original: nayavidbhir nave rājñi sad asac copadarśitam /
analyzed: naya vidbhiḥ nave rājñi sat asat ca upadarśitam

original: pūrva evābhavat pakṣas tasmin nābhavad uttaraḥ // Ragh_4.10 //
analyzed: pūrvaḥ eva abhavat pakṣaḥ tasmin na abhavat uttaraḥ

original: pañcānām api bhūtānām utkarṣaṃ pupuṣur guṇāḥ /
analyzed: pañcānām api bhūtānām utkarṣam pupuṣuḥ guṇāḥ

original: nave tasmin mahīpāle sarvaṃ navam ivābhavat // Ragh_4.11 //
analyzed: nave tasmin mahīpāle sarvam navam iva abhavat

original: yathā prahlādanāc candraḥ pratāpāt tapano yathā /
analyzed: yathā prahlādanāt candraḥ pratāpāt tapanaḥ yathā

original: tathaiva so 'bhūd anvartho rājā prakṛtirañjanāt // Ragh_4.12 //
analyzed: tathā eva saḥ bhūt anvarthaḥ rājā prakṛti rañjanāt

original: kāmaṃ karṇāntaviṣrānte viśāle tasya locane /
analyzed: kāmam karṇa anta viṣrānte viśāle tasya locane

original: cakṣuṣmattā tu śāstreṇa sūkṣmakāryārthadarśinā // Ragh_4.13 //
analyzed: cakṣuṣmat tā tu śāstreṇa sūkṣma kārya artha darśinā

original: labdhapraśamanasvastham athainaṃ samupasthitā /
analyzed: labdha praśamana svastham athā enam samupasthitā

original: pārthivaśrīr dvitīyeva śarat paṅkajalakṣaṇā // Ragh_4.14 //
analyzed: pārthiva śrīḥ dvitīyā iva śarad paṅkaja lakṣaṇā

original: nirvṛṣṭalaghubhir meghair muktavartmā suduḥsahaḥ /
analyzed: nirvṛṣṭa laghubhiḥ meghaiḥ mukta vartmā su duḥsahaḥ

original: svaṃ dhanuḥ śaṅkiteneva yugapad vyānaśe diśaḥ // Ragh_4.15 //
analyzed: svam dhanuḥ śaṅkitena iva yugapad vyānaśe diśaḥ

original: adhijyam āyudhaṃ kartuṃ muktavartmā suduḥsahaḥ /
analyzed: adhijyam āyudham kartum mukta vartmā su duḥsahaḥ

original: svaṃ dhanuḥ śaṅkiteneva saṃjahre śatamanyunā // Ragh_4.15* //
analyzed: svam dhanuḥ śaṅkitena iva saṃjahre śatamanyunā

original: vārṣikaṃ saṃjahārendro dhanur jaitraṃ raghur dadhau /
analyzed: vārṣikam saṃjahāra indraḥ dhanuḥ jaitram raghuḥ

original: prajārthasādhane tau hi paryāyodyatakārmukau // Ragh_4.16 //
analyzed: prajā artha sādhane tau hi paryāya udyata kārmukau

original: puṇḍarīkātapatras taṃ vikasatkāśacāmaraḥ /
analyzed: puṇḍarīka ātapatraḥ tam vikasat kāśa cāmaraḥ

original: ṛtur viḍambayām āsa āsīt samarasā dvayoḥ // Ragh_4.17 //
analyzed: ṛtuḥ viḍambayām āsa āsīt samarasā dvayoḥ

original: prasādarīkātapatras taṃ candre ca viśadaprabhe /
analyzed: tam candre ca viśada prabhe

original: tadā cakṣuṣmatāṃ prītir āsīt samarasā dvayoḥ // Ragh_4.18 //
analyzed: tadā cakṣuṣmatām prītiḥ āsīt samarasā dvayoḥ

original: haṃsaśreṇīṣu tārāsu kumudvatsu ca vāriṣu /
analyzed: haṃsa śreṇīṣu tārāsu kumudvatsu ca vāriṣu

original: vibhūtayays tadīyānāṃ paryastā yaśasām iva // Ragh_4.19 //
analyzed: tadīyānām paryastāḥ yaśasām iva

original: ikṣucchāyaniṣādinyas tasya goptur guṇodayam /
analyzed: ikṣu chāya niṣādinyaḥ tasya goptuḥ guṇa udayam

original: ākumārakathodghātaṃ śāligopyo jagur yaśaḥ // Ragh_4.20 //
analyzed: ā kumāra kathā udghātam śāli gopyaḥ jaguḥ yaśaḥ

original: prasasādodayād ambhaḥ kumbhayoner mahaujasaḥ /
analyzed: prasasāda udayāt ambhaḥ kumbhayoneḥ mahā ojasaḥ

original: raghor abhibhavāśaṅki cukṣubhe dviṣatāṃ manaḥ // Ragh_4.21 //
analyzed: raghoḥ abhibhava āśaṅki cukṣubhe dviṣatām manaḥ

original: madodagrāḥ kakudmantaḥ saritāṃ kūlamudrujāḥ /
analyzed: mada udagrāḥ kakudmantaḥ saritām kūlam udru jāḥ

original: līlākhelam anuprāpur mohakṣās tasya vikramam // Ragh_4.22 //
analyzed: līlā khelam anuprāpuḥ mohakṣāḥ tasya vikramam

original: prasavaiḥ saptaparṇānāṃ madagandhibhir āhatāḥ /
analyzed: prasavaiḥ sapta parṇānām mada gandhibhiḥ āhatāḥ

original: asūyayeva tannāgāḥ saptadhaiva prasusruvuḥ // Ragh_4.23 //
analyzed: asūyayā iva tat nāgāḥ saptadhā eva prasusruvuḥ

original: saritaḥ kurvatī gādhāḥ pathaś cāśyānakardamān /
analyzed: saritaḥ kurvatī gādhāḥ pathaḥ ca āśyāna kardamān

original: yātrāyai codayām āsa taṃ śakteḥ prathamaṃ śarat // Ragh_4.24 //
analyzed: yātrāyai codayām āsa tam śakteḥ prathamam śarad

original: samyak tasmai ghuto vahnir vājinīrājanāvidhau /
analyzed: samyak tasmai ghutaḥ vahniḥ vājinī rājanā vidhau

original: pradakṣiṇārcir vyājena hasteneva jayaṃ dadau // Ragh_4.25 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa arciḥ vyājena hastena iva jayam dadau

original: sa guptamūlapratyantaḥ śuddhapārṣṇir ayānvitaḥ /
analyzed: sa gupta mūla pratyantaḥ śuddha pārṣṇiḥ ayā anvitaḥ

original: ṣaḍvidhaṃ balam ādāya pratasthe digjigīṣayā // Ragh_4.26 //
analyzed: ṣaḍvidham balam ādāya pratasthe diś jigīṣayā

original: avākiran vayovṛddhās taṃ lājaiḥ paurayoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: avākiran vayaḥ vṛddhāḥ tam lājaiḥ paura yoṣitaḥ

original: pṛṣatair mandaroddhūtaiḥ kṣīrormaya ivācyutam // Ragh_4.27 //
analyzed: pṛṣataiḥ mandara uddhūtaiḥ kṣīra ūrmayaḥ iva acyutam

original: sa yayau prathamaṃ prācīṃ tulyaḥ prācīnabarhiṣā /
analyzed: sa yayau prathamam prācīm tulyaḥ prācīnabarhiṣā

original: ahitān aniloddhūtais tarjayann iva ketubhiḥ // Ragh_4.28 //
analyzed: ahitān anila uddhūtaiḥ tarjayan iva ketubhiḥ

original: rajobhiḥ syandanoddhūtair gajaiś ca ghanasaṃnibhaiḥ /
analyzed: rajobhiḥ syandana uddhūtaiḥ gajaiḥ ca ghana saṃnibhaiḥ

original: bhuvas talam iva vyoma kurvan vyomeva bhūtalam // Ragh_4.29 //
analyzed: bhuvaḥ talam iva vyoma kurvan vyoma iva bhū talam

original: pratāpo 'gre tataḥ śabdaḥ parāgas tadantaram /
analyzed: pratāpaḥ gre tatas śabdaḥ parāgaḥ tad antaram

original: yayau paścād rathādīti catuḥskandheva sā camūḥ // Ragh_4.30 //
analyzed: yayau paścāt ratha ādi iti catur skandhā iva sā camūḥ

original: marupṛṣṭhāny udambhāṃsi nāvyāḥ supratarā nadīḥ /
analyzed: maru pṛṣṭhāni udambhāṃsi nāvyāḥ su pratarāḥ nadīḥ

original: vipināni prakāśāni śaktimattvāc cakāra saḥ // Ragh_4.31 //
analyzed: vipināni prakāśāni śaktimat tvāt cakāra saḥ

original: purogaiḥ kaluṣās tasya sahaprasthāyibhiḥ kṛśāḥ /
analyzed: purogaiḥ kaluṣāḥ tasya saha prasthāyibhiḥ kṛśāḥ

original: paścātprayāyibhiḥ paṅkāś cakrire mārganimnagāḥ // Ragh_4.31* //
analyzed: paścāt prayāyibhiḥ paṅkāḥ cakrire mārga nimna gāḥ

original: sa senāṃ mahatīṃ karṣan pūrvasāgaragāminīm /
