analyzed: sa senām mahatīm karṣan pūrva sāgara gāminīm

original: babhau harajaṭābhraṣṭāṃ gaṅgām iva bhagīrathaḥ // Ragh_4.32 //
analyzed: babhau hara jaṭā bhraṣṭām gaṅgām iva bhagīrathaḥ

original: tyājitaiḥ phalam utkhātair bhagnaiś ca bahudhā nṛpaiḥ /
analyzed: tyājitaiḥ phalam utkhātaiḥ bhagnaiḥ ca bahudhā nṛpaiḥ

original: tasyāsīd ulbaṇo mārgaḥ pādapair iva dantinaḥ // Ragh_4.33 //
analyzed: tasya āsīt ulbaṇaḥ mārgaḥ pādapaiḥ iva dantinaḥ

original: paurastyān evam ākrāmaṃs tāṃs tāñ janapadāñ jayī /
analyzed: paurastyān evam ākrāman tān tām janapadām jayī

original: prāpa tālīvanśyāmam upakañṭhaṃ mahodadheḥ // Ragh_4.34 //
analyzed: prāpa tālī vanśyāmam upakañṭham mahā udadheḥ

original: anamrāṇāṃ samuddhartus tasmāt sindhurayād iva /
analyzed: anamrāṇām samuddhartuḥ tasmāt sindhurayāt iva

original: ātmā saṃrakṣitaḥ suhmair vṛttim āśritya vaitasīm // Ragh_4.35 //
analyzed: ātmā saṃrakṣitaḥ suhmaiḥ vṛttim āśritya vaitasīm

original: vaṅgān utkhāya tarasā netā nausādhanoddhatān /
analyzed: vaṅgān utkhāya tarasā netā nau sādhana uddhatān

original: nicakhāna jayastambhān gaṅgāsroto'ntareṣu saḥ // Ragh_4.36 //
analyzed: nicakhāna jaya stambhān gaṅgā srotaḥ ntareṣu saḥ

original: āpādapadmapraṇatāḥ kalamā iva te raghum /
analyzed: ā pāda padma praṇatāḥ kalamāḥ iva te raghum

original: phalaiḥ saṃvardhayām āsur utkhātapratirpitāḥ // Ragh_4.37 //
analyzed: phalaiḥ saṃvardhayām āsuḥ utkhāta pratirpitāḥ

original: sa tīrtvā kapiṣāṃ sainyair baddhadviradasetubhiḥ /
analyzed: sa tīrtvā kapiṣām sainyaiḥ baddha dvirada setubhiḥ

original: utkalādarśitapathaḥ kaliṅgābhimukho yayau // Ragh_4.38 //
analyzed: utkalā darśita pathaḥ kaliṅga abhimukhaḥ yayau

original: sa pratāpaṃ mahendrasya mūrdhni tīkṣṇaṃ nyaveśayat /
analyzed: sa pratāpam mahā indrasya mūrdhni tīkṣṇam nyaveśayat

original: aṅkuśaṃ dviradasyeva yantā gambhīravedinaḥ // Ragh_4.39 //
analyzed: aṅkuśam dviradasya iva yantā gambhīra vedinaḥ

original: pratijagrāha kāliṅgas tam astrair gajasādhanaḥ /
analyzed: pratijagrāha kāliṅgaḥ tam astraiḥ gaja sādhanaḥ

original: pakṣacchedodyataṃ śakraṃ śilāvarṣīva parvataḥ // Ragh_4.40 //
analyzed: pakṣa cheda udyatam śakram śilā varṣī iva parvataḥ

original: dviṣāṃ viṣahya kākutsthas tatra nārācadurdinam /
analyzed: dviṣām viṣahya kākutsthaḥ tatra nārāca durdinam

original: sanmaṅgalasnāta iva pratipede jayaśriyam // Ragh_4.41 //
analyzed: sat maṅgala snātaḥ iva pratipede jaya śriyam

original: vāyavyāstravinirdhūtāt pakṣāviddhān mahodadheḥ /
analyzed: vāyavya astra vinirdhūtāt pakṣa āviddhāt mahā udadheḥ

original: gajānīkāt sa kāliṅgaṃ tārkṣyaḥ sarpam ivādade // Ragh_4.41* //
analyzed: gaja anīkāt sa kāliṅgam tārkṣyaḥ sarpam iva ādade

original: tāmbūlīnāṃ dalais tatra racitāpānabhūmayaḥ /
analyzed: tāmbūlīnām dalaiḥ tatra racita āpānabhūmayaḥ

original: nalikerāsavaṃ yodhāḥ śātravaṃ ca papur yaśaḥ // Ragh_4.42 //
analyzed: nalikera āsavam yodhāḥ śātravam ca papuḥ yaśaḥ

original: gṛhītapratimuktasya sa dharmavijayī nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhīta pratimuktasya sa dharma vijayī nṛpaḥ

original: śriyaṃ mahendranāthasya jahāra na tu medinīm // Ragh_4.43 //
analyzed: śriyam mahā indra nāthasya jahāra na tu medinīm

original: tato velātaṭenaiva phalavatpūgamālinā /
analyzed: tatas velā taṭena eva phalavat pūga mālinā

original: agastyācaritām āśām anāśāsyajayo yayau // Ragh_4.44 //
analyzed: agastya ācaritām āśām anāśāsya jayaḥ yayau

original: sa sainyaparibhogeṇa gajadānasugandhinā /
analyzed: sa sainya paribhogeṇa gaja dāna sugandhinā

original: kāverīṃ saritāṃ patyuḥ śaṅkanīyām ivākarot // Ragh_4.45 //
analyzed: kāverīm saritām patyuḥ śaṅkanīyām iva akarot

original: balair adhuṣitās tasya vijigīṣor gatādhvanaḥ /
analyzed: balaiḥ a dhuṣitāḥ tasya vijigīṣoḥ gata adhvanaḥ

original: maricodbhrāntahārītā malayādrer upatyakāḥ // Ragh_4.46 //
analyzed: marica udbhrānta hārītāḥ malaya adreḥ upatyakāḥ

original: sasañjur aśvakṣuṇṇānām elānām utpatiṣṇavaḥ /
analyzed: sasañjuḥ aśva kṣuṇṇānām elānām utpatiṣṇavaḥ

original: tulyagandhiṣu mattebhakaṭeṣu phalareṇavaḥ // Ragh_4.47 //
analyzed: tulya gandhiṣu matta ibha kaṭeṣu phala reṇavaḥ

original: ājāneyakhurakṣuṇṇapakvailākṣetrasaṃbhavam /
analyzed: ājāneya khura kṣuṇṇa pakva elā kṣetra saṃbhavam

original: vyānaśe sapadi vyoma tripadīchedinām api // Ragh_4.47* //
analyzed: vyānaśe sapadi vyoma tripadī chedinām api

original: bhogiveṣṭanamārgeṣu candanānāṃ samarpitam /
analyzed: bhogi veṣṭana mārgeṣu candanānām samarpitam

original: n'āsrasat kariṇāṃ graivaṃ tripadīchedinām api // Ragh_4.48 //
analyzed: nā asrasat kariṇām graivam tripadī chedinām api

original: diśi mandāyate tejo dakṣiṇasyāṃ raver api /
analyzed: diśi mandāyate tejaḥ dakṣiṇasyām raveḥ api

original: tasyām eva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpaṃ na viṣehire // Ragh_4.49 //
analyzed: tasyām eva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpam na viṣehire

original: tāmraparṇīsametasya muktāsāraṃ mahodadheḥ /
analyzed: tāmraparṇī sametasya muktā sāram mahā udadheḥ

original: te nipatya dadus tasmai yaśaḥ svam iva saṃcitam // Ragh_4.50 //
analyzed: te nipatya daduḥ tasmai yaśaḥ svam iva saṃcitam

original: sa nirviśya yathākāmaṃ taṭeṣv ālīnacandanau /
analyzed: sa nirviśya yathākāmam taṭeṣu ālīna candanau

original: stanāv iva diśas tasyāḥ śailau malayadardurau // Ragh_4.51 //
analyzed: stanau iva diśaḥ tasyāḥ śailau malaya dardurau

original: tasyānīkair visarpadbhir aparāntajayodyataiḥ /
analyzed: tasya anīkaiḥ visarpadbhiḥ aparānta jaya udyataiḥ

original: rāmāstrotsārito 'py āsīt sahyalagna ivārṇavaḥ // Ragh_4.53 //
analyzed: rāma astra utsāritaḥ pi āsīt sahya lagnaḥ iva arṇavaḥ

original: bhayotsṛṣṭavibhūṣāṇāṃ tena keralayoṣitām /
analyzed: bhaya utsṛṣṭa vibhūṣāṇām tena kerala yoṣitām

original: alakeṣu camūreṇuś cūrṇapratinidhīkṛtaḥ // Ragh_4.54 //
analyzed: alakeṣu camū reṇuḥ cūrṇa pratinidhīkṛtaḥ

original: muralāmārutoddhūtam agamat kaitakaṃ rajaḥ /
analyzed: muralā māruta uddhūtam agamat kaitakam rajaḥ

original: tadyodhavārabāṇānām ayatnapaṭavāsatām // Ragh_4.55 //
analyzed: tad yodha vāra bāṇānām ayatna paṭa vāsatām

original: abhyabhūyata vāhānāṃ caratāṃ gātraśiñjitaiḥ /
analyzed: abhyabhūyata vāhānām caratām gātra śiñjitaiḥ

original: varmabhiḥ pavanoddhūtarājatālīvanadvhvanaiḥ // Ragh_4.56 //
analyzed: varmabhiḥ pavana uddhūta rājatālī vanadvhvanaiḥ

original: kharjūrīskandhanaddhānāṃ madodgārtasugandhiṣu /
analyzed: kharjūrī skandha naddhānām mada udga ārta sugandhiṣu

original: kaṭeṣu kariṇāṃ petuḥ puṃnāgebhyaḥ śilīmukhāḥ // Ragh_4.57 //
analyzed: kaṭeṣu kariṇām petuḥ puṃnāgebhyaḥ śilīmukhāḥ

original: avakāśaṃ kilodanvān rāmāyābhyarthito dadau /
analyzed: avakāśam kila udanvān rāmāya abhyarthitaḥ dadau

original: aparāntamahīpālavyājena raghave karam // Ragh_4.58 //
analyzed: aparānta mahīpāla vyājena raghave karam

original: mattebharadanotkīrṇavyaktavikramalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: matta ibha radana utkīrṇa vyakta vikrama lakṣaṇam

original: trikūṭam eva tatroccair jayastambhaṃ cakāra saḥ // Ragh_4.59 //
analyzed: trikūṭam eva tatra uccais jaya stambham cakāra saḥ

original: pārasīkāṃs tato jetuṃ pratasthe sthalavartmanā /
analyzed: pārasīkān tatas jetum pratasthe sthala vartmanā

original: indriyākhyān iva ripūṃs tattvajñānena saṃyamī // Ragh_4.60 //
analyzed: indriya ākhyān iva ripūn tattva jñānena saṃyamī

original: yavanīmukhapadmānāṃ sehe madhumadaṃ na saḥ /
analyzed: yavanī mukha padmānām sehe madhu madam na saḥ

original: bālātapam ivābjānām akālajaladodayaḥ // Ragh_4.61 //
analyzed: bāla ātapam iva abjānām akāla jalada udayaḥ

original: saṃgrāmas tumulas tasya pāścātyair aśvasādhanaiḥ /
analyzed: saṃgrāmaḥ tumulaḥ tasya pāścātyaiḥ aśva sādhanaiḥ

original: śārṅgakūjitavijñeyapratiyodhe rajasy abhūt // Ragh_4.62 //
analyzed: śārṅga kūjita vijñeya pratiyodhe rajasi abhūt

original: bhallāpavarjitais teṣāṃ śirobhiḥ śmaśrulair mahīm /
analyzed: bhallāpa varjitaiḥ teṣām śirobhiḥ śmaśrulaiḥ mahīm

original: tastāra saraghāvyāptaiḥ sa kṣaudrapaṭalair iva // Ragh_4.63 //
analyzed: tastāra saraghā vyāptaiḥ sa kṣaudra paṭalaiḥ iva

original: apanītaśirastrāṇāḥ śeṣās taṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ /
analyzed: apanīta śirastrāṇāḥ śeṣāḥ tam śaraṇam yayuḥ

original: praṇipātapratīkāraḥ saṃrambho hi mahātmanām // Ragh_4.64 //
analyzed: praṇipāta pratīkāraḥ saṃrambhaḥ hi mahātmanām

original: vinayante sma tadyodhā madhubhir vijayaśramam /
analyzed: vinayante sma tad yodhāḥ madhubhiḥ vijaya śramam

original: āstīrṇājinaratnāsu drākṣāvalayabhūmiṣu // Ragh_4.65 //
analyzed: āstīrṇa ajina ratnāsu drākṣā valaya bhūmiṣu

original: tataḥ pratasthe kauberīṃ bhāsvān iva raghur diśam /
analyzed: tatas pratasthe kauberīm bhāsvān iva raghuḥ diśam

original: śarair usrair ivodīcyān uddhariṣyam rasān iva // Ragh_4.66 //
analyzed: śaraiḥ usraiḥ iva udīcyān uddhariṣyam rasān iva

original: jitān ajayyas tān eva kṛtvā rathapuraḥsarān /
analyzed: jitān ajayyaḥ tān eva kṛtvā ratha puraḥsarān

original: mahārṇavam ivaurāgniḥ praviveśottarāpatham // Ragh_4.66* //
analyzed: mahā arṇavam iva aura agniḥ praviveśa uttarāpatham

original: vinītādhvaśramās tasya sindhutīraveceṣṭanaiḥ /
analyzed: vinīta adhva śramāḥ tasya sindhu tīra veceṣṭanaiḥ

original: dudhuvur vājinaḥ skandhāṃl lagnakuṅkumakesarān // Ragh_4.67 //
analyzed: dudhuvuḥ vājinaḥ skandhān lagna kuṅkuma kesarān

original: tatra hūṇāvarodhānāṃ bhartṛśu vyaktavikramam /
analyzed: tatra hūṇa avarodhānām vyakta vikramam

original: kapolapāṭalādeśi babhūva raghuceṣṭitam // Ragh_4.68 //
analyzed: kapola pāṭalā deśi babhūva raghu ceṣṭitam

original: kāmbojāḥ samare soḍhuṃ tasya vīryam anīśvarāḥ /
analyzed: kāmbojāḥ samare soḍhum tasya vīryam anīśvarāḥ

original: gajālānaparikliṣṭair akṣoṭaiḥ sārdham ānatāḥ // Ragh_4.69 //
analyzed: gaja ālāna parikliṣṭaiḥ akṣa uṭaiḥ sārdham ānatāḥ

original: teṣāṃ sadaśvabhūyiṣṭhās tuṅgā draviṇarāśayaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām sat aśva bhūyiṣṭhāḥ tuṅgāḥ draviṇa rāśayaḥ

original: upadā viviśuḥ śaśvan notsekāḥ kosaleśvaram // Ragh_4.70 //
analyzed: upadāḥ viviśuḥ śaśvat na utsekāḥ kosala īśvaram

original: tato gaurīguruṃ śailam ārurohāśvasādhanaḥ /
analyzed: tatas gaurīgurum śailam āruroha aśvasādhanaḥ

original: vardhayann iva tatkūṭān uddhūtair dhātureṇubhiḥ // Ragh_4.71 //
analyzed: vardhayan iva tad kūṭān uddhūtaiḥ dhātu reṇubhiḥ

original: śaśaṃsa tulyasattvānāṃ sainyaghoṣe 'py asaṃbhramam /
analyzed: śaśaṃsa tulya sattvānām sainya ghoṣe pi asaṃbhramam

original: guhāśayānāṃ siṃhānāṃ parivṛtyāvalokitam // Ragh_4.72 //
analyzed: guhā āśayānām siṃhānām parivṛtya avalokitam

original: bhūrjeṣu marmarībhūtāḥ kīcakadhvanihetavaḥ /
analyzed: bhūrjeṣu marmarībhūtāḥ kīcaka dhvani hetavaḥ

original: gaṅgāśīkariṇo mārge marutas taṃ siṣevire // Ragh_4.73 //
analyzed: gaṅgā śīkariṇaḥ mārge marutaḥ tam siṣevire

original: viśaśramur namerūṇāṃ chāyāsv adhyāsya sainikāḥ /
analyzed: viśaśramuḥ namerūṇām chāyāsu adhyāsya sainikāḥ

original: dṛṣado vāsitotsaṅgā niṣaṇṇamṛganābhibhiḥ // Ragh_4.74 //
analyzed: dṛṣadaḥ vāsita utsaṅgāḥ niṣaṇṇa mṛga nābhibhiḥ

original: saralāsaktamātaṅgagraiveyasphuritatviṣaḥ /
analyzed: sarala āsakta mātaṅga graiveya sphurita tviṣaḥ

original: āsannoṣadhayo netur naktam asnehadīpikāḥ // Ragh_4.75 //
analyzed: āsanna oṣadhayaḥ netuḥ naktam a sneha dīpikāḥ

original: tasyotsṛṣṭanivāseṣu kaṇṭharajjukṣata tvacaḥ /
analyzed: tasya utsṛṣṭa nivāseṣu tvacaḥ

original: gajavarṣma kirātebhyaḥ śaśaṃsur devadāravaḥ // Ragh_4.76 //
analyzed: gaja varṣma kirātebhyaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ devadāravaḥ

original: tatra janyaṃ raghor ghoraṃ pārvatīyair gaṇair abhūt /
analyzed: tatra janyam raghoḥ ghoram pārvatīyaiḥ gaṇaiḥ abhūt

original: nārācakṣepaṇīyāśmaniṣpeṣotpatitānalam // Ragh_4.77 //
śarair utsavasaṃketān sa kṛtvā viratotsavān /
analyzed: śaraiḥ utsava saṃketān sa kṛtvā virata utsavān

original: jayodāharaṇaṃ bāhvor gāpayām āsa kiṃnarān // Ragh_4.78 //
analyzed: jaya udāharaṇam bāhvoḥ gāpayām āsa kiṃnarān

original: paraspareṇa vijñātas teṣūpāyanapāṇiṣu /
analyzed: paraspareṇa vijñātaḥ teṣu upāyana pāṇiṣu

original: rājñā himavataḥ sāro rājñaḥ sāro himādriṇā // Ragh_4.79 //
analyzed: rājñā himavataḥ sāraḥ rājñaḥ sāraḥ himādriṇā

original: tatrākṣobhyaṃ yaśorāśiṃ niveśyāvarurobha saḥ /
analyzed: tatra akṣobhyam yaśaḥ rāśim niveśya avarurobha saḥ

original: paulastyatulitasyādrer ādadhāna iva hriyam // Ragh_4.80 //
analyzed: paulastya tulitasya adreḥ ādadhānaḥ iva hriyam

original: cakampe tīrṇalauhitye tasmin prāgjyotiṣeśvaraḥ /
analyzed: cakampe tīrṇa lauhitye tasmin prāgjyotiṣa īśvaraḥ

original: tadgālānatāṃ prāptaiḥ saha kālāgurudruamaiḥ // Ragh_4.81 //
analyzed: tad gālā ānatām prāptaiḥ saha kālāguru druamaiḥ

original: na prasehe sa ruddhārkam adhārāvarṣadurdinam /
analyzed: na prasehe sa ruddha arkam adhārā varṣa durdinam

original: rathavartma rajo 'py asya kuta eva patākinīm // Ragh_4.82 //
analyzed: ratha vartma rajaḥ pi asya kutas eva patākinīm

original: tam īśaḥ kāmarūpāṇām atyākhaṇḍalavikramam /
analyzed: tam īśaḥ kāmarūpāṇām ati ākhaṇḍala vikramam

original: bheje bhinnakaṭair nāgair anyān uparurodha yaiḥ // Ragh_4.83 //
analyzed: bheje bhinna kaṭaiḥ nāgaiḥ anyān uparurodha yaiḥ

original: kāmarūpeśvaras tasya hemapīṭhādhidevatām /
analyzed: kāmarūpa īśvaraḥ tasya hema pīṭha adhidevatām

original: ratnapuṣpopahāreṇa cchāyām ānarca pādayoḥ // Ragh_4.84 //
analyzed: ratna puṣpa upahāreṇa chāyām ānarca pādayoḥ

original: iti jitvā diṣo jiṣṇur nyavartata rathoddhatam /
analyzed: iti jitvā diṣaḥ jiṣṇuḥ nyavartata ratha uddhatam

original: rajo viśrāmayan rājñāṃ chattraśūnyeṣu mauliṣu // Ragh_4.85 //
analyzed: rajaḥ viśrāmayan rājñām chattra śūnyeṣu mauliṣu

original: sa viśvajitam ājahre yajñaṃ sarvasvadakṣiṇam /
analyzed: sa viśvajitam ājahre yajñam sarva sva dakṣiṇam

original: ādānaṃ hi visargāya sataṃ vārimucām iva // Ragh_4.86 //
analyzed: ādānam hi visargāya satam vāri mucām iva

original: sattrānte sacivasakhaḥ puraskriyābhir gurvībhiḥ śamitaparājayavyalīkān /
analyzed: sattra ante saciva sakhaḥ puraskriyābhiḥ gurvībhiḥ śamita parājaya vyalīkān

original: kākutsthaś ciravirahotsukāvarodhān rājanyān svapuranivṛttaye 'numene // Ragh_4.87 //
analyzed: kākutsthaḥ cira viraha utsuka avarodhān rājanyān sva pura nivṛttaye numene

original: yajñānte tam avabhṛthābiṣekapūtaṃ satkāraiḥ śamitaparājayavyalīkān /
analyzed: yajña ante tam avabhṛtha a biṣeka pūtam satkāraiḥ śamita parājaya vyalīkān

original: āmantryotsukavanitātpatadvisṛṣṭāḥ svāni svāny avanibhujaḥ purāṇi jagmuḥ // Ragh_4.87* //
analyzed: āmantrya utsuka vanitāt patat visṛṣṭāḥ svāni svāni avanibhujaḥ purāṇi jagmuḥ

original: te rekādhvajakuliśātapatraicihnaṃ samrājaś caraṇayugaṃ prasādalabhyam /
analyzed: te rekā dhvaja kuliśa ātapatraiḥ cihnam samrājaḥ caraṇa yugam prasāda labhyam

original: prasthānapraṇatibhir aṅgulīṣu cakrur maulisrakcyutamakarandareṇugauram // Ragh_4.88 //
analyzed: prasthāna praṇatibhiḥ aṅgulīṣu cakruḥ mauli sraj cyuta makaranda reṇu gauram

original: tam adhvare viśvajiti kṣitīśaṃ niḥśeṣaviśrāṇitakośajātam /
analyzed: tam adhvare viśvajiti kṣitīśam niḥśeṣa viśrāṇita kośa jātam

original: upāttavidyo gurudakṣinārthī kautsaḥ prapede varatantuśiṣyaḥ // Ragh_5.1 //
analyzed: upātta vidyaḥ kautsaḥ prapede vara tantu śiṣyaḥ

original: sa mṛnmaye vītahiraṇmayatvāt pātre nidhāyārgahyam anarghyaśīlaḥ /
analyzed: sa mṛd maye vīta hiraṇmaya tvāt pātre nidhāya ārgahyam an arghya śīlaḥ

original: śrutaprakāśaṃ yaśasā prakāśaḥ pratyujjagāmātithim ātitheyaḥ // Ragh_5.2 //
analyzed: śruta prakāśam yaśasā prakāśaḥ pratyujjagāma atithim ātitheyaḥ

original: tam arcayitvā vidhivad vidhijñas tapodhanaṃ mānadhanāgrayāyī /
analyzed: tam arcayitvā vidhivat vidhi jñaḥ tapodhanam māna dhana agra yāyī

original: viśāṃpatir viṣṭarabhājam ārāt kṛtāñjaliḥ kṛtyavid ita uvāca // Ragh_5.3 //
analyzed: viśām patiḥ viṣṭara bhājam ārāt kṛtāñjaliḥ kṛtya vid itas uvāca

original: apy agraṇīr mantrakṛtām ṛṣīṇāṃ kuśāgrabuddhe kuśalī gurus te /
analyzed: api agraṇīḥ mantra kṛtām ṛṣīṇām kuśa agra buddhe kuśalī guruḥ te

original: yatas tvayā jñānam aśeṣam āptam lokena caitanyam ivoṣṇaraśmeḥ // Ragh_5.4 //
analyzed: yatas tvayā jñānam aśeṣam āptam lokena caitanyam iva uṣṇaraśmeḥ

original: kāyena vācā manasāpi śaśvad yat saṃbhṛtaṃ vāsavadhairyalopi /
analyzed: kāyena vācā manasā api śaśvat yat saṃbhṛtam vāsava dhairya lopi

original: āpādyate na vyayam antarāyaiḥ kaccin maharṣes trividhaṃ tapas tat // Ragh_5.5 //
analyzed: āpādyate na vyayam antarāyaiḥ kaccit mahā ṛṣeḥ trividham tapaḥ tat

original: ādhārabandhapramukhaiḥ prayatnaiḥ saṃvardhitānāṃ sutanirviśeṣam /
analyzed: ādhāra bandha pramukhaiḥ prayatnaiḥ saṃvardhitānām suta nirviśeṣam

original: kaccin na vāyvādir upaplavo vaḥ śramacchidaṃ āśramapādapānām // Ragh_5.6 //
analyzed: kaccit na vāyu ādiḥ upaplavaḥ vaḥ śrama chidam āśrama pādapānām

original: kriyānimitteṣv api vatsalatvād abhagnakāmā munibhiḥ kuśeṣu /
analyzed: kriyā nimitteṣu api vatsala tvāt a bhagna kāmā munibhiḥ kuśeṣu

original: tadaṅkaśayyācyutanābhinālā kaccin mṛgīṇām anaghā prasūtiḥ // Ragh_5.7 //
analyzed: tad aṅka śayyā acyuta nābhi nālā kaccit mṛgīṇām anaghā prasūtiḥ

original: nirvartyate yair niyamābhiṣeko yebhyo nivāpāñjalayaḥ pitḥṇām /
analyzed: nirvartyate yaiḥ niyama abhiṣekaḥ yebhyaḥ nivāpa añjalayaḥ pitḥṇām

original: tāny uñchaṣaṣṭhāṅkitasaikatāni śivāni vas tīrthajalāni kaccit // Ragh_5.8 //
analyzed: tāni uñcha ṣaṣṭha aṅkita saikatāni śivāni vaḥ tīrtha jalāni kaccit

original: nīvārapākādi kaḍamgarīyair āmṛśyate jānapadair na kaccit /
analyzed: nīvāra pāka ādi kaḍamgarīyaiḥ āmṛśyate jānapadaiḥ na kiṃcid

original: kālopapannātithikalpabhāgaṃ vanyaṃ śarīrasthitisādhanaṃ vaḥ // Ragh_5.9 //
analyzed: kāla upapanna atithi kalpa bhāgam vanyam śarīra sthiti sādhanam vaḥ

original: api prasannena maharṣiṇā tvaṃ samyag vinīyānumato gṛhāya /
analyzed: api prasannena mahā ṛṣiṇā tvam samyak vinīya anumataḥ gṛhāya

original: kālo hy ayaṃ saṃkramituṃ dvitīyaṃ sarvopakārakṣamam āśramaṃ te // Ragh_5.10 //
analyzed: kālaḥ hi ayam saṃkramitum dvitīyam sarva upakāra kṣamam āśramam te

original: tavārhato nābhigamena tṛptaṃ mano niyogakriyayotsukaṃ me /
analyzed: tava arhataḥ na abhigamena tṛptam manaḥ niyoga kriyayā utsukam me

original: apy ājñayā śāsitur ātmanā vā prāpto 'si saṃbhāvayituṃ vanān mām // Ragh_5.11 //
analyzed: api ājñayā śāsituḥ ātmanā vā prāptaḥ si saṃbhāvayitum vanāt mām

original: ity arghyapātrānumitavyayasya raghor udārām api gāṃ niśamya /
analyzed: iti arghya pātra anumita vyayasya raghoḥ udārām api gām niśamya

original: svārthopapattiṃ prati durbalāśas tam ity avocad varatantuśiṣyaḥ // Ragh_5.12 //
analyzed: sva artha upapattim prati tam iti avocat varatantu śiṣyaḥ

original: sarvatra no vārttam avehi rājan nāthe kutas tvavy aśubhaṃ prajānām /
analyzed: sarvatra naḥ vārttam avehi rājan nāthe kutas aśubham prajānām

original: sūrye tapaty āvaraṇāya dṛṣṭeḥ kalpeta lokasya kathaṃ tamisrā // Ragh_5.13 //
analyzed: sūrye tapati āvaraṇāya dṛṣṭeḥ kalpeta lokasya katham tamisrā

original: bhaktiḥ pratīkṣyeṣu kulocitā te pūrvān mahābhāga tayā 'tiśeṣe /
analyzed: bhaktiḥ pratīkṣyeṣu kula ucitā te pūrvān mahābhāga tayā tiśeṣe

original: vyatītakālas tv aham abhyupetas tvām arthibhāvād iti me viṣādaḥ // Ragh_5.14 //
analyzed: vyatīta kālaḥ tu aham abhyupetaḥ tvām arthi bhāvāt iti me viṣādaḥ

original: śarīramātreṇa narendra tiṣṭhann ābhāsi tīrthapratipāditarddhiḥ /
analyzed: śarīra mātreṇa narendra tiṣṭhan ābhāsi tīrtha pratipādita ṛddhiḥ

original: āraṇyakopāttaphalaprasūtiḥ stambena nīvāra ivāvaśiṣṭaḥ // Ragh_5.15 //
analyzed: āraṇyaka upātta phala prasūtiḥ stambena nīvāraḥ iva avaśiṣṭaḥ

original: sthāne bhavān ekanarādhipaḥ sann akiṃcanatvaṃ makhajaṃ vyanakti /
analyzed: sthāne bhavān eka narādhipaḥ san akiṃcana tvam makha jam vyanakti

original: paryāyapītasya surair himāṃśoḥ kalākṣayaḥ ślāghyataro hi vṛddheḥ // Ragh_5.16 //
analyzed: paryāya pītasya suraiḥ himāṃśoḥ kalā kṣayaḥ ślāghyataraḥ hi vṛddheḥ

original: tadanyatas tāvad ananyakāryo gurvartham āhartum ahaṃ yatiṣye /
analyzed: tad anyatas tāvat ananya kāryaḥ guru artham āhartum aham yatiṣye

original: svasty astu te nirgalitāmbugarbhaṃ śaradghanaṃ nārdati cātako 'pi // Ragh_5.17 //
analyzed: svasti astu te nirgalita ambu garbham śarad ghanam na ardati

original: etāvad uktvā pratiyātukāmaṃ śiṣyaṃ maharṣer nṛpatir niṣidhya /
analyzed: etāvat uktvā pratiyātu kāmam śiṣyam mahā ṛṣeḥ nṛpatiḥ niṣidhya

original: kiṃ vastu vidvan gurave pradeyaṃ tvayā kiyad veti tam anvayuṅkta // Ragh_5.18 //
analyzed: kim vastu vidvan gurave pradeyam tvayā kiyat vā iti tam anvayuṅkta

original: tato yathāvadvihitādhvarāya tasmai smayāveśavivarjitāya /
analyzed: tatas yathāvat vihita adhvarāya tasmai smaya āveśa vivarjitāya

original: varṇāśramāṇāṃ gurave sa varṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ prastutam ācacakṣe // Ragh_5.19 //
analyzed: varṇa āśramāṇām gurave sa varṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ prastutam ācacakṣe

original: samāptavidyena mayā maharṣir vijñāpito 'bhūd gurudakṣiṇāyai /
analyzed: samāpta vidyena mayā mahā ṛṣiḥ vijñāpitaḥ bhūt guru dakṣiṇāyai

original: sa me cirāyāskhalitopacārāṃ tāṃ bhaktim evāgaṇayat purastāt // Ragh_5.20 //
analyzed: sa me cirāya a skhalita upacārām tām bhaktim evā agaṇayat purastāt

original: nirbandhasaṃjātaruṣārthakārśyam acintayitvā guruṇāham uktaḥ /
analyzed: nirbandha saṃjāta ruṣā artha kārśyam a cintayitvā guruṇā aham uktaḥ

original: vittasya vidyāparisaṃkhyayā me koṭīṣ catasro daśa cāhareti // Ragh_5.21 //
analyzed: vittasya vidyā parisaṃkhyayā me koṭīḥ catasraḥ daśa ca āhara iti

original: so 'haṃ saparyāvidhibhājanena matvā bahvantaṃ prabhuśabdaśeṣam /
analyzed: saḥ ham saparyā vidhi bhājanena matvā bahu antam prabhu śabda śeṣam

original: abhyutsahe saṃprati noparoddhum alpetaratvāc chrutaniṣkrayasya // Ragh_5.22 //
analyzed: abhyutsahe saṃprati nā uparoddhum alpa itara tvāt śruta niṣkrayasya

original: itthaṃ dvijena dvijarākāntir āvedito vedavidāṃ vareṇa /
analyzed: ittham dvijena dvija rā kāntiḥ āveditaḥ veda vidām vareṇa

original: enonivṛttendriyavṛttir enaṃ jagāda bhūyo jagadekanāthaḥ // Ragh_5.23 //
analyzed: enaḥ nivṛtta indriya vṛttiḥ enam jagāda bhūyas jagat eka nāthaḥ

original: gurvartham arthī śrutapāradṛśvā raghoḥ sakāśād anavāpya kāmam /
analyzed: guru artham arthī śruta pāra dṛśvā raghoḥ sakāśāt an avāpya kāmam

original: gato vadāyāntaram ity ayaṃ me mā bhūt parīvādanavāvatāraḥ // Ragh_5.24 //
analyzed: gataḥ vadāya antaram iti ayam me mā bhūt

original: sa tvaṃ praśaste mahite madīye vasaṃś caturtho 'gnir ivāgnyagāre /
analyzed: sa tvam praśaste mahite madīye vasan caturthaḥ gniḥ iva agnyagāre

original: dvitrāṇy ahāny arhasi soḍhum arhan yāvad yate sādhayituṃ tvadartham // Ragh_5.25 //
analyzed: dvitrāṇi ahāni arhasi soḍhum arhan yāvat yate sādhayitum tvad artham

original: tatheti tasy' āvitathaṃ pratītaḥ pratyagrahīt saṃgaram agrajanmā /
analyzed: tathā iti tasi ā avitatham pratītaḥ pratyagrahīt saṃgaram agrajanmā

original: gām āttasārāṃ raghur apy avekṣya niṣkaṣṭum arthaṃ cakame kuberāt // Ragh_5.26 //
analyzed: gām ātta sārām raghuḥ api avekṣya niṣkaṣṭum artham cakame kuberāt

original: vasiṣṭhamantrokṣaṇajāt prabhāvād udanvadākāśamahīdhareṣu /
analyzed: vasiṣṭha mantra ukṣaṇa jāt prabhāvāt udanvat ākāśa mahīdhareṣu

original: marutsakhasyeva balāhakasya gatir vijaghne na hi tadrathasya // Ragh_5.27 //
analyzed: marut sakhasya iva balāhakasya gatiḥ vijaghne na hi tat rathasya

original: athādhiśiśye prayathaḥ pradoṣe rathaṃ raghuḥ kalpitaśastragarbham /
analyzed: athā adhiśiśye prayathaḥ pradoṣe ratham raghuḥ kalpita śastra garbham

original: sāmantasaṃbhāvanayaiva dhīraḥ kailāsanāthaṃ tarasā jigīṣuḥ // Ragh_5.28 //
analyzed: sāmanta saṃbhāvanayā eva dhīraḥ kailāsa nātham tarasā jigīṣuḥ

original: prātaḥ prayāṇābhimukhāya tasmai savismayāḥ kośagṛhe niyuktāḥ /
analyzed: prātar prayāṇa abhimukhāya tasmai sa vismayāḥ kośagṛhe niyuktāḥ

original: hiraṇmayīṃ kośagṛhasya madhye vṛṣṭiṃ śaśaṃsuḥ patitāṃ nabhastaḥ // Ragh_5.29 //
analyzed: hiraṇmayīm kośagṛhasya madhye vṛṣṭim śaśaṃsuḥ patitām nabhastaḥ

original: taṃ bhūpatir bhāsurahemarāśiṃ labdhaṃ kuberād abhiyāsyamānāt /
analyzed: tam bhūpatiḥ bhāsura hema rāśim labdham kuberāt abhiyāsyamānāt

original: dideśa kautasya samastam eva pādaṃ sumeror iva vajrabhinnam // Ragh_5.30 //
analyzed: dideśa kautasya samastam eva pādam sumeroḥ iva vajra bhinnam

original: janasya sāketanivāsinas tau dvāv apy abhūtām abhinandyasattvau /
analyzed: janasya sāketa nivāsinaḥ tau dvau api abhūtām abhinandya sattvau

original: gurupradeyādhikanīḥspṛho 'rthī nṛpo 'rthikāmād adhikapradaś ca // Ragh_5.31 //
analyzed: guru pradeya adhika nīḥspṛhaḥ rthī nṛpaḥ rthi kāmāt adhika pradaḥ ca

original: athoṣṭravāmīśatavāhitārthaṃ prajeṣvaraṃ prītamanā maharṣiḥ /
analyzed: atha uṣṭra vāmī śata vāhita artham prajeṣu aram prīta manāḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ

original: spṛṣan kareṇānatapūrvakāyaṃ saṃprasthito vācam uvāca kautsaḥ // Ragh_5.32 //
analyzed: spṛṣan kareṇa ānata pūrva kāyam saṃprasthitaḥ vācam uvāca kautsaḥ

original: kim atra citraṃ yadi kāmasūr bhūr vṛtte sthitasyādhipateḥ prajānām /
analyzed: kim atra citram yadi kāmasūḥ bhūḥ vṛtte sthitasya adhipateḥ prajānām

original: acintanīyas tu tava prabhāvo manīṣitaṃ dyaur api yena dugdhā // Ragh_5.33 //
analyzed: a cintanīyaḥ tu tava prabhāvaḥ manīṣitam dyauḥ api yena dugdhā

original: āśāsyam anyat punaruktabhūtaṃ śreyāṃsi sarvāṇy adhijagmuṣas te /
analyzed: āśāsyam anyat punar ukta bhūtam śreyāṃsi sarvāṇi adhijagmuṣaḥ te

original: putraṃ labhasvātmaguṇānurūpaṃ bhavantam īḍaṃ bhavataḥ piteva // Ragh_5.34 //
analyzed: putram labhasva ātma guṇa anurūpam bhavantam īḍam bhavataḥ pitā iva

original: itthaṃ prayujyāśiṣam agrajanmā rājñe pratīyāya guroḥ sakāśam /
analyzed: ittham prayujya āśiṣam agrajanmā rājñe pratīyāya guroḥ sakāśam

original: rājāpi lebhe sutam āśu tasmād ālokam arkād iva jīvalokaḥ // Ragh_5.35 //
analyzed: rājā api lebhe sutam āśu tasmāt ālokam arkāt iva jīva lokaḥ

original: brāhme muhūrte kila tasya devī kumārakalpaṃ suṣuve kumāram /
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte kila tasya devī kumāra kalpam suṣuve kumāram

original: ataḥ pitā brahmaṇa eva nāmnā tam ātmajanmānam ajaṃ cakāra // Ragh_5.36 //
analyzed: atas pitā brahmaṇaḥ eva nāmnā tam ātmajanmānam ajam cakāra

original: rūpaṃ tad ojasvi tad eva vīryaṃ tadaiva naisargikam unnatatvam /
analyzed: rūpam tat ojasvi tat eva vīryam tadā eva naisargikam unnata tvam

original: na kāraṇāt svād bibhide kumāraḥ pravartito dīpa iva pradīpāt // Ragh_5.37 //
analyzed: na kāraṇāt svāt bibhide kumāraḥ pravartitaḥ dīpaḥ iva pradīpāt

original: upāttavidyaṃ vidhivad gurubhyas taṃ yauvanodbhedaviśeṣakāntam /
analyzed: upātta vidyam vidhivat gurubhyaḥ tam yauvana udbheda viśeṣa kāntam

original: śrīr gantukāmāpi guror anujñāṃ dhīreva kanyā pitur ācakāṅkṣa // Ragh_5.38 //
analyzed: śrīḥ gantu kāmā api guroḥ anujñām dhīrā iva kanyā pituḥ ācakāṅkṣa

original: atheśvareṇa krathakaiśikānāṃ svayaṃvarārthaṃ svasur indumatyāḥ /
analyzed: atha īśvareṇa kratha kaiśikānām svayaṃvara artham svasuḥ indumatyāḥ

original: āptaḥ kumārānayanotsukena bhojena dūto raghave visṛṣṭaḥ // Ragh_5.39 //
analyzed: āptaḥ kumāra ānayana utsukena bhojena dūtaḥ raghave visṛṣṭaḥ

original: taṃ ślāghyasaṃbandham asau vicintya dārakriyāyogyadaśaṃ ca putram /
analyzed: tam ślāghya saṃbandham asau vicintya dārakriyā yogya daśam ca putram

original: prasthāpayām āsa sasainyam enam ṛddhāṃ vidarbhādhiparājadhānīm // Ragh_5.40 //
analyzed: prasthāpayām āsa sa sainyam enam ṛddhām vidarbha adhipa rājadhānīm

original: tasyopakāryāracitopakārā vanyetarā jānapadopadābhiḥ /
analyzed: tasya upakāryā a racita upakārāḥ vanyā itarāḥ jānapada upadābhiḥ

original: mārge nivāsā manujendrasūnor babhūvur udyānavihārakalpāḥ // Ragh_5.41 //
analyzed: mārge nivāsāḥ manuja indra sūnoḥ babhūvuḥ udyāna vihāra kalpāḥ

original: sa narmadārodhasi śīkarārdrair marudbhir ānartitanaktamāle /
analyzed: sa narmadā rodhasi śīkara ārdraiḥ marudbhiḥ ānartita naktamāle

original: niveśayām āsa vilaṅghitādhvā klāntaṃ rajodhūsaraketu sainyam // Ragh_5.42 //
analyzed: niveśayām āsa vilaṅghita adhvā klāntam rajaḥ dhūsara ketu sainyam

original: athopariṣṭād bhramarair bhramadbhiḥ prāk sūcitāntaḥsalilapraveśaḥ /
analyzed: atha upariṣṭāt bhramaraiḥ bhramadbhiḥ prāk sūcita antar salila praveśaḥ

original: nirdhauta dānāmalagaṇḍabhittir yanyaḥ saritto gaja unmamajja // Ragh_5.43 //
analyzed: nirdhauta dāna amala gaṇḍa bhittiḥ yan yaḥ sarittaḥ gajaḥ unmamajja

original: niḥśeṣavikṣālitadhātunāpi vaprakriyām ṛkṣavatas taṭeṣu /
analyzed: niḥśeṣa vikṣālita dhātunā api vapra kriyām ṛkṣavataḥ taṭeṣu

original: nīlordhvarekhāśabalena śaṃsan dantadvayenāśmavikuṇṭhitena // Ragh_5.44 //
analyzed: nīla ūrdhva rekhā śabalena śaṃsan danta dvayena aśma vikuṇṭhitena

original: saṃhāravikṣepalaghukriyeṇa hastena tīrābhimukhaḥ saśabdam /
analyzed: saṃhāra vikṣepa laghu kriyeṇa hastena tīra abhimukhaḥ sa śabdam

original: babhau sa bhindan bṛhatas taraṅgān vāryargalābhaṅga iva pravṛttaḥ // Ragh_5.45 //
analyzed: babhau sa bhindan bṛhataḥ taraṅgān vāri argala ābhaṅge iva pravṛttaḥ

original: sa bhogibhogādhikapīvareṇa hastena tīrābhimukhaḥ saśabdam /
analyzed: sa bhogi bhoga adhika pīvareṇa hastena tīra abhimukhaḥ sa śabdam

original: saṃvardhitārtdhaprahitena dīrghān cikṣepa vārīparighān ivormīn // Ragh_5.45* //
analyzed: saṃvardhita artdha prahitena dīrghān cikṣepa vārī parighān iva ūrmīn

original: śailopamaḥ śaivalamañjarīṇāṃ jālāni karṣann urasā sa paścāt /
analyzed: śaila upamaḥ śaivala mañjarīṇām jālāni karṣan urasā sa paścāt

original: pūrvaṃ tadutpīḍitavārirāśiḥ saritpravāhas taṭam utsasarpa // Ragh_5.46 //
analyzed: pūrvam tad utpīḍita vāri rāśiḥ sarit pravāhaḥ taṭam utsasarpa

original: kāraṇḍavotsṛṣṭamṛdupratnānāḥ pulindayoṣāmbuvihārakāñcīḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇḍava utsṛṣṭa mṛdu pratna ānāḥ pulinda yoṣā ambu vihāra kāñcīḥ

original: karṣan sa śaivālalatā nadīṣaḥ skandhāvalagnās taṭam utsasarpa // Ragh_5.46* //
analyzed: karṣan sa śaivāla latāḥ nadī iṣaḥ skandha avalagnāḥ taṭam utsasarpa

original: tasyaikanāgasya kapolabhittyor jalāvagāhakṣaṇamātraśāntā /
analyzed: tasya eka nāgasya kapola bhittyoḥ jala avagāha kṣaṇa mātra śāntā

original: vanyetarānekapadarśanena punar didīpe madadurdinaśrīḥ // Ragh_5.47 //
analyzed: punar didīpe mada durdina śrīḥ

original: saptacchadakṣīrakaṭupravāham asahyam āghrāya madaṃ tadīyam /
analyzed: saptacchada kṣīra kaṭu pravāham asahyam āghrāya madam tadīyam

original: vilaṅghitādhoraṇatīvrayatnāḥ senāgajendrā vimukhā babhūvuḥ // Ragh_5.48 //
analyzed: vilaṅghita ādhoraṇa tīvra yatnāḥ senā gaja indrāḥ vimukhāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: sa cchinnabandhadrutayugyaśūnyaṃ bhagnākṣaparyastarathaṃ kṣaṇena /
analyzed: sa chinna bandha druta yugya śūnyam bhagna akṣa paryasta ratham kṣaṇena

original: rāmāparitāṇavihastayodhaṃ senāniveśaṃ tumulaṃ cakāra // Ragh_5.49 //
analyzed: rāma a paritāṇa vihasta yodham senā niveśam tumulam cakāra

original: tam āpatantaṃ nṛpater avadhyo vanyaḥ karīti śrutavān kumāraḥ /
analyzed: tam āpatantam nṛpateḥ avadhyaḥ vanyaḥ karī iti śrutavān kumāraḥ

original: nivartayiṣyan viśikhena kumbhe jaghāna nātyāyatakṛṣṭaśārṅgaḥ // Ragh_5.50 //
analyzed: nivartayiṣyan viśikhena kumbhe jaghāna na ati āyata kṛṣṭa śārṅgaḥ

original: sa viddhamātraḥ kila nāgarūpam utsṛjya tadvismitasainyadṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: sa viddha mātraḥ kila nāga rūpam utsṛjya tad vismita sainya dṛṣṭaḥ

original: sphuratprabhāmaṇḍalamadhyavarti kāntaṃ vapur vyomacaraṃ prapede // Ragh_5.51 //
analyzed: sphurat prabhā maṇḍala madhya varti kāntam vapuḥ vyoma caram prapede

original: atha prabhāvopanataiḥ kumāraṃ kalpadrumotthair avakīrya puṣpaiḥ /
analyzed: atha prabhāva upanataiḥ kumāram kalpadruma utthaiḥ avakīrya puṣpaiḥ

original: uvāca vāgmī daśanaprabhābhiḥ saṃvardhitoraḥsthalatārahāraḥ // Ragh_5.52 //
analyzed: uvāca vāgmī daśana prabhābhiḥ saṃvardhita uraḥsthala tāra hāraḥ

original: mataṅgaśāpād avalepamūlād avāptavān asmi mataṅgajatvam /
analyzed: mataṅga śāpāt avalepa mūlāt avāptavān asmi mataṅga ja tvam

original: avehi gandharvapates tanūjaṃ priyaṃvadaṃ māṃ priyadarśanasya // Ragh_5.53 //
analyzed: avehi gandharva pateḥ tanūjam priyaṃvadam mām priya darśanasya

original: sa cānunītaḥ praṇatena paścān mayā maharṣir mṛdutām agacchat /
analyzed: sa ca anunītaḥ praṇatena paścāt mayā mahā ṛṣiḥ mṛdu tām agacchat

original: uṣṇatvam agnyātapasaṃprayogāc chaityaṃ hi yat sā prakṛtir jalasya // Ragh_5.54 //
analyzed: uṣṇa tvam agni ātapa saṃprayogāt śaityam hi yat sā prakṛtiḥ jalasya

original: ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavo yadā te bhetsyaty ajaḥ kumbham ayomukhena /
analyzed: ikṣvāku vaṃśa prabhavaḥ yadā te bhetsyati ajaḥ kumbham ayomukhena

original: saṃyokṣyase svena vapurmahimnā tadety avocat sa taponidhir mām // Ragh_5.55 //
analyzed: saṃyokṣyase svena vapuḥ mahimnā tadā iti avocat sa taponidhiḥ mām

original: saṃmocitaḥ sattvavatā tvayāhaṃ śāpāc ciraprārthitadarśanena /
analyzed: saṃmocitaḥ sattvavatā tvayā aham śāpāt cira prārthita darśanena

original: pratipriyaṃ ced bhavato na kuryāṃ vṛthā hi me syāt svapadopalabdhiḥ // Ragh_5.56 //
analyzed: pratipriyam ced bhavataḥ na kuryām vṛthā hi me syāt sva pada upalabdhiḥ

original: saṃmohanaṃ nāma sakhe mamāstraṃ prayogasaṃhāravibhaktamantram /
analyzed: saṃmohanam nāma sakhe mama astram prayoga saṃhāra vibhakta mantram

original: gāndharvam ādhatsva yataḥ prayoktur na cārihiṃsā vijayaś ca haste // Ragh_5.57 //
analyzed: gāndharvam ādhatsva yatas prayoktuḥ na ca ari hiṃsā vijayaḥ ca haste

original: alaṃ hriyā māṃ prati yan muhūrtaṃ dayāparo 'bhuḥ praharann api tvam /
analyzed: alam hriyā mām prati yat muhūrtam dayā paraḥ bhuḥ praharan api tvam

original: tasmād upacchandayati prayojaṃ mayi tvayā na pratiśedharaukṣyam // Ragh_5.58 //
analyzed: tasmāt upacchandayati prayojam mayi tvayā na pratiśedha raukṣyam

original: tathety upaspṛśya payaḥ pavitraṃ somodhbavāyāḥ sarito nṛsomaḥ /
analyzed: tathā iti upaspṛśya payaḥ pavitram somodhbavāyāḥ saritaḥ nṛsomaḥ

original: udaṅmukhaḥ so 'stravid astramantraṃ jagrāha tasmān nigṛhītaśāpāt // Ragh_5.59 //
analyzed: udak mukhaḥ saḥ stra vid astra mantram jagrāha tasmāt nigṛhīta śāpāt

original: evaṃ tayor adhvani daivayogād āseduṣoḥ sakhyam acintyahetu /
analyzed: evam tayoḥ adhvani daiva yogāt āseduṣoḥ sakhyam acintya hetu

original: eko yayau caitrarathapadeśān saurājyaramyān aparo vidarbhān // Ragh_5.60 //
analyzed: ekaḥ yayau caitraratha padeśān saurājya ramyān aparaḥ vidarbhān

original: taṃ tasthivāṃsaṃ nagaropakaṇṭhe tadāgamārūḍhagurupraharṣaḥ /
analyzed: tam tasthivāṃsam nagara upakaṇṭhe tad āgama ārūḍha guru praharṣaḥ

original: pratyujjagāma krathakaiśikendraś candraṃ pravṛddhormir ivormimālī // Ragh_5.61 //
analyzed: pratyujjagāma kratha kaiśika indraḥ candram pravṛddha ūrmiḥ iva ūrmimālī

original: praveśya cainaṃ puram agrayāyī nīcais tathopācarad arpitaśrīḥ /
analyzed: praveśya ca enam puram agra yāyī nīcais tathā upācarat arpita śrīḥ

original: mene yathā tatra janaḥ sameto vaidarbham āgantum ajaṃ gṛheśam // Ragh_5.62 //
analyzed: mene yathā tatra janaḥ sametaḥ vaidarbham āgantum ajam gṛheśam

original: tasy' ādhikārapuruṣaiḥ praṇataiḥ pradiṣṭāṃ prāgdvāravediviniveśitapūrṇa kumbhām /
analyzed: tasi ādhikāra puruṣaiḥ praṇataiḥ pradiṣṭām prāc dvāra vedi viniveśita pūrṇa kumbhām

original: mene yathā tatra janaḥ sameto bālyāt parām iva daśāṃ madano 'dhyuvāsa // Ragh_5.63 //
analyzed: mene yathā tatra janaḥ sametaḥ bālyāt parām iva daśām madanaḥ dhi uvāsa

original: tatra svayaṃvarasamāhṛtarājalokaṃ kanyālalāma kamanīyam ajasya lipsoḥ /
analyzed: tatra svayaṃvara samāhṛta rāja lokam kanyā lalāma kamanīyam ajasya lipsoḥ

original: bhāvāvabodhakaluṣā dayiteva rātrau nidrā cireṇa nayanābhimukhī babhūva // Ragh_5.64 //
analyzed: bhāva avabodha kaluṣā dayitā iva rātrau nidrā cireṇa nayana abhimukhī babhūva

original: taṃ karṇabhūṣaṇanipīḍitapīvarāṃsaṃ śayyottaracchadavimardakṛśāṅgarāgam /
analyzed: tam karṇabhūṣaṇa nipīḍita pīvara aṃsam śayyā uttaracchada vimarda kṛśa aṅgarāgam

original: sūtātmajāḥ savayasaḥ prathitaprabodhaṃ)
analyzed: sūta ātmajāḥ savayasaḥ prathita prabodham

original: prābodhayann uṣasi vāgbhir udāravācaḥ // Ragh_5.65 //
analyzed: prābodhayan uṣasi vāgbhiḥ udāra vācaḥ

original: rātrir gatā matimatāṃ vara muñca śayyāṃ dhātrā dvidhaiva nanu dhūr jagato vibhaktā /
analyzed: rātriḥ gatā matimatām vara muñca śayyām dhātrā dvidhā eva nanu dhūḥ jagataḥ vibhaktā

original: tām ekatas tava bibharti gurur vinidras tasyā bhavān aparadhuryapadāvalambī // Ragh_5.66 //
analyzed: tām ekatas tava bibharti guruḥ vinidraḥ tasyāḥ bhavān apara dhurya pada avalambī

original: nidrāvaśena bhavatāpy anapekṣamāṇā paryutsukatvam abalā niśi khaṇḍiteva /
analyzed: nidrā vaśena bhavatā api an apekṣamāṇā paryutsuka tvam abalā niśi khaṇḍitā iva

original: lakṣmīr vinodayati yena digantalambī so 'pi tvadānanaruciṃ vijahāti candraḥ // Ragh_5.67 //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ vinodayati yena diganta lambī saḥ u pi tvad ānana rucim vijahāti candraḥ

original: tad valgunā yugapadunmiṣitena tāvat sadyaḥ paraparatulām adhirohatāṃ dve /
analyzed: tat valgunā yugapad unmiṣitena tāvat sadyas para para tulām adhirohatām dve

original: praspandamānaparuṣetaratāram antaś cakṣus tava pracalitabhramaraṃ ca padmam // Ragh_5.68 //
analyzed: praspandamāna paruṣa itara tāram antar cakṣuḥ tava pracalita bhramaram ca padmam

original: vṛntāc chlathaṃ harati puṣpam anokahānāṃ saṃsṛjyate sarasijair aruṇāmśubhinnaiḥ /
analyzed: vṛntāt ślatham harati puṣpam anokahānām saṃsṛjyate sarasijaiḥ aruṇāmśu bhinnaiḥ

original: svābhāvikaṃ paraguṇena vibhātavāyuḥ saurabhyam īpsur iva te mukhamārutasya // Ragh_5.69 //
analyzed: svābhāvikam para guṇena vibhātavāyuḥ saurabhyam īpsuḥ iva te mukha mārutasya

original: tāmrodareṣu paitaṃ tarupallaveṣu nirdhauta hāragulikāviśadaṃ himāmbhaḥ /
analyzed: tāmra udareṣu taru pallaveṣu nirdhauta hāra gulikā viśadam hima ambhaḥ

original: ābhāti labdhaparabhāgatayādharoṣṭhe līlāsmitaṃ sadaśanārcir iva tvadīyam // Ragh_5.70 //
analyzed: ābhāti labdha parabhāga tayā adhara uṣṭhe līlā smitam sa daśana arciḥ iva tvadīyam

original: yāvat pratāpanidhir ākramate na bhānur ahnāya tāvad aruṇena tamo nirastam /
analyzed: yāvat pratāpa nidhiḥ ākramate na bhānuḥ ahne tāvat aruṇena tamaḥ nirastam

original: āyodhanāgrasaratāṃ tvayi vīra yāte kiṃ vā ripūṃs tava guruḥ svayam ucchinatti // Ragh_5.71 //
analyzed: āyodhana agra sara tām tvayi vīra yāte kim vā ripūn tava guruḥ svayam ucchinatti

original: śayyāṃ jahaty ubhayapakṣavinītanidrāḥ stamberamā mukharaśṛṅkhalakarṣiṇas te /
analyzed: śayyām jahati ubhaya pakṣa vinīta nidrāḥ stamberamāḥ mukhara śṛṅkhala karṣiṇaḥ te

original: yeṣāṃ vibhānti taruṇāruṇarāgayogād bhinnādrigairikataṭā iva dantakoṣāḥ // Ragh_5.72 //
analyzed: yeṣām vibhānti taruṇa aruṇa rāga yogāt bhinna adri gairika taṭāḥ iva dantakoṣāḥ

original: dīrgheṣv amī niyamitāḥ paṭamaṇḍapeṣu nidrāṃ vihāya vanajākṣa vanāyudeśyāḥ /
analyzed: dīrgheṣu amī niyamitāḥ paṭa maṇḍapeṣu nidrām vihāya vanaja akṣa vanāyu deśyāḥ

original: vaktroṣmaṇā malinayanti purogatāni lehyāni saindhavaśilāśakalāni vāhāḥ // Ragh_5.73 //
analyzed: vaktra ūṣmaṇā malinayanti purogatāni lehyāni saindhava śilā śakalāni vāhāḥ

original: bhavati viralabhaktir mlānapuṣpopahāraḥ svakiraṇpariveṣodhbedaśūnyāḥ pradīpāḥ /
analyzed: bhavati virala bhaktiḥ mlāna puṣpa upahāraḥ sva kiraṇ pariveṣa udhbeda śūnyāḥ pradīpāḥ

original: ayam api ca giraṃ nas tvatprabodhaprayuktām anuvadati śukas te mañjuvāk pañjarasthaḥ // Ragh_5.74 //
analyzed: ayam api ca giram naḥ tvad prabodha prayuktām anuvadati śukaḥ te mañju vāc pañjara sthaḥ

original: iti viracitavāgbhir bandiputraiḥ kumāraḥ sapadi vigatanidras talpam ujjhāṃ cakāra /
analyzed: iti viracita vāgbhiḥ bandi putraiḥ kumāraḥ sapadi vigata nidraḥ talpam ujjhām cakāra

original: madapaṭu ninadadbhir bodhito rājahaṃsaiḥ suragaja iva gāṅgaṃ saikataṃ supratīkaḥ // Ragh_5.75 //
analyzed: mada paṭu ninadadbhiḥ bodhitaḥ rājahaṃsaiḥ sura gajaḥ iva gāṅgam saikatam su pratīkaḥ

original: atha vidhim avasāyya śāstradṛṣṭaṃ divasamukhocitam añcitākṣipakṣmā /
analyzed: atha vidhim avasāyya śāstra dṛṣṭam divasa mukha ucitam añcita akṣi pakṣmā

original: kuśalaviracitānukūlaveṣaḥ kṣitipasamājam agāt svayaṃvarastham // Ragh_5.76 //
analyzed: kuśala viracita anukūla veṣaḥ kṣitipa samājam agāt svayaṃvara stham

original: sa tatra mañceṣu manojñaveṣān siṃhāsanasthān upacāravastu /
analyzed: sa tatra mañceṣu manojña veṣān siṃhāsana sthān upacāra vastu

original: vaimānikānāṃ marutām apaśyad ākṛṣṭalīlān naralokapālān // Ragh_6.1 //
analyzed: vaimānikānām marutām apaśyat ākṛṣṭa līlān nara lokapālān

original: rater gṛhītānunayena kāmaṃ pratyarpitasvāṅgam iveśvareṇa /
analyzed: rateḥ gṛhīta anunayena kāmam pratyarpita sva aṅgam iva īśvareṇa

original: kākutstham ālokayatāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ mano babhūvendumatīnirāśam // Ragh_6.2 //
analyzed: kākutstham ālokayatām nṛpāṇām manaḥ babhūva indumatī nirāśam

original: vaidarbhanirdiṣṭam asau kumāraḥ kḷptena sopānapathena mañcam /
analyzed: vaidarbha nirdiṣṭam asau kumāraḥ kḷptena sopāna pathena mañcam

original: śilāvibhaṅgair mṛgarājaśāvas tuṅgaṃ nagotsaṅgam ivāruroha // Ragh_6.3 //
analyzed: śilā vibhaṅgaiḥ mṛgarāja śāvaḥ tuṅgam naga utsaṅgam iva āruroha

original: parārdhyavarṇāstaraṇopapannam āsedivān ratnavad (?) āsanaṃ saḥ /
analyzed: parārdhya varṇa āstaraṇa upapannam āsedivān ratna vat āsanam saḥ

original: bhūyiṣṭham āsīd upameyakāntir mayūrapṛṣṭhāśrayiṇā guhena // Ragh_6.4 //
analyzed: bhūyiṣṭham āsīt upameya kāntiḥ mayūra pṛṣṭha āśrayiṇā guhena

original: tāsu śriyā rājaparaṃparāsu prabhāviśeṣodayadurnirīkṣyaḥ /
analyzed: tāsu śriyāḥ rāja paraṃparāsu prabhā viśeṣa udaya durnirīkṣyaḥ

original: sahasradhātmā vyarucad vibhaktaḥ payomucāṃ paṅktiṣu vidyuteva // Ragh_6.5 //
analyzed: sahasradhā ātmā vyarucat vibhaktaḥ payomucām paṅktiṣu vidyutā iva

original: teṣāṃ mahārhāsanasaṃsthitānām udāranepathyabhṛtāṃ sa madhye /
analyzed: teṣām mahārha āsana saṃsthitānām udāra nepathya bhṛtām sa madhye

original: rarāja dhāmnā raghusūnur eva kalpadrumāṇām iva pārijātaḥ // Ragh_6.6 //
analyzed: rarāja dhāmnā raghu sūnuḥ eva kalpadrumāṇām iva pārijātaḥ

original: netravrajāḥ paurajanasya tasmin vihāya sarvān nṛpatīn nipetuḥ /
analyzed: netra vrajāḥ paura janasya tasmin vihāya sarvān nṛpatīn nipetuḥ

original: madotkaṭe recitapuṣpavṛkṣā gandhadvipe vanya iva dvirephāḥ // Ragh_6.7 //
analyzed: mada utkaṭe recita puṣpa vṛkṣāḥ gandhadvipe vanyaḥ iva dvirephāḥ

original: atha stute bandibhir anvayajñaiḥ somārkavaṃśye naradevaloke /
analyzed: atha stute bandibhiḥ anvaya jñaiḥ soma arka vaṃśye naradeva loke

original: saṃcārite c' āgārusārayonau dhūpe samutsarpati vaijayantīḥ // Ragh_6.8 //
analyzed: saṃcārite c āgārusāra yonau dhūpe samutsarpati vaijayantīḥ

original: puropakaṇṭhopavanāśrayāṇāṃ kalāpinām uddhatanṛtyahetau /
analyzed: pura upakaṇṭha upavana āśrayāṇām kalāpinām uddhata nṛtya hetau

original: pradhmātaśaṅkhe parito digantāṃs tūryasvane mūrchati maṅgalārthe // Ragh_6.9 //
analyzed: pradhmāta śaṅkhe paritas diś antān tūrya svane mūrchati maṅgala arthe

original: manuṣyavāhyaṃ caturaśrayānam adhyāsya kanyā parivāraśobhi /
analyzed: manuṣya vāhyam adhyāsya kanyā parivāra śobhi

original: viveśa mañcāntararājamārgaṃ patiṃvarā kḷptavivāhaveṣā // Ragh_6.10 //
analyzed: viveśa mañca antara rājamārgam patiṃvarā kḷpta vivāha veṣā

original: tasmin vidhānātiśaye vidhātuḥ kanyāmaye netraśataikalakṣye /
analyzed: tasmin vidhāna atiśaye vidhātuḥ kanyā maye netra śata eka lakṣye

original: nipetur antaḥkaraṇair narendrā dehaiḥ sthitāḥ kevalam āsaneṣu // Ragh_6.11 //
analyzed: nipetuḥ antaḥkaraṇaiḥ narendrāḥ dehaiḥ sthitāḥ kevalam āsaneṣu

original: tāṃ praty abhivyaktamanorathānāṃ mahīpatīnāṃ praṇayāgradūtyaḥ /
analyzed: tām prati abhivyakta manorathānām mahīpatīnām praṇaya agra dūtyaḥ

original: pravālośobhā iva pādapānāṃ śṛṅgāraceṣṭa vividhā babhūvuḥ // Ragh_6.12 //
analyzed: pravāla uśobhāḥ iva pādapānām śṛṅgāra ceṣṭa vividhāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: kaścit karābhyām upagūḍhanālam ālolapattrābhihatadvirepham /
analyzed: kaścid karābhyām upagūḍha nālam ālola pattra abhihata dvirepham

original: rajobhir antaḥ pariveṣabandhi līlāravindaṃ bhramayāṃ cakāra // Ragh_6.13 //
analyzed: rajobhiḥ antar pariveṣa bandhi līlā aravindam bhramayām cakāra

original: visrastam aṃsād aparo vilāsī ratnānuviddhāṅgadakoṭilagnam /
analyzed: visrastam aṃsāt aparaḥ vilāsī ratna anuviddha aṅgada koṭi lagnam

original: prālambam utkṛṣya yathāvakaśaṃ nināya sācīkṛtacāruvaktraḥ // Ragh_6.14 //
analyzed: prālambam utkṛṣya yathāvakaśam nināya sācīkṛta cāru vaktraḥ

original: ākuñcitāgrāṅgulinā tato 'nyaḥ kiṃcitsamāvarjitanetraśobhaḥ /
analyzed: ākuñcita agra aṅgulinā tatas nyaḥ kiṃcid samāvarjita netra śobhaḥ

original: tiryagvisaṃsarpinakhaprabheṇa pādena haimaṃ vililekha pīṭham // Ragh_6.15 //
analyzed: tiryak visaṃsarpi nakha prabheṇa pādena haimam vililekha pīṭham

original: niveśya vāmaṃ bhujam āsanārdhe tatasaṃniveśād adhikonnatāṃsaḥ /
analyzed: niveśya vāmam bhujam āsana ardhe tata saṃniveśāt adhika unnata aṃsaḥ

original: kaścid vivṛttatrikabhinnahāraḥ suhṛtsamābhāṣaṇatatparo 'bhūt // Ragh_6.16 //
analyzed: kaścid vivṛtta trika bhinna hāraḥ suhṛd samābhāṣaṇa tatparaḥ bhūt

original: vilāsinīvibhramadantapattram āpāṇḍu raṃ ketakabarham anyaḥ /
analyzed: vilāsinī vibhrama danta pattram āpāṇḍu ketaka barham anyaḥ

original: priyāitambocitasaṃniveśair vipāṭayām āsa yuvā nakhāgraiḥ // Ragh_6.17 //
analyzed: priyā aitamba ucita saṃniveśaiḥ vipāṭayām āsa yuvā nakha agraiḥ

original: kuśeśayātāmratalena kaścit kareṇa rekhādhvajalāñchanena /
analyzed: kuśeśaya ātāmra talena kaścid kareṇa rekhā dhvaja lāñchanena

original: ratnāṅgulīyaprabhayānuviddhān udīrayām āsa salīlam akṣān // Ragh_6.18 //
analyzed: ratna aṅgulīya prabhayā anuviddhān udīrayām āsa sa līlam akṣān

original: kaścid yathābhāgam avasthite 'pi svasaṃniveśād vyatilaṅghinīva /
analyzed: kaścid yathābhāgam avasthite sva saṃniveśāt vyatilaṅghinī iva

original: vajrāṃśugarbhāṅgulirandhram ekaṃ vyāpārayām āsa karaṃ kirīṭe // Ragh_6.19 //
analyzed: vajra aṃśu garbha aṅguli randhram ekam vyāpārayām āsa karam kirīṭe

original: tato nṛpāṇāṃ śrutavṛttavaṃśā puṃvat pragalbhā pratihārarakṣī /
analyzed: tatas nṛpāṇām śruta vṛtta vaṃśā puṃvat pragalbhā pratihāra rakṣī

original: prāk saṃnikarṣaṃ magadheśvarasya nītvā kumārīm avadat sunandā // Ragh_6.20 //
analyzed: prāk saṃnikarṣam magadha īśvarasya nītvā kumārīm avadat sunandā

original: asau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇonmukhānām agādhasattvo magadhapratiṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: asau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇa unmukhānām agādha sattvaḥ magadha pratiṣṭhaḥ

original: rājā prajārañjanalabdhavarṇaḥ paraṃtapo nāma yathārthanāmā // Ragh_6.21 //
analyzed: rājā prajā rañjana labdha varṇaḥ paraṃtapaḥ nāma yathārtha nāmā

original: kāmaṃ ṇrpāḥ santu saharaśo 'nye rājanvatīm āhur anena bhūmim /
analyzed: kāmam santu saharaśas nye rājanvatīm āhuḥ anena bhūmim

original: nakṣatratārāgrahasaṃkulāpi jyotiṣmatī candramasaiva rātriḥ // Ragh_6.22 //
analyzed: nakṣatra tārā graha saṃkulā api jyotiṣmatī candramasā eva rātriḥ

original: kriyāprabandhād ayam adhvarāṇām ajasram āhūtasahasranetraḥ /
analyzed: kriyā prabandhāt ayam adhvarāṇām ajasram āhūta sahasranetraḥ

original: śacyāś ciraṃ pāṇdukapolalambān mandāraśūnyān alakāṃś cakāra // Ragh_6.23 //
analyzed: śacyāḥ ciram pāṇdu kapola lambān mandāra śūnyān alakān cakāra

original: anena ced icchasi gṛhyamāṇaṃ pāṇiṃ vareṇyena kuru praveśe /
analyzed: anena ced icchasi gṛhyamāṇam pāṇim vareṇyena kuru praveśe

original: prāsādavātāyanasaṃśritānāṃ netrotsatvaṃ puṣpapurāṅganānām // Ragh_6.24 //
analyzed: prāsāda vātāyana saṃśritānām netra utsa tvam puṣpapura aṅganānām

original: evaṃ tayokte tam avekṣya kiṃcid (?)
analyzed: evam tayā ukte tam avekṣya kiṃcid

original: visraṃsidūrvāṅkamadhūkamālā /
ṛjupraṇāmakriyayaiva tanvī pratyādideśainam abhāṣamāṇā // Ragh_6.25 //
analyzed: ṛju praṇāma kriyayā eva tanvī pratyādideśa enam a bhāṣamāṇā

original: tāṃ saiva vetragrahaṇe niyuktā rājāntaraṃ rājasutāṃ nināya /
analyzed: tām sā eva vetra grahaṇe niyuktā rāja antaram rāja sutām nināya

original: samīraṇottheva taraṅgalekhā padmāntaraṃ mānasarājahaṃsīm // Ragh_6.26 //
analyzed: samīraṇa utthā iva taraṅga lekhā padma antaram mānasa rājahaṃsīm

original: jagāda cainām ayam aṅganāthaḥ surāṅganāprārthitayauvanaśrīḥ /
analyzed: jagāda ca enām ayam aṅga nāthaḥ sura aṅganā prārthita yauvana śrīḥ

original: vinītanāgaḥ kila sūtrakārair aindraṃ padaṃ bhūmigato 'pi bhuṅkte // Ragh_6.27 //
analyzed: vinīta nāgaḥ kila sūtra kāraiḥ aindram padam bhūmi gataḥ bhuṅkte

original: anena paryāsayatāsrabindūn muktāphalsthūlatamān staneṣu /
analyzed: anena paryāsayatā asra bindūn muktāphal sthūlatamān staneṣu

original: pratyarpitāḥ śatruvilāsinīnām unmucya sūtreṇa vinaiva hārāḥ // Ragh_6.28 //
analyzed: pratyarpitāḥ śatru vilāsinīnām unmucya sūtreṇa vinā eva hārāḥ

original: nisargabhinnāspadam ekasaṃstham asmin dvayaṃ śrīś ca sarasvatī ca /
analyzed: nisarga bhinna āspadam eka saṃstham asmin dvayam śrīḥ ca sarasvatī ca

original: kāntyā girā sūnṛtayā ca yogyā tvam eva kalyāṇi tayos tṛtīyā // Ragh_6.29 //
analyzed: kāntyā girā sūnṛtayā ca yogyā tvam eva kalyāṇi tayoḥ tṛtīyā

original: athāṅgarājād avatārya cakṣur yāh janyām avadat kumārī /
analyzed: atha aṅga rājāt avatārya cakṣuḥ janyām avadat kumārī

original: nāsau na kāmyo na ca veda samyag draṣṭuṃ na sā bhinnarucir hi lokaḥ // Ragh_6.30 //
analyzed: na asau na kāmyaḥ na ca veda samyak draṣṭum na sā bhinna ruciḥ hi lokaḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ duṣprasahaṃ dviṣadbhir nṛpaṃ niyuktā pratihārabhūmau /
analyzed: tatas param duṣprasaham dviṣadbhiḥ nṛpam niyuktā pratihāra bhūmau

original: nidarśayām āsa viśeṣadṛśyam induṃ navotthānam ivendumatyai // Ragh_6.31 //
analyzed: nidarśayām āsa viśeṣa dṛśyam indum nava utthānam iva indumatyai

original: avantinātho 'yam udagrabāhur viśālavakṣās tanuvṛttamadhyaḥ /
analyzed: avantināthaḥ yam udagra bāhuḥ viśāla vakṣāḥ tanu vṛtta madhyaḥ

original: āropya cakrabhrahmam uṣṇatejās tvaṣṭreva yatnollikhito vibhāti // Ragh_6.32 //
analyzed: āropya cakra bhrahmam uṣṇa tejāḥ tvaṣṭrā iva yatna ullikhitaḥ vibhāti

original: asya prayāṇeṣu samagraśakter agresarair vājibhir utthitāni /
analyzed: asya prayāṇeṣu samagra śakteḥ agresaraiḥ vājibhiḥ utthitāni

original: kurvanti sāmantaśikhāmaṇīnāṃ prabhāprarohāstamayaṃ rajāṃsi // Ragh_6.33 //
analyzed: kurvanti sāmanta śikhāmaṇīnām prabhā praroha astamayam rajāṃsi

original: asau mahākālaniketanasya vasann adūre kila candramauleḥ /
analyzed: asau mahākāla niketanasya vasan adūre kila candramauleḥ

original: tamisrapakṣe 'pi saha priyābhir jyotsnāvato nirviśati pradoṣān // Ragh_6.34 //
analyzed: tamisra pakṣe saha priyābhiḥ jyotsnāvataḥ nirviśati pradoṣān

original: anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru kaccin manaso rucis te /
analyzed: anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhā ūru kaccit manasaḥ ruciḥ te

original: siprātaraṅgānilakampitāsu vihartum udyānaparaṃparāsu // Ragh_6.35 //
analyzed: siprā taraṅga anila kampitāsu vihartum udyāna paraṃparāsu

original: tasminn abhidyotitabandhupadme pratāpasaṃśoṣitaśatrupaṅke /
analyzed: tasmin abhidyotita bandhu padme pratāpa saṃśoṣita śatru paṅke

original: babandha sā nottamasaukumāryā kumudvatī bhānumatīva bhāvam // Ragh_6.36 //
analyzed: babandha sā nā uttama saukumāryā kumudvatī bhānumatī iva bhāvam

original: tām agratas tāmarasāntarābhām anūparājasya guṇair anūnām /
analyzed: tām agratas tāmarasa antara ābhām anūpa rājasya guṇaiḥ anūnām

original: vidhāya sṛṣṭiṃ lalitām vidhātur jagāda bhūyaḥ sudatīṃ sunandā // Ragh_6.37 //
analyzed: vidhāya sṛṣṭim lalitām vidhātuḥ jagāda bhūyas sudatīm sunandā

original: saṃgrāmanirviṣṭasahasrabāhur aṣṭadāsadvīpanikhātayūpaḥ /
analyzed: saṃgrāma nirviṣṭa sahasra bāhuḥ aṣṭa dāsa dvīpa nikhāta yūpaḥ

original: ananyasādhāraṇarājaśabdo babhūva yogī kila kārtavīryaḥ // Ragh_6.38 //
analyzed: an anya sādhāraṇa rāja śabdaḥ babhūva yogī kila kārtavīryaḥ

original: akāryacintāsamakālam eva prādurbhavaṃś cāpadharaḥ purastāt /
analyzed: akārya cintā sama kālam eva prādurbhavan cāpa dharaḥ purastāt

original: antaḥśarīreṣv api yaḥ prajānāṃ pratyādideśāvinayaṃ vinetā // Ragh_6.39 //
analyzed: antar śarīreṣu api yaḥ prajānām pratyādideśa a vinayam vinetā

original: jyābandhaniṣpandabhujena yasya viniśvasadvaktraparaṃpareṇa /
analyzed: jyā bandha niṣpanda bhujena yasya viniśvasat vaktra paraṃpareṇa

original: kārāgṛhe nirjitavāsavena laṅkeśvareṇoṣitam ā prasādāt // Ragh_6.40 //
analyzed: kārā gṛhe nirjita vāsavena laṅkeśvareṇa uṣitam prasādāt

original: tasyānvaye bhūpatir eṣa jātaḥ pratīpa ity āgamavṛddhasevī /
analyzed: tasya anvaye bhūpatiḥ eṣa jātaḥ pratīpaḥ iti āgama vṛddha sevī

original: yena śriyaḥ saṃśrayadoṣarūḍhaṃ svabhāvalolety ayaśaḥ pramṛśṭam // Ragh_6.41 //
analyzed: yena śriyaḥ saṃśraya doṣa rūḍham svabhāva lolā iti ayaśaḥ

original: āyodhane kṛṣṇagatiṃ sahāyam avāpya yaḥ kṣatriyakālarātrim /
analyzed: āyodhane kṛṣṇa gatim sahāyam avāpya yaḥ kṣatriya kālarātrim

original: dhārāṃ śitāṃ rāmaparaśvadhasya saṃbhāvayaty utpalapattrasārām // Ragh_6.42 //
analyzed: dhārām śitām rāma paraśvadhasya saṃbhāvayati utpala pattra sārām

original: asyāṅkalakṣmīr bhava dīrghabāhor māhiṣmatīvapranitambakāñcīm /
analyzed: asya aṅka lakṣmīḥ bhava dīrgha bāhoḥ māhiṣmatī vapra nitamba kāñcīm

original: prāsādajālair jalveṇiramyāṃ revāṃ yadi prekṣitum asti kāmaḥ // Ragh_6.43 //
analyzed: prāsāda jālaiḥ jalveṇi ramyām revām yadi prekṣitum asti kāmaḥ

original: tasyāḥ prakāmaṃ priyadarśano 'pi na sa kṣitīśo rucaye babhūva /
analyzed: tasyāḥ prakāmam priya darśanaḥ na sa kṣitīśaḥ rucaye babhūva

original: śaratpramṛṣṭāmbudharoparodhaḥ śaśīva paryāptakalo nalinyāḥ // Ragh_6.44 //
analyzed: śarad pramṛṣṭa ambudhara uparodhaḥ śaśī iva paryāpta kalaḥ nalinyāḥ

original: sā śūrasendādhipatiṃ suṣeṇam uddiśya lokāntaragītakīrtim /
analyzed: sā śūrasenda adhipatim suṣeṇam uddiśya loka antara gīta kīrtim

original: ācāraśuddhobhayavaṃśadīpaṃ śuddhāntarakṣyā jagade kumārī // Ragh_6.45 //
analyzed: ācāra śuddha ubhaya vaṃśa dīpam śuddha anta rakṣyā jagade kumārī

original: nīpānvayaḥ pārthiva eṣa vajvā guṇair yam āśritya paraspareṇa /
analyzed: nīpa anvayaḥ pārthivaḥ eṣa vajvā guṇaiḥ yam āśritya paraspareṇa

original: siddhāśramaṃ śāntam ivaitya sattvair naisargiko 'py utsasṛje virodhaḥ // Ragh_6.46 //
analyzed: siddhāśramam śāntam iva etya sattvaiḥ naisargikaḥ pi utsasṛje virodhaḥ

original: yasy' ātmagehe nayanābhirāmā kāntir himāṃśor iva saṃniviṣṭa /
analyzed: yasi ātma gehe nayana abhirāmā kāntiḥ himāṃśoḥ iva saṃniviṣṭa

original: harmyāgrasaṃrūḍhatṛṇāṅkureṣu tejo 'viśahyaṃ ripumandireṣu // Ragh_6.47 //
analyzed: harmya agra saṃrūḍha tṛṇa aṅkureṣu tejaḥ viśahyam ripu mandireṣu

original: yasyāvarodhastanacandanānāṃ prakṣālanād vārivihārakāle /
analyzed: yasya avarodha stana candanānām prakṣālanāt vāri vihāra kāle

original: kalindakanyā mathurāṃ gatā 'pi gaṅgormisaṃsakta jaleva bhāti // Ragh_6.48 //
analyzed: kalinda kanyā mathurām gatā gaṅgā ūrmi saṃsakta jalā iva bhāti

original: trastena tākrṣyāt kila kāliyena maṇiṃ visṛṣṭaṃ yamunaukasā yaḥ /
analyzed: trastena tākrṣyāt kila kāliyena maṇim visṛṣṭam yamunaukasā yaḥ

original: vakṣaḥsthalavyāpirucaṃ dadhānaḥ sakaustubhaṃ hrepayatīva kṛṣnam // Ragh_6.49 //
analyzed: vakṣaḥsthala vyāpi rucam dadhānaḥ sa kaustubham hrepayati iva kṛṣnam

original: saṃbhāvya bhartāram amuṃ yuvānaṃ mṛdupravālottarapuṣpaśayye /
analyzed: saṃbhāvya bhartāram amum yuvānam mṛdu pravāla uttara puṣpa śayye

original: vṛndāvane caitrarathād anūne nirviśyatāṃ sundari yuvanaśrīḥ // Ragh_6.50 //
analyzed: vṛndāvane caitrarathāt anūne nirviśyatām sundari yuvana śrīḥ

original: adhyāsya cāmbhaḥpṛṣatokṣitāni śaileyagandhīni śilātalāni /
analyzed: adhyāsya ca ambhaḥ pṛṣata ukṣitāni śaileya gandhīni śilā talāni

original: kalāpināṃ prāvṛṣi paśya nṛtyaṃ kāntāsu govardhanakandarāsu // Ragh_6.51 //
analyzed: kalāpinām prāvṛṣi paśya nṛtyam kāntāsu govardhana kandarāsu

original: nṛpaṃ tam āvartamanojñanābhiḥ sā vyatyagād anyavadhūr bhavitrī /
analyzed: nṛpam tam āvarta manojña nābhiḥ sā vyatyagāt anya vadhūḥ bhavitrī

original: mahīdharaṃ mārgavaśād upetaṃ srotovahā sāgaragāminīva // Ragh_6.52 //
analyzed: mahīdharam mārga vaśāt upetam srotaḥ vahā sāgara gāminī iva

original: athāṅgadāśliṣṭabhujaṃ bhujiṣyā hemāṅgadaṃ nāma kaliṅganātham /
analyzed: athā aṅgada āśliṣṭa bhujam bhujiṣyā hemāṅgadam nāma kaliṅga nātham

original: āseduṣīṃ sāditaśatrupakṣaṃ bālām abālendumukhīṃ babhāṣe // Ragh_6.53 //
analyzed: āseduṣīm sā ādita śatru pakṣam bālām a bāla indu mukhīm babhāṣe

original: asau mahendrādrisamānasāraḥ patir mahendrasya mahodadheś ca /
analyzed: asau mahendra adri samāna sāraḥ patiḥ mahendrasya mahā udadheḥ ca

original: yasya kṣaratsainyagajacchalena yātrāsu yātīva puro mahendraḥ // Ragh_6.54 //
analyzed: yasya kṣarat sainya gaja chalena yātrāsu yāti iva puras mahā indraḥ

original: jyāghātarekhe subhujo bhujābhyāṃ bibharti yaś cāpabhṛtāṃ purogaḥ /
analyzed: jyā ghāta rekhe su bhujaḥ bhujābhyām bibharti yaḥ cāpa bhṛtām purogaḥ

original: ripuśriyāṃ sāñjanabhāṣpaseke bandīkṛṭānām iva paddhatī dve // Ragh_6.55 //
analyzed: ripu śriyām sāñjana bhāṣpa seke bandīkṛṭānām iva paddhatī dve

original: raṇe 'mitatrīṇatayā prakāśaḥ śarāsanajyānikaṣau bhujābhyām /
analyzed: raṇe mita trīṇa tayā prakāśaḥ śarāsana jyā nikaṣau bhujābhyām

original: viśiṣṭarekhau ripuvikramāgner nirvāṇamārgāv iva yo bibharti // Ragh_6.55* //
analyzed: viśiṣṭa rekhau ripu vikrama agneḥ nirvāṇa mārgau iva yaḥ bibharti

original: yam ātmanaḥ sadmani saṃnikṛṣṭo mandradhvanityājitayāmatūryaḥ /
analyzed: yam ātmanaḥ sadmani saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ mandra dhvaniti ajita yāma tūryaḥ

original: prāsādavātāyanadṛṣyavīciḥ prabodhayaty arṇava eva suptam // Ragh_6.56 //
analyzed: prāsāda vātāyana dṛṣya vīciḥ prabodhayati arṇave eva suptam

original: anena sārdhaṃ viharāmburāśes tīreṣu tālīvanamarmareṣu /
analyzed: anena sārdham vihara amburāśeḥ tīreṣu tālī vana marmareṣu

original: dvīpānatarānītalavaṅgapuṣpair apākṛtasvedalavā marudbhiḥ // Ragh_6.57 //
analyzed: dvīpa anatara ānīta lavaṅga puṣpaiḥ apākṛta sveda lavāḥ marudbhiḥ

original: pralobhitāpy ākṛtilobhanīyā patiṃ purasyorugapūrvanāmnaḥ /
analyzed: pralobhitā api ākṛti lobhanīyā patim

original: tasmād apāvartata dūrakṛṣṭā nītyeva lakṣmīḥ pratikūladaivāt // Ragh_6.58 //
analyzed: tasmāt apāvartata dūra kṛṣṭā nītyā iva lakṣmīḥ pratikūla daivāt

original: athādhigamyābhuvarājakalpaṃ patiṃ purasyorugapūrvanāmnaḥ /
analyzed: athā adhigamya ābhuva rāja kalpam patim purasya uruga pūrva nāmnaḥ

original: ācārapūtobhayavaṃśadīpaṃ śuddhāntarakṣyā jagade kumārī // Ragh_6.58* //
analyzed: ācāra pūta ubhaya vaṃśa dīpam śuddha anta rakṣyā jagade kumārī

original: athorākhyasya purasya nāthaṃ dauvārikī devasarūpam /
analyzed: athora ākhyasya purasya nātham dauvārikī deva sarūpam

original: itaś cakorākṣi vilokayeti pūrvānuśiṣṭāṃ nijagāda bhojyām // Ragh_6.59 //
analyzed: itas cakora akṣi vilokaya iti pūrva anuśiṣṭām nijagāda bhojyām

original: pāṇḍyo 'yam aṃsārpitalambahāraḥ kḷptāṅgarāgo haricandanena /
analyzed: pāṇḍyaḥ yam aṃsa arpita lamba hāraḥ kḷpta aṅgarāgaḥ haricandanena

original: ābhāti bālātaparaktasānuḥ sanirjharodgāra ivādrirājaḥ // Ragh_6.60 //
analyzed: ābhāti bāla ātapa rakta sānuḥ sa nirjhara udgāraḥ iva adrirājaḥ

original: vindhyasya saṃstambhayitā mahādrer niḥśeṣapītojjhitasindhurājaḥ /
analyzed: vindhyasya saṃstambhayitā mahā adreḥ niḥśeṣa pīta ujjhita sindhurājaḥ

original: prītyāśvamedhāvabhṛthārdramūrteḥ sausnātiko yasya bhavaty agastyaḥ // Ragh_6.61 //
analyzed: prītyā aśvamedha avabhṛtha ārdra mūrteḥ sausnātikaḥ yasya bhavati agastyaḥ

original: astraṃ harād āptavatā durāpaṃ yenendralokāva jayāya dṛptaḥ /
analyzed: astram harāt āptavatā durāpam yena indra lokāḥ ava jayāya dṛptaḥ

original: purā janasthānavimardaśaṅkī saṃdhāya laḥkādhipatiḥ pratasthe // Ragh_6.62 //
analyzed: purā janasthāna vimarda śaṅkī saṃdhāya laḥkā adhipatiḥ pratasthe

original: anena pāṇau vidhivad (?)
analyzed: anena pāṇau vidhivat

original: gṛhīte mahākulīnena mahīva gurvī /
analyzed: gṛhīte mahākulīnena mahī iva gurvī

original: ratnānuviddhārṇavamekhalāyā diśaḥ sapatnī bhava dakṣiṇasyāḥ // Ragh_6.63 //
analyzed: ratna anuviddha arṇava mekhalāyāḥ diśaḥ sapatnī bhava dakṣiṇasyāḥ

original: tāmbūlavallīpariṇaddhapūgāsv elālatāliṅgitacandanāsu /
analyzed: tāmbūla vallī pariṇaddha pūgāsu elā latā āliṅgita candanāsu

original: tamālapattrāstaraṇāsu rantuṃ prasīda śaśvan malayasthalīṣu // Ragh_6.64 //
analyzed: tamāla pattra āstaraṇāsu rantum prasīda śaśvat malaya sthalīṣu

original: indīvaraśyāmatanaur nṛpo 'sau tvaṃ rocanāgauraśarīrayaṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: indīvara śyāma tanauḥ nṛpa u sau tvam rocanā gaura śarīra yaṣṭiḥ

original: anyonyaśobhāparivṛddhaye vāṃ yogas taḍittoyadayor ivāstu // Ragh_6.65 //
analyzed: anyonya śobhā parivṛddhaye vām yogaḥ taḍit toyadayoḥ iva astu

original: svasur vidarbhādhipates tadīyo lebhe 'ntaraṃ cetasi nopadeśaḥ /
analyzed: svasuḥ vidarbha adhipateḥ tadīyaḥ lebhe ntaram cetasi na upadeśaḥ

original: divākarādarśanabaddhakośe nakśatranāthāṃśur ivāravinde // Ragh_6.66 //
analyzed: divākara adarśana baddha kośe nakśatra nātha aṃśuḥ iva aravinde

original: saṃcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā /
analyzed: saṃcāriṇī dīpa śikhā iva rātrau yam yam vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā

original: narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ // Ragh_6.67 //
analyzed: narendra mārga aṭṭe iva prapede vivarṇa bhāvam sa sa bhūmipālaḥ

original: tasyāṃ raghoḥ sūnur upasthitāyāṃ vṛṇīta māṃ neti samākulo 'bhūt /
analyzed: tasyām raghoḥ sūnuḥ upasthitāyām vṛṇīta mām na iti samākulaḥ bhūt

original: vāmetaraḥ saṃśayam asya bāhuḥ keyūrabandhocchavasitair nunoda // Ragh_6.68 //
analyzed: vāmetaraḥ saṃśayam asya bāhuḥ keyūra bandha ucchavasitaiḥ nunoda

original: taṃ prāpya sarvāvayavānavadyaṃ vyāvartatānyopagamāt kumārī /
analyzed: tam prāpya sarva avayava anavadyam vyāvartata anya upagamāt kumārī

original: na hi praphullaṃ sahakāram etya vṛksāntaraṃ kāṅkṣati ṣaṭpadālī // Ragh_6.69 //
analyzed: na hi praphullam sahakāram etya vṛksa antaram kāṅkṣati ṣaṭpada ālī

original: tasmin samāveśitacittavṛttim induprabhām indumatīm avekṣya /
analyzed: tasmin samāveśita cittavṛttim induprabhām indumatīm avekṣya

original: pracakrame vaktum anukramajñā savistaraṃ vākyam idaṃ sunandā // Ragh_6.70 //
analyzed: pracakrame vaktum anukrama jñā sa vistaram vākyam idam sunandā

original: ikṣvākuvaṃśyaḥ kakudaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ kakutstha ity āhitalakṣaṇo 'bhūt /
analyzed: ikṣvāku vaṃśyaḥ kakudam nṛpāṇām kakut sthaḥ iti āhita lakṣaṇaḥ bhūt

original: kākutsthaśabdaṃ yata unnatecchāḥ ślāghyaṃ dadhaty uttarakosalendrāḥ // Ragh_6.71 //
analyzed: kākutstha śabdam yatas unnata icchāḥ ślāghyam dadhati uttarakosala indrāḥ

original: mahendram āsthāya mahokṣarūpaṃ yaḥ saṃyati prāptapināki līlaḥ /
analyzed: mahendram āsthāya mahā ukṣa rūpam yaḥ saṃyati prāpta pināki līlaḥ

original: cakāra bāṇair asurāṅganānāṃ gaṇḍasthalīḥ proṣitapattralekhāḥ // Ragh_6.72 //
analyzed: cakāra bāṇaiḥ asura aṅganānām gaṇḍa sthalīḥ proṣita pattra lekhāḥ

original: airāvatāsphālanaviślathaṃ yaḥ saṃghaṭṭayann aṅgadam aṅgadena /
analyzed: airāvata āsphālana viślatham yaḥ saṃghaṭṭayan aṅgadam aṅgadena

original: upeyuśaḥ svām api mūrtim agryām ardhāsanaṃ gotrabhido 'dhitaṣṭhau // Ragh_6.73 //
analyzed: upeyuśaḥ svām api mūrtim agryām ardhāsanam gotrabhidaḥ

original: jātaḥ kule tasya kilorukīrtiḥ kulapradīpo nṛpatir dilīpaḥ /
analyzed: jātaḥ kule tasya kila uru kīrtiḥ kula pradīpaḥ nṛpatiḥ dilīpaḥ

original: atiṣṭhad ekonaśatakratutve śakrābhyasūyāvinivṛttaye yaḥ // Ragh_6.74 //
analyzed: atiṣṭhat eka ūna śatakratu tve śakra abhyasūyā vinivṛttaye yaḥ

original: yasmin mahīṃ śāsati vāṇinīnāṃ nidrāṃ vihārārdhapathe gatānām /
analyzed: yasmin mahīm śāsati vāṇinīnām nidrām vihāra ardha pathe gatānām

original: vāto 'pi nāsaraṃsayad aṃśukāni ko lambayed āharaṇāya hastam // Ragh_6.75 //
analyzed: vātaḥ pi nā asaraṃsayat aṃśukāni kaḥ lambayet āharaṇāya hastam

original: putro raghus tasya padaṃ praśāsti mahākrator viśvajitaḥ prayoktā /
analyzed: putraḥ raghuḥ tasya padam praśāsti mahā kratoḥ viśvajitaḥ prayoktā

original: caturdigāvarjitasaṃbhṛtāṃ yo mṛtpātraśeṣām akarod vibhūtim // Ragh_6.76 //
analyzed: catur diś āvarjita saṃbhṛtām yaḥ mṛd pātra śeṣām akarot vibhūtim

original: ārūḍham adrīn udadhīn vitīrṇaṃ bhujaṃgamānāṃ vasatiṃ praviṣṭam /
analyzed: ārūḍham adrīn udadhīn vitīrṇam bhujaṃgamānām vasatim praviṣṭam

original: ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ yasya na cānubandhi yaśaḥ paricchettum iyattayālam // Ragh_6.77 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam gatam yasya na ca anubandhi yaśaḥ paricchettum iyat tayā alam

original: asau kumāras tam ajo 'nujātas triviṣṭapasyeva patiṃ jayantaḥ /
analyzed: asau kumāraḥ tam ajaḥ nu jātaḥ triviṣṭapasya iva patim jayantaḥ

original: gurvīṃ dhuraṃ yo bhuvanasya pitrā dhuryeṇa damyaḥ sadṛśaṃ bibharti // Ragh_6.78 //
analyzed: gurvīm dhuram yaḥ bhuvanasya pitrā dhuryeṇa damyaḥ sadṛśam bibharti

original: kulena kāntyā vayasā navena guṇaiś ca tais tair vinayapradhānaiḥ /
analyzed: kulena kāntyā vayasā navena guṇaiḥ ca taiḥ taiḥ vinaya pradhānaiḥ

original: tvam ātmanas tulyam amuṃ vṛṇīṣva ratnaṃ samāgacchatu kāñcanena // Ragh_6.79 //
analyzed: tvam ātmanaḥ tulyam amum vṛṇīṣva ratnam samāgacchatu kāñcanena

original: tataḥ sunandāvacanāvasāne lajjāṃ tanū kṛtya narendrakanyā /
analyzed: tatas sunandā vacana avasāne lajjām tanū kṛtya narendra kanyā

original: dṛṣṭyā prasādāmalayā kumāraṃ pratyagrahīt saṃvaraṇasrajeva // Ragh_6.80 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭyā prasāda amalayā kumāram pratyagrahīt saṃvaraṇa srajā iva

original: sā yūni tasminn abhilāṣabandhaṃ śaśāka śālīnatayā na vaktum /
analyzed: sā yūni tasmin abhilāṣa bandham śaśāka śālīna tayā na vaktum

original: romāñcalakṣyeṇa sa gātrayaṣṭiṃ bhittvā nirākrāmad arālakeśyāḥ // Ragh_6.81 //
analyzed: romāñca lakṣyeṇa sa gātra yaṣṭim bhittvā nirākrāmat arāla keśyāḥ

original: tathāgatāyāṃ parihāsapūrvaṃ sakhyāṃ sakhī vetradharā babhāṣe /
analyzed: tathāgatāyām parihāsa pūrvam sakhyām sakhī vetradharā babhāṣe

original: ārye vrajāmo 'nyata ity athaināṃ vadhūr asūyākuṭilaṃ dadarśa // Ragh_6.82 //
analyzed: ārye vrajāmaḥ nyatas iti atha enām vadhūḥ asūyā kuṭilam dadarśa

original: sā cūrṇagauraṃ raghunandanasya dhātrīkarābhyāṃ karabhopamorūḥ /
analyzed: sā cūrṇa gauram raghunandanasya dhātrī karābhyām karabha upama ūrūḥ

original: āsañjayām āsa yathāpradeśaṃ kaṇṭhe guṇaṃ mūrtam ivānurāgam // Ragh_6.83 //
analyzed: āsañjayām āsa yathāpradeśam kaṇṭhe guṇam mūrtam iva anurāgam

original: tayā srajā maṅgalapuṣpamayyā viśālavakṣaḥsthalalambayā saḥ /
analyzed: tayā srajā maṅgala puṣpa mayyā viśāla vakṣaḥsthala lambayā saḥ

original: amaṃsta kaṇṭhārpitabāhupāśāṃ vidarbharājāvarajāṃ vareṇyaḥ // Ragh_6.84 //
analyzed: amaṃsta kaṇṭha arpita bāhu pāśām vidarbha rāja avarajām vareṇyaḥ

original: śaśinam upagateyaṃ kaumudī meghamuktaṃ jalanidhim anurūpaṃ /
analyzed: śaśinam upagatā iyam kaumudī megha muktam jalanidhim anurūpam

original: iti samaguṇayogaprītayas tatra paurāḥ śravaṇakaṭu nṛpāṇām ekavākyaṃ vivavruḥ // Ragh_6.85 //
analyzed: iti sama guṇa yoga prītayaḥ tatra paurāḥ śravaṇa kaṭu nṛpāṇām eka vākyam vivavruḥ

original: pramuditavarapakṣam ekatas tat (?)
analyzed: pramudita vara pakṣam ekatas tat

original: kṣitipatimaṇḍalam anyato vitānam /
analyzed: kṣitipati maṇḍalam anyatas vitānam

original: uṣasi sara iva praphullapadmaṃ kumudavanapratipannanidram āsīt // Ragh_6.86 //
analyzed: uṣasi saraḥ iva praphulla padmam kumuda vana pratipanna nidram āsīt

original: athopayantrā sadṛśena yuktāṃ skandena sākṣād iva devasenām /
analyzed: atha upayantrā sadṛśena yuktām skandena sākṣāt iva deva senām

original: svasāram ādāya vidarbhanāthaḥ purapraveśābhimukho babhūva // Ragh_7.1 //
analyzed: svasāram ādāya vidarbha nāthaḥ pura praveśa abhimukhaḥ babhūva

original: senāniveśān pṛthivīkṣito 'pi jagmur vibhātagrahamandabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: senā niveśān pṛthivīkṣitaḥ pi jagmuḥ vibhāta graha manda bhāsaḥ

original: bhojyāṃ prati vyarthamanorathatvād rūpeṣu veṣeṣu ca sābhyasūyāḥ // Ragh_7.2 //
analyzed: bhojyām prati vyartha manoratha tvāt rūpeṣu veṣeṣu ca sa abhyasūyāḥ

original: sāṃnidhyayogāt kila tatra śacyāḥ svayaṃvarakṣobhakṛtām abhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sāṃnidhya yogāt kila tatra śacyāḥ svayaṃvara kṣobha kṛtām abhāvaḥ

original: kākutstham uddiśya samatsaro 'pi śaśāma tena kṣitipālalokaḥ // Ragh_7.3 //
analyzed: kākutstham uddiśya sa matsaraḥ pi śaśāma tena kṣitipāla lokaḥ

original: tāvat prakīrṇābhinavopacāram indrāyudhadyotitatoraṇāṅkam /
analyzed: tāvat prakīrṇa abhinava upacāram indrāyudha dyotita toraṇa aṅkam

original: varaḥ sa vadhvā saha rājamārgaṃ prāpa dhvajacchāyanivāritoṣṇam // Ragh_7.4 //
analyzed: varaḥ sa vadhvā saha rājamārgam prāpa dhvaja chāya nivārita uṣṇam

original: tatas tadālokanatatparāṇāṃ saudheṣu cāmīkarajālavatsu /
analyzed: tatas tad ālokana tatparāṇām saudheṣu cāmīkara jālavatsu

original: babhūvur itthaṃ purasundarīṇāṃ tyaktānyakāryāṇi viceṣṭitāni // Ragh_7.5 //
analyzed: babhūvuḥ ittham pura sundarīṇām tyakta anya kāryāṇi viceṣṭitāni

original: ālokamārgaṃ sahasā vrajantyā kayācid udveṣṭanavāntamālyaḥ /
analyzed: āloka mārgam sahasā vrajantyā kayācid udveṣṭana vānta mālyaḥ

original: baddhuṃ na saṃbhāvita eva tāvat kareṇa ruddho 'pi hi keśapāśaḥ // Ragh_7.6 //
analyzed: baddhum na saṃbhāvitaḥ eva tāvat kareṇa ruddhaḥ pi hi keśapāśaḥ

original: prasādhikālambitam agrapādam ākṣipya kācid dravarāgam eva /
analyzed: prasādhikā ālambitam agra pādam ākṣipya kācid drava rāgam eva

original: utṣṛṣṛalīlāgatir ā gavākṣād yayau śalākām aparā vahantī // Ragh_7.7 //
analyzed: utṣṛṣṭa līlā gatiḥ ā gavākṣāt yayau śalākām aparā vahantī

original: vilocanaṃ dakṣiṇam añjanena saṃbhāvya tadvañcitavāmanetrā /
analyzed: vilocanam dakṣiṇam añjanena saṃbhāvya tad vañcita vāma netrā

original: tathaiva vātāyanasaṃnikarṣaṃ yayau śalākām aparā vahantī // Ragh_7.8 //
analyzed: tathā eva vātāyana saṃnikarṣam yayau śalākām aparā vahantī

original: jālāntarapreṣitadṛṣṭir anyā prasthānabhinnāṃ na babandha nīvīm /
analyzed: jāla antara preṣita dṛṣṭiḥ anyā prasthāna bhinnām na babandha nīvīm

original: nābhipraviṣṭābharaṇaprabheṇa hastena tasthāv avalambya vāsaḥ // Ragh_7.9 //
analyzed: nābhi praviṣṭa ābharaṇa prabheṇa hastena tasthau avalambya vāsaḥ

original: ardhācitā satvaram utthitāyāḥ pade pade durnimite galantī /
analyzed: ardha ācitā sa tvaram utthitāyāḥ pade pade durnimite galantī

original: kasyāścid āsīd raśanā tadānīm aṅguṣṭhamāulārpitasūtraśeṣā // Ragh_7.10 //
analyzed: kasyāścid āsīt raśanā tadānīm aṅguṣṭha māula arpita sūtra śeṣā

original: stanaṃdhayantaṃ tanayaṃ vihāya vilokanāya tvarayā vrajantī /
analyzed: stanaṃdhayantam tanayam vihāya vilokanāya tvarayā vrajantī

original: saṃprasnutābhyāṃ padavīṃ stanābhyāṃ siṣeca kācit payas'' ā gavākṣāt // Ragh_7.10* //
analyzed: saṃprasnutābhyām padavīm stanābhyām siṣeca kācid payaḥ ā gavākṣāt

original: tāsāṃ mukhair āsavagandhagarbhair vyāptāntarāḥ sāndrakutūhalānām /
analyzed: tāsām mukhaiḥ āsava gandha garbhaiḥ vyāpta antarāḥ sāndra kutūhalānām

original: vilolanetrabhramarair gavākṣāḥ sahasrapattrābharaṇā ivāsan // Ragh_7.11 //
analyzed: vilola netra bhramaraiḥ gavākṣāḥ sahasra pattra ābharaṇāḥ iva āsan

original: tā rāghavaṃ dṛṣṭibhir āpibantyo nāryo na jagmur viṣayāntarāṇi /
analyzed: tāḥ rāghavam dṛṣṭibhiḥ āpibantyaḥ nāryaḥ na jagmuḥ viṣaya antarāṇi

original: tathā hi śeṣendriyavṛttir āsāṃ sarvātmanā cakṣur iva praviṣṭā // Ragh_7.12 //
analyzed: tathā hi śeṣa indriya vṛttiḥ āsām sarva ātmanā cakṣuḥ iva praviṣṭā

original: sthāne vṛtā bhūpatibhiḥ parokṣaiḥ svayaṃvaraṃ sādhum amaṃsta bhojyā /
analyzed: sthāne vṛtā bhūpatibhiḥ parokṣaiḥ svayaṃvaram sādhum amaṃsta bhojyā

original: padmeva nārāyaṇam anyathāsau labheta kāntaṃ katham ātmatulyam // Ragh_7.13 //
analyzed: padmā iva nārāyaṇam anyathā asau labheta kāntam katham ātma tulyam

original: paraspareṇa spṛhaṇīyaśobhaṃ na ced idaṃ dvandvam ayojayiṣyat /
analyzed: paraspareṇa spṛhaṇīya śobham na ced idam dvandvam ayojayiṣyat

original: asmin dvaye rūpavidhānayatnaḥ patyuḥ prajānāṃ vitatho 'bhaviṣyat // Ragh_7.14 //
analyzed: asmin dvaye rūpa vidhāna yatnaḥ patyuḥ prajānām vitathaḥ bhaviṣyat

original: ratismarau nūnam imāv abhūtāṃ rājñāṃ sahareṣu tathā hi bālā /
analyzed: rati smarau nūnam imau abhūtām rājñām sa hareṣu tathā hi bālā

original: gateyam ātmapratirūpam eva mano hi janmāntarasaṃgatijñam // Ragh_7.15 //
analyzed: gatā iyam ātma pratirūpam eva manaḥ hi janmāntara saṃgati jñam

original: ity udgatāḥ pauravadhūmukhebhyaḥ śṛṇvan kathāḥ śrotasukhāḥ kumāraḥ /
analyzed: iti udgatāḥ paura vadhū mukhebhyaḥ śṛṇvan kathāḥ śrota sukhāḥ kumāraḥ

original: udbhāsitaṃ maṅgalasaṃvidhābhiḥ saṃbandhinaḥ sadma samāsasāda // Ragh_7.16 //
analyzed: udbhāsitam maṅgala saṃvidhābhiḥ saṃbandhinaḥ sadma samāsasāda

original: tato 'vatīryāśu kareṇukāyāḥ sa kāmarūpeśvaradattahastaḥ /
analyzed: tatas vatīrya āśu kareṇukāyāḥ sa kāmarūpa īśvara datta hastaḥ

original: vaidarbhanirdiṣṭam atho viveśa nārīmanāṃsīva catuṣkam antaḥ // Ragh_7.17 //
analyzed: vaidarbha nirdiṣṭam atho viveśa nārī manāṃsi iva catuṣkam antar

original: mahārhasiṃhāsanasaṃsthito 'sau saratnam arghyaṃ madhuparkamiśram /
analyzed: mahārha siṃhāsana saṃsthitaḥ sau sa ratnam arghyam madhuparka miśram

original: bhojopanītaṃ ca dukūlayugmaṃ jagrāha sārdhaṃ vanitākaṭākṣaiḥ // Ragh_7.18 //
analyzed: bhoja upanītam ca dukūla yugmam jagrāha sārdham vanitā kaṭākṣaiḥ

original: dukūlavāsāḥ sa vadhūsamīpaṃ ninye vinītair avarodharakṣaiḥ /
analyzed: dukūla vāsāḥ sa vadhū samīpam ninye vinītaiḥ avarodha rakṣaiḥ

original: velāsākśaṃ sphuṭapeharājir navair udanvān iva candrapādaiḥ // Ragh_7.19 //
analyzed: velāsa akśam navaiḥ udanvān iva candra pādaiḥ

original: tatrārcito bhojapateḥ purodhā hutvāgnim ājyādibhir agnikalpaḥ /
analyzed: tatra arcitaḥ bhoja pateḥ purodhāḥ hutvā agnim ājya ādibhiḥ agni kalpaḥ

original: tam eva cādhāya vivāhasākṣye vadhūvarau saṃgamayāṃ cakāra // Ragh_7.20 //
analyzed: tam eva ca ādhāya vivāha sākṣye vadhū varau saṃgamayām cakāra

original: hastena hastaṃ parigṛhya vadhvāḥ sa rājasūnuḥ sutarāṃ cakāśe /
analyzed: hastena hastam parigṛhya vadhvāḥ sa rāja sūnuḥ sutarām cakāśe

original: anantarāśokalatāpravālaṃ prāpyeva cūtaḥ pratipallavena // Ragh_7.21 //
analyzed: anantara aśoka latā pravālam prāpya iva cūtaḥ pratipallavena

original: āsīd varaḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭaḥ svinnāṅguliḥ saṃvavṛte kumārī /
analyzed: āsīt varaḥ kaṇṭakita prakoṣṭaḥ svinna aṅguliḥ saṃvavṛte kumārī

original: vṛttis tayoḥ pāṇisamāgamena samaṃ vibhakteva maobhavasya // Ragh_7.22 //
analyzed: vṛttiḥ tayoḥ pāṇi samāgamena samam vibhaktā iva maobhavasya

original: tayor apāṅga-pratisāritāni kriyāsamāpattivartitāni /
analyzed: tayoḥ apāṅga pratisāritāni kriyā samāpatti vartitāni

original: hrīyantraṇām ānaśire manojñām anyonyalolāni vilocanāni // Ragh_7.23 //
analyzed: hrī yantraṇām ānaśire manojñām anyonya lolāni vilocanāni

original: pradakṣiṇaprakramaṇāt kṛṣānor udarciṣas tan (?)
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa prakramaṇāt kṛṣānoḥ udarciṣaḥ tan

original: mithunaṃ cakāśe /
analyzed: mithunam cakāśe

original: meror upānteṣv iva vartamānam anyonyasaṃsaktam ahastriyāmam // Ragh_7.24 //
analyzed: meroḥ upānteṣu iva vartamānam anyonya saṃsaktam ahar triyāmam

original: nitambagurvī guruṇā prayuktā vadhūr vidhātṛpratimena tena /
analyzed: nitamba gurvī guruṇā prayuktā vadhūḥ vidhātṛ pratimena tena

original: cakāra sā mattacakoranetrā lajjāvatī lājavisargam agnau // Ragh_7.25 //
analyzed: cakāra sā matta cakora netrā lajjāvatī lāja visargam agnau

original: haviḥśamīpallavalājagandhiḥ puṇyaḥ kṛśānor udiyāya dhūmaḥ /
analyzed: haviḥ śamī pallava lāja gandhiḥ puṇyaḥ kṛśānoḥ udiyāya dhūmaḥ

original: kapolasaṃsarpiśikhaḥ sa tasyā muhūrtakarṇotpalatāṃ prapede // Ragh_7.26 //
analyzed: kapola saṃsarpi śikhaḥ sa tasyāḥ muhūrta karṇa utpala tām prapede

original: tad añjanakledasamākulākṣaṃ pramlānabhījāṅkurakarṇapūram /
analyzed: tat añjana kleda samākula akṣam pramlāna bhīja aṅkura karṇapūram

original: vadhūmukhaṃ pāṭalagaṇḍalekham ācāradhūmagrahaṇād babhūva // Ragh_7.27 //
analyzed: vadhū mukham pāṭala gaṇḍa lekham ācāra dhūma grahaṇāt babhūva

original: tau snātakair bandhumatā ca rājñā puraṃdhribhiś ca kramaśaḥ prayuktam /
analyzed: tau snātakaiḥ bandhumatā ca rājñā puraṃdhribhiḥ ca kramaśas prayuktam

original: kanyākumārau kanakāsanasthāv ārdrākṣatāropaṇam anvabhūtām // Ragh_7.28 //
analyzed: kanyā kumārau kanaka āsana sthau ārdra akṣata āropaṇam anvabhūtām

original: iti svasur bhojakulapradīpaḥ saṃpādya pāṇigrahaṇaṃ sa rājā /
analyzed: iti svasuḥ bhoja kula pradīpaḥ saṃpādya pāṇigrahaṇam sa rājā

original: mahīpatīnāṃ pṛthagarhaṇārthaṃ samādideśādhikṛtān adhiśrīḥ // Ragh_7.29 //
analyzed: mahīpatīnām pṛthak arhaṇa artham samādideśa adhikṛtān

original: liṅgair mudaḥ saṃvṛtavikriyās te hradāḥ prasannā iva gūḍhanakrāḥ /
analyzed: liṅgaiḥ mudaḥ saṃvṛta vikriyāḥ te hradāḥ prasannāḥ iva gūḍha nakrāḥ

original: vaidarbham āmantrya yayus tadīyāṃ pratyarpya pūjām aupdāchalena // Ragh_7.30 //
analyzed: vaidarbham āmantrya yayuḥ tadīyām pratyarpya pūjām aupdāchalena

original: sa rājalokaḥ kṛtapūrvasaṃvid ārambhasiddhau samayopalabhyam) /
analyzed: sa rāja lokaḥ kṛta pūrva saṃvid ārambha siddhau samaya upalabhyam

original: ādāsyamānaḥ pramdāmiṣaṃ tad āvṛtya panthānam ajasya tasthau // Ragh_7.31 //
analyzed: ādāsyamānaḥ pramda āmiṣam tat āvṛtya panthānam ajasya tasthau

original: bhartāpi tāvat krathakaiṣikānām anuṣṭhitānantarajāvivāhaḥ /
analyzed: bhartā api tāvat kratha kaiṣikānām anuṣṭhita anantara jā vivāhaḥ

original: sattvānurūpāharaṇī kṛtaśrīḥ prāsthāpayad rāghavam anvagāc ca // Ragh_7.32 //
analyzed: sattva anurūpa āharaṇī kṛta śrīḥ prāsthāpayat rāghavam anvagāt ca

original: tisras trilokī prathitena sārdham ajena mārge vasatīr uṣitvā /
analyzed: tisraḥ trilokī prathitena sārdham ajena mārge vasatīḥ uṣitvā

original: tasmād apāvartata kuṇḍineśaḥ parvātyaye soma ivoṣṇaraśmeḥ // Ragh_7.33 //
analyzed: tasmāt apāvartata kuṇḍineśaḥ parva atyaye somaḥ iva uṣṇaraśmeḥ

original: pramanyavaḥ prāg api kosalendre pratyekam āttasvatayā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: pramanyavaḥ prāk api kosala indre pratyekam ātta sva tayāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: ato nṛpāś cakṣamire sametāḥ strīratnalābhaṃ na tadātmajasya // Ragh_7.34 //
analyzed: atas nṛpāḥ cakṣamire sametāḥ strī ratna lābham na tad ātmajasya

original: tam udvahantaṃ pathi bhojakanyāṃ rurodha rājanyagaṇaḥ sa dṛptaḥ /
analyzed: tam udvahantam pathi bhoja kanyām rurodha rājanya gaṇaḥ sa dṛptaḥ

original: balipradiṣṭaṃ śriyam ādadānaṃ traivikramaṃ pādam ivendraśatruḥ // Ragh_7.35 //
analyzed: bali pradiṣṭam śriyam ādadānam traivikramam pādam iva indra śatruḥ

original: tasyaḥ sa rakṣārtham analpayodham ādiṣya pitryaṃ sacivaṃ kumāraḥ /
analyzed: tasyaḥ sa rakṣā artham analpa yodham ādiṣya pitryam sacivam kumāraḥ

original: pratyagrahīt pārthivavāhinīṃ tāṃ jyotīrathāṃ śoṇa ivottaraṅgaḥ // Ragh_7.36 //
analyzed: pratyagrahīt pārthiva vāhinīm tām jyotīrathām śoṇaḥ iva uttaraṅgaḥ

original: pattiḥ padātiṃ rathinaṃ ratheśas turaṃgasādī turagādhirūḍham /
analyzed: pattiḥ padātim rathinam ratha īśaḥ turaṃga sādī turaga adhirūḍham

original: yantā gajasyābhyapatad gajasthaṃ tulyapratidvandvi babhūva yuddham // Ragh_7.37 //
analyzed: yantā gajasya abhyapatat gaja stham tulya pratidvandvi babhūva yuddham

original: nadatsu tūryeṣv avibhāvyavāco nodīrayanti sma kulopadeśān /
analyzed: nadatsu tūryeṣu avibhāvya vācaḥ na udīrayanti sma kula upadeśān

original: bāṇākṣarair eva parasparasya nāmorjitaṃ cāpabhṛtaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ // Ragh_7.38 //
analyzed: bāṇa akṣaraiḥ eva parasparasya nāma ūrjitam cāpa bhṛtaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ

original: utthāpitaḥ saṃyati reṇur aśvaiḥ sāndrīkṛtaḥ syandanavaṃśacakraiḥ /
analyzed: utthāpitaḥ saṃyati reṇuḥ aśvaiḥ sāndrīkṛtaḥ syandana vaṃśa cakraiḥ

original: cistāritaḥ kuñjarakarṇatālair netrakrameṇoparurodha sūryam // Ragh_7.39 //
analyzed: cistāritaḥ kuñjara karṇa tālaiḥ netra krameṇa uparurodha sūryam

original: matsyadhvajā vāyuvaśād vidīrṇair mukhaiḥ pravṛddhadvajinīrajāṃsi /
analyzed: matsya dhvajāḥ vāyu vaśāt vidīrṇaiḥ mukhaiḥ pravṛddha dvajinī rajāṃsi

original: babhuḥ pibantaḥ paramārthamatsyāḥ paryāvilānīva navodakāni // Ragh_7.40 //
analyzed: babhuḥ pibantaḥ parama artha matsyāḥ paryāvilāni iva nava udakāni

original: ratho rathāṅgadhvaninā vijajñe vilolaghaṇṭākvaṇitena nāgaḥ /
analyzed: rathaḥ rathāṅga dhvaninā vijajñe vilola ghaṇṭā kvaṇitena nāgaḥ

original: svabhartṛnāmagrahaṇād babhūva sāndre rajasy ātmaparāvabodhaḥ // Ragh_7.41 //
analyzed: sva bhartṛ nāma grahaṇāt babhūva sāndre rajasi ātma para avabodhaḥ

original: āvṛṇvato locanamārgam ājau rajo'ndhakārasya vijṛmbhitasya /
analyzed: āvṛṇvataḥ locana mārgam ājau rajaḥ ndhakārasya vijṛmbhitasya

original: śastrakṣatāśvadvipavīrajanmā bālāruṇo 'bhūd rudhirapravāhaḥ // Ragh_7.42 //
