analyzed: śastra kṣata aśva dvipa vīra janmā bāla aruṇaḥ bhūt rudhira pravāhaḥ

original: sa cchinnamūlaḥ kṣatajena reṇus tasyopariṣṭāt pavanāvadhūtaḥ /
analyzed: sa chinna mūlaḥ kṣatajena reṇuḥ tasya upariṣṭāt pavana avadhūtaḥ

original: aṅgāraśeṣasya hutāśanasya pūrvotthito dhūma ivābabhāse // Ragh_7.43 //
analyzed: aṅgāra śeṣasya hutāśanasya pūrva utthitaḥ dhūmaḥ iva ābabhāse

original: prahāramūrchāpagame rathasthān yantḥn upālabhya nivartitāśvāḥ /
analyzed: prahāra mūrchā apagame ratha sthān yantṝn upālabhya nivartita aśvāḥ

original: yaiḥ sāditā lakṣitapūrvaketūṃs tān eva sāmarṣatayā nijaghnuḥ // Ragh_7.44 //
analyzed: yaiḥ sāditāḥ lakṣita pūrva ketūn tān eva sa amarṣa tayā nijaghnuḥ

original: apy ardhamārge parabāṇalūnā dhanurbhṛtāṃ hastavatāṃ pṛṣatkāḥ /
analyzed: api ardha mārge para bāṇa lūnāḥ dhanuḥ bhṛtām hastavatām pṛṣatkāḥ

original: saṃprāpur evātmajavānuvṛttyā pūrvārdhabhāgaiḥ phalibhiḥ śaravyam // Ragh_7.45 //
analyzed: saṃprāpuḥ eva ātma java anuvṛttyā pūrva ardha bhāgaiḥ phalibhiḥ śaravyam

original: ādhoraṇānāṃ gajasaṃnipāte śirāṃsi cakrair niśitaiḥ kṣurāgraiḥ /
analyzed: ādhoraṇānām gaja saṃnipāte śirāṃsi cakraiḥ niśitaiḥ kṣura agraiḥ

original: hatāny api āyenanakhāgrakoṭivyāsaktakeśāni cireṇa petuḥ // Ragh_7.46 //
analyzed: hatāni api āyena nakha agra koṭi vyāsakta keśāni cireṇa petuḥ

original: pūrvaṃ prahartā na jaghāna bhūyaḥ pratiprahārākṣamam aśvasādī /
analyzed: pūrvam prahartā na jaghāna bhūyas pratiprahāra akṣamam aśvasādī

original: turaṃgamaskandhaniṣaṇṇadehaṃ pratyāśvasantaṃ ripum ācakāṅkṣa // Ragh_7.47 //
analyzed: turaṃgama skandha niṣaṇṇa deham pratyāśvasantam ripum ācakāṅkṣa

original: tanutyajāṃ varmabhṛtāṃ vikośair bṛhatsu danteṣv asibhiḥ patadbhiḥ /
analyzed: tanutyajām varma bhṛtām vikośaiḥ bṛhatsu danteṣu asibhiḥ patadbhiḥ

original: raṇakṣitiḥ śoṇitamadyakulyā gajā vivignāḥ karaśīkareṇa // Ragh_7.48 //
analyzed: raṇa kṣitiḥ śoṇita madya kulyāḥ gajāḥ vivignāḥ kara śīkareṇa

original: śilīmukhotkṛttaśiraḥphalāḍhyā cyutaiḥ śiratraiś caṣakottareva /
analyzed: śilīmukha utkṛtta śiraḥ phala āḍhyā cyutaiḥ śiratraiḥ caṣaka uttarā iva

original: raṇakṣitiḥ śoṇitamadyakulyā rarāja mṛtyor iva pānabhūmiḥ // Ragh_7.49 //
analyzed: raṇa kṣitiḥ śoṇita madya kulyā rarāja mṛtyoḥ iva pāna bhūmiḥ

original: upāntayor niṣkuṣitaṃ vihaṃgair ākṣipya tebhyaḥ piśitapriyāpi /
analyzed: upāntayoḥ niṣkuṣitam vihaṃgaiḥ ākṣipya tebhyaḥ piśitapriyā api

original: keyūrakoṭikṣatatāludeśā śivā bhujacchedam apācakāra // Ragh_7.50 //
analyzed: keyūra koṭi kṣata tālu deśā śivā bhuja chedam apācakāra

original: kaścid dviṣatkhaḍgahṛtottamāṅgaḥ sadyo vimānaprabhutām upetya /
analyzed: kaścid dviṣat khaḍga hṛta uttamāṅgaḥ sadyas vimāna prabhu tām upetya

original: vāmāṅgasaṃsaktasurāṅganaḥ svaṃ nṛtyat kabandhaṃ samare dadarśa // Ragh_7.51 //
analyzed: vāma aṅga saṃsakta sura aṅganaḥ svam nṛtyat kabandham samare dadarśa

original: anyonyasūtonmathanād abhūtāṃ tāv eva sūtau rathinau ca kaucit /
analyzed: anyonya sūta unmathanāt abhūtām tau eva sūtau rathinau ca kaucid

original: vyaśvau gadāvyāyatasaṃprahārau bagnāyudhau bāhuvimardaniṣṭhau // Ragh_7.52 //
analyzed: vyaśvau gadā vyāyata saṃprahārau bagna āyudhau bāhu vimarda niṣṭhau

original: paraspareṇa kṣatayoḥ prahartror utkrāntavāyvoḥ samakālam eva /
analyzed: paraspareṇa kṣatayoḥ prahartroḥ utkrānta vāyvoḥ sama kālam eva

original: amartyabhāve 'pi kayościd āsīd ekāsaraḥprārthitayor vivādaḥ // Ragh_7.53 //
analyzed: amartya bhāve pi kayoḥ cit āsīt eka āsaraḥ prārthitayoḥ vivādaḥ

original: vyūhāv ubhau tāv itaretarasmād bhaṅgaṃ jayaṃ cāpatur avyavastham /
analyzed: vyūhau ubhau tau itaretarasmāt bhaṅgam jayam cāpatuḥ avyavastham

original: paścātpuromārutayoḥ pravṛddhau paryāyavṛttyeva mahārṇavormī // Ragh_7.54 //
analyzed: paścāt puraḥ mārutayoḥ pravṛddhau paryāya vṛttyā iva mahā arṇava ūrmī

original: pareṇa bhagne 'pi bale mahaujā yayāv ajaḥ praty arisainyam eva /
analyzed: pareṇa bhagne pi bale mahā ojāḥ yayau ajaḥ prati ari sainyam eva

original: dhūmo nivarteta samīraṇena yato hi kakṣas tata eva vahniḥ // Ragh_7.55 //
analyzed: dhūmaḥ nivarteta samīraṇena yatas hi kakṣaḥ tatas eva vahniḥ

original: rathī niṣaṅgī kavacī dhanuṣmān dṛptaḥ sa rājanyakam ekavīraḥ /
analyzed: rathī niṣaṅgī kavacī dhanuṣmān dṛptaḥ sa rājanyakam eka vīraḥ

original: nivārayām āsa mahāvarāhaḥ kalpakṣayoddhūtam ivārṇavāmbhaḥ // Ragh_7.56 //
analyzed: nivārayām āsa mahāvarāhaḥ kalpa kṣaya uddhūtam iva arṇava ambhaḥ

original: sa dakṣiṇaṃ tūṇa-mukhena vāmaṃ vyāpārayan hastam alakṣyatājau /
analyzed: sa dakṣiṇam tūṇa mukhena vāmam vyāpārayan hastam alakṣyata ājau

original: ākarṇakṛṣṭā sakṛd asya yoddhur maurvīva bāṇān suṣuve riguphnān // Ragh_7.57 //
analyzed: ākarṇa kṛṣṭā sakṛt asya yoddhuḥ maurvī iva bāṇān suṣuve riguphnān

original: sa roṣadaṣṭādhikalohitoṣṭhair vyaktordhvarekā bhṛkuṭīr vahadbhiḥ /
analyzed: sa roṣa daṣṭa adhika lohita uṣṭhaiḥ vyakta ūrdhva rekāḥ bhṛkuṭīḥ vahadbhiḥ

original: tastāra gāṃ bhallanikṛttakaṇṭhair huṃkāragarbhair dviṣatāṃ śirobhiḥ // Ragh_7.58 //
analyzed: tastāra gām bhalla nikṛtta kaṇṭhaiḥ huṃkāra garbhaiḥ dviṣatām śirobhiḥ

original: sarvair balāṅgair dviradapradhānaiḥ sarvāyudhaiḥ kaṅkaṭabhedibhiś ca /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ bala aṅgaiḥ dvirada pradhānaiḥ sarva āyudhaiḥ kaṅkaṭa bhedibhiḥ ca

original: sarvaprayatnene ca bhūmipālās tasmin prajahrur yudhi sarva eva // Ragh_7.59 //
analyzed: ca bhūmipālāḥ tasmin prajahruḥ yudhi sarve eva

original: so 'stravrajaiś channarathaḥ pareṣāṃ dhvajāgramātreṇa babhūva lakṣyaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ stra vrajaiḥ channa rathaḥ pareṣām dhvaja agra mātreṇa babhūva lakṣyaḥ

original: nīhāramagno dinapūrvabhāgaḥ kiṃcitprakāśena vivasvateva // Ragh_7.60 //
analyzed: nīhāra magnaḥ dina pūrva bhāgaḥ kiṃcid prakāśena vivasvatā iva

original: priyaṃvadāt prāpam asau kumāraḥ prāyuṅkta rājasv adhirājasūnuḥ /
analyzed: priyaṃvadāt prāpam asau kumāraḥ prāyuṅkta rājasu adhirāja sūnuḥ

original: gāndharvam astraṃ kusumāstrakāntaḥ prasvāpanaṃ svapanivṛttalaulyaḥ // Ragh_7.61 //
analyzed: gāndharvam astram kusuma astra kāntaḥ prasvāpanam svapa nivṛtta laulyaḥ

original: tato dhanuṣkarṣaṇamūḍhahastam ekāṃsaparyastaśirastrajālam /
analyzed: tatas dhanuṣkarṣaṇa mūḍha hastam eka aṃsa paryasta śirastra jālam

original: tasthau dhvajastambhaniṣaṇṇadehaṃ nidrāvidheyaṃ naradevasainyam // Ragh_7.62 //
analyzed: tasthau dhvaja stambha niṣaṇṇa deham nidrā vidheyam naradeva sainyam

original: tataḥ priyopāttarase 'dharoṣṭhe niveśya dadhmau jalaṃ kumāraḥ /
analyzed: tatas priya upātta rase dharā uṣṭhe niveśya dadhmau jalam kumāraḥ

original: yena svahastārjitam ekavīraḥ piban yaśo mūrtam ivābhāse // Ragh_7.63 //
analyzed: yena sva hasta arjitam eka vīraḥ piban yaśaḥ mūrtam iva ābhāse

original: śaṅkhasvanābhijñatayā nivṛttās taṃ sannaśatruṃ dadṛśuḥ svayodhāḥ /
analyzed: śaṅkha svana abhijña tayā nivṛttāḥ tam sannaśatrum dadṛśuḥ sva yodhāḥ

original: nimīlitānām iva paṅkajānāṃ madhye sphurantaṃ pratimāśaśāṅkam // Ragh_7.64 //
analyzed: nimīlitānām iva paṅkajānām madhye sphurantam pratimā śaśāṅkam

original: saśoṇitais tena śilīmukhāgrair nikṣepitāḥ ketuṣu pārthivānām /
analyzed: sa śoṇitaiḥ tena śilīmukha agraiḥ nikṣepitāḥ ketuṣu pārthivānām

original: yaśo hṛtam saṃprati rāghaveṇa na jīvitaṃ vaḥ kṛpayeti varṇāḥ // Ragh_7.65 //
analyzed: yaśaḥ hṛtam saṃprati rāghaveṇa na jīvitam vaḥ kṛpayā iti varṇāḥ

original: sa cāpakoṭīnihitaikabāhuḥ śirastaniṣkarṣaṇabhinnamuliḥ /
analyzed: sa cāpa koṭī nihita eka bāhuḥ śira sta niṣkarṣaṇa bhinna muliḥ

original: lalāṭabaddhaśramavāribindur bhītāṃ priyām etya vaco babhāṣe // Ragh_7.66 //
analyzed: lalāṭa baddha śrama vāri binduḥ bhītām priyām etya vacaḥ babhāṣe

original: itaḥ parān arbhakahāryaśastrān vaidarbhi paśyānumatā mayāsi /
analyzed: itas parān arbhaka hārya śastrān vaidarbhi paśya anumatā mayā asi

original: evaṃvidhenāhavaceṣṭitena tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamabhiḥ // Ragh_7.67 //
analyzed: evaṃvidhena āhava ceṣṭitena tvam prārthyase hasta gatā

original: tasyāḥ pratidvandvibhavād viṣādāt sadyo vimuktaṃ mukham ābabhāse /
analyzed: tasyāḥ pratidvandvi bhavāt viṣādāt sadyas vimuktam mukham ābabhāse

original: niśvāsabāṣpāpagamāt prapannaḥ prasādam ātmīyam ivātmadarṣāḥ // Ragh_7.68 //
analyzed: niśvāsa bāṣpa apagamāt prapannaḥ prasādam ātmīyam iva ātma darṣāḥ

original: hṛṣṭāpi sā hrīvijitā na sākṣād vāgbhiḥ sakhīnāṃ priyam abhyanandat /
analyzed: hṛṣṭā api sā hrī vijitā na sākṣāt vāgbhiḥ sakhīnām priyam abhyanandat

original: sthalī navāmbhaḥpṛṣatābhivṛṣṭā mayūrakekābhir ivābhravṛndam // Ragh_7.69 //
analyzed: sthalī nava ambhaḥ pṛṣata abhivṛṣṭā mayūra kekābhiḥ iva abhra vṛndam

original: iti śirasi sa vāmaṃ pādam ādhāya rājñām udavahad anavadyāṃ tām avadyād apetah /
analyzed: iti śirasi sa vāmam pādam ādhāya rājñām udavahat anavadyām tām avadyāt apetaḥ

original: rathaturagarajobhis tasya rūkṣālakāgrā samaravijayalaṣmīḥ saiva mūrtā babhūva // Ragh_7.70 //
analyzed: ratha turaga rajobhiḥ tasya rūkṣa alaka agrā samara vijaya laṣmīḥ sā eva mūrtā babhūva

original: prathamaparigatārthas taṃ raghuḥ saṃnivṛttaṃ vijayinam abhinandya ślāghyajāyāsametam /
analyzed: prathama parigata arthaḥ tam raghuḥ saṃnivṛttam vijayinam abhinandya ślāghya jāyā sametam

original: tadupahitakuṭumbaḥ śāntimārgotusko 'bhūn na hi sati kuladhurye sūryavaṃśyā gṛhāya // Ragh_7.71 //
analyzed: tad upahita kuṭumbaḥ bhūt na hi sati kula dhurye sūrya vaṃśyāḥ gṛhāya

original: atha tasya vivāhakautukaṃ lalitaṃ bibhrata eva pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: atha tasya vivāha kautukam lalitam bibhrataḥ eva pārthivaḥ

original: vasudhām api hastagāminīm akarod indumatīm ivāparām // Ragh_8.1 //
analyzed: vasudhām api hasta gāminīm akarot indumatīm iva aparām

original: duritair api kartum ātmasāt prayatante nṛpasūnavo hi yat /
analyzed: duritaiḥ api kartum ātmasāt prayatante nṛpa sūnavaḥ hi yat

original: tad upasthitam agrahīd ajaḥ pitur ājñeti na bhogatṛṣṇayā // Ragh_8.2 //
analyzed: tat upasthitam agrahīt ajaḥ pituḥ ājñā iti na bhoga tṛṣṇayā

original: anubhūya vasiṣṭhasaṃbhṛtaiḥ salilais tena sahābhiṣecanam /
analyzed: anubhūya vasiṣṭha saṃbhṛtaiḥ salilaiḥ tena saha abhiṣecanam

original: viśadocchavasitena medinī kathayām āsa kṛtārthatām iva // Ragh_8.3 //
analyzed: viśada ucchavasitena medinī kathayām āsa kṛtārtha tām iva

original: sa babhūva durāsadaḥ parair guruṇātharvavidā kṛtakriyaḥ /
analyzed: sa babhūva durāsadaḥ paraiḥ guruṇā atharva vidā kṛta kriyaḥ

original: pavanāgnisamāgamo hy ayaṃ sahitaṃ brahma yad astratejasā // Ragh_8.4 //
analyzed: pavana agni samāgamaḥ hi ayam sahitam brahma yat astra tejasā

original: raghum eva nivṛttayauvanaṃ tam amanyanta naveśvaraṃ prajāḥ /
analyzed: raghum eva nivṛtta yauvanam tam amanyanta nava īśvaram prajāḥ

original: sa hi tasya na kevalāṃ śriyaṃ pratipede sakalān guṇān api // Ragh_8.5 //
analyzed: sa hi tasya na kevalām śriyam pratipede sakalān guṇān api

original: adhikaṃ śuśubhe śubhaṃyunā dvitayena dvayam eva saṃgatam /
analyzed: adhikam śuśubhe śubhaṃyunā dvitayena dvayam eva saṃgatam

original: padam ṛddham ajena paitṛkaṃ vinayenāsya navaṃ ca yauvanam // Ragh_8.6 //
analyzed: padam ṛddham ajena paitṛkam vinayena asya navam ca yauvanam

original: sadayaṃ bubhuje mahābhujaḥ sahasodvegam iyaṃ vrajed iti /
analyzed: sa dayam bubhuje mahā bhujaḥ sahasā udvegam iyam vrajet iti

original: aciropanatāṃ sa medinīṃ navapāṇigrahaṇāṃ vadhūm iva // Ragh_8.7 //
analyzed: acira upanatām sa medinīm nava pāṇigrahaṇām vadhūm iva

original: aham eva mato mahīpater iti sarvaḥ prakṛtiṣv acintayat /
analyzed: aham eva mataḥ mahīpateḥ iti sarvaḥ prakṛtiṣu acintayat

original: udadher iva nimagāśateṣv abhavan nāsya vimānanā kvacit // Ragh_8.8 //
analyzed: udadheḥ iva nimagā śateṣu abhavat nā asya vimānanā kvacid

original: na kharo na ca bhūyasā mṛduḥ pavamānaḥ pṛthivīruhān iva /
analyzed: na kharaḥ na ca bhūyasā mṛduḥ pavamānaḥ pṛthivīruhān iva

original: sa puraskṛtamadhyamakramo namayām āsa nṛpān anuddharan // Ragh_8.9 //
analyzed: sa puraskṛta madhyama kramaḥ namayām āsa nṛpān an uddharan

original: atha vīksya raghuḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ prakṛtiṣv ātmajam ātmavat tayā /
analyzed: atha vīksya raghuḥ pratiṣṭhitam prakṛtiṣu ātma jam ātma vat tayā

original: viṣayeṣu vināśadharmasu tridivasteṣv api niḥspṛho 'bhavat // Ragh_8.10 //
analyzed: viṣayeṣu vināśa dharmasu tridivaḥ teṣu api niḥspṛhaḥ bhavat

original: guṇavatsutaropitaśriyaḥ pariṇāme hi dilīpavaṃśajāḥ /
analyzed: guṇavat suta ropita śriyaḥ pariṇāme hi dilīpa vaṃśa jāḥ

original: padavīṃ taruvalkavāsasāṃ prayatāḥ saṃyamināṃ prapedire // Ragh_8.11 //
analyzed: padavīm taru valka vāsasām prayatāḥ saṃyaminām prapedire

original: tam araṇyasamāśrayonmukhaṃ śirasā veṣṭanaśobhinā sutaḥ /
analyzed: tam araṇya samāśraya unmukham śirasā veṣṭana śobhinā sutaḥ

original: pitaraṃ praṇipatya pādayor aparityāgam ayācatātmanaḥ // Ragh_8.12 //
analyzed: pitaram praṇipatya pādayoḥ a parityāgam ayācata ātmanaḥ

original: raghur aśrumukhasya tasya tat kṛtavān īpsitam ātmajapriyaḥ /
analyzed: raghuḥ aśru mukhasya tasya tat kṛtavān īpsitam ātmaja priyaḥ

original: na tu sarpa iva tvacaṃ punaḥ pratipede vyapavarjitāṃ śriyam // Ragh_8.13 //
analyzed: na tu sarpaḥ iva tvacam punar pratipede vyapavarjitām śriyam

original: sa kīlaśramam antyam āśrito nivasann āvasathe purād bahiḥ /
analyzed: sa kīla śramam antyam āśritaḥ nivasan āvasathe purāt bahis

original: samupāsyata putrabhogyayā snūṣayevāvikṛtendriyaḥ śriyā // Ragh_8.14 //
analyzed: samupāsyata putra bhogyayā snūṣayā iva a vikṛta indriyaḥ śriyā

original: praśamasthitapūrvapārthivaṃ kulam abhyudyata nūtaneśvaram /
analyzed: praśama sthita pūrva pārthivam kulam nūtana īśvaram

original: nabhasā nibhṛtendunā tulām uditārkeṇa samāruroha tat // Ragh_8.15 //
analyzed: nabhasā nibhṛta indunā tulām udita arkeṇa samāruroha tat

original: yatipārthivaliṅgadhāriṇau dadṛśate raghurāghavau janaiḥ /
analyzed: yati pārthiva liṅga dhāriṇau dadṛśate raghu rāghavau janaiḥ

original: apavargamahodayārthayor bhuvam aṃśāv iva dharmayor gatau // Ragh_8.16 //
analyzed: apavarga mahā udaya arthayoḥ bhuvam aṃśau iva dharmayoḥ gatau

original: ajitādhigamāya mantribhir yuyuje nītiviśaradair ajaḥ /
analyzed: ajita adhigamāya mantribhiḥ yuyuje nīti viśaradaiḥ ajaḥ

original: anapāyipadopalabdhaye raghur āptaiḥ samiyāya yogibhiḥ // Ragh_8.17 //
analyzed: anapāyi pada upalabdhaye raghuḥ āptaiḥ samiyāya yogibhiḥ

original: samayujayta bhūpatir yuvā sacivaiḥ pratyaham arthasiddhaye /
analyzed: samayujayta bhūpatiḥ yuvā sacivaiḥ pratyaham artha siddhaye

original: apunarjananopattaye prayayāḥ saṃyamibhir manīṣibhiḥ // Ragh_8.17* //
analyzed: a punar janana upattaye prayayāḥ saṃyamibhiḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: nṛpatiḥ prakṛtīr avekṣitum vyavahārāsanam ādade yuvā /
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ prakṛtīḥ avekṣitum vyavahāra āsanam ādade yuvā

original: paricetum upāṃśu dhāraṇāṃ kuśapūtaṃ pravayās tu viṣṭaram // Ragh_8.18 //
analyzed: paricetum upāṃśu dhāraṇām kuśa pūtam pravayāḥ tu viṣṭaram

original: anuraṇjayituṃ prajāḥ prabhur vyahārāsanam ādade navaḥ /
analyzed: anuraṇjayitum prajāḥ prabhuḥ vyahāra āsanam ādade navaḥ

original: aparaḥ śuciviṣṭarasthitaḥ paricetuṃ yatate sma dhāraṇāḥ // Ragh_8.18* //
analyzed: aparaḥ śuci viṣṭara sthitaḥ paricetum yatate sma dhāraṇāḥ

original: anayat prabhuśaktisaṃpadā vaśam eko nṛpatīn anantarān /
analyzed: anayat prabhu śakti saṃpadā vaśam ekaḥ nṛpatīn anantarān

original: aparaḥ praṇidhānayogyayā marutaḥ pañca śarīragocarān // Ragh_8.19 //
analyzed: aparaḥ praṇidhāna yogyayā marutaḥ pañca śarīra gocarān

original: nayacakṣur ajo didṛkṣayā pararandhrasya tatāna maṇḍale /
analyzed: naya cakṣuḥ ajaḥ didṛkṣayā para randhrasya tatāna maṇḍale

original: hṛdaye samaropayan manaḥ paramaṃ jyotir avekṣituṃ raghuḥ // Ragh_8.19* //
analyzed: hṛdaye samaropayat manaḥ paramam jyotiḥ avekṣitum raghuḥ

original: akarod acireśvaraḥ kṣitau dviṣadārambhaphalāni bhasmasāt /
analyzed: akarot acira īśvaraḥ kṣitau dviṣat ārambha phalāni bhasmasāt

original: aparo dahane svakarmaṇāṃ vavṛte jñānamayena vahninā // Ragh_8.20 //
analyzed: aparaḥ dahane sva karmaṇām vavṛte jñāna mayena vahninā

original: paṇabandhamukhān guṇān ajaḥ ṣaḍ upāyuṅkta samīkṣya tatphalam /
analyzed: paṇa bandha mukhān guṇān ajaḥ ṣaṭ upāyuṅkta samīkṣya tad phalam

original: raghur apy ajayad guṇatrayaṃ prakṛtisthaṃ samaloṣṭakāñcanaḥ // Ragh_8.21 //
analyzed: raghuḥ api ajayat guṇatrayam prakṛti stham sama loṣṭa kāñcanaḥ

original: na navaḥ prabhur ā phalodayāt sthirakarmā virarāma karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: na navaḥ prabhuḥ ā phala udayāt sthira karmā virarāma karmaṇaḥ

original: na ca yogavidher navetaraḥ sthiradhīr ā paramātmadarśanāt // Ragh_8.22 //
analyzed: na ca yoga vidheḥ nava itaraḥ sthira dhīḥ ā paramātma darśanāt

original: iti śatruṣu cendriyeṣu ca pratiṣiddhaprasareṣu jāgratau /
analyzed: iti śatruṣu ca indriyeṣu ca pratiṣiddha prasareṣu jāgratau

original: prasitāv udayāpavargayor ubhayīṃ siddhim ubhāv avāpatuḥ // Ragh_8.23 //
analyzed: prasitau udaya apavargayoḥ ubhayīm siddhim ubhau avāpatuḥ

original: atha kāścid ajavyapekṣayā gamayitvā samdarśanaḥ samāḥ /
analyzed: atha kāścid aja vyapekṣayā gamayitvā samdarśanaḥ samāḥ

original: tamasaḥ param āpad avyayaṃ puruṣaṃ yogasamādhinā raghuḥ // Ragh_8.24 //
analyzed: tamasaḥ param āpat avyayam puruṣam yoga samādhinā raghuḥ

original: śutadehavisarjanaḥ pituś ciram aśrūṇi vimucya rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: śuta deha visarjanaḥ pituḥ ciram aśrūṇi vimucya rāghavaḥ

original: vidadhe vidhim asya naiṣṭhikaṃ yatibhiḥ sārdham anagnim agnicit // Ragh_8.25 //
analyzed: vidadhe vidhim asya naiṣṭhikam yatibhiḥ sārdham anagnim agni cit

original: akarot sa tadaurdhvadaihikaṃ pitṛbhaktyā pitṛkāryakalpavit /
analyzed: akarot sa tat aurdhvadaihikam pitṛ bhaktyā pitṛ kārya kalpa vid

original: na hi tena pathā tanutyajas tanayāvarjitapiṇḍakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // Ragh_8.26 //
analyzed: na hi tena pathā tanutyajaḥ tanayā varjita piṇḍa kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: sa parārdhyagater aśocyatāṃ pitur uddiśya sadarthavedibhiḥ /
analyzed: sa parārdhya gateḥ a śocya tām pituḥ uddiśya sat artha vedibhiḥ

original: śamitādhir adhijyakārmukaḥ kṛtavān apratiśāsanaṃ jagat // Ragh_8.27 //
analyzed: śamita ādhiḥ adhijya kārmukaḥ kṛtavān a pratiśāsanam jagat

original: kṣitir indumatī ca bhāminī patim āsādya tam agryapauruṣam /
analyzed: kṣitiḥ indumatī ca bhāminī patim āsādya tam agrya pauruṣam

original: prathamā bahuratnasūr abhūd aparā vīram ajījanat sutam // Ragh_8.28 //
analyzed: prathamā bahu ratna sūḥ abhūt aparā vīram ajījanat sutam

original: daśarāsmiśatopamadyutiṃ yaśasā dikṣu daśav api śrutam /
analyzed: daśa rāsmi śata upama dyutim yaśasā dikṣu api śrutam

original: daśapūrvarathaṃ yam ākhyayā daśakaṇṭhāriguruṃ vidur budhāḥ // Ragh_8.29 //
analyzed: daśa pūrva ratham yam ākhyayā daśakaṇṭha ari gurum viduḥ budhāḥ

original: ṛṣidevagaṇasvadhābhujāṃ śrutayāgaprasvaiḥ sa pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣi deva gaṇa svadhā bhujām śruta yāga prasvaiḥ sa pārthivaḥ

original: anṛṇatvam upeyivān babhau paridher mukta ivoṣṇadīdhitiḥ // Ragh_8.30 //
analyzed: anṛṇa tvam upeyivān babhau paridheḥ muktaḥ iva uṣṇa dīdhitiḥ

original: balam ārtabhayopaśāntaye viduṣāṃ saṃnataye bahu śrutam /
analyzed: balam ārta bhaya upaśāntaye viduṣām saṃnataye bahu śrutam

original: vasu tasya na kevalaṃ guṇavattāpi paraprayojanā // Ragh_8.31 //
analyzed: vasu tasya na kevalam guṇavat tā api para prayojanā

original: sa kadācid aveṣitaprajaḥ saha devyā vijahāra suprajāḥ /
analyzed: sa kadācid aveṣita prajaḥ saha devyā vijahāra suprajāḥ

original: nagaropavane śacīsakho marutāṃ pālayiteva nandane // Ragh_8.32 //
analyzed: nagara upavane śacī sakhaḥ marutām pālayitā iva nandane

original: atha rodhasi dakṣiṇodadheḥ śrita gokarṇaniketam īśvaram /
analyzed: atha rodhasi dakṣiṇa udadheḥ śrita gokarṇa niketam īśvaram

original: upavīṇayituṃ yayau raver udagāvṛttipathena nāradaḥ // Ragh_8.33 //
analyzed: upavīṇayitum yayau raveḥ udak āvṛtti pathena nāradaḥ

original: kusumair grathitām apārthivaiḥ srajam ātodyaśironiveśitām /
analyzed: kusumaiḥ grathitām apārthivaiḥ srajam ātodya śiraḥ niveśitām

original: aharat kila tasya vegavān adhivāsaspṛhayeva mārutaḥ // Ragh_8.34 //
analyzed: aharat kila tasya vegavān adhivāsa spṛhayā iva mārutaḥ

original: bhramaraiḥ kusumānusāribhiḥ parikīrṇā parivādinī muneḥ /
analyzed: bhramaraiḥ kusuma anusāribhiḥ parikīrṇā parivādinī muneḥ

original: dadṛśe pavanāvalepajaṃ sṛjatī bāṣpam ivāñjanāvilam // Ragh_8.35 //
analyzed: dadṛśe pavana avalepa jam sṛjatī bāṣpam iva añjana āvilam

original: abhibhūya vibhūtim ārtavīṃ madhugandhātiśayena vīrudhām /
analyzed: abhibhūya vibhūtim ārtavīm madhu gandha atiśayena vīrudhām

original: nṛpater amarasrag āpa sā dayitorustanakoṭisusthitim // Ragh_8.36 //
analyzed: nṛpateḥ amara sraj āpa sā dayitā ūru stana koṭi susthitim

original: kṣaṇamātrasakhīṃ sujātayoḥ stanayos tām avalokya vihalā /
analyzed: kṣaṇa mātra sakhīm sujātayoḥ stanayoḥ tām avalokya vihalā

original: nimimīla narottamapriyā hṛtacandrā tamaseva kaumudī // Ragh_8.37 //
analyzed: nimimīla nara uttama priyā hṛta candrā tamasā iva kaumudī

original: vapuṣā karaṇojjhitena sā nipatantī patim apy apātayat /
analyzed: vapuṣā karaṇa ujjhitena sā nipatantī patim api apātayat

original: nanu tailaniṣekabindunā saha dīpārcir upaiti medinīm // Ragh_8.38 //
analyzed: nanu taila niṣeka bindunā saha dīpa arciḥ upaiti medinīm

original: samam eva narādhipena sā gurusaṃmohaviluptacetanā /
analyzed: samam eva narādhipena sā guru saṃmoha vilupta cetanā

original: gurusaṃmohaviluptacetanā navadīpārcir iva kṣites talam // Ragh_8.38* //
analyzed: guru saṃmoha vilupta cetanāḥ nava dīpa arciḥ iva kṣiteḥ talam

original: ubhayor api pārśvavartināṃ tumu lenārtaraveṇa vejitāḥ /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api pārśva vartinām tumu lena ārta raveṇa vejitāḥ

original: vihagāḥ kamalākarālayāḥ samaduḥkhā iva tatra cukruśuḥ // Ragh_8.39 //
analyzed: vihagāḥ kamala akara ālayāḥ sama duḥkhāḥ iva tatra cukruśuḥ

original: nṛpater vyajanādibhis tamo nunude sā tu tathaiva saṃsthitā /
analyzed: nṛpateḥ vyajana ādibhiḥ tamaḥ nunude sā tu tathā eva saṃsthitā

original: pratikāravidhānam āyuṣaḥ sati śeṣe hi phalāya kalpate // Ragh_8.40 //
analyzed: pratikāra vidhānam āyuṣaḥ sati śeṣe hi phalāya kalpate

original: pratiyojayitavyavallakīsamavasthām atha sattvaviplavāt /
analyzed: pratiyojayitavya vallakī samavasthām atha sattva viplavāt

original: sa nināya nitāntavatsalaḥ parigṛhyocitam aṅkam aṅganām // Ragh_8.41 //
analyzed: sa nināya nitānta vatsalaḥ parigṛhya ucitam aṅkam aṅganām

original: sa nināya nitāntavatsalaḥ parivṛttaprathamacchaviṃ kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: sa nināya nitānta vatsalaḥ parivṛtta prathama chavim kṣaṇāt

original: saliloddhṛtapadminīnibhāṃ dayitām aṅkam udaśulocanaḥ // Ragh_8.41* //
analyzed: salila uddhṛta padminī nibhām dayitām aṅkam udaśu locanaḥ

original: sa nināya nitāntavatsalaḥ karaṇāpāyavibhinnavarṇayā /
analyzed: sa nināya nitānta vatsalaḥ karaṇa apāya vibhinna varṇayā

original: samalakṣyata bibhrad āvilāṃ mṛgalekhām uṣasīva candramāḥ // Ragh_8.42 //
analyzed: samalakṣyata bibhrat āvilām mṛga lekhām uṣasi iva candramāḥ

original: vilalāpa sa bāṣpagadgadaṃ sahajām apy apahāya dhīratām /
analyzed: vilalāpa sa bāṣpa gadgadam sahajām api apahāya dhīra tām

original: abhitaptam ayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate kaiva kathā śarīriṣu // Ragh_8.43 //
analyzed: abhitaptam mārdavam bhajate kā eva kathā śarīriṣu

original: kusumāny api gātrasaṃgamāt prabhavanty āyur apohituṃ yadi /
analyzed: kusumāni api gātra saṃgamāt prabhavanti āyuḥ apohitum yadi

original: na bhaviṣyati hanta sādhanaṃ kim ivānayat prahariṣyato vidheḥ // Ragh_8.44 //
analyzed: na bhaviṣyati hanta sādhanam kim iva anayat prahariṣyataḥ vidheḥ

original: atha vā mṛdu vastu hiṃsituṃ mṛdunaivārabhate prajāntakaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā mṛdu vastu hiṃsitum mṛdunā eva ārabhate prajā antakaḥ

original: himasekavipattir atra me nalinī pūrvanidarśanaṃ matā // Ragh_8.45 //
analyzed: hima seka vipattiḥ atra me nalinī pūrva nidarśanam matā

original: srag iyaṃ yadi jīvitāpahā hṛdaye kiṃ nihitā na hanti mām /
analyzed: sraj iyam yadi jīvita apahā hṛdaye kim nihitā na hanti mām

original: viṣam apy amṛtaṃ kvacid bhaved amṛtaṃ vā viṣam īśvarecchayā // Ragh_8.46 //
analyzed: viṣam api amṛtam kvacid bhavet amṛtam vā viṣam īśvara icchayā

original: atha vā mama bhāgyaviplavād aśaniḥ kalpita eṣa vedhasā /
analyzed: atha vā mama bhāgya viplavāt aśaniḥ kalpitaḥ eṣa vedhasā

original: yad anena tarur na pātitas kṣapitā tadviṭapāśritalatā // Ragh_8.47 //
analyzed: yat anena taruḥ na pātitaḥ kṣapitā tad viṭapa āśrita latā

original: kṛtavaty asi nāvadhīraṇām aparādhhe 'pi yadā ciraṃ mayi /
analyzed: kṛtavatī asi na avadhīraṇām aparādhhe yadā ciram mayi

original: katham ekapade nirāgasaṃ janam ābhāṣyam imaṃ na manyase // Ragh_8.48 //
analyzed: katham eka pade nirāgasam janam ābhāṣyam imam na manyase

original: dhruvam asmi śaṭhaḥ śucismite vidhitaḥ kaitavavatsalas tava /
analyzed: dhruvam asmi śaṭhaḥ śuci smite vidhitaḥ kaitava vatsalaḥ tava

original: paralokam asaṃnivṛttaye yad anāpṛcchya gatāsi mām itaḥ // Ragh_8.49 //
analyzed: para lokam a saṃnivṛttaye yat an āpṛcchya gatā asi mām itas

original: dayitāṃ yadi tāvad anvagād vinivṛttaṃ kim idaṃ tayā vinā /
analyzed: dayitām yadi tāvat anvagāt vinivṛttam kim idam tayā vinā

original: sahatāṃ hatajīvitaṃ mama prabalām ātmakṛtena vedanām // Ragh_8.50 //
analyzed: sahatām hata jīvitam mama prabalām ātma kṛtena vedanām

original: surataśramasaṃbhṛto mukhe dhriyate svedalavodgamo 'pi te /
analyzed: surata śrama saṃbhṛtaḥ mukhe dhriyate sveda lava udgamaḥ pi te

original: atha cāstamitā 'sy aho bata dhig imāṃ dehabhṛtām asāratām // Ragh_8.51 //
analyzed: atha ca astamitā si aho bata dhik imām dehabhṛtām a sāra tām

original: surataśramavāribindavo na hi tāvad viramanti te mukhe /
analyzed: surata śrama vāri bindavaḥ na hi tāvat viramanti te mukhe

original: katham astamitā 'sy aho bata dhig imām dehavatām asāratām // Ragh_8.51* //
analyzed: katham astamitā si aho bata dhik imām dehavatām a sāra tām

original: manasāpi na vipriyaṃ mayā kṛtapūrvaṃ tava kiṃ jahāsi mām /
analyzed: manasā api na vipriyam mayā kṛta pūrvam tava kim jahāsi mām

original: nanu śabdapatiḥ kṣiter ahaṃ tvayi me bhāvanibandhanā ratiḥ // Ragh_8.52 //
analyzed: nanu śabda patiḥ kṣiteḥ aham tvayi me bhāva nibandhanā ratiḥ

original: kusumotkacitān valīmataś calayan bhṛṅgarucas tavālakān /
analyzed: kusuma utkacitān valīmataḥ calayan bhṛṅga rucaḥ tava alakān

original: karabhoru karoti mārutas tvadupāvartanśaṅki me manaḥ // Ragh_8.53 //
analyzed: karabha ūru karoti mārutaḥ tvat upāvartan śaṅki me manaḥ

original: tad apohitum arhasi priye pratibodhena viṣādam āṣu me /
analyzed: tat apohitum arhasi priye pratibodhena viṣādam me

original: jvalitena guhāgataṃ tamas tuhinādrer iva natam oṣadhiḥ // Ragh_8.54 //
analyzed: jvalitena guhā gatam tamaḥ tuhina adreḥ iva natam oṣadhiḥ

original: idam ucchvasitālakaṃ mukhaṃ viśrāntakathaṃ dunoti mām /
analyzed: idam ucchvasita alakam mukham viśrānta katham dunoti mām

original: niśi suptam ivaikapaṅkajaṃ viratābhyantaraṣaṭpadasvanam // Ragh_8.55 //
analyzed: niśi suptam iva eka paṅkajam virata abhyantara ṣaṭpada svanam

original: śaśinaṃ punar eti śārvarī dayitā dvandvacaraṃ patatriṇam /
analyzed: śaśinam punar eti śārvarī dayitā dvandva caram patatriṇam

original: iti tau virhāntarakṣamau katham atyantagatā na māṃ daheḥ // Ragh_8.56 //
analyzed: iti tau katham atyanta gatā na mām daheḥ

original: navapallavasaṃstare 'pi te mṛdu dūyeta yad aṅgam arpitam /
analyzed: nava pallava saṃstare te mṛdu dūyeta yat aṅgam arpitam

original: tad idaṃ viṣahiṣyate kathaṃ vada vāmoru citādhirohaṇam // Ragh_8.57 //
analyzed: tat idam viṣahiṣyate katham vada vāma ūru citā adhirohaṇam

original: iyam apratibodhaśāyinīṃ raśanā tvāṃ prathamā rahaḥsakhī /
analyzed: iyam apratibodha śāyinīm raśanā tvām prathamā rahaḥ sakhī

original: gativibhramasāda nīravā na śucā nānumṛteva lakṣyte // Ragh_8.58 //
analyzed: gati vibhrama sāda nīravā na śucā na anumṛtā iva lakṣyate

original: kalam anyabhṛtāsu bhāṣitaṃ kalahaṃsīṣu gataṃ madālasaṃ /
analyzed: kalam anya bhṛtāsu bhāṣitam kalahaṃsīṣu gatam mada alasam

original: pṛṭatīṣu vilolam īkṣitaṃ pavanādhūtalatāsu vibhramaḥ // Ragh_8.59 //
analyzed: vilolam īkṣitam pavana ādhūta latāsu vibhramaḥ

original: tridivotsukayāpy avekṣya māṃ nihitāḥ satyam amī guṇās tvayā /
analyzed: tridiva utsukayā api avekṣya mām nihitāḥ satyam amī guṇāḥ tvayā

original: virahe tava me guruvyathaṃ hṛdayaṃ na tv avalambituṃ kṣamāḥ // Ragh_8.60 //
analyzed: virahe tava me guru vyatham hṛdayam na tu avalambitum kṣamāḥ

original: mithunaṃ parikalpitaṃ tvayā sahakāraḥ phalinī ca nanv imau /
analyzed: mithunam parikalpitam tvayā sahakāraḥ phalinī ca nanu imau

original: avidhāya vivāhasatkriyām anayor gamyata ivy asāṃpratam // Ragh_8.61 //
analyzed: a vidhāya vivāha satkriyām anayoḥ gamyate ivi asāṃpratam

original: kusumaṃ kṛtadohadas tvayā yad aśoko 'yam udīrayiṣyati /
analyzed: kusumam kṛta dohadaḥ tvayā yat aśokaḥ yam udīrayiṣyati

original: alakābharaṇaṃ kathaṃ nu tat tava neṣyāmi nivāpalālyatām // Ragh_8.62 //
analyzed: alaka ābharaṇam katham nu tat tava neṣyāmi nivāpa lālya tām

original: smarateva saśabdanūpuraṃ caraṇānugraham anyadurlabham /
analyzed: smaratā iva sa śabda nūpuram caraṇa anugraham anya durlabham

original: amunā kusumāśruvarṣiṇā tvam aśokena sugātri śocyase // Ragh_8.63 //
analyzed: amunā kusuma aśru varṣiṇā tvam aśokena su gātri śocyase

original: tava niḥśvasitānukāribhir bakulair ardhacitāṃ samaṃ mayā /
analyzed: tava niḥśvasita anukāribhiḥ bakulaiḥ ardha citām samam mayā

original: asamāpya vilāsamekhalāṃ kim idaṃ kiṃnarakaṇṭhi supyate // Ragh_8.64 //
analyzed: a samāpya vilāsa mekhalām kim idam kiṃnara kaṇṭhi supyate

original: samaduḥkhasukhaḥ sakhījanaḥ pratipaccandranibho 'yam ātmajaḥ /
analyzed: sama duḥkha sukhaḥ sakhī janaḥ pratipad candra nibhaḥ yam ātmajaḥ

original: aham ekarasas tathāpi te vyavasāyaḥ pratipattiniṣṭhuraḥ // Ragh_8.65 //
analyzed: aham ekarasaḥ tathā api te vyavasāyaḥ pratipatti niṣṭhuraḥ

original: dhṛtir astamitā ratiś cyutā virataṃ geyam ṛtur nirutsavaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ astamitā ratiḥ cyutā viratam geyam ṛtuḥ nirutsavaḥ

original: gatam ābharaṇaprayojanaṃ pariśūnyaṃ śayanīyam adya me // Ragh_8.66 //
analyzed: gatam ābharaṇa prayojanam pariśūnyam śayanīyam adya me

original: gṛhiṇī sacivaḥ sakhī mithaḥ priyaśiṣyā lalite kalāvidhau /
analyzed: gṛhiṇī sacivaḥ sakhī mithas priya śiṣyāḥ lalite kalā vidhau

original: karuṇāvimukhena mṛtyunā haratā tvāṃ vada kiṃ na me hṛtam // Ragh_8.67 //
analyzed: karuṇā vimukhena mṛtyunā haratā tvām vada kim na me hṛtam

original: madirākṣi madānanārpitaṃ madhu pītvā rasavat kathaṃ nu me /
analyzed: madirā akṣi mad ānana arpitam madhu pītvā rasavat katham nu me

original: anupāsyasi bāṣpadūṣitaṃ paralokopanataṃ jalāñjalim // Ragh_8.68 //
analyzed: anupāsyasi bāṣpa dūṣitam para loka upanatam jalāñjalim

original: vibhave 'pi sati tvayā vinā sukham etāvad ajasya gaṇyatām /
analyzed: vibhave pi sati tvayā vinā sukham etāvat ajasya gaṇyatām

original: ahṛtasya vilobhanāntarair mama sarve viṣayās tadāśrayāḥ // Ragh_8.69 //
analyzed: ahṛtasya vilobhana antaraiḥ mama sarve viṣayāḥ tad āśrayāḥ

original: vilapann iti kosalādhipaḥ karuṇārthagrathitaṃ priyāṃ prati /
analyzed: vilapan iti kosala adhipaḥ karuṇā artha grathitam priyām prati

original: akarot pṛthivīruhān api srutaśākhārasabhāṣpadurdinān // Ragh_8.70 //
analyzed: akarot pṛthivīruhān api sruta śākhā rasa bhāṣpa durdinān

original: atha tasya kathaṃcid aṅkataḥ svajanas tām apanīya sundarīṃ /
analyzed: atha tasya kathaṃcid aṅkataḥ sva janaḥ tām apanīya sundarīm

original: visasarja kṛtāntyamaṇḍanām analāy' āgurucandanadihase // Ragh_8.71 //
analyzed: visasarja kṛta antya maṇḍanām analāy āguru candana dihase

original: pramadām anu saṃsthitaḥ śucā nṛpatiḥ sann iti vācyadarśanāt /
analyzed: pramadām anu saṃsthitaḥ śucā nṛpatiḥ san iti vācya darśanāt

original: na cakāra śarīram agnisāt saha devyā na tu jīvitāśayā // Ragh_8.72 //
analyzed: na cakāra śarīram agnisāt saha devyā na tu jīvita āśayā

original: atha tena daśāhataḥ pare guṇaśeṣāṃ upadiṣya gehinīm /
analyzed: atha tena daśa ahataḥ pare guṇa śeṣām upadiṣya gehinīm

original: viduṣā vidhayo maharddhayaḥ pura evopavane samāpitāḥ // Ragh_8.73 //
analyzed: viduṣā vidhayaḥ mahā ṛddhayaḥ puras eva upavane samāpitāḥ

original: sa viveśa purīṃ tayā vinā kṣaṇadāpāyaśaśāṅkadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: sa viveśa purīm tayā vinā kṣaṇadā apāya śaśāṅka darśanaḥ

original: parivāham ivāvalokayan svaśucaḥ pauravadhūmukhāśruṣu // Ragh_8.74 //
analyzed: parivāham iva avalokayan sva śucaḥ paura vadhū mukha aśruṣu

original: atha taṃ savanāya diṣitaḥ praṇidhānād gurur āśramasthitaḥ /
analyzed: atha tam savanāya praṇidhānāt guruḥ āśrama sthitaḥ

original: abhiṣaṅgajaḍaṃ vijajñivān iti śiṣyeṇa kilānvabodhayat // Ragh_8.75 //
analyzed: abhiṣaṅga jaḍam vijajñivān iti śiṣyeṇa kila anvabodhayat

original: asamāptavidhir yato munis tava vidvān api tāpakāraṇam /
analyzed: asamāpta vidhiḥ yatas muniḥ tava vidvān api tāpa kāraṇam

original: na bhavantam upasthitaḥ svayaṃ prakṛtau sthāpayituṃ kṛtasthitiḥ // Ragh_8.76 //
analyzed: na bhavantam upasthitaḥ svayam prakṛtau sthāpayitum kṛta sthitiḥ

original: mayi tasya suvṛtta vartate laghusaṃdeśapadā sarasvatī /
analyzed: mayi tasya su vṛtta vartate laghu saṃdeśa padā sarasvatī

original: śṛṇu viśrutasattvasāra tāṃ hṛdi cainām upadhātum arhasi // Ragh_8.77 //
analyzed: śṛṇu viśruta sattva sāra tām hṛdi ca enām upadhātum arhasi

original: puruṣasya padeṣv ajanmanaḥ samatītaṃ ca bhavac ca bhāvi ca /
analyzed: puruṣasya padeṣu a janmanaḥ samatītam ca bhavat ca bhāvi ca

original: sa hi niṣpratighena cakṣuṣā tritayaṃ jñānamayena paśyati // Ragh_8.78 //
analyzed: sa hi niṣpratighena cakṣuṣā tritayam jñāna mayena paśyati

original: carataḥ kila duścaraṃ tapas tṛṇabindoḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ purā /
analyzed: carataḥ kila duścaram tapaḥ tṛṇabindoḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ purā

original: prajighāya samādhibedinīṃ harir asmai hariṇīṃ surāṅganām // Ragh_8.79 //
analyzed: prajighāya samādhi bedinīm hariḥ asmai hariṇīm sura aṅganām

original: sa tapaḥpratibandhamanyunā pramukhāviṣkṛtacāruvibhramām /
analyzed: sa tapaḥ pratibandha manyunā pramukha āviṣkṛta cāru vibhramām

original: aśapad bhava mānuṣīti tāṃ śamavelāpralayormiṇā muniḥ // Ragh_8.80 //
analyzed: aśapat bhava mānuṣī iti tām śama velā pralaya ūrmiṇā muniḥ

original: bhagavan paravān ayaṃ janaḥ pratikūlācaritaṃ kṣamasva me /
analyzed: bhagavan paravān ayam janaḥ pratikūla ācaritam kṣamasva me

original: iti copanatāṃ kṣitipṛśaṃ vivaśā śāpanivṛttikāraṇam // Ragh_8.81 //
analyzed: iti ca upanatām kṣitipṛśam vivaśā śāpa nivṛtti kāraṇam

original: krathakaiśikavaṃśasaṃbhavā tava bhūtvā mahiṣī cirāya sā /
analyzed: kratha kaiśika vaṃśa saṃbhavā tava bhūtvā mahiṣī cirāya sā

original: upalabdhavatī divaś cyutaṃ vivaśā śāpanivṛttikāraṇam // Ragh_8.82 //
analyzed: upalabdhavatī divaḥ cyutam vivaśā śāpa nivṛtti kāraṇam

original: tad alaṃ tadapāyacintayā vipad utpattimatām upasthitā /
analyzed: tat alam tad apāya cintayā vipad utpattimatām upasthitā

original: vasudheyam avekṣyatāṃ tvayā vasumatyā hi nṛpāḥ kalatriṇaḥ // Ragh_8.83 //
analyzed: vasudhā iyam avekṣyatām tvayā vasumatyāḥ hi nṛpāḥ kalatriṇaḥ

original: udaye madavācyam ujjhatā śrutam āviṣkṛtam ātmavattayā /
analyzed: udaye mad a vācyam ujjhatā śrutam āviṣkṛtam ātmavat tayā

original: manasas tad upasthite jvare punar aklībatayā prakāśyatāṃ // Ragh_8.84 //
analyzed: manasaḥ tat upasthite jvare punar aklība tayā prakāśyatām

original: rudatā kuta eva sā punar bhavatā nānumṛtāpi labhyate /
analyzed: rudatā kutas eva sā punar bhavatā na anumṛtā api labhyate

original: paralokajuṣāṃ svakarmabhir gatayo bhinnapathā hi dehinām // Ragh_8.85 //
analyzed: para loka juṣām sva karmabhiḥ gatayaḥ bhinna pathāḥ hi dehinām

original: ruditena na sā nivartate nṛpa tat tāvad anrthakaṃ tava /
analyzed: ruditena na sā nivartate nṛpa tat tāvat anrthakam tava

original: na bhavān anusaṃsthito 'pi tāṃ labhate karmavaśā hi dehinaḥ // Ragh_8.85* //
analyzed: na bhavān anusaṃsthitaḥ u pi tām labhate karma vaśāḥ hi dehinaḥ

original: apaśokamanāḥ kuṭumbinīm anugṛhṇīṣva nivāpadattibhiḥ /
analyzed: apaśoka manāḥ kuṭumbinīm anugṛhṇīṣva nivāpa dattibhiḥ

original: svajanāśru kilātrisaṃtataṃ dahati pretam iti pracakṣate // Ragh_8.86 //
analyzed: sva jana aśru kila a tri saṃtatam dahati pretam iti pracakṣate

original: maraṇaṃ prakṛtiḥ śarīriṇāṃ vikṛtir jīvitam ucyate budhaiḥ /
analyzed: maraṇam prakṛtiḥ śarīriṇām vikṛtiḥ jīvitam ucyate budhaiḥ

original: kṣaṇam apy avatiṣṭhate śvasan yadi jantur nanu lābhavān asau // Ragh_8.87 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam api avatiṣṭhate śvasan yadi jantuḥ nanu lābhavān asau

original: avagacchati mūḍhacetanaḥ priyanāśaṃ hṛdi śalyam arpitam /
analyzed: avagacchati mūḍha cetanaḥ priya nāśam hṛdi śalyam arpitam

original: sthiradhīs tu tad eva manyate kuśaladvāratayā samuddhṛtam // Ragh_8.88 //
analyzed: sthira dhīḥ tu tat eva manyate kuśala dvāra tayā samuddhṛtam

original: avagacchati mūḍhacetanaḥ śruta dhṛtasaṃyogaviparyayau yadā /
analyzed: avagacchati mūḍha cetanaḥ śruta dhṛta saṃyoga viparyayau yadā

original: virahaḥ kim ivānutāpayed vada bāhyair viṣayair vipaścitam // Ragh_8.89 //
analyzed: virahaḥ kim iva anutāpayet vada bāhyaiḥ viṣayaiḥ vipaścitam

original: na pṛthagjanavac chuco vaśaṃ vaśinām uttama gantum arhasi /
analyzed: na pṛthagjana vat śucaḥ vaśam vaśinām uttama gantum arhasi

original: drumasānumatāṃ kim antaraṃ yadi vāyau dvitaye 'pi te calāḥ // Ragh_8.90 //
analyzed: druma sānumatām kim antaram yadi vāyau dvitaye te calāḥ

original: sa tatheti vinetur udāramateḥ pratigṛhya vaco visasarja munim /
analyzed: sa tathā iti vinetuḥ udāra mateḥ pratigṛhya vacaḥ visasarja munim

original: tad alabdhapadaṃ hṛdi śokaghane pratiyātam ivāntikam asya guroḥ // Ragh_8.91 //
analyzed: tat alabdha padam hṛdi śoka ghane pratiyātam iva antikam asya guroḥ

original: tenāṣṭau parigamitāḥ samāḥ kathaṃcid bālatvād avitathasūnṛtena sūnoḥ /
analyzed: tena aṣṭau parigamitāḥ samāḥ kathaṃcid bāla tvāt avitatha sūnṛtena sūnoḥ

original: sādṛśyapratikṛtidarśanaiḥ priyāyāḥ svapneṣu kṣaṇikasamāgamtosavaiś ca // Ragh_8.92 //
analyzed: sādṛśya pratikṛti darśanaiḥ priyāyāḥ svapneṣu ca

original: tasya prasahya hṛdayaṃ kila śokaśaṅkuḥ plakṣapraroha iva saudhatalaṃ bibheda /
analyzed: tasya prasahya hṛdayam kila śoka śaṅkuḥ plakṣa prarohaḥ iva saudha talam bibheda

original: prāṇāntahetum api taṃ bhiṣajām asādhyaṃ lābhaṃ priyānugamane tvarayā sa mene // Ragh_8.93 //
analyzed: prāṇānta hetum api tam bhiṣajām asādhyam lābham priya anugamane tvarayā sa mene

original: samyagvinītam atha varmaharaṃ kumāram ādiśya rakṣaṇavidhau vidhivat prajānām /
analyzed: samyak vinītam atha varmaharam kumāram ādiśya rakṣaṇa vidhau vidhivat prajānām

original: rogopasṛṣṭatanudurvasatiṃ mumukṣuḥ prāyopaveśanamatir nṛpatir babhūva // Ragh_8.94 //
analyzed: roga upasṛṣṭa tanu durvasatim mumukṣuḥ prāya upaveśana matiḥ nṛpatiḥ babhūva

original: tīrthe toyavyatikarabhave jahnukanyāsaryvor dehatyāgād amaragaṇanālekhyam āsādya sadyaḥ /
analyzed: tīrthe toya vyatikara bhave jahnu kanyā saryvoḥ dehatyāgāt amara gaṇanā lekhyam āsādya sadyas

original: pūrvākārādhikatararucā saṃgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣv aramata punar nandanābhyantareṣu // Ragh_8.95 //
analyzed: pūrva ākāra adhikatara rucā saṃgataḥ kāntayā asau līlā āgāreṣu aramata punar nandana abhyantareṣu

original: pitur anantaram uttarkosalān samadhigamya samādhijitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: pituḥ anantaram uttarkosalān samadhigamya samādhi jita indriyaḥ

original: daśarathaḥ praśaśāsa mahāratho yamavatām avatāṃ ca dhuri sthitaḥ // Ragh_9.1 //
analyzed: daśarathaḥ praśaśāsa mahā rathaḥ yamavatām avatām ca dhuri sthitaḥ

original: adhigataṃ vidhivad yad apālayat prakṛtimaṇḍalam ātmakulocitam /
analyzed: adhigatam vidhivat yat apālayat prakṛti maṇḍalam ātma kula ucitam

original: abhavad asya tato guṇavattaraṃ sanagaraṃ nagarandhrakaraujasaḥ // Ragh_9.2 //
analyzed: abhavat asya tatas guṇavattaram sa nagaram naga randhra kara ojasaḥ

original: ubhayam eva vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ samayavarṣitayā kṛtakarmaṇām /
analyzed: ubhayam eva vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ samaya varṣi tayā kṛta karmaṇām

original: valaniṣūdanam arthpatiṃ ca taṃ śramanudaṃ manudaṇḍaharānvayam // Ragh_9.3 //
analyzed: vala niṣūdanam arthpatim ca tam śrama nudam manu daṇḍahara anvayam

original: janapade na gadaḥ padam ādadhāv abhibhavaḥ kuta eva sapatnajaḥ /
analyzed: janapade na gadaḥ padam ādadhau abhibhavaḥ kutas eva sapatna jaḥ

original: kṣitir abhūt phalavaty ajanandane śamarate 'maratejasi pārthive // Ragh_9.4 //
analyzed: kṣitiḥ abhūt phalavatī aja nandane śama rate mara tejasi pārthive

original: daśadigantajitā raghuṇā yathā śriyam apuṣyad ajena tataḥ param /
analyzed: daśa diganta jitā raghuṇā yathā śriyam apuṣyat ajena tatas param

original: tam adhigamya tathaiva punar babhau na na mahī 'nam ahīnaparākramam // Ragh_9.5 //
analyzed: tam adhigamya tathā eva punar babhau na na mahī ahīna parākramam

original: samatayā vasuvṛṭivisarjanair niyamanād asatāṃ ca narādhipaḥ /
analyzed: sama tayā vasu vṛṭi visarjanaiḥ niyamanāt asatām ca narādhipaḥ

original: anuyayau yamapuṇyajaneśvarau savaruṇāv aruṇāgrasaraṃ rucā // Ragh_9.6 //
analyzed: anuyayau yama puṇyajana īśvarau sa varuṇau aruṇa agrasaram rucā

original: na mṛgayābhiratir na durodaraṃ na ca śaśipratimābharaṇaṃ madhu /
analyzed: na mṛgayā abhiratiḥ na durodaram na ca śaśi pratimā ābharaṇam madhu

original: tam udayāya na vā navayauvanā priyatamā yatamānam apāharā // Ragh_9.7 //
analyzed: tam udayāya na vā nava yauvanā priyatamā yatamānam apāharā

original: na kṛpaṇā prabhavaty api vāsave na vitathā parihāsakathāsv api /
analyzed: na kṛpaṇā prabhavati api vāsave na vitathā parihāsa kathāsu api

original: na ca sapatnajaneṣv api tena vāg aparuṣā paruṣākṣaram īritā // Ragh_9.8 //
analyzed: na ca sapatna janeṣu api tena vāc aparuṣā paruṣa akṣaram īritā

original: udayam astamayaṃ ca raghūdvahād ubhayam ānaśire vasudhādhipāḥ /
analyzed: udayam astamayam ca raghūdvahāt ubhayam ānaśire vasudhādhipāḥ

original: sa hi nideśam alaṅghayatām abhūt suhṛd ayohṛdayaḥ pratigarjatām // Ragh_9.9 //
analyzed: sa hi nideśam a laṅghayatām abhūt suhṛd ayaḥ hṛdayaḥ pratigarjatām

original: ajayad ekarathena sa medinīm udadhinemim adhijyaśarāsanaḥ /
analyzed: ajayat eka rathena sa medinīm udadhi nemim adhijya śarāsanaḥ

original: jayam aghoṣayad asya tu kevalaṃ gajavatī javatīrahayā camūḥ // Ragh_9.10 //
analyzed: jayam aghoṣayat asya tu kevalam gajavatī javatīra hayā camūḥ

original: jaghananirviṣayīkṛtamekhalān anucitāśruviluptaviśeṣakān /
analyzed: jaghana nirviṣayīkṛta mekhalān anucita aśru vilupta viśeṣakān

original: sa ripudāragaṇān akarod balād analakān alakādhipavikramaḥ // Ragh_9.10* //
analyzed: sa ripu dāra gaṇān akarot balāt analakān alakādhipa vikramaḥ

original: avanim ekarathena varūthinā jitavataḥ kila tasya dhanurbhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: avanim eka rathena varūthinā jitavataḥ kila tasya dhanurbhṛtaḥ

original: vijayadundubhitāṃ yayur arṇavā ghanaravā naravāhanasaṃpadaḥ // Ragh_9.11 //
analyzed: vijaya dundubhi tām yayuḥ arṇavāḥ ghana ravāḥ nara vāhana saṃpadaḥ

original: śamitapakṣabalaḥ śitakoṭinā śikhariṇāṃ kuliśena puraṃdaraḥ /
analyzed: śamita pakṣa balaḥ śita koṭinā śikhariṇām kuliśena puraṃdaraḥ

original: sa sāravṛṣṭimucā dhanuṣā dviṣāṃ svanavatā navatāmarasānanaḥ // Ragh_9.12 //
analyzed: sa sāra vṛṣṭi mucā dhanuṣā dviṣām svanavatā nava tāmarasa ānanaḥ

original: sphuritakoṭisahasramarīcinā samacinot kuliśena harir yaśaḥ /
analyzed: sphurita koṭi sahasra marīcinā samacinot kuliśena hariḥ yaśaḥ

original: sa dhanuṣā yudhi sāyakavarṣiṇā svanavatā navatāmarasānanaḥ // Ragh_9.12* //
analyzed: sa dhanuṣā yudhi sāyaka varṣiṇā svanavatā nava tāmarasa ānanaḥ

original: caraṇayor nakharāgasamṛddhibhir mukuṭaratnamarīcibhir aspṛśan /
analyzed: caraṇayoḥ nakha rāga samṛddhibhiḥ mukuṭa ratna marīcibhiḥ a spṛśan

original: sa dhanuṣā yudhi sāyakavarṣiṇā śatamakhaṃ tam akhaṇḍitapauruṣam // Ragh_9.13 //
analyzed: sa dhanuṣā yudhi sāyaka varṣiṇā śatamakham tam akhaṇḍita pauruṣam

original: nivavṛte sa mahārṇavarodhasaḥ sacivakāritabālasutāñjalīn /
analyzed: nivavṛte sa mahā arṇava rodhasaḥ saciva kārita bāla suta añjalīn

original: samanukampya sapatnaparigrahān analakān alakānavamāṃ purīm // Ragh_9.14 //
analyzed: samanukampya sapatna parigrahān analakān alakān avamām purīm

original: upagato 'pi ca maṇḍalanābhitām anuditānyasitātapavāraṇaḥ /
analyzed: upagataḥ pi ca maṇḍala nābhi tām an udita anya sita ātapa vāraṇaḥ

original: ajitam asti nṛpāspadam ity abhūd analaso 'nalasomasamadyutiḥ // Ragh_9.15 //
analyzed: ajitam asti nṛpa āspadam iti abhūt analasaḥ nala soma sama dyutiḥ

original: kratuṣu tena visarjitamaulinā bhujasamāhṛtadigvasunā kṛtāḥ /
analyzed: kratuṣu tena visarjita maulinā bhuja samāhṛta digvasunā kṛtāḥ

original: kanakayūpasamucchrayaśobhino vitamasā tamasārasyūtaṭāḥ // Ragh_9.16 //
analyzed: kanaka yūpa samucchraya śobhinaḥ vitamasā tamasā arasyū taṭāḥ

original: ajinadaṇḍabhṛtaṃ kuśamekhalāṃ yatagiraṃ mṛgaśṛṅgaparigrahām /
analyzed: ajina daṇḍa bhṛtam kuśa mekhalām yata giram mṛga śṛṅga parigrahām

original: adhivasaṃs tanum adhvaradīkṣitām asambhāsam abhāsayad īśvaraḥ // Ragh_9.17 //
analyzed: adhivasan tanum adhvara dīkṣitām asambhāsam abhāsayat īśvaraḥ

original: avabhṛtaprayato niyatendriyaḥ surasamājasamākramaṇocitaḥ /
analyzed: avabhṛta prayataḥ niyata indriyaḥ sura samāja samākramaṇa ucitaḥ

original: namayati sma sa kevalam unnataṃ vanamuce namucer araye śiraḥ // Ragh_9.18 //
analyzed: namayati sma sa kevalam unnatam vanamuce namuceḥ araye śiraḥ

original: tam apahāya kakutsthakulodbhavaṃ puruṣam ātmabhuvaṃ ca pativratā /
analyzed: tam apahāya kakutstha kula udbhavam puruṣam ātmabhuvam ca pativratā

original: nṛpatim anyam asevata devatā sakamalā kam alāghavam arthiṣu // Ragh_9.19 //
analyzed: nṛpatim anyam asevata devatā sa kamalā kam alāghavam arthiṣu

original: sa kila saṃyugamūrdhni sahāyatāṃ maghavataḥ pratipadya mahārathaḥ /
analyzed: sa kila saṃyuga mūrdhni sahāya tām maghavataḥ pratipadya mahā rathaḥ

original: svabhujavīryam agāpayad ucchritaṃ suravadhūr avadhūtabhayāḥ śaraiḥ // Ragh_9.20 //
analyzed: sva bhuja vīryam agāpayat ucchritam sura vadhūḥ avadhūta bhayāḥ śaraiḥ

original: asakṛd ekarathena tarasvinā harihayāgrasareṇa dhanurbhṛtā /
analyzed: asakṛt eka rathena tarasvinā hari haya agrasareṇa dhanuḥ bhṛtā

original: dinakarābhimukhā raṇareṇavo rurudhire rudhireṇa suradviṣām // Ragh_9.21 //
analyzed: dinakara abhimukhāḥ raṇa reṇavaḥ rurudhire rudhireṇa suradviṣām

original: tam alabhanta patiṃ patidevatāḥ śikhariṇāṃ iva sāgaram āpagāḥ /
analyzed: tam alabhanta patim pati devatāḥ śikhariṇām iva sāgaram āpagāḥ

original: magadhakosalakekayaśasināṃ duhitaro 'hitaropitamārgaṇam // Ragh_9.22 //
analyzed: magadha kosala kekaya śasinām duhitaraḥ hita ropita mārgaṇam

original: priyatamābhir asau tiṛbhir babhau tisṛbhir eva bhuvaṃ saha śaktibhiḥ /
analyzed: priyatamābhiḥ asau tiṛbhiḥ babhau tisṛbhiḥ eva bhuvam saha śaktibhiḥ

original: upagato vininīṣur iva prajā harihayo 'rihayogavicakṣaṇaḥ // Ragh_9.23 //
analyzed: upagataḥ vininīṣuḥ iva prajāḥ hari hayaḥ riha yoga vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: atha samāvavṛte kusumair navais tam iva sevitum ekanarādhipam /
analyzed: atha samāvavṛte kusumaiḥ navaiḥ tam iva sevitum eka narādhipam

original: yamakuberjaleśvaravajriṇāṃ samadhuraṃ madhur añcitavikramam // Ragh_9.24 //
analyzed: yama kubeḥ jaleśvara vajriṇām sa madhuram madhuḥ añcita vikramam

original: jigamiṣur dhanadādhyuṣitāṃ diśaṃ rathayujā parivartitavāhanaḥ /
analyzed: jigamiṣuḥ dhanada adhyuṣitām diśam ratha yujā parivartita vāhanaḥ

original: dinamukhāni ravir himanirgrahair vimalayan malayaṃ nagam atyajat // Ragh_9.25 //
analyzed: dina mukhāni raviḥ hima nirgrahaiḥ vimalayan malayam nagam atyajat

original: himavivarṇitacandanapallavaṃ virahayan malayādrim udaṅmukhaḥ /
analyzed: hima vivarṇita candana pallavam virahayan malaya adrim udak mukhaḥ

original: vihagayoḥ kṛpayeva śanair yayau ravir aharvirahadhruvabhedayoḥ // Ragh_9.25* //
analyzed: vihagayoḥ kṛpayā iva śanais yayau raviḥ ahar viraha dhruva bhedayoḥ

original: kusumajanma tato navapallavās tadanu ṣaṭpadakokilakūjitam /
analyzed: kusuma janma tatas nava pallavāḥ tadanu ṣaṭpada kokila kūjitam

original: iti yathākramam āvirabhūn madhur drumavatīm avatīrya vanasthalīm // Ragh_9.26 //
analyzed: iti yathākramam āvirabhūt madhuḥ drumavatīm avatīrya vana sthalīm

original: surabhisaṃgamajaṃ vanamālayā navapalāśam adhāryata bhaṅguram /
analyzed: surabhi saṃgama jam vanamālayā nava palāśam adhāryata bhaṅguram

original: ramaṇadattam ivārdranakhakṣataṃ pramadayā madayāpitalajjayā // Ragh_9.26* //
analyzed: ramaṇadattam iva ārdra nakha kṣatam pramadayā mada yāpita lajjayā

original: upahitaṃ śiśirāpagamaśriyā mukulajālam aśobhata kiṃśuke /
analyzed: upahitam śiśira apagama śriyā mukula jālam aśobhata kiṃśuke

original: praṇayinīva nakhakṣatamaṇḍanaṃ pramadayā madayāpitalajjayā // Ragh_9.27 //
analyzed: praṇayinī iva nakha kṣata maṇḍanam pramadayā mada yāpita lajjayā

original: parabhṛtā madanakṣatacetasāṃ priyasakhī laghuvāg iva yoṣitām /
analyzed: parabhṛtā madana kṣata cetasām priya sakhī laghu vāc iva yoṣitām

original: priyatamān akarot kalahāntare mṛduravā duravāpasamāgamān // Ragh_9.27* //
analyzed: priyatamān akarot kalaha antare mṛdu ravā duravāpa samāgamān

original: vraṇagurupramadādharaduḥsahaṃ jaghananirviṣayīkṛtamekhalam /
analyzed: vraṇa guru pramadā adhara duḥsaham jaghana nirviṣayīkṛta mekhalam

original: na khalu tāvad aśeṣam apohituṃ ravir alaṃ viralaṃ kṛtavān himam // Ragh_9.28 //
analyzed: na khalu tāvat aśeṣam apohitum raviḥ alam viralam kṛtavān himam

original: viśadacandrakaraṃ sukhamārutaṃ kusumitadrumam unmadakokilam /
analyzed: viśada candra karam sukha mārutam kusumita drumam unmada kokilam

original: tad upabhogarasaṃ himavarṣiṇaḥ param ṛtor viralaṃ kṛtavān himam // Ragh_9.28* //
analyzed: tat upabhoga rasam himavarṣiṇaḥ param ṛtoḥ viralam kṛtavān himam

original: abhinayān paricetum ivodyatā malayamārutakampitapallavā /
analyzed: abhinayān paricetum iva udyatā malaya māruta kampita pallavā

original: amadayat sahakāralatā manaḥ sakalikā kalikāmajitām api // Ragh_9.29 //
analyzed: amadayat sahakāra latā manaḥ sa kalikā kalikām ajitām api

original: nayaguṇopacitām iva bhūpateḥ sadupakāraphalāṃ śriyam arthinaḥ /
analyzed: naya guṇa upacitām iva bhūpateḥ sat upakāra phalām śriyam arthinaḥ

original: abhiyayuḥ saraso madhusaṃbhṛtāṃ kamalinīm alinīrapatriṇaḥ // Ragh_9.30 //
analyzed: abhiyayuḥ sarasaḥ madhu saṃbhṛtām kamalinīm ali nīra patriṇaḥ

original: daśanacandrikayā vyabhāsitaṃ hasitam āsavagandhi madhor iva /
analyzed: daśana candrikayā vyabhāsitam hasitam āsava gandhi madhoḥ iva

original: bakulapuṣpam asevyata ṣaṭpadaiḥ śucirasaṃ cirasaṃcitam īpsubhiḥ // Ragh_9.30* //
analyzed: bakula puṣpam asevyata ṣaṭpadaiḥ śuci rasam cira saṃcitam īpsubhiḥ

original: kusumam eva na kevalam ārtavaṃ navam aśokataroḥ smaradīpanam /
analyzed: kusumam eva na kevalam ārtavam navam aśoka taroḥ smara dīpanam

original: kisalayaprasavo 'pi vilāsināṃ madayitā dayitāśravaṇārpitaḥ // Ragh_9.31 //
analyzed: kisalaya prasavaḥ pi vilāsinām madayitā dayitā śravaṇa arpitaḥ

original: viracitā madhunopavanśriyām abhinavā iva pattraviśeṣakāḥ /
analyzed: viracitāḥ madhunā upavan śriyām abhinavāḥ iva pattra viśeṣakāḥ

original: madhulihāṃ madhudānaviśāradāḥ kurabakā ravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ // Ragh_9.32 //
analyzed: madhulihām madhu dāna viśāradāḥ kurabakāḥ rava kāraṇa tām yayuḥ

original: suvadanāvadanāsavasaṃbhṛtas tadanuvādiguṇaḥ kusumodgamaḥ /
analyzed: suvadanā vadana āsava saṃbhṛtaḥ tad anuvādi guṇaḥ kusuma udgamaḥ

original: madhukarair akaron madhulolupair bakulam ākulam āyatapaṅktibhiḥ // Ragh_9.33 //
analyzed: madhukaraiḥ akarot madhula ulupaiḥ bakulam ākulam āyata paṅktibhiḥ

original: suvadanāvadanāsavasaṃbhṛtas tadanuvādiguṇaḥ kusumodgamaḥ /
analyzed: suvadanā vadana āsava saṃbhṛtaḥ tad anuvādi guṇaḥ kusuma udgamaḥ

original: iti dayāta ivābhavad āyatā na rajanī rajanīśavatī madhau // Ragh_9.33* //
analyzed: iti dayātaḥ iva abhavat āyatā na rajanī rajanīśavatī madhau

original: prathamam anyabhṛtābhir udīritāḥ praviralā iva mugdhavadhūkathāḥ /
analyzed: prathamam anya bhṛtābhiḥ udīritāḥ praviralāḥ iva mugdha vadhū kathāḥ

original: surabhigandhiṣu śuśruvire giraḥ kusumitāsu mitā vanarājiṣu // Ragh_9.34 //
analyzed: surabhi gandhiṣu śuśruvire giraḥ kusumitāsu mitāḥ vana rājiṣu

original: śrutisukhabhramarasvanagītayaḥ kusumakomaladantaruco babhuḥ /
analyzed: śruti sukha bhramara svana gītayaḥ kusuma komala danta rucaḥ babhuḥ

original: upavanāntalatāḥ pavanāhataiḥ kisalayaiḥ salayair iva pāṇibhiḥ // Ragh_9.35 //
analyzed: upavana anta latāḥ pavana āhataiḥ kisalayaiḥ sa layaiḥ iva pāṇibhiḥ

original: lalitavibhramabandhavicakṣaṇaṃ surabhigandhaparājitakesaram /
analyzed: lalita vibhrama bandha vicakṣaṇam surabhi gandha parājita kesaram

original: patiṣu nirviviśur madhum aṅganāḥ smarasakhaṃ rasakhaṇḍanavarjitam // Ragh_9.36 //
analyzed: patiṣu nirviviśuḥ madhum aṅganāḥ smara sakham rasa khaṇḍana varjitam

original: tilakamastakaharmyakṛtāspadaiḥ kusumamadhvanuṣaṅgasugandhibhiḥ /
analyzed: tilaka mastaka harmya kṛta āspadaiḥ kusuma madhu anuṣaṅga sugandhibhiḥ

original: kalam agīyata bhṛṅgavilāsināṃ smarayutair ayutair abalāsakhaiḥ // Ragh_9.36* //
analyzed: kalam agīyata bhṛṅga vilāsinām smara yutaiḥ ayutaiḥ abalā sakhaiḥ

original: śuśubhire smitacārutarānanāḥ striya iva ślathaśiñjitamekhalāḥ /
analyzed: śuśubhire smita cārutara ānanāḥ striyaḥ iva ślatha śiñjita mekhalāḥ

original: vikacatāmarasā gṛhadīrghikā madakalodakalolavihaṃgamāḥ // Ragh_9.37 //
analyzed: vikaca tāmarasāḥ gṛhadīrghikāḥ mada kala udaka lola vihaṃgamāḥ

original: laghayati sma na patyaparādhajaṃ na sahakāratarus taruṇīdhṛtam /
analyzed: laghayati sma na pati aparādha jam na sahakāra taruḥ taruṇī dhṛtam

original: kusumito namito 'libhir unmadaiḥ smarasamādhisamādhikaroṣitam // Ragh_9.37* //
analyzed: kusumitaḥ namitaḥ unmadaiḥ smara samādhi samādhi kara uṣitam

original: upayayau tanutāṃ madhukhaṇḍitā himakarodayapāṇḍumukhacchaviḥ /
analyzed: upayayau tanu tām madhu khaṇḍitā himakara udaya pāṇḍu mukha chaviḥ

original: sadṛśam iṣṭasamāgamanirvṛtiṃ vanitayā 'nitayā rajanīvadhūḥ // Ragh_9.38 //
analyzed: sadṛśam iṣṭa samāgama nirvṛtim vanitayā nitayā rajanīvadhūḥ

original: apatuṣāratayā viśadaprabhaiḥ suratarāga pariśramanodibhiḥ /
analyzed: apatuṣāra tayā viśada prabhaiḥ surata rāga pariśrama nodibhiḥ

original: kusumacāpam atejayad aṃśubhir himakaro makarojitaketanam // Ragh_9.39 //
analyzed: kusuma cāpam atejayat aṃśubhiḥ himakaraḥ makara ujita ketanam

original: hutahutāśanadīpti vanśriyaḥ pratinidhiḥ kanakābharaṇasya yat /
analyzed: huta hutāśana dīpti van śriyaḥ pratinidhiḥ kanaka ābharaṇasya yat

original: yuvatayaḥ kusumaṃ dadhur āhitaṃ tad (?)
analyzed: yuvatayaḥ kusumam āhitam tat

original: alake dalakesarapeśalam // Ragh_9.40 //
analyzed: alake dala kesara peśalam

original: alibhir añjanabindumaoharaiḥ kusumapaṅktinipātibhir aṅkitaḥ /
analyzed: alibhiḥ añjana bindu maoharaiḥ kusuma paṅkti nipātibhiḥ aṅkitaḥ

original: na khalu śobahayit sma vanasthalīṃ na tilakas tilakaḥ pramadām iva // Ragh_9.41 //
analyzed: na khalu śoba hayit sma vana sthalīm na tilakaḥ tilakaḥ pramadām iva

original: amadayan madghugandhasanāthayā kisalayādharasaṃgatayā manaḥ /
analyzed: amadayat madghu gandha sanāthayā kisalaya adhara saṃgatayā manaḥ

original: kusumasaṃbhṭtayā navamallikā smitarucā tarucāruvilāsinī // Ragh_9.42 //
analyzed: kusuma saṃbhṭtayā nava mallikā smita rucā taru cāru vilāsinī

original: analasānyabhṛtā 'nalasān manaḥ kamaladhūlibhṛtā maruteritā /
analyzed: analasānya bhṛtā manaḥ kamala dhūli bhṛtā marutā īritā

original: kusumabhāranatādhvagayoṣitām asamaśokam aśokalatā 'karot // Ragh_9.42* //
analyzed: kusuma bhāra nata adhvaga yoṣitām asamaśokam aśoka latā karot

original: aruṇarāganiṣedhibhir aṃśukaiḥ śravaṇalabdhapadaiś ca yavāṅkuraiḥ /
analyzed: aruṇa rāga niṣedhibhiḥ aṃśukaiḥ śravaṇa labdha padaiḥ ca yava aṅkuraiḥ

original: parabhṛtāvirutaiś ca vilāsinaḥ smarabalair abalaikarasāḥ kṛtāḥ // Ragh_9.43 //
analyzed: parabhṛta a virutaiḥ ca vilāsinaḥ smara balaiḥ abala eka rasāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: upacitāvayavā śucibhiḥ kaṇair alikadambakayogam upeyuṣī /
analyzed: upacita avayavā śucibhiḥ kaṇaiḥ ali kadambaka yogam upeyuṣī

original: sadṛśakāntir alakṣyata mañjarī tilakajā 'lakajālakamauktikaiḥ // Ragh_9.44 //
analyzed: sadṛśa kāntiḥ alakṣyata mañjarī tilaka jā laka jālaka mauktikaiḥ

original: dhvajapaṭaṃ madanasya dhanurbhṛtaś chavikaraṃ mukhacūrṇam ṛtuśriyaḥ /
analyzed: dhvaja paṭam madanasya dhanuḥ bhṛtaḥ chavi karam mukha cūrṇam ṛtu śriyaḥ

original: kusumakesarareṇum alivrajāḥ sapavanopavanotthitam anvayuḥ // Ragh_9.45 //
analyzed: kusuma kesara reṇum ali vrajāḥ sa pavana upavana utthitam anvayuḥ

original: anubhavan navadolam ṛtūtsavaṃ paṭur pai priyakaṇṭhajigṛkṣayā /
analyzed: anubhavan nava dolam ṛtu utsavam paṭuḥ pai priya kaṇṭha jigṛkṣayā

original: anayad āsanarajjuparigrahe bhujalatāṃ jaḍatām abalājanaḥ // Ragh_9.46 //
analyzed: anayat āsana rajju parigrahe bhuja latām jaḍa tām abalā janaḥ

original: tyajata mānam alaṃ bata bigrahair na punar eti gataṃ caturaṃ vayaḥ /
analyzed: tyajata mānam alam bata bigrahaiḥ na punar eti gatam caturam vayaḥ

original: parabhṛtābhir itīva nivedite smaramate ramate sma vadhūjanaḥ // Ragh_9.47 //
analyzed: parabhṛtābhiḥ iti iva nivedite smara mate ramate sma vadhū janaḥ

original: atha yathāsukham ārtavam utsavaṃ samanubhūya vilāsavatīsakhaḥ /
analyzed: atha yathāsukham ārtavam utsavam samanubhūya vilāsavatī sakhaḥ

original: narapatiś cakame mṛgayāratiṃ sa madhumanmadhumanmathasaṃnibhaḥ // Ragh_9.48 //
analyzed: narapatiḥ cakame mṛgayā ratim sa madhumat madhu manmatha saṃnibhaḥ

original: paricayaṃ calakṣyanipātane bhayaruṣoś ca tadiṅgitabodhanam /
analyzed: paricayam ca lakṣya nipātane bhaya ruṣoḥ ca tad iṅgita bodhanam

original: śramajayāt praguṇāṃ ca karoty asau tanum ato 'numataḥ sacivair yayau // Ragh_9.49 //
analyzed: śrama jayāt praguṇām ca karoti asau tanum atas numataḥ sacivaiḥ yayau

original: mṛgavanopagamakṣamaveṣabhṛd vipulakaṇṭhaniṣaktaśarāsanaḥ /
analyzed: mṛga vana upagama kṣama veṣa bhṛt vipula kaṇṭha niṣakta śarāsanaḥ

original: gaganam aśvakhuroddhuta reṇubhir nṛsavitā savitānam ivākarot // Ragh_9.50 //
analyzed: gaganam reṇubhiḥ nṛ savitā savitānam iva akarot

original: grathitamaulir asau vanamālayā taru palāśasavarṇatanucchadaḥ /
analyzed: grathita mauliḥ asau vanamālayā palāśa savarṇa tanucchadaḥ

original: turagavalganacaṇcalakuṇḍalo viruruce ruruceṣṭitabhūmiṣu // Ragh_9.51 //
analyzed: turaga valgana caṇcala kuṇḍalaḥ viruruce ruruceṣṭita bhūmiṣu

original: tanulatāviniveśitavigrahā bhramarasaṃkramitekṣaṇavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: tanu latā viniveśita vigrahāḥ bhramara saṃkramita īkṣaṇa vṛttayaḥ

original: dadṛṣur adhvani taṃ vanadevatāḥ sunayanaṃ nayananditakosalam // Ragh_9.52 //
analyzed: dadṛṣuḥ adhvani tam vana devatāḥ sunayanam naya nandita kosalam

original: śvagaṇvāgurikaiḥ prathamāsthitaṃ vyapagatānaladasyu viveśa saḥ /
analyzed: śva gaṇvā gurikaiḥ prathama āsthitam vyapagata anala dasyu viveśa saḥ

original: sthiraturaṃgamabhūmi nipānavan mṛgavayogavayopacitaṃ vanam // Ragh_9.53 //
analyzed: sthira turaṃgama bhūmi nipānavat mṛga vayaḥ gavaya upacitam vanam

original: atha nabhasya iva tridaśāyudhaṃ kanakapiṅgataḍidguṇasaṃyutam /
analyzed: atha nabhasyaḥ iva tridaśa āyudham kanaka piṅga taḍit guṇa saṃyutam

original: dhanur radhijyam anādhir upādade naravaro ravaroṣitakesarī // Ragh_9.54 //
analyzed: dhanuḥ radhijyam anādhiḥ upādade nara varaḥ rava roṣita kesarī

original: tasya stanapraṇayibhir muhur eṇaśāvair vyāhanyamānahariṇīgamanaṃ purastāt /
analyzed: tasya stana praṇayibhiḥ muhur eṇa śāvaiḥ vyāhanyamāna hariṇī gamanam purastāt

original: āvirbabhūva kuśagarbhamukhaṃ mṛgāṇāṃ yūthaṃ tadagrasaragarvitakṛṣnasāram // Ragh_9.55 //
analyzed: āvirbabhūva kuśa garbha mukham mṛgāṇām yūtham tad agrasara garvita kṛṣna sāram

original: tat prārthitaṃ javanvājigatena rājñā tūṇīmukhoddhṛtaśareṇa viśīrṇapaṅkti /
analyzed: tat prārthitam javan vāji gatena rājñā tūṇī mukha uddhṛta śareṇa viśīrṇa paṅkti

original: śyāmīcakāra vanam ākuladṛśṭipātair vateritotpaladalaprakarair ivāmbhaḥ // Ragh_9.56 //
analyzed: śyāmīcakāra vanam ākula dṛśṭi pātaiḥ vata īrita utpala dala prakaraiḥ iva ambhaḥ

original: lakṣyīkṛtasya hariṇasya hariprabhāvaḥ prekṣya sthitāṃ sahacarīṃ vyavadhāya deham /
analyzed: lakṣyīkṛtasya hariṇasya hari prabhāvaḥ prekṣya sthitām sahacarīm vyavadhāya deham

original: ākarṇakṛṣṭam api kāmitayā sa dhanvī bāṇaṃ kṛpāmṛdhumanāḥ pratisaṃjahāra // Ragh_9.57 //
analyzed: ākarṇa kṛṣṭam api kāmi tayā sa dhanvī bāṇam kṛpā mṛdhu manāḥ pratisaṃjahāra

original: tasyāpareṣv api mṛgeṣu śarān mumukṣoḥ karṇāntam etya bibhide nibiḍo 'pi muṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: tasya apareṣu api mṛgeṣu śarān mumukṣoḥ karṇa antam etya bibhide nibiḍaḥ u pi muṣṭiḥ

original: trāsātimātracaṭulaiḥ smarayatsu netraiḥ prauḍhapriyānayanavibhramaceṣṭitāni // Ragh_9.58 //
analyzed: trāsa atimātra caṭulaiḥ smarayatsu netraiḥ prauḍha priyā nayana vibhrama ceṣṭitāni

original: uttasthuṣaḥ śiśirapalvalapaṅkamadhyān mustāprarohakavalāvayavānukīrṇam /
analyzed: uttasthuṣaḥ śiśira palvala paṅka madhyāt mustā praroha kavala avayava anukīrṇam

original: jagrāha sa drutavarāhakulasya mārgaṃ suvyaktam ārdrapadapaṅktibhir āyatābhiḥ // Ragh_9.59 //
analyzed: jagrāha sa druta varāha kulasya mārgam su vyaktam ārdra pada paṅktibhiḥ āyatābhiḥ

original: taṃ vāhanād avanatottarakāyam īṣad vidhyantam uddhatasaṭāḥ pratihantum īṣuḥ /
analyzed: tam vāhanāt avanata uttarakāyam īṣat vidhyantam uddhata saṭāḥ pratihantum īṣuḥ

original: nātmānam asya vividuḥ sahasā varāhā vṛkeṣu viddham iṣubhir jaghanāśrayeṣu // Ragh_9.60 //
analyzed: na ātmānam asya vividuḥ sahasā varāhāḥ vṛkeṣu viddham iṣubhiḥ jaghana āśrayeṣu

original: tenābhighātarabhasasya vikṛṣya pattrī vanyasya netravivare mahiṣasya muktaḥ /
analyzed: tena abhighāta rabhasasya vikṛṣya pattrī vanyasya netra vivare mahiṣasya muktaḥ

original: nirbhidya vigraham aśoṇitaliptapuṅkhas taṃ pātayāṃ prathamam āsa papāta paścāt // Ragh_9.61 //
analyzed: nirbhidya vigraham a śoṇita lipta puṅkhaḥ tam pātayām prathamam āsa papāta paścāt

original: prāyo viṣāṇaparimoṣalaghūttamāṅgān khaḍgāṃś cakāra nṛpatir niśitaiḥ kṣurapraiḥ /
analyzed: prāyas viṣāṇa parimoṣa laghu uttamāṅgān khaḍgān cakāra nṛpatiḥ niśitaiḥ kṣurapraiḥ

original: śṛṇgaṃ sa dṛptavinayādhikṛtaḥ pareṣām abhyucchritaṃ na mamṛṣe na tu dīrgham āyuḥ // Ragh_9.62 //
analyzed: śṛṇgam sa dṛpta vinaya adhikṛtaḥ pareṣām abhyucchritam na mamṛṣe na tu dīrgham āyuḥ

original: vyāghrān abhīr abhimukhopatitān guhābhyaḥ phullāsanāgraviṭapān iva vāyurugṇān /
analyzed: vyāghrān abhīḥ abhimukha upatitān guhābhyaḥ phulla āsana agra viṭapān iva vāyu rugṇān

original: śikṣāviśeṣalaghuhastatayā nimeṣāt tūṇīcakāra śarapūritavaktrarandhrān // Ragh_9.63 //
analyzed: śikṣā viśeṣa laghu hasta tayā nimeṣāt tūṇīcakāra śara pūrita vaktra randhrān

original: nirghātograiḥ kuñjalīnāñ jighāṃsur jyānirghoṣaiḥ kṣobhayām āsa siṃhān /
analyzed: nirghāta ugraiḥ kuñjalīnām jighāṃsuḥ jyā nirghoṣaiḥ kṣobhayām āsa siṃhān

original: nūnaṃ teṣām abhyasūyāparo 'bhūd vīryodagre rājaśabde mṛgeṣu // Ragh_9.64 //
analyzed: nūnam teṣām abhyasūyā paraḥ bhūt vīrya udagre rāja śabde mṛgeṣu

original: tān hatvā gajakulabaddhatīvravairān kākutsthaḥ kuṭilanakhāgralagnamuktān /
analyzed: tān hatvā gaja kula baddha tīvra vairān kākutsthaḥ kuṭila nakha agra lagna muktān

original: ātmānaṃ raṇakṛtakarmaṇāṃ gajānām ānṛṇyaṃ gatam iva mārgaṇair amaṃsta // Ragh_9.65 //
analyzed: ātmānam raṇa kṛta karmaṇām gajānām ānṛṇyam gatam iva mārgaṇaiḥ amaṃsta

original: tān hatvā gajakulabaddhatīvravairān kākutsthaḥ kuṭilanakhāgralagnamuktān /
analyzed: tān hatvā gaja kula baddha tīvra vairān kākutsthaḥ kuṭila nakha agra lagna muktān

original: ātmānaṃ raṇakṛtakarmaṇāṃ gajānām ānṛṇyaṃ gatam iva mārgaṇair amaṃsta // Ragh_9.65 //
analyzed: ātmānam raṇa kṛta karmaṇām gajānām ānṛṇyam gatam iva mārgaṇaiḥ amaṃsta

original: camarān paritaḥ pravartitāśvaḥ kvacid ākarṇavikṛṣṭabhallavarṣī /
analyzed: camarān paritas pravartita aśvaḥ kvacid ākarṇa vikṛṣṭa bhalla varṣī

original: nṛpatīn iva tān viyojya sadyaḥ sitavālavyajanair jagāma śāntim // Ragh_9.66 //
analyzed: nṛpatīn iva tān viyojya sadyas sita vāla vyajanaiḥ jagāma śāntim

original: api turagasamīpād utpatantaṃ mayūraṃ na sa rucirakalāpaṃ bāṇalakṣyī cakāra /
analyzed: api turaga samīpāt utpatantam mayūram na sa rucira kalāpam bāṇa lakṣyī cakāra

original: sapadi gatamanaskaś citramālyānukīrṇe rativigalitabandhe keśapāśe priyāyāḥ // Ragh_9.67 //
analyzed: sapadi gata manaskaḥ citra mālya anukīrṇe rati vigalita bandhe keśapāśe priyāyāḥ

original: tasya karkaśavihārsaṃbhavaṃ svedam ānanavilagnajālakam /
analyzed: tasya karkaśa vihār saṃbhavam svedam ānana vilagna jālakam

original: ācacāma satuṣāraśīkaro bhinnapallavapuṭo vanānilaḥ // Ragh_9.68 //
analyzed: ācacāma sa tuṣāra śīkaraḥ bhinna pallava puṭaḥ vana anilaḥ

original: iti vismṛtānyakaraṇīyam ātmanaḥ sacivāvalambitadhuraṃ narādhipam /
analyzed: iti vismṛta anya karaṇīyam ātmanaḥ saciva avalambita dhuram narādhipam

original: parivṛddharāgam anubhandhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī // Ragh_9.69 //
analyzed: parivṛddha rāgam anubhandha sevayā mṛgayā jahāra catuḥ eva kāminī

original: sa lalitakusumapravālaśayyāṃ jvalitamahauṣadhidīpikāsanāthām /
analyzed: sa lalita kusuma pravāla śayyām jvalita mahā oṣadhi dīpikā sanāthām

original: narapatir ativāhayāṃ babhūva kvacid asametaparicchadas triyāmām // Ragh_9.70 //
analyzed: narapatiḥ ativāhayām babhūva kvacid a sameta paricchadaḥ triyāmām

original: uṣasi sa gajayūthakarṇatālaiḥ paṭupaṭadhavanibhir vinītanidraḥ /
analyzed: uṣasi sa gaja yūtha karṇa tālaiḥ paṭu paṭadha vanibhiḥ vinīta nidraḥ

original: aramata madhurāṇi tatra śṛṇvan vihagavikūjitabandimaṅgalāni // Ragh_9.71 //
analyzed: aramata madhurāṇi tatra śṛṇvan vihaga vikūjita bandi maṅgalāni

original: atha jātu ruror gṛhītavartmā vipine pārśvacarair alakṣyamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: atha jātu ruroḥ gṛhīta vartmā vipine pārśvacaraiḥ a lakṣyamāṇaḥ

original: śramaphenamucā tapasvigāḍhāṃ tamasāṃ prāpa nadīṃ turaṃgameṇa // Ragh_9.72 //
analyzed: śrama phena mucā tapasvi gāḍhām tamasām prāpa nadīm turaṃgameṇa

original: kumbhapūraṇabhavaḥ paṭur uccair uccacāra nando 'mbhasi tasyāḥ /
analyzed: kumbha pūraṇa bhavaḥ paṭuḥ uccais uccacāra nandaḥ mbhasi tasyāḥ

original: tatra sa dviradabṛṃhitaśaṅkī śabdapātinam iṣuṃ visasarja // Ragh_9.73 //
analyzed: tatra sa dvirada bṛṃhita śaṅkī śabda pātinam iṣum visasarja

original: nṛpateḥ pratiṣiddham eva tat kṛtavān paṅktiratho vilaṅghya yat /
analyzed: nṛpateḥ pratiṣiddham eva tat kṛtavān paṅktirathaḥ vilaṅghya yat

original: apathe padam arpayanti hi śrutavanto 'pi rajonimīlitāḥ // Ragh_9.74 //
analyzed: apathe padam arpayanti hi śrutavantaḥ pi rajaḥ nimīlitāḥ

original: hā tāteti kranditam ākarṇya viṣaṇṇas tasyānviṣyan vetasagūḍhaṃ prabhavaṃ saḥ /
analyzed: hā tāta iti kranditam ākarṇya viṣaṇṇaḥ tasya anviṣyan vetasa gūḍham prabhavam saḥ

original: śalyaprotaṃ prekṣya sakumbhaṃ muniputraṃ tāpād antaḥśalya ivāsīt kśitipo 'pi // Ragh_9.75 //
analyzed: śalya protam prekṣya sa kumbham muni putram tāpāt antaḥśalyaḥ iva āsīt kśitipaḥ pi

original: tenāvatīrya turagāt prathitāngvayena pṛṣṭānvayaḥ sa jalakumbhaniṣaṇṇadehaḥ /
analyzed: tena avatīrya turagāt pṛṣṭa anvayaḥ sa jala kumbha niṣaṇṇa dehaḥ

original: tasmai dvijetaratapasvisutaṃ skhaladbhir ātmānam akṣarapadaiḥ kathayāṃ babhūva // Ragh_9.76 //
analyzed: tasmai dvija itara tapasvi sutam skhaladbhiḥ ātmānam akṣara padaiḥ babhūva

original: taccoditaḥ ca tam anuddhrṛtaśalyam eva pitroḥ sakāśam avasannadṛśor nināya /
analyzed: tad coditaḥ ca tam an uddhrṛta śalyam eva pitroḥ sakāśam avasanna dṛśoḥ nināya

original: tābhyāṃ tathāgatam upetya tam ekaputram ajñānataḥ svacaritaṃ nṛpatiḥ śaśaṃsa // Ragh_9.77 //
analyzed: tābhyām tathāgatam upetya tam eka putram ajñānataḥ sva caritam nṛpatiḥ śaśaṃsa

original: tau daṃpatī bahu vilapya śiśoḥ prahartrā śalyaṃ nikhātam udahārayatām urastaḥ /
analyzed: tau daṃpatī bahu vilapya śiśoḥ prahartrā śalyam nikhātam udahārayatām urastaḥ

original: so 'bhūt parāsur atha bhūmipatiṃ śaśāpa hastārpitair nayanvāribhir eva vṛddhaḥ // Ragh_9.78 //
analyzed: saḥ bhūt parāsuḥ atha bhūmipatim śaśāpa hasta arpitaiḥ nayan vāribhiḥ eva vṛddhaḥ

original: diṣṭāntam āpsyati bhavān api putraśokād ante vayasy aham iveti tam uktavantam /
analyzed: diṣṭāntam āpsyati bhavān api putra śokāt ante vayasi aham iva iti tam uktavantam

original: ākrāntapūrvam iva muktaviṣaṃ bhujaṃgaṃ provāca kosalapatiḥ prathamāparāddhaḥ // Ragh_9.79 //
analyzed: ākrānta pūrvam iva mukta viṣam bhujaṃgam provāca kosala patiḥ prathama aparāddhaḥ

original: śāpo 'py adṛṣṭatanayānanapadmaśobhe sānugraho bhagavatā mayi pātito 'yam /
analyzed: śāpaḥ pi adṛṣṭa tanaya ānana padma śobhe sa anugrahaḥ bhagavatā mayi pātitaḥ yam

original: kṛṣyāṃ dahann api khalu kṣitim indhaneddho bījaprarohajananīṃ jvalanaḥ karoti // Ragh_9.80 //
analyzed: kṛṣyām dahan api khalu kṣitim indhana iddhaḥ bīja praroha jananīm jvalanaḥ karoti

original: itthaṃ gate gataghṛṇaḥ kim ayaṃ vidhattāṃ vadhyas tavety abhitite vasudhādhipena /
analyzed: ittham gate gata ghṛṇaḥ kim ayam vidhattām vadhyaḥ tava iti abhitite vasudhādhipena

original: edhān hutāśanavataḥ sa munir yayāce putraṃ parāsum anugantumanāḥ sadāraḥ // Ragh_9.81 //
analyzed: edhān hutāśanavataḥ sa muniḥ yayāce putram parāsum anugantu manāḥ sa dāraḥ

original: prātānugaḥ sapadi śāsanam asya rājā saṃpādya pātakaviluptadhṛtir nivṛttaḥ /
analyzed: prāta anugaḥ sapadi śāsanam asya rājā saṃpādya pātaka vilupta dhṛtiḥ nivṛttaḥ

original: antarniviṣṭapadam ātmavināśahetuṃ śāpaṃ dadhaj jvalanam aurvam ivāmburāśiḥ // Ragh_9.82 //
analyzed: antar niviṣṭa padam ātma vināśa hetum śāpam dadhat jvalanam aurvam iva amburāśiḥ

original: tadartham arthajñagate gatatrapaḥ kim eṣa te vadhyajano 'nusiṣṭhatu /
analyzed: tad artham artha jña gate gata trapaḥ kim eṣa te vadhya janaḥ nusiṣṭhatu

original: sa vahnisaṃskāram ayācatātmanaḥ sadārasūnor vidadhe ca tan nṛpaḥ // Ragh_9.82A //
analyzed: sa vahni saṃskāram ayācata ātmanaḥ sa dāra sūnoḥ vidadhe ca tat nṛpaḥ

original: sameyivān raghuvṛṣabhaḥ svasainikaiḥ svamandiraṃ śithiladhṛtir nivartitaḥ /
analyzed: sameyivān raghu vṛṣabhaḥ sva sainikaiḥ sva mandiram śithila dhṛtiḥ nivartitaḥ

original: manogataṃ guruṃ ṛṣiśāpam udvahan kṣayānalaṃ jaladhir ivāntakāspadam // Ragh_9.82B //
analyzed: manogatam gurum ṛṣi śāpam udvahan kṣaya analam jaladhiḥ iva antaka āspadam

original: pṛthivīṃ śāsatas tasya pākaśāsanatejasaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthivīm śāsataḥ tasya pākaśāsana tejasaḥ

original: kiṃcidūnam anūnarddheḥ śaradām ayutaṃ yayau // Ragh_10.1 //
analyzed: kiṃcid ūnam an ūna ṛddheḥ śaradām ayutam yayau

original: na copalebhe pūrveṣām ṛṇanirmokṣasādhanam /
analyzed: na ca upalebhe pūrveṣām ṛṇa nirmokṣa sādhanam

original: sutābhidhānaṃ sa jyotiḥ śaradām ayutaṃ yayau // Ragh_10.2 //
analyzed: suta abhidhānam sa jyotiḥ śaradām ayutam yayau

original: manor vaṃśaś ciraṃ tasminn anabhivyaktasaṃtatiḥ /
analyzed: manoḥ vaṃśaḥ ciram tasmin an abhivyakta saṃtatiḥ

original: nimajjya punar utthāsyan nadaḥ śoṇa ivābhavat // Ragh_10.2* //
analyzed: nimajjya punar utthāsyan nadaḥ śoṇaḥ iva abhavat

original: atiṣṭhat pratyayāpekṣasaṃtatiḥ sa ciraṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: atiṣṭhat pratyaya apekṣa saṃtatiḥ sa ciram nṛpaḥ

original: prāṅ manthād anabhivyaktaratnotpattir ivārṇavaḥ // Ragh_10.3 //
analyzed: prāk manthāt an abhivyakta ratna utpattiḥ iva arṇavaḥ

original: ṛṣyaśṛṅgādayas tasya santaḥ saṃtānakāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣyaśṛṅga ādayaḥ tasya santaḥ saṃtāna kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: ārebhire jitātmānaḥ putrīyām iṣṭim ṛtvijaḥ // Ragh_10.4 //
analyzed: ārebhire jita ātmānaḥ putrīyām iṣṭim ṛtvijaḥ

original: tasminn avasare devāḥ paulastyopaplutā harim /
analyzed: tasmin avasare devāḥ paulastya upaplutāḥ harim

original: abhijagmur nidāghārtāś chāyāvṛkṣam ivādhvagāḥ // Ragh_10.5 //
analyzed: abhijagmuḥ nidāgha ārtāḥ chāyā vṛkṣam iva adhvagāḥ

original: te ca prāpur udanvataṃ bubudhe cādipūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: te ca prāpuḥ udanvatam bubudhe ca ādi pūruṣaḥ

original: avyākṣepo bhaviṣyantyāḥ kāryasiddher hi lakṣaṇam // Ragh_10.6 //
analyzed: avyākṣepaḥ bhaviṣyantyāḥ kārya siddheḥ hi lakṣaṇam

original: bhogibhogādanāsīnaṃ dadṛśus taṃ divaukasaḥ /
analyzed: bhogi bhogāt an āsīnam dadṛśuḥ tam divaukasaḥ

original: tatphaṇāmaṇḍalodarcirmaṇidyotitavigraham // Ragh_10.7 //
analyzed: tad phaṇā maṇḍala udarciḥ maṇi dyotita vigraham

original: śriyaḥ padmaniṣaṇṇāyāḥ kṣaumāntaritamekhale /
analyzed: śriyaḥ padma niṣaṇṇāyāḥ kṣauma antarita mekhale

original: aṅke nikṣiptacaraṇam āstīrṇakarapallave // Ragh_10.8 //
analyzed: aṅke nikṣipta caraṇam āstīrṇa karapallave

original: prabuddhapuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ bālātapanibhāṃśukam /
analyzed: prabuddha puṇḍarīka akṣam bāla ātapa nibha aṃśukam

original: divasaṃ śāradam iva prārambhasukhadarśanam // Ragh_10.9 //
analyzed: divasam śāradam iva prārambha sukha darśanam

original: prabhānuliptaśrīvatsaṃ lakṣmīvibhramadarpaṇam /
analyzed: prabhā anulipta śrīvatsam lakṣmī vibhrama darpaṇam

original: kautsubhākhyam apāṃ sāraṃ bibhrāṇaṃ bṛhatorasā // Ragh_10.10 //
analyzed: kautsubha ākhyam apām sāram bibhrāṇam bṛhatā urasā

original: bāhubhir viṭapākārair divyābharaṇabhūṣitaiḥ /
analyzed: bāhubhiḥ viṭapa ākāraiḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaiḥ

original: āvirbhūtam apāṃ madhye pārijātam ivāparam // Ragh_10.11 //
analyzed: āvirbhūtam apām madhye pārijātam iva aparam

original: daityastrīgaṇḍalekhānāṃ madarāgavilopibhiḥ /
analyzed: daitya strī gaṇḍa lekhānām mada rāga vilopibhiḥ

original: hetibhiś cetanāvadbhir udīritajayasvanam // Ragh_10.12 //
analyzed: hetibhiḥ cetanāvadbhiḥ udīrita jaya svanam

original: muktaśeṣavirodhena kuliśavraṇalakṣmaṇā /
analyzed: mukta śeṣa virodhena kuliśa vraṇa lakṣmaṇā

original: upasthitaṃ prāñjalinā vinītena garutmatā // Ragh_10.13 //
analyzed: upasthitam prāñjalinā vinītena garutmatā

original: yoganidrāntaviśadaiḥ pāvanair avalokanaiḥ /
analyzed: yoga nidrā anta viśadaiḥ pāvanaiḥ avalokanaiḥ

original: bhṛgvādīn anugṛhṇantaṃ saukha śāyanikān ṛṣīn // Ragh_10.14 //
analyzed: bhṛgu ādīn anugṛhṇantam saukha śāyanikān ṛṣīn

original: praṇipatya surās tasmai śamayitre suradviṣām /
analyzed: praṇipatya surāḥ tasmai śamayitre suradviṣām

original: athainaṃ tuṣṭuvuḥ stutyam avāṅmanasagocaram // Ragh_10.15 //
analyzed: athā enam tuṣṭuvuḥ stutyam a vāc manasa gocaram

original: namo viśvasṛje pūrvaṃ viśvaṃ tadanu bibhrate /
analyzed: namaḥ viśvasṛje pūrvam viśvam tadanu bibhrate

original: atha viśvasya saṃhartre tubhyaṃ tredhāsthitātmane // Ragh_10.16 //
analyzed: atha viśvasya saṃhartre tubhyam tredhā sthita ātmane

original: rasāntarāṇy ekarasaṃ yathā divyaṃ payo 'śnute /
analyzed: rasa antarāṇi eka rasam yathā divyam payaḥ śnute

original: deśe deśe guṇeṣv evam avasthās tvam avikriyaḥ // Ragh_10.17 //
analyzed: deśe deśe guṇeṣu evam avasthāḥ tvam avikriyaḥ

original: ameyo mitalokas tvam anarthī prārthanāvahaḥ /
analyzed: ameyaḥ mita lokaḥ tvam anarthī prārthanā vahaḥ

original: ajito jiṣṇur atyantam avyakto vyaktakāraṇam // Ragh_10.18 //
analyzed: ajitaḥ jiṣṇuḥ atyantam avyaktaḥ vyakta kāraṇam

original: ekaḥ kāraṇatas tāṃ tām avasthāṃ pratipadyase /
analyzed: ekaḥ kāraṇataḥ tām tām avasthām pratipadyase

original: nānātvaṃ rāgasaṃyogāt sphaṭikasy'eva te smṛtam // Ragh_10.19 //
analyzed: nānātvam rāga saṃyogāt sphaṭikasya iva te smṛtam

original: hṛdayastham anāsannam akāmaṃ tvāṃ tapasvinam /
analyzed: hṛdaya stham anāsannam akāmam tvām tapasvinam

original: dayālum anaghaspṛṣṭaṃ purāṇam ajaraṃ viduḥ // Ragh_10.20 //
analyzed: dayālum anagha spṛṣṭam purāṇam ajaram viduḥ

original: sarvajñas tvam avijñātaḥ sarvayonis tvam ātmabhūḥ /
analyzed: sarva jñaḥ tvam a vijñātaḥ sarva yoniḥ tvam ātmabhūḥ

original: sarvaprabhur anīśas tvam ekas tvaṃ sarvarūpabhāk // Ragh_10.21 //
analyzed: sarva prabhuḥ anīśaḥ tvam ekaḥ tvam sarva rūpa bhāj

original: saptasāmopagītaṃ tvāṃ saptārṇavajaleśayam /
analyzed: sapta sāma upagītam tvām sapta arṇava jaleśayam

original: saptārcirmukham ācakhyuḥ saptalokaikasaṃśrayam // Ragh_10.22 //
analyzed: saptārciḥ mukham ācakhyuḥ saptaloka eka saṃśrayam

original: caturvargaphalaṃ jñānaṃ kālāvasthā caturyugā /
caturvarṇamayo lokas tvattaḥ sarvaṃ caturmukhāt // Ragh_10.23 //
analyzed: catur varṇa mayaḥ lokaḥ tvattaḥ sarvam caturmukhāt

original: abhyāsanigṛhītena manasā hṛdayāśrayam /
analyzed: abhyāsa nigṛhītena manasā hṛdaya āśrayam

original: jyotirmayaṃ vicinvanti yoginas tvāṃ vimuktaye // Ragh_10.24 //
analyzed: jyotiḥ mayam vicinvanti yoginaḥ tvām vimuktaye

original: ajasya gṛhṇato janma nirīhasya hatadviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ajasya gṛhṇataḥ janma nirīhasya hata dviṣaḥ

original: svapato jāgarūkasya yāthātmyaṃ veda kas tava // Ragh_10.25 //
analyzed: svapataḥ jāgarūkasya yāthātmyam veda kaḥ tava

original: śabdādīn viṣayān bhoktuṃ carituṃ duścaraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: śabda ādīn viṣayān bhoktum caritum duścaram tapaḥ

original: paryāpto 'si prajāḥ pātum audāsīnyena vartitum // Ragh_10.26 //
analyzed: paryāptaḥ si prajāḥ pātum audāsīnyena vartitum

original: bahudhāpy āgamair bhinnāḥ panthānaḥ siddhihetavaḥ /
analyzed: bahudhā api āgamaiḥ bhinnāḥ panthānaḥ siddhi hetavaḥ

original: tvayy eva nipatanty oghā jāhnavīyā ivārṇave // Ragh_10.27 //
analyzed: tvayi eva nipatanti oghāḥ jāhnavīyāḥ iva arṇave

original: tvayy āveśitacittānāṃ tvatsamarpitakarmaṇām /
analyzed: tvayi āveśita cittānām tvad samarpita karmaṇām

original: gatis tvaṃ vītarāgāṇām abhūyaḥsaṃnivṛttaye // Ragh_10.28 //
analyzed: gatiḥ tvam vīta rāgāṇām abhūyas saṃnivṛttaye

original: pratyakṣo 'py aparicchedyo mahyādir mahimā tava /
analyzed: pratyakṣaḥ pi aparicchedyaḥ mahi ādiḥ mahimā tava

original: āptavāganumānābhyāṃ sādhyaṃ tvāṃ prati kā kathā // Ragh_10.29 //
analyzed: āpta vāc anumānābhyām sādhyam tvām prati kā kathā

original: kevalaṃ smaraṇenaiva punāsi puruṣaṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: kevalam smaraṇena eva punāsi puruṣam yatas

original: anena vṛttayaḥ śeṣā niveditaphalās tvayi // Ragh_10.30 //
analyzed: anena vṛttayaḥ śeṣāḥ nivedita phalāḥ tvayi

original: udadher iva ratnāni tejāṃsīva vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: udadheḥ iva ratnāni tejāṃsi iva vivasvataḥ

original: stutibhyo vyatiricyante dūreṇa caritāni te // Ragh_10.31 //
analyzed: stutibhyaḥ vyatiricyante dūreṇa caritāni te

original: anavāptam avāptavyaṃ na te kiṃcana vidyate /
analyzed: anavāptam avāptavyam na te kiṃcana vidyate

original: lokānugraha evaiko hetus te janmakaramaṇoḥ // Ragh_10.32 //
analyzed: loka anugrahaḥ evā ekaḥ hetuḥ te janmaka ramaṇoḥ

original: mahimānaṃ yad utkīrtya tava saṃhriyate vacaḥ /
analyzed: mahimānam yat utkīrtya tava saṃhriyate vacaḥ

original: śrameṇa tad aśaktyā vā na guṇānām iyattayā // Ragh_10.33 //
analyzed: śrameṇa tat aśaktyā vā na guṇānām iyat tayā

original: iti prasādayām āsus tava saṃhriyate vacaḥ /
analyzed: iti prasādayām āsuḥ tava saṃhriyate vacaḥ

original: bhūtārthavyāhṛtiḥ sā hi na stutiḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ // Ragh_10.34 //
analyzed: bhūta artha vyāhṛtiḥ sā hi na stutiḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: tasmai kuśalasaṃpraśnavyañjitaprītaye surāḥ /
analyzed: tasmai kuśala saṃpraśna vyañjita prītaye surāḥ

original: bhayam apralayodvelād ācakhyur nairṛtodadheḥ // Ragh_10.35 //
analyzed: bhayam a pralaya udvelāt ācakhyuḥ nairṛta udadheḥ

original: atha velāsamāsannaśailarandhrānunādinā /
analyzed: atha velā samāsanna śaila randhra anunādinā

original: svareṇovāca bhagavān paribhūtārṇavadhvaniḥ // Ragh_10.36 //
analyzed: svareṇa uvāca bhagavān paribhūta arṇava dhvaniḥ

original: purāṇasya kaves tasya varṇasthānasamīritā /
analyzed: purāṇasya kaveḥ tasya varṇa sthāna samīritā

original: babhūva kṛtasaṃskārā caritārthaiva bhāratī // Ragh_10.37 //
analyzed: babhūva kṛta saṃskārā caritārthā eva bhāratī

original: babhau sa daśanajyotsnā sā vibhor vadanodgatā /
analyzed: babhau sa daśana jyotsnā sā vibhoḥ vadana udgatā

original: niryātaśeṣā caraṇād gaṅgevordhvapravartinī // Ragh_10.38 //
analyzed: niryāta śeṣā caraṇāt gaṅgā iva ūrdhva pravartinī

original: jāne vo rakṣasākrāntāv anubhāvaparākramau /
analyzed: jāne vaḥ rakṣasā ākrāntau anubhāva parākramau

original: aṅgināṃ tamasevobhau guṇau prathmamadhyamau // Ragh_10.39 //
analyzed: aṅginām tamasā iva ubhau guṇau prathma madhyamau

original: viditaṃ tapyamānaṃ ca tena me bhuvantrayam /
analyzed: viditam tapyamānam ca tena me bhuvantrayam
