original: akāmopanateneva sādhor hṛdayam enasā // Ragh_10.40 //
analyzed: akāma upanatena iva sādhoḥ hṛdayam enasā

original: kāryeṣu caikakāryatvād abhyarthyo 'smi na vajriṇā /
analyzed: kāryeṣu ca eka kārya tvāt abhyarthyaḥ smi na vajriṇā

original: svayam eva hi vāto 'gneḥ sārathyaṃ pratipadyate // Ragh_10.41 //
analyzed: svayam eva hi vātaḥ gneḥ sārathyam pratipadyate

original: svāsidhārāparihṛtaḥ kāmaṃ cakrasya tena me /
analyzed: sva asi dhārā parihṛtaḥ kāmam cakrasya tena me

original: sthāpito daśamo mūrdhā lavyāṃśa iva rakṣasā // Ragh_10.42 //
analyzed: sthāpitaḥ daśamaḥ mūrdhā lavya aṃśaḥ iva rakṣasā

original: sraṣṭur varātisargāt tu mayā tasya durātmanaḥ /
analyzed: sraṣṭuḥ vara atisargāt tu mayā tasya durātmanaḥ

original: atyārūḍhaṃ ripoḥ soḍhaṃ candaneva bhoginaḥ // Ragh_10.43 //
analyzed: atyārūḍham ripoḥ soḍham candanā iva bhoginaḥ

original: dhātāraṃ tapasā prītaṃ yayāce sa hi rākṣasaḥ /
analyzed: dhātāram tapasā prītam yayāce sa hi rākṣasaḥ

original: daivāt sargād avadhyatvaṃ martyeṣv āsthāparāṅmukhaḥ // Ragh_10.44 //
analyzed: daivāt sargāt avadhya tvam martyeṣu āsthā parāṅmukhaḥ

original: so 'haṃ dāśarathir bhūtvā raṇabhūmer balikṣamam /
analyzed: saḥ ham dāśarathiḥ bhūtvā raṇa bhūmeḥ bali kṣamam

original: kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇais tacchiraḥkamaloccayam // Ragh_10.45 //
analyzed: kariṣyāmi śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ tad śiraḥ kamala uccayam

original: acirād vajvabhir bhāgaṃ kalpitaṃ vidhivat punaḥ /
analyzed: acirāt vajvabhiḥ bhāgam kalpitam vidhivat punar

original: māyāvibhir anālīḍham ādāsyadhve miśācaraiḥ // Ragh_10.46 //
analyzed: māyāvibhiḥ an ālīḍham ādāsyadhve miśācaraiḥ

original: vaimānikāḥ puṇyakṛtas tyajantu marutāṃ pathi /
analyzed: vaimānikāḥ puṇya kṛtaḥ tyajantu marutām pathi

original: puṣpakālokasaṃkṣobhaṃ meghāvaraṇatatparāḥ // Ragh_10.47 //
analyzed: puṣpaka āloka saṃkṣobham megha āvaraṇa tatparāḥ

original: moṣyadhve svargabandīnāṃ veṇībandhān adūṣitān /
analyzed: moṣyadhve svarga bandīnām veṇī bandhān a dūṣitān

original: śāpayantritapaulastyabalātkārakacagrahaiḥ // Ragh_10.48 //
analyzed: śāpa yantrita paulastya balātkāra kacagrahaiḥ

original: rāvaṇāvagrahaklāntam iti vāgamṛtena saḥ /
analyzed: rāvaṇa avagraha klāntam iti vāc amṛtena saḥ

original: abhivṛṣya marutsasyaṃ kṛṣṇameghas tirodadhe // Ragh_10.49 //
analyzed: abhivṛṣya marut sasyam kṛṣṇa meghaḥ tirodadhe

original: puruhūtaprabhṛtayaḥ surakāryodyataṃ surāḥ /
analyzed: puruhūta prabhṛtayaḥ sura kārya udyatam surāḥ

original: aṃśair anuyayur viṣṇuṃ puṣpair vāyum iva drumāḥ // Ragh_10.50 //
analyzed: aṃśaiḥ anuyayuḥ viṣṇum puṣpaiḥ vāyum iva drumāḥ

original: atha tasya viśāṃpatyur ante kāmyasya karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: atha tasya viśām patyuḥ ante kāmyasya karmaṇaḥ

original: puruṣaḥ prababhūvāgner vismayena sahartvijām // Ragh_10.51 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ prababhūva agneḥ vismayena saha ṛtvijām

original: hemapātragataṃ dorbhyām ādadhānaḥ payaścarum /
analyzed: hema pātra gatam dorbhyām ādadhānaḥ payaḥ carum

original: anupraveśād ādyasya puṃsas tenāpi durvaham // Ragh_10.52 //
analyzed: anupraveśāt ādyasya puṃsaḥ tena api durvaham

original: prājāpatyopanītaṃ tad (?)
analyzed: prājāpatya upanītam tat

original: annaṃ pratyagrahīn nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: annam pratyagrahīt nṛpaḥ

original: vṛṣeva payasāṃ sāram āviṣkṛtam udanvatā // Ragh_10.53 //
analyzed: vṛṣā iva payasām sāram āviṣkṛtam udanvatā

original: anena kathitā rājño guṇās tasyānyadurlabhāḥ /
analyzed: anena kathitāḥ rājñaḥ guṇāḥ tasya anya durlabhāḥ

original: prasūtiṃ cakame tasmiṃs trailokyaprabhavo 'pi yat // Ragh_10.54 //
analyzed: prasūtim cakame tasmin trailokya prabhavaḥ pi yat

original: sa tejo vaiśnavaṃ patnyor vibheje carusaṃjñitam /
analyzed: sa tejaḥ vaiśnavam patnyoḥ vibheje caru saṃjñitam

original: dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ pratyagram aharpatir ivātapam // Ragh_10.55 //
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ pratyagram aharpatiḥ iva ātapam

original: arcitā tasya kausalyā priyā kekayavaṃśajā /
analyzed: arcitā tasya kausalyā priyā kekaya vaṃśa jā

original: ataḥ saṃbhāvitāṃ tābhyāṃ sumitrām aicchad īśvaraḥ // Ragh_10.56 //
analyzed: atas saṃbhāvitām tābhyām sumitrām aicchat īśvaraḥ

original: te bahujñasya cittajñe patnyau patyur mahīṣitaḥ /
analyzed: te bahu jñasya citta jñe patnyau patyuḥ mahīṣitaḥ

original: caror ardhārdhabhāgābhyāṃ tām ayojayatām ubhe // Ragh_10.57 //
analyzed: caroḥ ardha ardha bhāgābhyām tām ayojayatām ubhe

original: sāpi praṇayavaty āsīt sapatnyor ubhayor api /
analyzed: sā api praṇayavatī āsīt sapatnyoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: bhramarī vāraṇasyeva madanisyandalekhayoḥ // Ragh_10.58 //
analyzed: bhramarī vāraṇasya iva mada nisyanda lekhayoḥ

original: tābhir garbhaḥ prajābhūtyai dadhre devāṃśasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: tābhiḥ garbhaḥ prajā bhūtyai dadhre deva aṃśa sambhavaḥ

original: saurībhir iva nāḍībhir amṛtākhyābhir ammayaḥ // Ragh_10.59 //
analyzed: saurībhiḥ iva nāḍībhiḥ amṛta ākhyābhiḥ ammayaḥ

original: samam āpannasattvās tā rejur āpāṇḍuratviṣaḥ /
analyzed: samam āpannasattvāḥ tāḥ rejuḥ āpāṇḍura tviṣaḥ

original: antargataphalārambhāḥ sasyānām iva saṃpadaḥ // Ragh_10.60 //
analyzed: antargata phala ārambhāḥ sasyānām iva saṃpadaḥ

original: guptaṃ dadṛśur ātmānaṃ sarvāḥ svapneṣu vāmanaiḥ /
analyzed: guptam dadṛśuḥ ātmānam sarvāḥ svapneṣu vāmanaiḥ

original: jalajāsigadāśārṅgacakralāñchitamūrtibhiḥ // Ragh_10.61 //
analyzed: jalaja asi gadā śārṅga cakra lāñchita mūrtibhiḥ

original: hemapakṣaprabhājālaṃ gagane ca vitanvatā /
analyzed: hema pakṣa prabhā jālam gagane ca vitanvatā

original: uhyante sma suparṇena vegākṛṣṭapayomucā // Ragh_10.62 //
analyzed: uhyante sma suparṇena vega ākṛṣṭa payaḥ mucā

original: bibhratyā kaustubhaṃ nyāsaṃ stanāntaravilambinam /
analyzed: bibhratyā kaustubham nyāsam stanāntara vilambinam

original: paryupāsyanta lakṣmyā ca padmavyajanahastayā // Ragh_10.63 //
analyzed: paryupāsyanta lakṣmyā ca padma vyajana hastayā

original: kṛtābhiṣekair divyāyāṃ trisrotasi ca saptabhiḥ /
analyzed: kṛta abhiṣekaiḥ divyāyām trisrotasi ca saptabhiḥ

original: brahma rṣibhiḥ paraṃ brahma gṛṇadhbir upatasthire // Ragh_10.64 //
analyzed: brahma ṛṣibhiḥ param brahma gṛṇadhbiḥ upatasthire

original: tābhyas tathāvidhān svapnāñ chrutvā prīto hi pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: tābhyaḥ tathāvidhān svapnān śrutvā prītaḥ hi pārthivaḥ

original: mene parārdhyam ātmānaṃ gurutvena jagdguroḥ // Ragh_10.65 //
analyzed: mene parārdhyam ātmānam guru tvena jagdguroḥ

original: vibhaktātmā vibhus tāsām ekaḥ kuṣiṣv anekadhā /
analyzed: vibhakta ātmā vibhuḥ tāsām ekaḥ kuṣiṣu anekadhā

original: uvāsa pratimācandraḥ prasannānām apām iva // Ragh_10.66 //
analyzed: uvāsa pratimā candraḥ prasannānām apām iva

original: athāgramahiṣī rājñaḥ prasūtisamaye satī /
analyzed: atha agra mahiṣī rājñaḥ prasūti samaye satī

original: putraṃ tamo'pahaṃ lebhe naktaṃ jyotir ivauṣadhiḥ // Ragh_10.67 //
analyzed: putram tamaḥ upaham lebhe naktam jyotiḥ iva oṣadhiḥ

original: rāma ity abhirāmeṇa tenāpratima tejasā /
analyzed: rāmaḥ iti abhirāmeṇa tena apratima tejasā

original: nāmadheyaṃ guruś cakre jagatprathamamaṅgalam // Ragh_10.68 //
analyzed: nāmadheyam guruḥ cakre jagat prathama maṅgalam

original: raghuvaṃśapradīpena tenāpratima tejasā /
analyzed: raghu vaṃśa pradīpena tena apratima tejasā

original: rakṣāgṛhagatā dīpāḥ pratyādiṣṭa ivābhavan // Ragh_10.69 //
analyzed: rakṣāgṛha gatāḥ dīpāḥ pratyādiṣṭe iva abhavan

original: śayyāgatena rāmeṇa mātā śātodarī babhau /
analyzed: śayyā gatena rāmeṇa mātā śāta udarī babhau

original: saikatāmbhojabalinā jāhnavīva śaratkṛśā // Ragh_10.70 //
analyzed: saikata ambhoja balinā jāhnavī iva śarad kṛśā

original: kaikeyyās tanayo jajñe bharato nāma śīlavān /
analyzed: kaikeyyāḥ tanayaḥ jajñe bharataḥ nāma śīlavān

original: janayitrīm alaṃcakre yaḥ praśraya iva śriyam // Ragh_10.71 //
analyzed: janayitrīm alaṃcakre yaḥ praśraye iva śriyam

original: sutau lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau sumitrā suṣuve yamau /
analyzed: sutau lakṣmaṇa śatrughnau sumitrā suṣuve yamau

original: samyagāgamitā vidyā prabodhavinayāv iva // Ragh_10.72 //
analyzed: samyak āgamitā vidyā prabodha vinayau iva

original: nirdoṣam abhavat sarvam āviṣkṛtaguṇaṃ jagat /
analyzed: nirdoṣam abhavat sarvam āviṣkṛta guṇam jagat

original: anvagād iva hi svargo gāṃ gataṃ puruṣottamam // Ragh_10.73 //
analyzed: anvagāt iva hi svargaḥ gām gatam puruṣottamam

original: tasyodaye caturmūrteḥ paulastyacakiteśvarāḥ /
analyzed: tasya udaye caturmūrteḥ paulastya cakita īśvarāḥ

original: virajaskair nabhasvadbhir diśa ucchvasitā iva // Ragh_10.74 //
analyzed: virajaskaiḥ nabhasvadbhiḥ diśaḥ ucchvasitāḥ iva

original: kṛśānur apadhūmatvāt prasannatvāt prabhākaraḥ /
analyzed: kṛśānuḥ apadhūma tvāt prasanna tvāt prabhā karaḥ

original: rakṣiviprakṛtāv āstām apaviddhaśucāv iva // Ragh_10.75 //
analyzed: rakṣi viprakṛtau āstām apaviddha śucau iva

original: daśānanakirīṭebhyas tatkṣaṇaṃ rākṣasaśriyaḥ /
analyzed: daśānana kirīṭebhyaḥ tad kṣaṇam rākṣasa śriyaḥ

original: maṇivyājena paryastāḥ pṛthivyām aśrubindavaḥ // Ragh_10.76 //
analyzed: maṇi vyājena paryastāḥ pṛthivyām aśru bindavaḥ

original: putrajanmapraveśyānāṃ tūryāṇām tasya putriṇaḥ /
analyzed: putra janma praveśyānām tūryāṇām tasya putriṇaḥ

original: ārambhaṃ prathamaṃ cakrur devadhundubhayo divi // Ragh_10.77 //
analyzed: ārambham prathamam cakruḥ deva dhundubhayaḥ divi

original: saṃtānakamayī vṛṣṭir bhavane cāsya petuṣī /
analyzed: saṃtānaka mayī vṛṣṭiḥ bhavane ca asya petuṣī

original: samaṅgalopacārāṇāṃ saivādiracanābhavat // Ragh_10.78 //
analyzed: sa maṅgala upacārāṇām sā eva ādi racanā bhavat

original: kumārāḥ kṛtasaṃskārās te dhātristanya pāyinaḥ /
analyzed: kumārāḥ kṛta saṃskārāḥ te dhātristanya pāyinaḥ

original: ānandenāgrajeneva samaṃ vavṛdhire pituḥ // Ragh_10.79 //
analyzed: ānandena agrajena iva samam vavṛdhire pituḥ

original: svābhāvikaṃ vinītatvaṃ teṣaṃ vinayakarmaṇā /
analyzed: svābhāvikam vinīta tvam teṣam vinaya karmaṇā

original: mumūrcha sahajaṃ tejo haviṣeva havirbhujām // Ragh_10.80 //
analyzed: mumūrcha sahajam tejaḥ haviṣā iva havirbhujām

original: parasparāviruddhās te tad raghor anaghaṃ kulam /
analyzed: paraspara a viruddhāḥ te tat raghoḥ anagham kulam

original: alam uddyotayām āsur devāraṇyam ivartavaḥ // Ragh_10.81 //
analyzed: alam uddyotayām āsuḥ deva araṇyam iva ṛtavaḥ

original: samāne 'pi hi saubhrātre yathobhau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
analyzed: samāne pi hi saubhrātre yathā ubhau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: tathā bharataśatrughnau prītyā dvandvaṃ babhūvatuḥ // Ragh_10.82 //
analyzed: tathā bharata śatrughnau prītyā dvandvam babhūvatuḥ

original: teṣāṃ dvayor dvayor aikyaṃ bibhide na kadācana /
analyzed: teṣām dvayoḥ dvayoḥ aikyam bibhide na kadācana

original: yathā vāyuvibhāvasvor yathā candrasamudrayoḥ // Ragh_10.83 //
analyzed: yathā vāyu vibhāvasvoḥ yathā candra samudrayoḥ

original: te prajānāṃ prajānāthās tejasā praśrayeṇa ca /
analyzed: te prajānām prajā nāthāḥ tejasā praśrayeṇa ca

original: mano jahrur nidāghānte śyāmābhrā divasā iva // Ragh_10.84 //
analyzed: manaḥ jahruḥ nidāgha ante śyāma abhrāḥ divasāḥ iva

original: sa caturdhā babhau vyastaḥ prasavaḥ pṛthivīpateḥ /
analyzed: sa caturdhā babhau vyastaḥ prasavaḥ pṛthivīpateḥ

original: dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇām avatāra ivāṅgabhāk // Ragh_10.85 //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām avatāraḥ iva aṅga bhāj

original: guṇair ārādhayām āsus te guruṃ guruvatsalāḥ /
analyzed: guṇaiḥ ārādhayām āsuḥ te gurum guru vatsalāḥ

original: tam eva caturnateśaṃ ratnair iva mahārṇavāḥ // Ragh_10.86 //
analyzed: tam eva catur nata īśam ratnaiḥ iva mahā arṇavāḥ

original: suragaja iva dantair bhagnadaityāsidhārair naya iva paṇabandhavyaktayogair upāyaiḥ /
analyzed: sura gajaḥ iva dantaiḥ bhagna daitya asi dhāraiḥ nayaḥ iva paṇa bandha vyakta yogaiḥ upāyaiḥ

original: harir iva yugadīrghair dorbhir aṃṣais tadīyaiḥ patir avanipatīnāṃ taiś cakāśe // Ragh_10.87 //
analyzed: hariḥ iva yuga dīrghaiḥ dorbhiḥ aṃṣaiḥ tadīyaiḥ patiḥ avanipatīnām taiḥ cakāśe

original: kauśikena sa kila kṣitīśvaro rāmam adhvaravighātaśāntaye /
analyzed: kauśikena sa kila kṣitīśvaraḥ rāmam adhvara vighāta śāntaye

original: kākapakṣadharam etya yācitas tejasāṃ hi na vayaḥ samīkṣyate // Ragh_11.1 //
analyzed: kākapakṣa dharam etya yācitaḥ tejasām hi na vayaḥ samīkṣyate

original: kṛcchralabdham api labdhavarṇabhāk taṃ dideśa munaye salakṣmaṇam /
analyzed: kṛcchra labdham api labdha varṇa bhāj tam dideśa munaye sa lakṣmaṇam

original: apy asupraṇayināṃ raghoḥ kule na vyahanyata kadācid arthitā // Ragh_11.2 //
analyzed: api a su praṇayinām raghoḥ kule na vyahanyata kadācid arthi tā

original: yāvad ādiśati pārthivas tayor nirgamāya puramārgasatkriyām /
analyzed: yāvat ādiśati pārthivaḥ tayoḥ nirgamāya pura mārga satkriyām

original: tāvad āśu vidadhe marutsakhaiḥ sā sapuṣpajalavarṣibhir ghanaiḥ // Ragh_11.3 //
analyzed: tāvat āśu vidadhe marut sakhaiḥ sā sa puṣpajala varṣibhiḥ ghanaiḥ

original: tau nideśakaraṇodyatau pitur dhanvinau caraṇayor nipetatuḥ /
analyzed: tau nideśa karaṇa udyatau pituḥ dhanvinau caraṇayoḥ nipetatuḥ

original: bhūpater api tayoḥ pravatsyator namrayor upari bāṣpabindavaḥ // Ragh_11.4 //
analyzed: bhūpateḥ api tayoḥ pravatsyatoḥ namrayoḥ upari bāṣpa bindavaḥ

original: tau pitur nayanajena vāriṇā kiṃcidukṣitaśikhaṇḍakāv ubhau /
analyzed: tau pituḥ nayana jena vāriṇā kiṃcid ukṣita śikhaṇḍakau ubhau

original: dhanvinau tam ṛṣim anvagacchatāṃ pauradṛṣṭikṛtamārgatoraṇau // Ragh_11.5 //
analyzed: dhanvinau tam ṛṣim anvagacchatām paura dṛṣṭi kṛta mārga toraṇau

original: lakṣmaṇānucaram eva rāghavaṃ netum aicchad ṛṣir ity asau nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣmaṇa anucaram eva rāghavam netum aicchat ṛṣiḥ iti asau nṛpaḥ

original: āśiṣaṃ prayuyuje na vāhinīṃ sā hi rakṣaṇavidhau tayoḥ kṣamā // Ragh_11.6 //
analyzed: āśiṣam prayuyuje na vāhinīm sā hi rakṣaṇa vidhau tayoḥ kṣamā

original: rejatuś ca sutarāṃ mahaujasaḥ kauśikasya padavīm anudrutau /
analyzed: rejatuḥ ca sutarām mahā ojasaḥ kauśikasya padavīm anudrutau

original: uttarāṃ prati diśaṃ vivasvataḥ prasthitasya madhumādhavāv iva // Ragh_11.6* //
analyzed: uttarām prati diśam vivasvataḥ prasthitasya madhu mādhavau iva

original: mātṛvargacaraṇaspṛṣau munes tau prapadya padavīṃ mahaujasaḥ /
analyzed: mātṛ varga caraṇa spṛṣau muneḥ tau prapadya padavīm mahā ojasaḥ

original: rejatur gativaśāt pravartinau bhāskarasya madhumādhavāv iva // Ragh_11.7 //
analyzed: rejatuḥ gati vaśāt pravartinau bhāskarasya madhu mādhavau iva

original: vīcilolabhujayos tayor gataṃ śaiśavāc capalam apy aśobhata /
analyzed: vīci lola bhujayoḥ tayoḥ gatam śaiśavāt capalam api aśobhata

original: toyadāgama ivoddhyabhidyayor nāmadheyasadṛśaṃ viceṣṭitam // Ragh_11.8 //
analyzed: toyada āgame iva uddhi abhidyayoḥ nāmadheya sadṛśam viceṣṭitam

original: tau balātibalayoḥ prabhāvato vidyayoḥ pathi munipradiṣṭayoḥ /
analyzed: tau bala atibalayoḥ prabhāvataḥ vidyayoḥ pathi muni pradiṣṭayoḥ

original: mamlatur na maṇikuṭṭimocitau mātṛpārśvaparivartināv iva // Ragh_11.9 //
analyzed: mamlatuḥ na maṇi kuṭṭima ucitau mātṛ pārśva parivartinau iva

original: pūrvavṛttakathitaiḥ purāvidaḥ sānujaḥ pitṛsakhasya rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva vṛtta kathitaiḥ   sa anujaḥ pitṛ sakhasya rāghavaḥ

original: uhyamāna iva vāhanocitaḥ pādacāram api na vyabhāvayat // Ragh_11.10 //
analyzed: uhyamānaḥ iva vāhana ucitaḥ pāda cāram api na vyabhāvayat

original: tau sarāṃsi rasavadbhir ambubhiḥ kūjitaiḥ śrutisukhaiḥ patatriṇaḥ /
analyzed: tau sarāṃsi rasavadbhiḥ ambubhiḥ kūjitaiḥ śruti sukhaiḥ patatriṇaḥ

original: vāyavaḥ surabhipuṣpareṇubhiś chāyayā ca jaladāḥ siṣevire // Ragh_11.11 //
analyzed: vāyavaḥ surabhi puṣpa reṇubhiḥ chāyayā ca jaladāḥ siṣevire

original: nāmbhasāṃ kamalaśobhināṃ tathā śākhināṃ na ca pariśramacchidām /
analyzed: na ambhasām kamala śobhinām tathā śākhinām na ca pariśrama chidām

original: darśanena laghunā yathā tayoḥ prītim āpur ubhayos tapasvinaḥ // Ragh_11.12 //
analyzed: darśanena laghunā yathā tayoḥ prītim āpuḥ ubhayoḥ tapasvinaḥ

original: sthāṇudagdhavapuṣas tapovanaṃ prāpya dāśarathir āttakārmukaḥ /
analyzed: sthāṇu dagdha vapuṣaḥ tapaḥ vanam prāpya dāśarathiḥ ātta kārmukaḥ

original: vigraheṇa madanasya cāruṇā so 'bhavat pratinidhir na karmaṇā // Ragh_11.13 //
analyzed: vigraheṇa madanasya cāruṇā saḥ bhavat pratinidhiḥ na karmaṇā

original: tau suketusutayā khilīkṛte kauśikād viditaśāpayā pathi /
analyzed: tau suketu sutayā khilīkṛte kauśikāt vidita śāpayā pathi

original: ninyatuḥ sthalaniveśitātaṭanī līlayaiva dhanuṣī adhijyatām // Ragh_11.14 //
analyzed: ninyatuḥ sthala niveśita ātaṭanī līlayā eva dhanuṣī adhijya tām

original: jyāniniādam atha gṛhṇatī tayoḥ prādurāsa bahūlakṣapā chaviḥ /
analyzed: atha gṛhṇatī tayoḥ prādurāsa bahūla kṣapā chaviḥ

original: tāḍakā calakapālakuṇḍalā kālikeva nibiḍā balākinī // Ragh_11.15 //
analyzed: tāḍakā cala kapāla kuṇḍalā kālikā iva nibiḍā balākinī

original: tīvravegadhutamārgavṛkṣayā pretacīvaravasā svanograyā /
analyzed: tīvra vega dhuta mārga vṛkṣayā preta cīvara vasā svana ugrayā

original: abhyabhāvi bharatāgrajas tayā vātyayeva pitṛkānanotthayā // Ragh_11.16 //
analyzed: abhyabhāvi bharatāgrajaḥ tayā vātyayā iva pitṛ kānana utthayā

original: udyataikabhujayaṣṭim āyatīṃ śroṇilambipuruṣāntramekhalām /
analyzed: udyata eka bhuja yaṣṭim āyatīm śroṇi lambi puruṣa antra mekhalām

original: tāṃ vilokya vanitāvadhe ghṛṇāṃ pattriṇā saha mumoca rāghavaḥ // Ragh_11.17 //
analyzed: tām vilokya vanitā vadhe ghṛṇām pattriṇā saha mumoca rāghavaḥ

original: yac cakāra vivaraṃ śilāghane tāḍakorasi sa rāmasāyakaḥ /
analyzed: yat cakāra vivaram śilā ghane tāḍaka urasi sa rāma sāyakaḥ

original: apraviṣṭaviṣayasya rakṣasāṃ dvāratām agamad antakasya tat // Ragh_11.18 //
analyzed: a praviṣṭa viṣayasya rakṣasām dvāra tām agamat antakasya tat

original: bāṇabhinnahṛdayā nipetuṣī sā svakānabhuvaṃ na kevalām /
analyzed: bāṇa bhinna hṛdayā nipetuṣī sā svakān abhuvam na kevalām

original: viṣṭapatrayaparājayasthirāṃ rāvaṇaśriyam api vyakampayat // Ragh_11.19 //
analyzed: viṣṭapa traya parājaya sthirām rāvaṇa śriyam api vyakampayat

original: rāmamanmathaśareṇa tāḍitā duḥsahena dṛdaye niśācarī /
analyzed: rāma manmatha śareṇa tāḍitā duḥsahena dṛdaye niśācarī

original: gandhavadrudhiracandanokṣitā jīviteśavasatiṃ jagāma sā // Ragh_11.20 //
analyzed: gandhavat rudhira candana ukṣitā jīviteśa vasatim jagāma sā

original: nairṛtaghnam atha mantravan muneḥ prāpad astram avadānatoṣitāt /
analyzed: nairṛta ghnam atha mantravat muneḥ prāpat astram avadāna toṣitāt

original: jyotir indhanaipāti bhāskarāt sūryakānta iva tāḍakāntakaḥ // Ragh_11.21 //
analyzed: jyotiḥ bhāskarāt sūryakāntaḥ iva tāḍaka antakaḥ

original: vāmanāśramapadaṃ tataḥ paraṃ pāvanaṃ śruam ṛṣer upeyivān /
analyzed: vāmana āśrama padam tatas param pāvanam śruam ṛṣeḥ upeyivān

original: unmanāḥ prathamajanmaceṣṭitāny asmarann api babhūva rāghavaḥ // Ragh_11.22 //
analyzed: unmanāḥ prathama janma ceṣṭitāni a smaran api babhūva rāghavaḥ

original: āsasāda munir ātmanas tataḥ śiṣyavargaparikalpitārhaṇam /
analyzed: āsasāda muniḥ ātmanaḥ tatas śiṣya varga parikalpita arhaṇam

original: baddhapallavapuṭāñjalidrumaṃ darśanonmukha mṛgaṃ tapovanam // Ragh_11.23 //
analyzed: baddha pallava puṭa añjali drumam darśana unmukha mṛgam tapaḥ vanam

original: tatra dīkṣitam ṛṣiṃ rakaṣatur vighnato daśarathātmajau śaraiḥ /
analyzed: tatra dīkṣitam ṛṣim rakaṣatuḥ vighnataḥ daśaratha ātmajau śaraiḥ

original: lokam andhatamasāt kramoditau raśāmibhiḥ śaśidivākarāv iva // Ragh_11.24 //
analyzed: lokam andhatamasāt krama uditau raśāmibhiḥ śaśi divākarau iva

original: vīkṣya vedim atha raktabindubhir bandhujīvapṛthubhiḥ pradūṣitām /
analyzed: vīkṣya vedim atha rakta bindubhiḥ bandhujīva pṛthubhiḥ pradūṣitām

original: saṃbhramo 'bhavad apoḍhakarmaṇām ṛtvijāṃ cyutavikaṅkatasrucām // Ragh_11.25 //
analyzed: saṃbhramaḥ bhavat apoḍha karmaṇām ṛtvijām cyuta vikaṅkata srucām

original: unmukhaḥ sapadi lakṣmaṇāgrajo bāṇam āśrayamukhāt samuddharan /
analyzed: unmukhaḥ sapadi lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ bāṇam āśraya mukhāt samuddharan

original: rakṣasāṃ balam apaśyad ambare gṛdhrapakṣapavaneritadhvajam // Ragh_11.26 //
analyzed: rakṣasām balam apaśyat ambare gṛdhra pakṣa pavana īrita dhvajam

original: tatra yāv adhipatī makhadviṣāṃ tau śaravyam akarot sa netarān /
analyzed: tatra yau adhipatī makha dviṣām tau śaravyam akarot sa na itarān

original: kiṃ mahoragavisarpivikramo rājileṣu garuḍaḥ pravartate // Ragh_11.27 //
analyzed: kim mahā uraga visarpi vikramaḥ rājileṣu garuḍaḥ pravartate

original: so 'stram ugrajavam astrakovidaḥ saṃdadhe dhanuṣi vāyudaivatam /
analyzed: saḥ stram ugra javam astra kovidaḥ saṃdadhe dhanuṣi vāyu daivatam

original: tena śailagurum apy apātayat pāṇḍupattram iva tāḍakāsutam // Ragh_11.28 //
analyzed: tena śailagurum api apātayat pāṇḍu pattram iva tāḍakā sutam

original: yaḥ subāhur iti rākṣaso 'paras tatra tatra visasarpa māyayā /
analyzed: yaḥ su bāhuḥ iti paras tatra tatra visasarpa māyayā

original: taṃ kṣurapraśakalīkṛtām kṛtī pattriṇāṃ vyabhajad āśramād bahiḥ // Ragh_11.29 //
analyzed: tam kṣura pra śakalīkṛtām kṛtī pattriṇām vyabhajat āśramāt bahis

original: ity apāstamakhavighnayos tayoḥ sāṃyugīnam abhinandya vikramam /
analyzed: iti apāsta makha vighnayoḥ tayoḥ sāṃyugīnam abhinandya vikramam

original: ṛtvijaḥ kulapater yathākramaṃ vāgyatasya niravartayan kriyāḥ // Ragh_11.30 //
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ kula pateḥ yathākramam vāgyatasya niravartayan kriyāḥ

original: tau praṇāmacalakākapakṣakau bhrātarāv abhṛthāpluto muniḥ /
analyzed: tau praṇāma cala kākapakṣakau bhrātarau abhṛtha āplutaḥ muniḥ

original: āśiṣām anupadaṃ samaspṛśad darbhapāṭitatalena pāṇinā // Ragh_11.31 //
analyzed: āśiṣām anupadam samaspṛśat darbha pāṭita talena pāṇinā

original: taṃ nyamantrayata saṃbhṛtakratur maithilaḥ sa mighilāṃ vrajan vaśī /
analyzed: tam nyamantrayata saṃbhṛta kratuḥ maithilaḥ sa mighilām vrajan vaśī

original: rāghavāv api nināya bibhratau taddhanuḥśravaṇajaṃ kutūhalam // Ragh_11.32 //
analyzed: rāghavau api nināya bibhratau tad dhanuḥ śravaṇa jam kutūhalam

original: taiḥ śiveṣu vasatir gatādhvabhiḥ sāyam āśramataruṣv agṛhyata /
analyzed: taiḥ śiveṣu vasatiḥ gata adhvabhiḥ sāyam āśrama taruṣu agṛhyata

original: yeṣu dīrghatapasaḥ parigraho vāsavakṣaṇakalatratāṃ yayau // Ragh_11.33 //
analyzed: yeṣu dīrghatapasaḥ parigrahaḥ vāsava kṣaṇa kalatra tām yayau

original: pratyapadyata cirāya yat punaś cāru gautamavadhūḥ śilāmayī /
analyzed: pratyapadyata cirāya yat punar cāru gautama vadhūḥ śilā mayī

original: svaṃ vapuḥ sa kila kilibiṣacchidāṃ rāmapādarajasām anugrahaḥ // Ragh_11.34 //
analyzed: svam vapuḥ sa kila kilibiṣa chidām rāma pāda rajasām anugrahaḥ

original: rāghavānvitam upasthitaṃ muniṃ taṃ niśamya janako janeśvaraḥ /
analyzed: rāghava anvitam upasthitam munim tam niśamya janakaḥ janeśvaraḥ

original: arthakāmasahitaṃ saparyayā dehabaddham iva dharmam abhyagāt // Ragh_11.35 //
analyzed: artha kāma sahitam saparyayā deha baddham iva dharmam abhyagāt

original: tau videhanagarīnivāsināṃ gāṃ gatāv iva divaḥ punarvasū /
analyzed: tau videha nagarī nivāsinām gām gatau iva divaḥ punarvasū

original: manyate sma pibatāṃ vilocanaiḥ pakṣmapātam api vañcanāṃ manaḥ // Ragh_11.36 //
analyzed: manyate sma pibatām vilocanaiḥ pakṣma pātam api vañcanām manaḥ

original: yūpavaty avasite kiryāvidhau kālavit kuśikavaṃśavardhanaḥ /
analyzed: yūpavati avasite kiryā vidhau kāla vid kuśika vaṃśa vardhanaḥ

original: rāmam iṣvasanadarśanotsukaṃ maithilāya kathayāṃ bvabhūva saḥ // Ragh_11.37 //
analyzed: rāmam iṣvasana darśana utsukam maithilāya saḥ

original: tasya vīkṣya lalitaṃ vapuḥ śiśoḥ pārthivaḥ prathitavaṃśajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: tasya vīkṣya lalitam vapuḥ śiśoḥ pārthivaḥ prathita vaṃśa janmanaḥ

original: svaṃ vicintya ca dhanur durānamaṃ pīḍito duhiṭśulkasaṃsthayā // Ragh_11.38 //
analyzed: svam vicintya ca dhanuḥ durānamam pīḍitaḥ duhiṣ śulka saṃsthayā

original: abravīc ca bhagavan mataṅgajair yad bṛhadbhir api karma duṣkaram /
analyzed: abravīt ca bhagavat mataṅga jaiḥ yat bṛhadbhiḥ api karma duṣkaram

original: tatra nāham anumantum utsahe moghavṛtti kalabhasya ceṣṭitam // Ragh_11.39 //
analyzed: tatra na aham anumantum utsahe mogha vṛtti kalabhasya ceṣṭitam

original: hrepitā hi bahavo nareśvarās tena tāta dhanuṣā dhanurbhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: hrepitāḥ hi bahavaḥ nareśvarāḥ tena tāta dhanuṣā dhanuḥ bhṛtaḥ

original: jyānighātakaṭhinatvaco bhujān svān vidhūya dhig iti pratasthire // Ragh_11.40 //
analyzed: jyā nighāta kaṭhina tvacaḥ bhujān svān vidhūya dhik iti pratasthire

original: pratyuvāca tam ṛṣir niśamyatāṃ sārato 'yam atha vā kṛtaṃ girā /
analyzed: pratyuvāca tam ṛṣiḥ niśamyatām sāratas yam atha vā kṛtam girā

original: cāpa eva bhavato bhaviṣyati vyaktaśaktir aśanir girāv iva // Ragh_11.41 //
analyzed: cāpaḥ eva bhavataḥ bhaviṣyati vyakta śaktiḥ aśaniḥ girau iva

original: evam āptavacanāt sa pauruṣaṃ kākapakṣakadhare 'pi rāghave /
analyzed: evam āpta vacanāt sa pauruṣam kākapakṣaka dhare pi rāghave

original: śraddadhe tridaśagopamātrake dāhaśaktim iva kṛṣṇavartmani // Ragh_11.42 //
analyzed: śraddadhe tridaśa gopa mātrake dāha śaktim iva kṛṣṇavartmani

original: vyādideśa gaṇaḥ sapārśvagān karmukābharaṇāya maithilaḥ /
analyzed: vyādideśa gaṇaḥ sa pārśvagān karmuka ābharaṇāya maithilaḥ

original: taijasaya dhanuṣaḥ pravṛttaye toyadān iva sahasralocanaḥ // Ragh_11.43 //
analyzed: dhanuṣaḥ pravṛttaye toyadān iva sahasralocanaḥ

original: tat prasuptabhujagendrabhīṣaṇaṃ vīkṣya dāśarathir ādade dhanuḥ /
analyzed: tat prasupta bhujaga indra bhīṣaṇam vīkṣya dāśarathiḥ ādade dhanuḥ

original: vidrutakratumṛgānausāriṇaṃ yena bāṇam asṛjad vṛṣadhvajaḥ // Ragh_11.44 //
analyzed: vidruta kratu mṛga anausāriṇam yena bāṇam asṛjat vṛṣadhvajaḥ

original: ātatajyam akarot sa saṃsadā vismayastimitanetram īkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: ātata jyam akarot sa saṃsadā vismaya stimita netram īkṣitaḥ

original: śailasāram api nātiyatnataḥ puṣpacāpam iva peśalaṃ smaraḥ // Ragh_11.45 //
analyzed: śaila sāram api na ati yatnataḥ puṣpa cāpam iva peśalam smaraḥ

original: bhajyamānam atimātrakarṣaṇāt tena vajraparuṣasvanaṃ dhanuḥ /
analyzed: bhajyamānam atimātra karṣaṇāt tena vajra paruṣa svanam dhanuḥ

original: bhārgavāya dṛḍhamanyave punaḥ kṣatram udyatam iti nyavedayat // Ragh_11.46 //
analyzed: bhārgavāya dṛḍha manyave punar kṣatram udyatam iti nyavedayat

original: dṛṣṭasāram atha rudrakārmuke vīryaśulkam abhinandya maithilaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa sāram atha rudra kārmuke vīrya śulkam abhinandya maithilaḥ

original: rāghavāya tanayām ayonijāṃ rūpiṇīṃ śriyam iva nyavedayat // Ragh_11.47 //
analyzed: rāghavāya tanayām a yoni jām rūpiṇīm śriyam iva nyavedayat

original: maithilaḥ sapadi satyasaṃgaro rāghavāya tanayām ayonijāṃ /
analyzed: maithilaḥ sapadi satya saṃgaraḥ rāghavāya tanayām ayonijām

original: saṃnidhau dyutimatas taponidher agnisākṣika ivātisṛṣṭavān // Ragh_11.48 //
analyzed: saṃnidhau dyutimataḥ taponidheḥ agni sākṣike iva atisṛṣṭavān

original: prāhiṇoc ca mahitaṃ mahādyutiḥ kosalādhipataye purodhasam /
analyzed: prāhiṇot ca mahitam mahā dyutiḥ kosala adhipataye purodhasam

original: bhṛtyabhāvi duhituḥ parigrahād diśyatāṃ kulam idaṃ nimer iti // Ragh_11.49 //
analyzed: bhṛtya bhāvi duhituḥ parigrahāt diśyatām kulam idam nimeḥ iti

original: utsukaś ca sutadārakarmaṇā so 'bhavad gurur upāgataś ca tam /
analyzed: utsukaḥ ca suta dāra karmaṇā saḥ bhavat guruḥ upāgataḥ ca tam

original: gautamasya tanayo 'nukūlavāk prārthitaṃ hi sukṛtām akālahṛt // Ragh_11.49* //
analyzed: gautamasya tanayaḥ nukūla vāc prārthitam hi sukṛtām akāla hṛt

original: anviyeṣa sadṛśīṃ sa ca snuṣāṃ prāpa cainam anukūlavāg dvijaḥ /
analyzed: anviyeṣa sadṛśīm sa ca snuṣām prāpa ca enam anukūla vāc dvijaḥ

original: sadya eva sukṛtāṃ hi pacyate kalpavṛkṣaphala dharmi kāṅkṣitam // Ragh_11.50 //
analyzed: sadyas eva su kṛtām hi pacyate kalpavṛkṣa phala dharmi kāṅkṣitam

original: tasya kalpitapuraskriyāvidheḥ śuśruvān vacanam agrajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: tasya kalpita puraskriyā vidheḥ śuśruvān vacanam agrajanmanaḥ

original: uccacāla valabhitasakho vaśī sainyareṇumuṣitārkadīdhitiḥ // Ragh_11.51 //
analyzed: uccacāla vala bhita sakhaḥ vaśī sainya reṇu muṣita arka dīdhitiḥ

original: āsasāda mithilāṃ sa veṣṭayan piḍitopavanapādapāṃ balaiḥ /
analyzed: āsasāda mithilām sa veṣṭayan piḍita upavana pādapām balaiḥ

original: prītirodham asahiṣṭa sā purī strīva kāntaparibhogam āyatam // Ragh_11.52 //
analyzed: prīti rodham asahiṣṭa sā purī strī iva kānta paribhogam āyatam

original: tau sametya samayasthitāv ubhau bhūpatī varuṇavāsavopamau /
analyzed: tau sametya samaya sthitau ubhau bhūpatī varuṇa vāsava upamau

original: kanyakātanayakautukakriyāṃ svaprabhāvasadṛśīṃ vitenatuḥ // Ragh_11.53 //
analyzed: kanyakā tanaya kautuka kriyām sva prabhāva sadṛśīm vitenatuḥ

original: pārthivīm udavahad raghūdvaho lakṣmaṇas tadanujām athormilām /
analyzed: pārthivīm udavahat raghūdvahaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ tad anujām atha ūrmilām

original: yau tayor avarajau varaujasau tau kuśadhvajasute sumadhyame // Ragh_11.54 //
analyzed: yau tayoḥ avara jau vara ojasau tau kuśadhvaja sute sumadhyame

original: te caturthasahitās trayo babhuḥ sūnavo navavadhūparigrahāḥ /
analyzed: te caturtha sahitāḥ trayaḥ babhuḥ sūnavaḥ nava vadhū parigrahāḥ

original: sāmadānavidhibhedavigrahāḥ siddhimanta iva tasya bhūpateḥ // Ragh_11.55 //
analyzed: sāma dāna vidhi bheda vigrahāḥ siddhimantaḥ iva tasya bhūpateḥ

original: tā narādhipasutā nṛpātmajais te ca tābhir agaman kṛtārthatām /
analyzed: tāḥ narādhipa sutāḥ nṛpa ātmajaiḥ te ca tābhiḥ agaman kṛtārtha tām

original: so 'bhavad varavadhūsamāgamaḥ pratyayaprakṛtiyogsaṃnibhaḥ // Ragh_11.56 //
analyzed: saḥ bhavat vara vadhū samāgamaḥ pratyaya prakṛti yoga saṃnibhaḥ

original: evam āttaratir ātmasaṃbhavāṃs tān niveśya caturo 'pi tatra saḥ /
analyzed: evam ātta ratiḥ ātma saṃbhavān tān niveśya caturaḥ pi tatra saḥ

original: adhvasu triṣu visṛṣṭamaithilaḥ svāṃ purīṃ daśaratho nyavartata // Ragh_11.57 //
analyzed: adhvasu triṣu visṛṣṭa maithilaḥ svām purīm daśarathaḥ nyavartata

original: tasya jātu marutaḥ pratīpagā vartmasu dhavjatarupramāthinaḥ /
analyzed: tasya jātu marutaḥ pratīpa gāḥ vartmasu dhavja taru pramāthinaḥ

original: cikliśur bhṛśatayā varūthinīm uttaṭā iva nadīrayāḥ sthalīm // Ragh_11.58 //
analyzed: cikliśuḥ bhṛśa tayā varūthinīm uttaṭāḥ iva nadī rayāḥ sthalīm

original: lakṣyate sma tadanantaraṃ ravir baddhabhīmapairveṣamaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣyate sma tad anantaram raviḥ baddha bhīma paiḥ veṣa maṇḍalaḥ

original: vainateyaśamitasya bhogino bhogaveṣṭita iva cyuto maṇiḥ // Ragh_11.59 //
analyzed: vainateya śamitasya bhoginaḥ bhoga veṣṭitaḥ iva cyutaḥ maṇiḥ

original: śyenapakṣaparidhūsarālakāḥ sāṃdhyamegharudhirārdravāsasaḥ /
analyzed: śyena pakṣa paridhūsara alakāḥ sāṃdhya megha rudhira ārdra vāsasaḥ

original: aṅganā iva rajasvalā diśo no babhūvur avalokanakṣamāḥ // Ragh_11.60 //
analyzed: aṅganāḥ iva rajasvalāḥ diśaḥ naḥ babhūvuḥ avalokana kṣamāḥ

original: bhāskaraś ca diśam adhyuvāsa yāṃ tāṃ śritāḥ pratibhayaṃ vavāśire /
analyzed: bhāskaraḥ ca diśam adhyuvāsa yām tām śritāḥ pratibhayam vavāśire

original: kṣatraśoṇitapitṛkriyocitaṃ codayantya iva bhārgavaṃ śivāḥ // Ragh_11.61 //
analyzed: kṣatra śoṇita pitṛ kriyā ucitam codayantyaḥ iva bhārgavam śivāḥ

original: tat pratīpapavanādi vaikṛtaṃ prekṣya śāntim adhikṛtya kṛtyavit /
analyzed: tat pratīpa pavana ādi vaikṛtam prekṣya śāntim adhikṛtya kṛtya vid

original: anvayuṅkta gurum īśvaraḥ kṣiteḥ svantam ity alaghayat sa tadvyathām // Ragh_11.62 //
analyzed: anvayuṅkta gurum īśvaraḥ kṣiteḥ su antam iti alaghayat sa tad vyathām

original: tejasaḥ sapadi rāśir utthitaḥ prādurāsa kila vāhinīmukhe /
analyzed: tejasaḥ sapadi rāśiḥ utthitaḥ prādurāsa kila vāhinī mukhe

original: yaḥ pramṛjya nayanāni sainikair lakṣaṇīyapuruṣākṛtiś cirāt // Ragh_11.63 //
analyzed: yaḥ pramṛjya nayanāni sainikaiḥ lakṣaṇīya puruṣa ākṛtiḥ cirāt

original: pitryam aṃśam upavītalakṣaṇaṃ mātṛkaṃ ca dhanur ūrjitaṃ dadhat /
analyzed: pitryam aṃśam upavīta lakṣaṇam mātṛkam ca dhanuḥ ūrjitam dadhat

original: yaḥ sasoma iva gharmadīdhitiḥ sadvijihva iva candanadrumaḥ // Ragh_11.64 //
analyzed: yaḥ sa somaḥ iva gharma dīdhitiḥ sa dvijihvaḥ iva candana drumaḥ

original: yena roṣaparuṣātmanaḥ pituḥ śāsane sthibhido 'pi tasthuṣā /
analyzed: yena roṣa paruṣā ātmanaḥ pituḥ śāsane sthibhidaḥ u pi tasthuṣā

original: vepamānajananīśiraśchidā prāg ajīyata ghṛṇā tato mahī // Ragh_11.65 //
analyzed: vepamāna jananī śiraḥ chidā prāk ajīyata ghṛṇā tatas mahī

original: akṣabhījavalayena nibabhau dakṣiṇaśravaṇasaṃsthitena yaḥ /
analyzed: akṣa bhīja valayena nibabhau dakṣiṇa śravaṇa saṃsthitena yaḥ

original: kṣatriyāntakaraṇaikaviṃśater vyājapūrvagaṇanām ivodvahan // Ragh_11.66 //
analyzed: kṣatriyānta karaṇa ekaviṃśateḥ vyāja pūrva gaṇanām iva udvahan

original: taṃ pitur vadhabhavena manyunā rājavaṃśanidhanāya dīkṣitam /
analyzed: tam pituḥ vadha bhavena manyunā rāja vaṃśa nidhanāya dīkṣitam

original: bālasūnur avalokya bhārgavaṃ svāṃ daśāṃ ca viṣasāda pārthivaḥ // Ragh_11.67 //
analyzed: bāla sūnuḥ avalokya bhārgavam svām daśām ca viṣasāda pārthivaḥ

original: rāmanāma iti tulyam ātmaje vartamānam ahite ca dāruṇe /
analyzed: rāma nāma iti tulyam ātmaje vartamānam ahite ca dāruṇe

original: hṛdyam asya bhayadāyi cābhavad ratnajātam iva hārasarpayoḥ // Ragh_11.68 //
analyzed: hṛdyam asya bhaya dāyi ca abhavat ratna jātam iva hāra sarpayoḥ

original: arghyam arghyam iti vādinaṃ nṛpaṃ so 'navekṣya bharatāgrajo yataḥ /
analyzed: arghyam arghyam iti vādinam nṛpam saḥ na avekṣya bharatāgrajaḥ yatas

original: kṣatrakopadahanārciṣaṃ tataḥ saṃdadhe dṛśam udagratārakām // Ragh_11.69 //
analyzed: kṣatra kopa dahana arciṣam tatas saṃdadhe dṛśam udagra tārakām

original: tena kārmukaniṣaktamuṣṭinā rāghavo vigatabhīḥ purogataḥ /
analyzed: tena kārmuka niṣakta muṣṭinā rāghavaḥ vigata bhīḥ purogataḥ

original: aṅgulīvivaracāriṇaṃ śaraṃ kurvatā nijagade yuyutsunā // Ragh_11.70 //
analyzed: aṅgulī vivara cāriṇam śaram kurvatā nijagade yuyutsunā

original: kṣatrajātam apakāri vairi me tan nihatya bahuśaḥ śamaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: kṣatra jātam apakāri vairi me tat nihatya bahuśas śamam gataḥ

original: suptasarpa iva daṇḍaghaṭṭanād roṣito 'smi tava vikramaśravāt // Ragh_11.71 //
analyzed: supta sarpaḥ iva daṇḍa ghaṭṭanāt roṣitaḥ smi tava vikrama śravāt

original: maithilasya dhanur anyapārthivais tvaṃ kilānamitapūrvam akṣaṇoḥ /
analyzed: maithilasya dhanuḥ anya pārthivaiḥ tvam kila ānamita pūrvam akṣaṇoḥ

original: tan niśamya bahavatā samarthaye vīryaśṛṅgam iva bhagnam ātmanaḥ // Ragh_11.72 //
analyzed: tat niśamya bahavatā samarthaye vīrya śṛṅgam iva bhagnam ātmanaḥ

original: anyadā jagati rāma ity ayaṃ śabda uccarita eva mām agāt /
analyzed: anyadā jagati rāmaḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ uccaritaḥ eva mām agāt

original: vrīḍam āvahati me sa saṃprati vyastavṛttir udayonmukhe tvayi // Ragh_11.73 //
analyzed: vrīḍam āvahati me sa saṃprati vyasta vṛttiḥ udaya unmukhe tvayi

original: bibhrato 'stram acale 'py akuṇṭhitaṃ dvau matau mama ripū samāgasau /
analyzed: bibhrataḥ stram acale pi akuṇṭhitam dvau matau mama ripū samāgasau

original: homa-dhenu-haraṇāc ca haihayas tvaṃ ca irtim apahartum udyataḥ // Ragh_11.74 //
analyzed: homadhenu haraṇāt ca haihayaḥ tvam ca irtim apahartum udyataḥ

original: kṣatriyāntakaraṇo 'pi vikramas tena mām avati nājite tvayi /
analyzed: kṣatriya anta karaṇaḥ vikramaḥ tena mām avati na a jite tvayi

original: pāvakasya mahimā sa gaṇyate kakṣavaj jvalati sāgare 'pi yaḥ // Ragh_11.75 //
analyzed: pāvakasya mahimā sa gaṇyate kakṣavat jvalati sāgare pi yaḥ

original: viddhi cāttabalam ojasā harer aiśvaraṃ dhanur abhāji yat tvayā /
analyzed: viddhi ca ātta balam ojasā hareḥ aiśvaram dhanuḥ abhāji yat tvayā

original: khātamūlam anilo nadīrayaiḥ pātayaty api mṛdus taṭadrumam // Ragh_11.76 //
analyzed: khāta mūlam anilaḥ nadī rayaiḥ pātayati api mṛduḥ taṭa drumam

original: tan madīyam idam āyudhaṃ jyayā saṃgamayya saśaraṃ vikṛṣyatām /
analyzed: tat madīyam idam āyudham jyayā saṃgamayya sa śaram vikṛṣyatām

original: tiṣṭhatu pradhanam evam apy ahaṃ tulyabāhutarasā jitas tvayā // Ragh_11.77 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu pradhanam evam api aham tulya bāhu tarasā jitaḥ tvayā

original: kātaro 'si yadi vodgatārciṣā tarjitaḥ paraśudhārayā mama /
analyzed: kātaraḥ si yadi vā udgata arciṣā tarjitaḥ paraśu dhārayā mama

original: jyānighātakaṭhināṅgulir vṛthā badhyatām abhayayācanāñjaliḥ // Ragh_11.78 //
analyzed: jyā nighāta kaṭhina aṅguliḥ vṛthā badhyatām abhaya yācana añjaliḥ

original: evam uktavati bhīmadarśane bhārgave smitavikampitādharaḥ /
analyzed: evam uktavati bhīma darśane bhārgave smita vikampita adharaḥ

original: taddhanurgrahaṇam eva rāghavaḥ pratyapadyata samartham uttaram // Ragh_11.79 //
analyzed: tat dhanuḥ grahaṇam eva rāghavaḥ pratyapadyata samartham uttaram

original: pūrvajanmadhanuṣā samāgataḥ so 'timātralaghudarśano 'bhavat /
analyzed: pūrva janma dhanuṣā samāgataḥ saḥ timātra laghu darśanaḥ bhavat

original: kevalo 'pi subhago navāmbudaḥ kiṃ punas tridaśacāpalāñchitaḥ // Ragh_11.80 //
analyzed: kevalaḥ pi subhagaḥ nava ambudaḥ kim punar tridaśa cāpala āñchitaḥ

original: tena bhūminihitaikakoṭi tat kārmukaṃ ca balinādhiropitam /
analyzed: tena tat kārmukam ca balinā adhiropitam

original: niṣprabhaś ca ripur āsa bhūbhṛtāṃ dhūmaśeṣa iva dhūmaketanaḥ // Ragh_11.81 //
analyzed: niṣprabhaḥ ca ripuḥ āsa bhūbhṛtām dhūma śeṣaḥ iva dhūmaketanaḥ

original: tāv ubhāv api paraspara-sthitau vardhamānaparihīnatejasau /
analyzed: tau ubhau api paraspara sthitau vardhamāna parihīna tejasau

original: paśyati sma janatā dinātyaye pārvaṇau śaśidivākarāv iva // Ragh_11.82 //
analyzed: paśyati sma janatā dina atyaye pārvaṇau śaśi divākarau iva

original: taṃ kṛpāmṛdur avekṣya bhārgavaṃ rāghavaḥ skhalitavīryam ātmani /
analyzed: tam kṛpā mṛduḥ avekṣya bhārgavam rāghavaḥ skhalita vīryam ātmani

original: svaṃ ca saṃhitam amogham āśugaṃ vyājahāra harasūnasaṃnibhaḥ // Ragh_11.83 //
analyzed: svam ca saṃhitam amogham āśu gam vyājahāra hara sūna saṃnibhaḥ

original: na prahartum alam asmi nidayaṃ vipra ity abhibhavaty api tvayi /
analyzed: na prahartum alam asmi nidayam vipraḥ iti abhibhavati api tvayi

original: śaṃṣa kiṃ gatim anena pattriṇā hanmi lokam uta te makhārjitam // Ragh_11.84 //
analyzed: śaṃṣa kim gatim anena pattriṇā hanmi lokam uta te makha arjitam

original: pratyuvāca tam ṛṣir na tattvatas tvāṃ na vedmi puruṣaṃ purātanam /
analyzed: pratyuvāca tam ṛṣiḥ na tattvataḥ tvām na vedmi puruṣam purātanam

original: gāṃ gatasya tava dhāma vaiṣṇavaṃ kopito hy asi mayā didṛkṣuṇā // Ragh_11.85 //
analyzed: gām gatasya tava dhāma vaiṣṇavam kopitaḥ hi asi mayā didṛkṣuṇā

original: bhasmasāt kṛtavataḥ pitṛdviṣaḥ pātrasāc ca vasudhāṃ sasāgarām /
analyzed: bhasmasāt kṛtavataḥ pitṛ dviṣaḥ pātrasāt ca vasudhām sa sāgarām

original: āhito jayaviparyayo 'pi me ślāghya eva parameṣṭhinā tvayā // Ragh_11.86 //
analyzed: āhitaḥ jaya viparyayaḥ me ślāghyaḥ eva parameṣṭhinā tvayā

original: tad gatiṃ matimatāṃ varepsitāṃ puṇyatīrthagamanāya rakṣa me /
analyzed: tat gatim matimatām vara īpsitām puṇya tīrtha gamanāya rakṣa me

original: pīḍayiṣyati na māṃ khilīkṛtā svargapaddhatir abhogalolupam // Ragh_11.87 //
analyzed: pīḍayiṣyati na mām khilīkṛtā svarga paddhatiḥ a bhoga lolupam

original: pratyapadyata tatheti rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaś ca visasarja sāyakam /
analyzed: pratyapadyata tathā iti rāghavaḥ prāc mukhaḥ ca visasarja sāyakam

original: bhārgavasya sukṛto 'pi so 'bhavat svargamārgaparigho duratyayaḥ // Ragh_11.88 //
analyzed: bhārgavasya su kṛtaḥ pi saḥ bhavat svarga mārga parighaḥ duratyayaḥ

original: rāghavo 'pi caraṇau taponidheḥ kṣamyatām iti vadan samaspṛṣat /
analyzed: rāghavaḥ pi caraṇau taponidheḥ kṣamyatām iti vadan samaspṛṣat

original: nirjiteṣu tarasā tarasvināṃ śatruṣu praṇatir eva kīrtaye // Ragh_11.89 //
analyzed: nirjiteṣu tarasā tarasvinām śatruṣu praṇatiḥ eva kīrtaye

original: rājasatvam avadhūya mātṛkaṃ pitryam asmi gamitaḥ śamaṃ yadā /
analyzed: rājasa tvam avadhūya mātṛkam pitryam asmi gamitaḥ śamam yadā

original: nanv aninditaphalo mama tvayā nigraho 'py ayam anugrahīkṛtaḥ // Ragh_11.90 //
analyzed: nanu anindita phalaḥ mama tvayā nigrahaḥ pi ayam anugrahīkṛtaḥ

original: sādhu yāmy aham avighnam astu te devakāryam upapādayiṣyataḥ /
analyzed: sādhu yāmi aham avighnam astu te deva kāryam upapādayiṣyataḥ

original: ūcivān iti vacaḥ salakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajam ṛṣis tirodadhe // Ragh_11.91 //
analyzed: ūcivān iti vacaḥ sa lakṣmaṇam lakṣmaṇa agrajam ṛṣiḥ tirodadhe

original: svaṃ niveśya kila dhāma rāghave vaiṣṇavaṃ viditaviṣṇutejasi /
analyzed: svam niveśya kila dhāma rāghave vaiṣṇavam vidita viṣṇu tejasi

original: svastidānam adhikṛtya cākṣayaṃ bhārgavo 'tha nijam āśramaṃ yayau // Ragh_11.91* //
analyzed: svasti dānam adhikṛtya ca akṣayam bhārgavaḥ nijam āśramam yayau

original: tasmin gate vijayinaṃ parirabhya rāmaṃ snehād amanyata pitā punar eva jātam /
analyzed: tasmin gate vijayinam parirabhya rāmam snehāt amanyata pitā punar eva jātam

original: tasyābhavat kṣaṇaśucaḥ paritoṣalābhaḥ kakṣāgnilaṅghitataror iva vṛṣṭipātaḥ // Ragh_11.92 //
analyzed: tasya abhavat kṣaṇa śucaḥ paritoṣa lābhaḥ kakṣa agni laṅghita taroḥ iva vṛṣṭi pātaḥ

original: atha pathi gamayitvā kḷparamyopakārye katicid avanipālaḥ śarvarīḥ śarvakalpah /
analyzed: atha pathi gamayitvā kḷpa ramya upakārye katicid avanipālaḥ śarvarīḥ śarva kalpaḥ

original: puram aviśad ayodhyāṃ maithilīdarśanīnāṃ kuvalayitagavākṣāṃ locanair aṅganānām // Ragh_11.93 //
analyzed: puram aviśat ayodhyām maithilī darśanīnām kuvalayita gavākṣām locanaiḥ aṅganānām

original: nirviṣṭaviṣayasnehaḥ sa daśāntam upeyivān /
analyzed: nirviṣṭa viṣaya snehaḥ sa daśāntam upeyivān

original: āsīd āsannanirvāṇaḥ pradīpārcir ivoṣasi // Ragh_12.1 //
analyzed: āsīt āsanna nirvāṇaḥ pradīpa arciḥ iva uṣasi

original: taṃ karṇamūlam āgatya rāme śrīr nasyatām iti /
analyzed: tam karṇa mūlam āgatya rāme śrīḥ nasyatām iti

original: kaikeyīśaṅkayevāha palitacchadmanā jarā // Ragh_12.2 //
analyzed: kaikeyī śaṅkayā iva āha palita chadmanā jarā

original: sā paurān paurakāntasya rāmasyābhyudayaśrutiḥ /
analyzed: sā paurān paura kāntasya rāmasya abhyudaya śrutiḥ

original: pratyekaṃ hlādayāṃ cakre kulyevodyānapādapān // Ragh_12.3 //
analyzed: pratyekam cakre kulyā iva udyāna pādapān

original: tasyābhiṣekasaṃbhāraṃ kalpitaṃ krūraniścayā /
analyzed: tasya abhiṣeka saṃbhāram kalpitam krūra niścayā

original: dūṣayām āsa kaikeyī śokoṣṇaiḥ pārthivāśrubhiḥ // Ragh_12.4 //
analyzed: dūṣayām āsa kaikeyī śoka uṣṇaiḥ pārthiva aśrubhiḥ

original: sā kilāśvāsitā caṇḍī bhartrā tatsaṃśrutau varau /
analyzed: sā kila āśvāsitā caṇḍī bhartrā tad saṃśrutau varau

original: udvavāmendrasiktā bhūr bilamagnāv ivoragau // Ragh_12.5 //
analyzed: udvavāma indra siktā bhūḥ bila magnau iva uragau

original: tayoś caturdaśaikena rāmaṃ prāvrājayat samāḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ caturdaśa ekena rāmam prāvrājayat samāḥ

original: dvitīyena sutasyaicchad vaidhavyaikaphalāṃ śriyam // Ragh_12.6 //
analyzed: dvitīyena sutasya aicchat vaidhavya eka phalām śriyam

original: pitrā dattāṃ rudan rāmaḥ prāṅ mahīṃ pratyapadyata /
analyzed: pitrā dattām rudan rāmaḥ prāk mahīm pratyapadyata

original: paścād vanāya gaccheti tadājñāṃ mudito 'grahīt // Ragh_12.7 //
analyzed: paścāt vanāya gaccha iti tad ājñām muditaḥ grahīt

original: dadhato maṅgalakṣaume vasānasya ca valkale /
analyzed: dadhataḥ maṅgala kṣaume vasānasya ca valkale

original: dadṛśur vismitās tasya mukharāgaṃ samaṃ janāḥ // Ragh_12.8 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ vismitāḥ tasya mukha rāgam samam janāḥ

original: sa sītālakṣmaṇasakhaḥ satyād gurum alopayan /
analyzed: sa sītā lakṣmaṇa sakhaḥ satyāt gurum a lopayan

original: viveśa daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ pratyekaṃ ca satāṃ manaḥ // Ragh_12.9 //
analyzed: viveśa daṇḍaka araṇyam pratyekam ca satām manaḥ

original: rājāpi tadviyogārtaḥ smṛtvā śāpaṃ svakarmajam /
analyzed: rājā api tad viyoga ārtaḥ smṛtvā śāpam sva karma jam

original: śarīratyāgamātreṇa śuddhilābham amanyata // Ragh_12.10 //
analyzed: śarīra tyāga mātreṇa śuddhi lābham amanyata

original: viproṣitakumāraṃ tad (?)
analyzed: viproṣita kumāram tat

original: rājyam astamiteśvaram /
analyzed: rājyam astamita īśvaram

original: randhrānveṣaṇadakṣāṇāṃ dviṣām āmiṣatāṃ yayau // Ragh_12.11 //
analyzed: randhra anveṣaṇa dakṣāṇām dviṣām āmiṣa tām yayau

original: athānāthāḥ prakṛtayo mātṛbandhunivāsinam /
analyzed: atha anāthāḥ prakṛtayaḥ mātṛ bandhu nivāsinam

original: maulair ānāyayām āsur bhartaṃ stambhitāśrubhiḥ // Ragh_12.12 //
analyzed: maulaiḥ ānāyayām āsuḥ bhartam stambhita aśrubhiḥ

original: śrutvā tathāvidhaṃ mṛtyuṃ kaikeyītanayaḥ pituḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā tathāvidham mṛtyum kaikeyī tanayaḥ pituḥ

original: mātur na kevalaṃ svasyāḥ śriyo 'py āsīt parāṅmukhaḥ // Ragh_12.13 //
analyzed: mātuḥ na kevalam svasyāḥ śriyaḥ u pi āsīt parāṅmukhaḥ

original: sasainyaś cānvagād rāmaṃ darśitān āśramālayaiḥ /
analyzed: sa sainyaḥ ca anvagāt rāmam darśitān āśrama ālayaiḥ

original: tasya paśyan sasaumitrer udaśrur vasatidrumān // Ragh_12.14 //
analyzed: tasya paśyan sa saumitreḥ udaśruḥ vasati drumān

original: citrakūṭavanasthaṃ ca kathitasvargatir guroḥ /
analyzed: citrakūṭa vana stham ca kathita svargatiḥ guroḥ

original: lakṣmyā nimantrayāṃ cakre tam anucchiṣṭasaṃpadā // Ragh_12.15 //
analyzed: lakṣmyā cakre tam an ucchiṣṭa saṃpadā

original: sa hi prathamaje tasminn akṛtaśrīparigrahe /
analyzed: sa hi prathama je tasmin a kṛta śrī parigrahe

original: parivettāram ātmānaṃ mene svīkaraṇād bhuvaḥ // Ragh_12.16 //
analyzed: parivettāram ātmānam mene svīkaraṇāt bhuvaḥ

original: tam aśakyam apākraṣṭuṃ nirdeśāt svargiṇaḥ pituḥ /
analyzed: tam aśakyam apākraṣṭum nirdeśāt svargiṇaḥ pituḥ

original: yayāce pāduke paścāt kartuṃ rājyādhidevate // Ragh_12.17 //
analyzed: yayāce pāduke paścāt kartum rājya adhidevate

original: sa visṛṣṭas tathety uktvā bhrātrā naivāviśat purīm /
analyzed: sa visṛṣṭaḥ tathā iti uktvā bhrātrā nā eva aviśat purīm

original: nandigrāmagatas tasya rājyaṃ nyāsam ivābhunak // Ragh_12.18 //
analyzed: nandigrāma gataḥ tasya rājyam nyāsam iva abhunak

original: dṛḍhabhaktir iti jyeṣṭhe rājyatṛṣṇāparāṅmukhaḥ /
analyzed: dṛḍha bhaktiḥ iti jyeṣṭhe rājya tṛṣṇā parāṅmukhaḥ

original: mātuḥ pāpasya śuddhyarthaṃ prāyaścittam ivākarot // Ragh_12.19 //
analyzed: mātuḥ pāpasya śuddhi artham prāyaścittam iva akarot

original: rāmo 'pi saha vaidehyā vane vanyena vartayan /
analyzed: rāmaḥ u pi saha vaidehyā vane vanyena vartayan

original: cacāra sānujaḥ śānto vṛddhekṣvākuvrataṃ yuvā // Ragh_12.20 //
analyzed: cacāra sa anujaḥ śāntaḥ vṛddha ikṣvāku vratam yuvā

original: prabhāvastambhitacchāyam āśritaḥ sa vanaspatim /
analyzed: prabhāva stambhita chāyam āśritaḥ sa vanaspatim

original: kadācid aṅke sītāyāḥ śiśye kiṃcid iva śramāt // Ragh_12.21 //
analyzed: kadācid aṅke sītāyāḥ śiśye kiṃcid iva śramāt

original: aindriḥ kila nakhais tasyā vidadāra stanau dvijaḥ /
analyzed: aindriḥ kila nakhaiḥ tasyāḥ vidadāra stanau dvijaḥ

original: priyopabhogacihneṣu paurobhāgyam ivācaran // Ragh_12.22 //
analyzed: priya upabhoga cihneṣu paurobhāgyam iva ācaran

original: mṛgamāṃsaṃ tataḥ sītāṃ rakṣantīm ātape dhṛtam /
analyzed: mṛga māṃsam tatas sītām rakṣantīm ātape dhṛtam

original: pakṣatuṇḍanakhāghātair babādhe vāyaso balāt // Ragh_12.22* //
analyzed: pakṣa tuṇḍa nakha āghātaiḥ babādhe vāyasaḥ balāt

original: tasminn āsthad iṣīkāstraṃ rāmo rāmāvabhodhitaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin āsthat iṣīkā astram rāmaḥ rāma avabhodhitaḥ

original: ātmānaṃ mumuce tasmād ekanetravyayena saḥ // Ragh_12.23 //
analyzed: ātmānam mumuce tasmāt eka netra vyayena saḥ

original: rāmas tv āsannadeśatvād bharatāgamanaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu āsanna deśa tvāt bharata āgamanam punar

original: āśaṅkyotsukasāraṅgāṃ citrakūṭasthalīṃ jahau // Ragh_12.24 //
analyzed: āśaṅkya utsuka sāraṅgām citrakūṭa sthalīm jahau

original: prayayāv ātitheyeṣu vasann ṛṣikuleṣu saḥ /
analyzed: prayayau ātitheyeṣu vasan ṛṣi kuleṣu saḥ

original: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ṛkṣeṣu vārṣikeṣv iva bhāskaraḥ // Ragh_12.25 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇām diśam ṛkṣeṣu vārṣikeṣu iva bhāskaraḥ

original: babhau tam anugacchantī videhādhipateḥ sutā /
analyzed: babhau tam anugacchantī videha adhipateḥ sutā

original: pratiṣiddhāpi kaikeyyā lakṣmīr iva guṇonmukhī // Ragh_12.26 //
analyzed: pratiṣiddhā api kaikeyyā lakṣmīḥ iva guṇa unmukhī

original: anusūyātisṛṣṭena puṇyagandhena kānanam /
analyzed: anusūyā atisṛṣṭena puṇya gandhena kānanam

original: sā cakārāṅgarāgeṇa puṣpoccalita ṣaṭpadam // Ragh_12.27 //
analyzed: sā cakāra aṅgarāgeṇa ṣaṭpadam

original: saṃdhyābhrakapiṣas tatra virādho nāma rākṣasaḥ /
analyzed: tatra virādhaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: atiṣṭhan mārgam āvṛtya rāmasyendor iva grahaḥ // Ragh_12.28 //
analyzed: atiṣṭhat mārgam āvṛtya rāmasya indoḥ iva grahaḥ

original: sa jaharā tayor madhye maithilīṃ lokaśoṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa jaharā tayoḥ madhye maithilīm loka śoṣaṇaḥ

original: nabhonabhasyayor vṛṣṭim avagraha ivāntare // Ragh_12.29 //
analyzed: nabhaḥ nabhasyayoḥ vṛṣṭim avagrahe iva antare

original: taṃ viniṣpiṣya kākutsthau purā dūṣayati shtalīm /
analyzed: tam viniṣpiṣya kākutsthau purā dūṣayati shtalīm

original: gandhenāśucinā ceti vasudhāyāṃ nicakhnatuḥ // Ragh_12.30 //
analyzed: gandhena aśucinā ca iti vasudhāyām nicakhnatuḥ

original: pañcavaṭyāṃ tato rāmaḥ śāsanāt kumbhajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: pañcavaṭyām tatas rāmaḥ śāsanāt kumbhajanmanaḥ

original: anapoṣhasthitis tasthau vindhyādriḥ prakṛtāv iva // Ragh_12.31 //
analyzed: anapoṣha sthitiḥ tasthau vindhya adriḥ prakṛtau iva

original: rāvaṇāvarajā tatra rāghavaṃ madanāturā /
analyzed: rāvaṇa avarajā tatra rāghavam madana āturā

original: abhipede nidāghārtā vyālīva malayadrumam // Ragh_12.32 //
analyzed: abhipede nidāgha ārtā vyālī iva malaya drumam

original: sā sītāsaṃnidhāv eva taṃ vavre kathitānvayā /
analyzed: sā sītā saṃnidhau eva tam vavre kathita anvayā

original: atyārūḍho hi nārīṇām akālajño maobhavaḥ // Ragh_12.33 //
analyzed: atyārūḍhaḥ hi nārīṇām akāla jñaḥ maobhavaḥ

original: kalatravān ahaṃ bāle kanīyāṃsaṃ bhajasva me /
analyzed: kalatravān aham bāle kanīyāṃsam bhajasva me

original: iti rāmo vṛṣasyantīṃ vṛṣaskandhaḥ śaśāsa tām // Ragh_12.34 //
analyzed: iti rāmaḥ vṛṣasyantīm vṛṣa skandhaḥ śaśāsa tām

original: jyeṣṭhābhigamanāt pūrvaṃ tenāpy anabhinanditā /
analyzed: jyeṣṭha abhigamanāt pūrvam tena api an abhinanditā

original: sābhūd rāmāśrayā bhūyo nadīvobhayakūlabhāk // Ragh_12.35 //
analyzed: rāma āśrayā bhūyas nadī iva ubhaya kūla bhāj

original: saṃrambhaṃ maithilīhāsaḥ kṣaṇaṃ saumyāṃ nināya tām /
analyzed: saṃrambham maithilī hāsaḥ kṣaṇam saumyām nināya tām

original: nivātastimitāṃ velāṃ candrodaya ivodadheḥ // Ragh_12.36 //
analyzed: nivāta stimitām velām candra udaye iva udadheḥ

original: phalam asyopahāsasya sadyaḥ prāpsyasi paśya mām /
analyzed: phalam asya upahāsasya sadyas prāpsyasi paśya mām

original: mṛgyaḥ paribhavo vyāghryām ity avehi tvayā kṛtam // Ragh_12.37 //
analyzed: mṛgyaḥ paribhavaḥ vyāghryām iti avehi tvayā kṛtam

original: ity uktvā maithilīṃ bhartur aṅke nirviśatīṃ bhayāt /
analyzed: iti uktvā maithilīm bhartuḥ aṅke nirviśatīm bhayāt

original: rūpaṃ śūrpaṇakhā-nāmnaḥ sadṛśaṃ pratyapadyata // Ragh_12.38 //
analyzed: rūpam śūrpaṇakhā nāmnaḥ sadṛśam pratyapadyata

original: lakṣmaṇaḥ prathamaṃ śrutvā kokilāmañjubhāṣiṇīm /
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ prathamam śrutvā kokilā mañju bhāṣiṇīm

original: śivāghorasvanāṃ paścād bubudhe vikṛteti tām // Ragh_12.39 //
analyzed: śivā aghora svanām paścāt bubudhe vikṛtā iti tām

original: parṇaśālām atha kṣipraṃ vidhṛtāsiḥ praviśya saḥ /
analyzed: parṇa śālām atha kṣipram vidhṛta asiḥ praviśya saḥ

original: vairūpyapaunaruktyena bhīṣaṇāṃ tām ayojayat // Ragh_12.40 //
analyzed: vairūpya paunaruktyena bhīṣaṇām tām ayojayat

original: sā vakranakhadhāriṇyā veṇukarkaśaparvayā /
analyzed: sā vakra nakha dhāriṇyā veṇu karkaśa parvayā

original: aṅkuśākārayāṅgulyā tāv atarjayad ambare // Ragh_12.41 //
analyzed: aṅkuśa ākārayā aṅgulyā tau atarjayat ambare

original: prāpya cāśu jansthānaṃ kharādibhyas tathāvidham /
analyzed: prāpya ca āśu jat sthānam khara ādibhyaḥ tathāvidham

original: rāmopakramam ācakhyau rakṣaḥparibhavaṃ navam // Ragh_12.42 //
analyzed: rāma upakramam ācakhyau rakṣaḥ paribhavam navam

original: mukhāvayavalūṇāṃ tāṃ nairṛtā yat purodadhuḥ /
analyzed: mukha avayava lūṇām tām nairṛtāḥ yat purodadhuḥ

original: rāmābhiyāyināṃ teṣāṃ tad evābhūd amaṅgalam // Ragh_12.43 //
analyzed: rāma abhiyāyinām teṣām tat eva abhūt amaṅgalam

original: udāyudhān āpatatas tān dṛptān prekṣya rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: udāyudhān āpatataḥ tān dṛptān prekṣya rāghavaḥ

original: nidadhe vijayāśaṃsāṃ cāpe sītāṃ ca lakṣmaṇe // Ragh_12.44 //
analyzed: nidadhe vijaya āśaṃsām cāpe sītām ca lakṣmaṇe

original: eko dāśarathī rāmo yātudhānāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ dāśarathiḥ rāmaḥ yātudhānāḥ sahasraśas

original: te tu yāvanta evājau tāvāṃś ca dadṛśe sa taiḥ // Ragh_12.45 //
analyzed: te tu yāvantaḥ eva ājau tāvān ca dadṛśe sa taiḥ

original: asajjanena kākutsthaḥ prayuktam atha dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: asat janena kākutsthaḥ prayuktam atha dūṣaṇam

original: na cakṣame śubhācāraḥ sa dūṣaṇam ivātmanaḥ // Ragh_12.46 //
analyzed: na cakṣame śubha ācāraḥ sa dūṣaṇam iva ātmanaḥ

original: taṃ śaraiḥ pratijagrāha kharatiśirasau ca saḥ /
analyzed: tam śaraiḥ pratijagrāha khara tiśirasau ca saḥ

original: khramaśas te punas tasya cāpāt samam ivodyayuḥ // Ragh_12.47 //
analyzed: khramaśas te punar tasya cāpāt samam iva udyayuḥ

original: tais trayāṇāṃ śitair bāṇair yathāpūrvaviśuddhibhiḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ trayāṇām śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ yathāpūrva viśuddhibhiḥ

original: āyur dehātigaiḥ pītaṃ rudhiraṃ tu patatribhiḥ // Ragh_12.48 //
analyzed: āyuḥ deha atigaiḥ pītam rudhiram tu patatribhiḥ

original: tasmin rāmaśarotkṛtte bale mahati rakṣasām /
analyzed: tasmin rāma śara utkṛtte bale mahati rakṣasām

original: utthitaṃ dadṛśe 'nyac ca kabandhebhyo na kiṃcana // Ragh_12.49 //
analyzed: utthitam dadṛśe nyat ca kabandhebhyaḥ na kiṃcana

original: sā bāṇavarṣiṇaṃ rāmaṃ yodhayitvā suradviṣām /
analyzed: sā bāṇa varṣiṇam rāmam yodhayitvā suradviṣām

original: aprabodhāya suṣvāpa gṛdhracchāye varūthinī // Ragh_12.50 //
analyzed: a prabodhāya suṣvāpa gṛdhra chāye varūthinī

original: rāghavāstravidīrṇānāṃ rāvaṇaṃ prati rakṣasām /
analyzed: rāghava astra vidīrṇānām rāvaṇam prati rakṣasām

original: teṣāṃ śūrpaṇakhaivaikā duṣpratvṛttiharābhavat // Ragh_12.51 //
analyzed: teṣām śūrpaṇakhā eva ekā duṣpratvṛtti harā bhavat

original: nigrahāt svasur āptānāṃ vadhāc ca dhanadānujaḥ /
analyzed: nigrahāt svasuḥ āptānām vadhāt ca dhanada anujaḥ

original: rāmeṇa nihataṃ mene padaṃ daśasu mūrdhasu // Ragh_12.52 //
analyzed: rāmeṇa nihatam mene padam daśasu mūrdhasu

original: rakṣasā mṛgarūpeṇa vañcayitvā sa rāghavau /
analyzed: rakṣasā mṛga rūpeṇa vañcayitvā sa rāghavau

original: jaharā sītāṃ pakṣīndraprayāsakṣaṇavighnitaḥ // Ragh_12.53 //
analyzed: jaharā sītām pakṣi indra prayāsa kṣaṇa vighnitaḥ

original: tau sītānveṣiṇau gṛdhraṃ lūnapakṣam apaśyatām /
analyzed: tau sītā anveṣiṇau gṛdhram lūna pakṣam apaśyatām

original: prāṇair daśarathaprīter anṛṇaṃ kaṇṭhavartibhiḥ // Ragh_12.54 //
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ daśaratha prīteḥ anṛṇam kaṇṭha vartibhiḥ

original: sa rāvaṇahṛtāṃ tābhyāṃ vacasācaṣṭa maithilīm /
analyzed: sa rāvaṇa hṛtām tābhyām vacasā ācaṣṭa maithilīm

original: ātmanaḥ sumahat karma vraṇair āvedya saṃsthitaḥ // Ragh_12.55 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ su mahat karma vraṇaiḥ āvedya saṃsthitaḥ

original: tayos rāvaṇahṛtāṃ tābhyāṃ pitṛvyāpattiśokayoḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ rāvaṇa hṛtām tābhyām pitṛ vyāpatti śokayoḥ

original: pitarīvāgnisaṃskārāt parā vavṛtire kriyāḥ // Ragh_12.56 //
analyzed: pitari iva agni saṃskārāt parāḥ vavṛtire kriyāḥ

original: vadhanirdhūtaśāpasya kabandhasyopadeśataḥ /
analyzed: vadha nirdhūta śāpasya kabandhasya upadeśataḥ

original: mumūrcha sakhyaṃ rāmasya samānavyasane harau // Ragh_12.57 //
analyzed: mumūrcha sakhyam rāmasya samāna vyasane harau

original: sa hatvā vālinaṃ vīras tatpade cirakāṅkṣite /
analyzed: sa hatvā vālinam vīraḥ tad pade cira kāṅkṣite

original: dhātoḥ sthāna ivādeśaṃ sugrīvaṃ saṃnyaveśayat // Ragh_12.58 //
analyzed: dhātoḥ sthāne iva ādeśam sugrīvam saṃnyaveśayat

original: itas tataś ca vaidehīm anveṣṭuṃ bhartṛcoditāḥ /
analyzed: itas tatas ca vaidehīm anveṣṭum bhartṛ coditāḥ

original: kapayaś cerur ārtasya rāmasyeva manorathāḥ // Ragh_12.59 //
analyzed: kapayaḥ ceruḥ ārtasya rāmasya iva manorathāḥ

original: pravṛttāv upalabdhāyāṃ tasyāḥ saṃpātidarśanāt /
analyzed: pravṛttau upalabdhāyām tasyāḥ saṃpāti darśanāt

original: mārutiḥ sāgaraṃ tīrṇaḥ saṃsāram iva nirmamaḥ // Ragh_12.60 //
analyzed: mārutiḥ sāgaram tīrṇaḥ saṃsāram iva nirmamaḥ

original: dṛṣṭā vicinvatā tena laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasīvṛtā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭā vicinvatā tena laṅkāyām rākṣasī vṛtā

original: jānakī viṣavallībhiḥ parīteva mahauṣadhiḥ // Ragh_12.61 //
analyzed: jānakī viṣa vallībhiḥ parītā iva mahā oṣadhiḥ

original: tasyai bhartur abhijñāmam aṅgulīyaṃ dadau kapiḥ /
analyzed: tasyai bhartuḥ abhijñāmam aṅgulīyam dadau kapiḥ

original: pratyudgatam ivānuṣṇais tadānandāśrubhindubhiḥ // Ragh_12.62 //
analyzed: pratyudgatam iva anuṣṇaiḥ tad ānanda aśru bhindubhiḥ

original: nirvāpya priyasaṃdeśaiḥ sītām akṣavadhoddhataḥ /
analyzed: nirvāpya priya saṃdeśaiḥ sītām akṣa vadha uddhataḥ

original: sa dadāha purīṃ laṅkāṃ kṣaṇasoḍhārinigrahaḥ // Ragh_12.63 //
analyzed: sa dadāha purīm laṅkām kṣaṇa soḍha ari nigrahaḥ

original: pratyabhijñānaratnaṃ ca rāmāyādarśayat kṛtī /
analyzed: pratyabhijñāna ratnam ca rāmāya adarśayat kṛtī

original: hṛdayaṃ svayam āyātaṃ vaidehyā iva mūrtimat // Ragh_12.64 //
analyzed: hṛdayam svayam āyātam vaidehyāḥ iva mūrtimat

original: sa prāpa hṛdayanyastamaṇiparśanimīlitaḥ /
analyzed: sa prāpa hṛdaya nyasta maṇi parśa nimīlitaḥ

original: apayodharasaṃsargaṃ priyāliṅgananirvṛtim // Ragh_12.65 //
analyzed: a payodhara saṃsargam priya āliṅgana nirvṛtim

original: śrutvā rāmaḥ priyodantaṃ mene tatsaṃgamotsukaḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā rāmaḥ priya udantam mene tad saṃgama utsukaḥ

original: mahārṇavaparikṣepaṃ laṅkāyāḥ parikhālaghum // Ragh_12.66 //
analyzed: mahā arṇava parikṣepam laṅkāyāḥ parikhā laghum

original: sa pratasthe 'rināśāya harisainyair anudrutaḥ /
analyzed: sa pratasthe ri nāśāya hari sainyaiḥ anudrutaḥ

original: na kevalaṃ dharā-pṛṣṭhe vyomni saṃbādhavartibhiḥ // Ragh_12.67 //
analyzed: na kevalam dharā pṛṣṭhe vyomni saṃbādha vartibhiḥ

original: nirviṣṭam udadheḥ kūle taṃ prapede vibhīṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: nirviṣṭam udadheḥ kūle tam prapede vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: snehād rākṣasalakṣmyeva buddhim ādiśya coditaḥ // Ragh_12.68 //
analyzed: snehāt rākṣasa lakṣmyā iva buddhim ādiśya coditaḥ

original: tasmai niśācaraiśvaryaṃ pratiśuśrāva rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: tasmai niśācara aiśvaryam pratiśuśrāva rāghavaḥ

original: kāle khalu samārabdhāḥ phalaṃ badhnanti nītayaḥ // Ragh_12.69 //
analyzed: kāle khalu samārabdhāḥ phalam badhnanti nītayaḥ

original: sa setuṃ bandhayām āsa plavagair lavaṇāmbhasi /
analyzed: sa setum bandhayām āsa plavagaiḥ lavaṇāmbhasi

original: rasātalād ivonmagnaṃ śeṣaṃ svapnāya śārṅgiṇaḥ // Ragh_12.70 //
analyzed: rasātalāt iva unmagnam śeṣam svapnāya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: tenottīrya pathā laṅkāṃ rodhayām āsa piṅgalaiḥ /
analyzed: tena uttīrya pathā laṅkām rodhayām āsa piṅgalaiḥ

original: dvitīyaṃ hemaprākāraṃ kurvadbhir iva vānaraiḥ // Ragh_12.71 //
analyzed: dvitīyam hema prākāram kurvadbhiḥ iva vānaraiḥ

original: raṇaḥ pravavṛte tatra bhīmaḥ plavagarakṣasām /
analyzed: raṇaḥ pravavṛte tatra bhīmaḥ plavaga rakṣasām

original: digvijṛmbhitakākutsthapaulastyajayaghoṣaṇaḥ // Ragh_12.72 //
pādapāviddhaparighaḥ śilāniṣpiṣṭamudgaraḥ /
analyzed: pādapa āviddha parighaḥ śilā niṣpiṣṭa mudgaraḥ

original: atiśastranakhanyāsaḥ śailarugṇa mataṅgajaḥ // Ragh_12.73 //
atha rāmaśiraśchedadarśanodbhrāntacetanām /
analyzed: atha rāma śiraḥ cheda darśana udbhrānta cetanām

original: sītāṃ māyeti śaṃsantī trijaṭā samajīvayat // Ragh_12.74 //
analyzed: sītām māyā iti śaṃsantī trijaṭā samajīvayat

original: kāmaṃ jīvati me nātha iti sā vijahau śucam /
analyzed: kāmam jīvati me nāthaḥ iti sā vijahau śucam

original: prāṅ matvā satyam asyāntaṃ jīvitāsmīti lajjitā // Ragh_12.75 //
analyzed: prāk matvā satyam asya antam jīvitāsmi iti lajjitā

original: garuḍāpātaviśliṣṭameghanādāstrabandhanaḥ /
dāśarathyoḥ kṣaṇakleśaḥ svapnavṛtta ivābhavat // Ragh_12.76 //
analyzed: dāśarathyoḥ kṣaṇa kleśaḥ svapna vṛttaḥ iva abhavat

original: tato bibheda paulastyaḥ śaktyā vakṣasi lakṣmaṇam /
analyzed: tatas bibheda paulastyaḥ śaktyā vakṣasi lakṣmaṇam

original: rāmas tv anāhato 'py āsīd vidīrṇahṛdayaḥ śucā // Ragh_12.77 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu anāhataḥ pi āsīt vidīrṇa hṛdayaḥ śucā

original: sa mārutisamānītamahauṣadhihatavyathaḥ /
analyzed: sa māruti samānīta mahā oṣadhi hata vyathaḥ

original: laṅkāstrīṇāṃ punaś cakre vilāpācāryakaṃ śaraiḥ // Ragh_12.78 //
analyzed: laṅkā strīṇām punar cakre vilāpa ācāryakam śaraiḥ

original: sa nādaṃ meghanādasya dhanuś cendrāyudhaprabham /
analyzed: sa nādam meghanādasya dhanuḥ ca indrāyudha prabham

original: meghasyeva śaratkālo na kiṃcit paryaśeṣayat // Ragh_12.79 //
analyzed: meghasya iva śarad kālaḥ na kiṃcid paryaśeṣayat

original: kleśena mahatā nidrāṃ tyājitaṃ raṇadurjayam /
analyzed: kleśena mahatā nidrām tyājitam raṇa durjayam

original: rāvaṇaḥ preṣayām āsa yuddhāyānujam ātmanaḥ // Ragh_12.79A //
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ preṣayām āsa yuddhāya anujam ātmanaḥ

original: jaghāna sa tadādeśāt kapīn ugrān anekaśaḥ /
analyzed: jaghāna sa tad ādeśāt kapīn ugrān anekaśas

original: viveśa ca purīṃ laṅkāṃ samādāya harīśvaram // Ragh_12.79B //
analyzed: viveśa ca purīm laṅkām samādāya hari īśvaram

original: kumbhakarṇaḥ kapīndreṇa tulyāvasthaḥ svasuḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ kapīndreṇa tulya avasthaḥ svasuḥ kṛtaḥ

original: rurodha rāmaṃ śṛṅgīva ṭaṅkacchinnamanaḥśilaḥ // Ragh_12.80 //
analyzed: rurodha rāmam śṛṅgī iva ṭaṅka chinna manaḥśilaḥ

original: akāle bodhito bhrātrā priyasvapno vṛthā bhavān /
analyzed: akāle bodhitaḥ bhrātrā priya svapnaḥ vṛthā bhavān

original: rāmeṣubhir itīvāsau dīrghanidrāṃ praveśitaḥ // Ragh_12.81 //
analyzed: rāma iṣubhiḥ iti iva asau dīrgha nidrām praveśitaḥ

original: itarāṇy api rakṣāṃsi petur vānarakoṭiṣu /
analyzed: itarāṇi api rakṣāṃsi petuḥ vānara koṭiṣu

original: rajāṃsi samarotthāni racchoṇitanandīṣv iva // Ragh_12.82 //
analyzed: rajāṃsi samara utthāni rat śoṇita nandīṣu iva

original: niryayāv atha paulasthyaḥ punar yuddhāya mandirāt /
analyzed: niryayau atha paulasthyaḥ punar yuddhāya mandirāt

original: arāvaṇam arāmaṃ vā jagad adyeti niścitaḥ // Ragh_12.83 //
analyzed: arāvaṇam arāmam vā jagat adyā iti niścitaḥ

original: rāmaṃ padātim ālokya laṅkeṣaṃ ca varūthinam /
analyzed: rāmam padātim ālokya laṅkeṣam ca varūthinam

original: hariyugyaṃ rathaṃ tasmai parjighāya puraṃdaraḥ // Ragh_12.84 //
analyzed: hari yugyam ratham tasmai parjighāya puraṃdaraḥ

original: tam ādhūtadvajapaṭaṃ vyomagaṅgormivāyubhiḥ /
analyzed: tam ādhūta dvaja paṭam vyoma gaṅgā ūrmi vāyubhiḥ

original: devasūtabhujālambī jaitram adhyāsta rāghavaḥ // Ragh_12.85 //
analyzed: deva sūta bhuja ālambī jaitram adhyāsta rāghavaḥ

original: mātalis tasya māhendram āmumoca tanucchadam /
analyzed: mātaliḥ tasya māhendram āmumoca tanucchadam

original: yatrotpaladadalaklaibyam astrāṇy āpuḥ suradviṣām // Ragh_12.86 //
analyzed: yatra utpalada dala klaibyam astrāṇi āpuḥ suradviṣām

original: anyonyadarśanaprāptavikramāvasaraṃ cirāt /
analyzed: anyonya darśana prāpta vikrama avasaram cirāt

original: rāmarāvaṇayor yuddhaṃ caritārtham ivābhavat // Ragh_12.87 //
analyzed: rāma rāvaṇayoḥ yuddham caritārtham iva abhavat

original: bhujamūrdhorubāhulyād eko 'pi dhandānujaḥ /
analyzed: bhuja mūrdha ūru bāhulyāt ekaḥ dhandānujaḥ

original: dadṛśe so 'yathāpūrvo mātṛvaṃśa iva sthitaḥ // Ragh_12.88 //
analyzed: dadṛśe saḥ yathāpūrvaḥ mātṛ vaṃśe iva sthitaḥ

original: jetāraṃ lokapālānāṃ svamukhair arciteśvaram /
analyzed: jetāram lokapālānām sva mukhaiḥ arcita īśvaram

original: rāmas tulitakailāsam arātiṃ bahv amanyata // Ragh_12.89 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ tulita kailāsam arātim bahu amanyata

original: tasya sphurati paulastyah sītāsaṃgamaśaṃsini /
analyzed: tasya sphurati paulastyaḥ sītā saṃgama śaṃsini

original: nicakhānādhikakrodhaḥ śaraṃ savyetare bhuje // Ragh_12.90 //
analyzed: nicakhāna adhika krodhaḥ śaram savyetare bhuje

original: rāvaṇasyāpi rāmāsto bhittvā hṛdayam āśugaḥ /
analyzed: rāvaṇasya api bhittvā hṛdayam āśu gaḥ

original: viveśa bhuvam ākhyātum uragebhya iva priyam // Ragh_12.91 //
analyzed: viveśa bhuvam ākhyātum uragebhyaḥ iva priyam

original: vacasaiva tayor vākyam astram astreṇa nighnatoḥ /
analyzed: vacasā eva tayoḥ vākyam astram astreṇa nighnatoḥ

original: anyonyajayasaṃrambho vavṛdhe vādinor iva // Ragh_12.92 //
analyzed: anyonya jaya saṃrambhaḥ vavṛdhe vādinoḥ iva

original: vikramavyatihāreṇa astram astreṇa nighnatoḥ /
analyzed: vikrama vyatihāreṇa astram astreṇa nighnatoḥ

original: jayaśrīr antarā vedir mattavāraṇayor iva // Ragh_12.93 //
analyzed: jaya śrīḥ antarā vediḥ matta vāraṇayoḥ iva

original: kṛtapratikṛtaprītais tayor muktāṃ surāsuraiḥ /
analyzed: kṛta pratikṛta prītaiḥ tayoḥ muktām sura asuraiḥ

original: parasparaṃ śaravrātāḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ na sehire // Ragh_12.94 //
analyzed: parasparam śara vrātāḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭim na sehire

original: ayaḥśaṅkucitāṃ rakṣaḥ śataghnīm atha śatrave /
analyzed: ayaḥ śaṅku citām rakṣaḥ śataghnīm atha śatrave

original: hṛtāṃ vaivasvatasyeva kūṭaśālmalim akṣipat // Ragh_12.95 //
analyzed: hṛtām vaivasvatasya iva kūṭaśālmalim akṣipat

original: rāghavo ratham aprāptāṃ tām āśāṃ ca suradviṣām /
analyzed: rāghavaḥ ratham aprāptām tām āśām ca suradviṣām

original: ardhacandramukhair bāṇaiś ciccheda kadalīsukham // Ragh_12.96 //
analyzed: ardhacandra mukhaiḥ bāṇaiḥ ciccheda kadalī sukham

original: amoghaṃ saṃdadhe cāsmai dhanuṣy akeadhnurdharaḥ /
analyzed: amogham saṃdadhe ca asmai dhanuṣi

original: brāhmam astraṃ priyāśokaśalyaniṣkarṣaṇauṣadham // Ragh_12.97 //
analyzed: brāhmam astram priya aśoka śalya niṣkarṣaṇa auṣadham

original: tad vyomni daśadhā bhinnaṃ dadṛśe dīptimanmukham /
analyzed: tat vyomni daśadhā bhinnam dadṛśe dīptimat mukham

original: vapur mahoragasyeva karālaphaṇamaṇḍalam // Ragh_12.98 //
analyzed: vapuḥ mahā uragasya iva karāla phaṇa maṇḍalam

original: tena mantraprayuktena nimeṣārdhād apātayat /
analyzed: tena mantra prayuktena nimeṣa ardhāt apātayat

original: sa rāvaṇaśiraḥpaṅktim ajñātavraṇavedanām // Ragh_12.99 //
analyzed: sa rāvaṇa śiraḥ paṅktim ajñāta vraṇa vedanām

original: bālārkapratimevāpsu vīcibhinnā patiṣyataḥ /
analyzed: bāla arka pratimā iva apsu vīci bhinnā patiṣyataḥ

original: rarāja rakṣaḥkāyasya kaṇṭhacchedapraṃparā // Ragh_12.100 //
analyzed: rarāja rakṣaḥ kāyasya kaṇṭha cheda praṃparā

original: marutāṃ paśyatāṃ tasya śirāṃsi patitāny api /
analyzed: marutām paśyatām tasya śirāṃsi patitāni api

original: mano nātiviśaśvāsa punaḥ saṃdhānaśaṅkinām // Ragh_12.101 //
analyzed: manaḥ na ativiśaśvāsa punar saṃdhāna śaṅkinām

original: atha madagurupakṣair lokapāladvipānām anugatam alivṛndair gaṇḍabhittīr vihāya /
analyzed: atha mada guru pakṣaiḥ lokapāla dvipānām anugatam ali vṛndaiḥ gaṇḍa bhittīḥ vihāya

original: upanatamaṇibandhe mūrdhni paulastyaśatroḥ surabhi suravimuktaṃ puṣpavarṣaṃ papāta // Ragh_12.102 //
analyzed: upanata maṇibandhe mūrdhni paulastya śatroḥ surabhi sura vimuktam puṣpa varṣam papāta

original: yantā hareḥ sapadi saṃhṛtakārmukajyam āpṛcchya rāghavam anuṣṭhitadevakāryam /
analyzed: yantā hareḥ sapadi saṃhṛta kārmuka jyam āpṛcchya rāghavam anuṣṭhita deva kāryam

original: nāmāṅkarāvaṇaśarāṅkitaketuyaṣṭim ūrdhvaṃ rathaṃ harisahasrayujaṃ nināya // Ragh_12.103 //
analyzed: nāma aṅka rāvaṇa śara aṅkita ketu yaṣṭim ūrdhvam ratham hari sahasra yujam nināya

original: raghupatir api jātavedoviśuddhāṃ pragṛhya priyāṃ priyasuhṛdi vibhīṣaṇe saṃgamayya śriyaṃ vairiṇaḥ /
analyzed: raghu patiḥ api jātavedaḥ viśuddhām pragṛhya priyām priya suhṛdi vibhīṣaṇe saṃgamayya śriyam vairiṇaḥ

original: ravisutasahitena tenānuyātaḥ sasaumitriṇā bhujavijitavimānaratnādhirūḍhaḥ pratasthe purīm // Ragh_12.104 //
analyzed: ravi suta sahitena tena anuyātaḥ sa saumitriṇā bhuja vijita vimāna ratna adhirūḍhaḥ pratasthe purīm

original: athāmanaḥ śabdaguṇaṃ guṇajñaḥ padaṃ vimānena vigāhamānaḥ /
analyzed: atha amanaḥ śabda guṇam guṇa jñaḥ padam vimānena vigāhamānaḥ

original: ratnākaraṃ vīkṣya mithaḥ sa jāyāṃ rāmābhidhāno harir ity uvāca // Ragh_13.1 //
analyzed: ratnākaram vīkṣya mithas sa jāyām rāma abhidhānaḥ hariḥ iti uvāca

original: vaidehi paśy' ā malayād vibhaktaṃ matsetunā phenilam amburāśim /
analyzed: vaidehi paśi ā malayāt vibhaktam mad setunā phenilam amburāśim

original: chāyāpatheneva śaratprasannam ākāśam āviṣkṛtacārutāram // Ragh_13.2 //
analyzed: chāyāpathena iva śarad prasannam ākāśam āviṣkṛta cāru tāram

original: guror yiyakṣoḥ kapilena medhye rasātalaṃ saṃkramite turaṃge /
analyzed: guroḥ yiyakṣoḥ kapilena medhye rasātalam saṃkramite turaṃge

original: tadartham urvīm avadārayadbhiḥ pūrvaiḥ kilāyaṃ parivardhito naḥ // Ragh_13.3 //
analyzed: tad artham urvīm avadārayadbhiḥ pūrvaiḥ kila ayam parivardhitaḥ naḥ

original: garbhaṃ dadhaty arkamarīcayo 'smād vivṛddhim atrāśnuvate vasūni /
analyzed: garbham dadhati arka marīcayaḥ smāt vivṛddhim atra aśnuvate vasūni

original: abindhanaṃ vahnim asau bibharti prahlādanaṃ jyotir ajany anena // Ragh_13.4 //
analyzed: abindhanam vahnim asau bibharti prahlādanam jyotiḥ ajani anena

original: tāṃ tām avasthāṃ pratipadyamānaṃ sthitaṃ daśa vyāpya diśo mahimnā /
analyzed: tām tām avasthām pratipadyamānam sthitam daśa vyāpya diśaḥ mahimnā

original: viṣṇor ivāsyānavadhāraṇīyam īdṛktayā rūpam iyattayā vā // Ragh_13.5 //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ iva asya an avadhāraṇīyam īdṛktayā rūpam iyat tayā vā

original: nābhiprarūḍhāmburuhāsanena saṃstūyamānaḥ prathamena dhātrā /
analyzed: nābhi prarūḍha amburuha āsanena saṃstūyamānaḥ prathamena dhātrā

original: amuṃ yugāntocitayogandiraḥ saṃhṛtya lokān puruṣo 'dhiśete // Ragh_13.6 //
analyzed: amum saṃhṛtya lokān puruṣaḥ dhiśete

original: pakṣacchidā gotrabhidāttagandhāḥ śaraṇyam enaṃ śataśo mahīdhrāḥ /
analyzed: pakṣacchidāḥ gotrabhidā ātta gandhāḥ śaraṇyam enam śataśas mahīdhrāḥ

original: nṛpā ivopaplavinaḥ parebhyo dharmottaraṃ madhyamam āśrayante // Ragh_13.7 //
analyzed: nṛpāḥ iva upaplavinaḥ parebhyaḥ dharma uttaram madhyamam āśrayante

original: rasātalād ādibhavena puṃsā bhuvaḥ prayuktodvahanakriyāyāḥ /
analyzed: rasātalāt ādi bhavena puṃsā bhuvaḥ prayukta udvahana kriyāyāḥ

original: asyāccham ambhaḥ pralayapravṛddhaṃ muhūrtavaktrāvaraṇaṃ babhūva // Ragh_13.8 //
analyzed: asya accham ambhaḥ pralaya pravṛddham muhūrta vaktra āvaraṇam babhūva

original: mukhārpaṇeṣu prakṛtipragalbhāḥ svayaṃ taraṅgādharadānadakṣaḥ /
analyzed: mukha arpaṇeṣu prakṛti pragalbhāḥ svayam taraṅga adhara dāna dakṣaḥ

original: ananyasāmānyakalatravṛttiḥ pibaty asau pāyayate ca sindhūḥ // Ragh_13.9 //
analyzed: an anya sāmānya kalatra vṛttiḥ pibati asau pāyayate ca sindhūḥ

original: sasattvam ādāya nadīmukhāmbhaḥ saṃmīlayanto vivṛtānanatvāt /
analyzed: sa sattvam ādāya nadī mukha ambhaḥ saṃmīlayantaḥ vivṛta ānana tvāt

original: amī śirobhis timayaḥ sarandhrair ūrdhvaṃ vitanvanti jalapravāhān // Ragh_13.10 //
analyzed: amī śirobhiḥ timayaḥ sa randhraiḥ ūrdhvam vitanvanti jala pravāhān

original: mātaṅganakraiḥ sahasotpatadbhir bhinnān dvidhā paśya samudraphenān /
analyzed: mātaṅga nakraiḥ sahasā utpatadbhiḥ bhinnān dvidhā paśya samudra phenān

original: kapolasaṃsarpitayā ya eṣāṃ vrajanti karṇa kṣaṇacāmaratvam // Ragh_13.11 //
analyzed: kapola saṃsarpitayā ye eṣām vrajanti karṇa kṣaṇa cāmara tvam

original: velānilāya prasṛtā bhujaṃgā mahormivisphūrjathunirviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: velā anilāya prasṛtāḥ bhujaṃgāḥ mahā ūrmi visphūrjathu nirviśeṣāḥ

original: sūryāṃśusaṃparkasamṛddharāgair vyajyanta ete maṇibhiḥ phaṇasthaiḥ // Ragh_13.12 //
analyzed: sūrya aṃśu saṃparka samṛddha rāgaiḥ vyajyante ete maṇibhiḥ phaṇa sthaiḥ

original: tavādharasparadhiṣu vidrumeṣu paryastam etat sahasormivegāt /
analyzed: tava adhara sparadhiṣu vidrumeṣu paryastam etat sahasā ūrmi vegāt

original: ūrdhvāṅkuraprotamukhaṃ kathaṃcit kleśad apakrāmati śaṅkhayūtham // Ragh_13.13 //
analyzed: ūrdhva aṅkura prota mukham kathaṃcid kleśat apakrāmati śaṅkha yūtham

original: pravṛttamātreṇa payāṃsi pātum āvartavegād bhramatā ghanena /
analyzed: pravṛtta mātreṇa payāṃsi pātum āvarta vegāt bhramatā ghanena

original: ābhāti bhūyiṣṭham ayaṃ samudraḥ pramathyamāno giriṇeva bhūyaḥ // Ragh_13.14 //
analyzed: ābhāti bhūyiṣṭham ayam samudraḥ pramathyamānaḥ giriṇā iva bhūyas

original: dūrād ayaścakranibhasya tanvī tamālatālīvanarājinīlā /
analyzed: dūrāt ayaḥ cakra nibhasya tanvī tamāla tālī vana rāji nīlā

original: ābhāti velā lavaṇāmburāśer dhārānibaddheva kalaṅkalekhā // Ragh_13.15 //
analyzed: ābhāti velā lavaṇa amburāśeḥ dhārā nibaddhā iva kalaṅka lekhā

original: velānilaḥ ketakareṇubhis te saṃbhāvayaty ānanam āyatākṣi /
analyzed: velā anilaḥ ketaka reṇubhiḥ te saṃbhāvayati ānanam āyata akṣi

original: mām akṣamaṃ maṇḍanakālahāner vettīva bimbādharabaddhatṛṣṇam // Ragh_13.16 //
analyzed: mām akṣamam maṇḍana kāla hāneḥ vetti iva bimba adhara baddha tṛṣṇam

original: ete vayaṃ saikatabhinnaśuktiparyastamuktāpaṭalaṃ payodheḥ /
analyzed: ete vayam saikata bhinna śukti paryasta muktā paṭalam payodheḥ

original: prāptā muhūrtena vimānavegāt kūlaṃ phalāvarjitapūgamālam // Ragh_13.17 //
analyzed: prāptāḥ muhūrtena vimāna vegāt kūlam phala āvarjita pūga mālam

original: kuruṣva tāvat karabhoru paścānmārge mṛgaprekṣiṇi dṛṣtipātam /
analyzed: kuruṣva tāvat karabha ūru paścāt mārge mṛga prekṣiṇi dṛṣtipātam

original: eṣā vidūrībhavataḥ samudrāt sakānanā niṣpatatīva bhūmiḥ // Ragh_13.18 //
analyzed: eṣā vidūrībhavataḥ samudrāt sa kānanā niṣpatati iva bhūmiḥ

original: kvacit pathā saṃcarate surāṇāṃ kvacid ghanānāṃ patatāṃ kvacic ca /
analyzed: kvacid pathā saṃcarate surāṇām kvacid ghanānām patatām kvacid ca

original: yathāvidho me manso 'bhilāṣaḥ pravartate paśya tathā vimānam // Ragh_13.19 //
analyzed: yathāvidhaḥ me mansaḥ bhilāṣaḥ pravartate paśya tathā vimānam

original: asau mahendradvipadānagandhī trimārgagāvīcivimardaśītaḥ /
analyzed: asau mahā indra dvipa dāna gandhī tri mārga ga avīci vimarda śītaḥ

original: ākāśavāyur dinayauvanotthān ācāmati svedalavān mukhe te // Ragh_13.20 //
analyzed: ākāśa vāyuḥ dina yauvana utthān ācāmati sveda lavān mukhe te

original: kareṇa vātāyanalambitena spṛṣṭas tvayā caṇḍi kutūhalinyā /
analyzed: kareṇa vātāyana lambitena spṛṣṭaḥ tvayā caṇḍi kutūhalinyā

original: āmuñcatīvābharaṇaṃ dvitīyam udbhinnavidyudvalayo ghanas te // Ragh_13.21 //
analyzed: āmuñcati iva ābharaṇam dvitīyam udbhinna vidyut valayaḥ ghanaḥ te

original: amī janasthānam apoḍhavighnaṃ matvā samārabdhanavoṭajāni /
analyzed: amī janasthānam apoḍha vighnam matvā samārabdha nava uṭajāni

original: adhyāsate cīrabhṛto yathāsvaṃ cirojjhitāny āśramamaṇḍalāni // Ragh_13.22 //
analyzed: adhyāsate cīrabhṛtaḥ yathāsvam cira ujjhitāni āśrama maṇḍalāni

original: saiṣā sthalī yatra vicinvatā tvāṃ bhraṣṭaṃ mayā nūpuram ekam urvyām /
analyzed: sā eṣā sthalī yatra vicinvatā tvām bhraṣṭam mayā nūpuram ekam urvyām

original: adṛśyata tvaccaraṇāravindaviśleṣaduḥkhād iva baddhamaunam // Ragh_13.23 //
analyzed: adṛśyata tvad caraṇa aravinda viśleṣa duḥkhāt iva baddha maunam

original: tvaṃ rakṣasā bhīru yato 'panītā taṃ mārgam etāḥ kṛpayā latā me /
analyzed: tvam rakṣasā bhīru yatas u panītā tam mārgam etāḥ kṛpayā latāḥ me

original: adarśayan vaktum aśaknuvatyaḥ śākhābhir āvarjitapallavābhiḥ // Ragh_13.24 //
analyzed: adarśayan vaktum a śaknuvatyaḥ śākhābhiḥ āvarjita pallavābhiḥ

original: mṛgyaś ca darbhāṅkuranirvyapekṣās tavāgatijñaṃ samabodhayan mām /
analyzed: mṛgyaḥ ca darbha aṅkura nirvyapekṣāḥ tava āgati jñam samabodhayat mām

original: vyāpārayantyo diśi dakṣiṇasyām utpakṣmarājīni vilocanāni // Ragh_13.25 //
analyzed: vyāpārayantyaḥ diśi dakṣiṇasyām utpakṣma rājīni vilocanāni

original: etad girer mālayavataḥ purastād āvirbhavaty ambarlekhi śṛṅgam /
analyzed: etat gireḥ mālayavataḥ purastāt āvirbhavati ambaḥ lekhi śṛṅgam

original: navaṃ yatra ghanair mayā ca tvadviprayogāśru samaṃ visṛṣṭam // Ragh_13.26 //
analyzed: navam yatra ghanaiḥ mayā ca tvad viprayoga aśru samam visṛṣṭam

original: gandhaś ca dhārāhatapalvalānāṃ kādambam ardhodgatakesaraṃ ca /
analyzed: gandhaḥ ca dhārā hata palvalānām kādambam ardha udgata kesaram ca

original: snigdhāś ca kekāḥ śikhināṃ babhūvur yasmin asahyāni vinā tvayā me // Ragh_13.27 //
analyzed: snigdhāḥ ca kekāḥ śikhinām babhūvuḥ yasmin asahyāni vinā tvayā me

original: pūrvānubhūtaṃ smaratā ca yatra kampottaraṃ bhīru tavopagūḍham /
analyzed: pūrva anubhūtam smaratā ca yatra kampa uttaram bhīru tava upagūḍham

original: guhāvisārīṇy ativāhitāni mayā kathaṃcid ghanagarjitāni // Ragh_13.28 //
analyzed: guhā visārīṇi ativāhitāni mayā kathaṃcid ghana garjitāni

original: āsārasiktakṣitibāṣpayogān mām akṣiṇod yatra vibhinnakośaiḥ /
analyzed: āsāra sikta kṣiti bāṣpa yogāt mām akṣiṇot yatra vibhinna kośaiḥ

original: viḍambyamānā navakandalais te vivāhadhūmāruṇalocanaśrīḥ // Ragh_13.29 //
analyzed: viḍambyamānā nava kandalaiḥ te vivāha dhūma aruṇa locana śrīḥ

original: upāntavānīravanopagūdhāny ālakṣyapāriplavasārasāni /
analyzed: upānta vānīra vana upagūdhāni ālakṣya pāriplava sārasāni

original: dūrāvatīrṇā pibatīva khedād amūni pampāsalilāni dṛṣṭiḥ // Ragh_13.30 //
analyzed: dūra avatīrṇā pibatī iva khedāt amūni pampā salilāni dṛṣṭiḥ

original: atrāviyuktāni rathāṅganāmnām anyonyadattotpalakesarāṇi /
analyzed: atra a viyuktāni rathāṅga nāmnām anyonya datta utpala kesarāṇi

original: dvandvāni dūrāntaravartinā te mayā priye saspṛham īkṣitāni // Ragh_13.31 //
analyzed: dvandvāni dūra antara vartinā te mayā priye sa spṛham īkṣitāni

original: imāṃ tatāśokalatāṃ ca tanvīṃ stanābhirāmastabakābhinamrām /
analyzed: imām tata aśoka latām ca tanvīm stana abhirāma stabaka abhinamrām

original: tvatprāptibuddhyā pariripsamānaḥ saumitriṇā sāsram ahaṃ niṣiddhaḥ // Ragh_13.32 //
analyzed: tvad prāpti buddhyā pariripsamānaḥ saumitriṇā sa asram aham niṣiddhaḥ

original: amūr vimānāntaralambinīnāṃ śrutvā svanaṃ kāñcanakiṅkiṇīnām /
analyzed: amūḥ vimāna antara lambinīnām śrutvā svanam kāñcana kiṅkiṇīnām

original: pratyudvrajantīva kham utpatantyo godāvarīsārasapaṅktayas tvām // Ragh_13.33 //
analyzed: pratyudvrajanti iva kham utpatantyaḥ godāvarī sārasa paṅktayaḥ tvām

original: eṣā tvayā peśalamadhyayāpi ghaṭāmbusaṃvardhitabālacūtā /
analyzed: eṣā tvayā peśala madhyayā api ghaṭa ambu saṃvardhita bāla cūtā

original: āhlādayaty unmukhakṛṣṇasārā dṛṣṭa cirāt pañcavaṭī mano me // Ragh_13.34 //
analyzed: āhlādayati unmukha kṛṣṇa sārā dṛṣṭa cirāt pañcavaṭī manaḥ me

original: atrānugodaṃ mṛgayānivṛttas taraṅgavātema vinītakhedaḥ /
analyzed: atrā anugodam mṛgayā nivṛttaḥ taraṅga vātā imā vinīta khedaḥ

original: rahas tvadutsaṅganiṣaṇṇamūrdhā smarāmi vānīragṛheṣu suptaḥ // Ragh_13.35 //
analyzed: rahaḥ tvad utsaṅga niṣaṇṇa mūrdhā smarāmi vānīra gṛheṣu suptaḥ

original: bhrūbheda mātreṇa padān maghonaḥ prabhraṃśayāṃ yo nahuṣaṃ cakāra /
analyzed: bhrū bheda mātreṇa padāt maghonaḥ prabhraṃśayām yaḥ nahuṣam cakāra

original: tasyāvilāmbhaḥpariśuddhihetor bhaumo muneḥ sthānaparigraho 'yam // Ragh_13.36 //
analyzed: tasya āvila ambhaḥ pariśuddhi hetoḥ bhaumaḥ muneḥ sthāna parigrahaḥ yam

original: tretāgnidhūmāgram anindyakīrtes tasyedam ākrāntavimānamārgam /
analyzed: tretāgni dhūma agram anindya kīrteḥ tasya idam ākrānta vimāna mārgam

original: ghrātvā havirgandhi rajovimuktaḥ samaśnute me laghimānam ātmā // Ragh_13.37 //
analyzed: ghrātvā haviḥ gandhi rajaḥ vimuktaḥ samaśnute me laghimānam ātmā

original: etan muner mānini śātakarṇeḥ pañcāpsaro nāma vihāravāri /
analyzed: etat muneḥ mānini śātakarṇeḥ pañcāpsaraḥ nāma vihāra vāri

original: ābhāti paryantavanaṃ vidūrān meghāntarālakṣyam ivendubimbam // Ragh_13.38 //
analyzed: ābhāti paryanta vanam vidūrāt megha antara ālakṣyam iva indu bimbam

original: purā sa darbhāṅkuramātravṛttiś caran mṛgaiḥ sārdham ṛṣir maghonā /
analyzed: purā sa darbha aṅkura mātra vṛttiḥ caran mṛgaiḥ sārdham ṛṣiḥ maghonā

original: samādhibhītena kilopanītaḥ pañcāpsaroyauvanakūṭabhandham // Ragh_13.39 //
analyzed: samādhi bhītena kila upanītaḥ pañca apsaraḥ yauvana kūṭa bhandham

original: tasyāyam antarhitasaudhabhājaḥ prasaktasaṃgītamṛdaṅgaghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ayam antarhita saudha bhājaḥ prasakta saṃgīta mṛdaṅga ghoṣaḥ

original: viyadgataḥ puṣpakacandraśālāḥ kṣaṇaṃ pratiṣrunmukharāḥ karoti // Ragh_13.40 //
