analyzed: viyat gataḥ puṣpaka candraśālāḥ kṣaṇam pratiṣrut mukharāḥ karoti

original: havirbhujām edhavatāṃ caturṇāṃ madhye lalāṭaṃtapasaptasaptiḥ /
analyzed: havirbhujām edhavatām caturṇām madhye lalāṭaṃtapa saptasaptiḥ

original: asau tapasyaty aparas tapasvī nāmnā sutīkṣṇaś caritena dāntaḥ // Ragh_13.41 //
analyzed: asau tapasyati aparaḥ tapasvī nāmnā sutīkṣṇaḥ caritena dāntaḥ

original: amuṃ sahāsaprahitekṣaṇāni vyājārdhasaṃdarśitamekhalāni /
analyzed: amum sa hāsa prahita īkṣaṇāni vyāja ardha saṃdarśita mekhalāni

original: nālaṃ vikartuṃ janitendraśaṅkaṃ surāṅganāvibhramaceṣṭitāni // Ragh_13.42 //
analyzed: na alam vikartum janita indra śaṅkam sura aṅganā vibhrama ceṣṭitāni

original: eṣo 'kṣamālāvalayaṃ mṛgāṇāṃ kaṇḍūyitāraṃ kuśasūcilāvam /
analyzed: kṣamālā valayam mṛgāṇām kaṇḍūyitāram kuśa sūci lāvam

original: sabhājane me bhujam ūrdhvabāhuḥ savyetaraṃ prādhvam itaḥ prayuṅkte // Ragh_13.43 //
analyzed: sabhājane me bhujam ūrdhva bāhuḥ savyetaram pra adhvam itas prayuṅkte

original: vācaṃyamatvāt praṇatiṃ mamaiṣa kampena kiṃcit pratigṛhya mūrdhnaḥ /
analyzed: vācaṃyama tvāt praṇatim mama eṣa kampena kiṃcid pratigṛhya mūrdhnaḥ

original: dṛṣṭiṃ vimānavyavadhānamuktāṃ punaḥ sahasrāciṣi saṃnidhatte // Ragh_13.44 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭim vimāna vyavadhāna muktām punar sahasrāciṣi saṃnidhatte

original: adaḥ śaraṇyaṃ śarabhaṅganāmnas tapovanaṃ pāvanam āhitāgneḥ /
analyzed: adaḥ śaraṇyam śarabhaṅga nāmnaḥ tapaḥ vanam pāvanam āhitāgneḥ

original: cirāya saṃtarpya samidhir agniṃ yo mantrapūtāṃ tanum apy ahauṣīt // Ragh_13.45 //
analyzed: cirāya saṃtarpya samidhiḥ agnim yaḥ mantra pūtām tanum api ahauṣīt

original: chāyāvinītādhvapariśrameṣu bhūyiṣṭhasaṃbhāvyaphaleṣv amīṣu /
analyzed: chāyā vinīta adhva pariśrameṣu bhūyiṣṭha saṃbhāvya phaleṣu amīṣu

original: tasyātithīnām adhunā saparyā sthitā suputreṣv iva pādapeṣu // Ragh_13.46 //
analyzed: tasya atithīnām adhunā saparyā sthitā su putreṣu iva pādapeṣu

original: dhārāsvanodgāridarīmukho 'sau śṛṅgāgralagnāmbudavaprapaṅkaḥ /
analyzed: dhārā svana udgāri darīmukhaḥ sau śṛṅga agra lagna ambuda vapra paṅkaḥ

original: badhnāti me bandhuragātri cakṣur dṛptaḥ kakudmān iva citrakūṭaḥ // Ragh_13.47 //
analyzed: badhnāti me bandhura gātri cakṣuḥ dṛptaḥ kakudmān iva citrakūṭaḥ

original: eṣā prasannastimitapravāhā sarid vidūrāntarabhāvatanvī /
analyzed: eṣā prasanna stimita pravāhā sarit vidūra antara bhāva tanvī

original: mandākinī bhāti nagopakaṇṭhe muktāvalī kaṇṭhagateva bhūmeḥ // Ragh_13.48 //
analyzed: mandākinī bhāti naga upakaṇṭhe muktā āvalī kaṇṭha gatā iva bhūmeḥ

original: ayaṃ sujāto 'nugiraṃ tamālaḥ pravālam ādāya sugandhi yasya /
analyzed: ayam su jātaḥ nu giram tamālaḥ pravālam ādāya sugandhi yasya

original: karṇārpiten' T ākaravaṃ kapolam apārthyakālāgurupattralekham Vt // Ragh_13.49 //
analyzed: ākaravam kapolam apārthya kālāguru pattra lekham

original: anigrahatrāsavinītasattvam apuṣpaliṅgāt phalabandhivṛkṣam /
analyzed: a nigraha trāsa vinīta sattvam a puṣpa liṅgāt phala bandhi vṛkṣam

original: vanaṃ tapaḥsādhanam etad atrer āviṣkṛtodagrataraprabhāvam // Ragh_13.50 //
analyzed: vanam tapaḥ sādhanam etat atreḥ āviṣkṛta udagratara prabhāvam

original: atrābhiṣekāya tapodhanānāṃ saptarśihastoddhṛtahemapadmām /
analyzed: atra abhiṣekāya tapodhanānām sapta ṛśi hasta uddhṛta hema padmām

original: pravartayām āsa kil' ānusūyā trisrotasaṃ tryambakamaulimālām // Ragh_13.51 //
analyzed: pravartayām āsa kil ānusūyā tri srotasam tryambaka mauli mālām

original: vīrāsanair dhyānajuṣām ṛṣīnām amī samādhyāsitavedimadhyāḥ /
analyzed: vīrāsanaiḥ dhyāna juṣām ṛṣīnām amī samādhyāsita vedi madhyāḥ

original: nivātaniṣkampatayā vibhānti yogādhirūḍhā iva śākhino 'pi // Ragh_13.52 //
analyzed: nivāta niṣkampa tayā vibhānti yoga adhirūḍhāḥ iva śākhinaḥ pi

original: tvayā purastād upayācito yaḥ so 'yaṃ vaṭaḥ śyāma iti pratītaḥ /
analyzed: tvayā purastāt upayācitaḥ yaḥ saḥ yam vaṭaḥ śyāmaḥ iti pratītaḥ

original: rāśir maṇīnām iva gāruḍānāṃ sapadmarāgaḥ phalito vibhāti // Ragh_13.53 //
analyzed: rāśiḥ maṇīnām iva gāruḍānām sa padmarāgaḥ phalitaḥ vibhāti

original: kvacit prabhā cāndramasī tamobhiś muktāmayī yaṣṭir ivānuviddhā /
analyzed: kvacid prabhā cāndramasī tamobhiḥ muktā mayī yaṣṭiḥ iva anuviddhā

original: anyatra mālā sitapaṅkajānām indīvarair utkhacitāntareva // Ragh_13.54 //
analyzed: anyatra mālā sita paṅkajānām indīvaraiḥ utkhacita antarā iva

original: kvacit khagānāṃ priyamānasānāṃ kādambasaṃsargavatīva /
analyzed: kvacid khagānām priya mānasānām kādamba saṃsargavatī iva

original: anyatra śubhrā śaradabhralekhā bhaktir bhuvaś candanakalpiteva // Ragh_13.55 //
analyzed: anyatra śubhrā śarad abhra lekhā bhaktiḥ bhuvaḥ candana kalpitā iva

original: kvacit prabhā cāndramasī tamobhiś chāyāvilīnaiḥ śabalīkṛteva /
analyzed: kvacid prabhā cāndramasī tamobhiḥ chāyā vilīnaiḥ śabalīkṛtā iva

original: anyatra śubhrā śaradabhralekhā randhreṣv ivālakṣyanabhaḥpradeśā // Ragh_13.56 //
analyzed: anyatra śubhrā śarad abhra lekhā randhreṣu iva alakṣya nabhaḥ pradeśā

original: kvacic ca kṛṣṇoragabhūṣaṇeva bhasmāṅgarāgā tanur īśvarasya /
analyzed: kvacid ca kṛṣṇa uraga bhūṣaṇā iva bhasma aṅga rāgā tanuḥ īśvarasya

original: paśyānavadyāṅgi vibhāti gaṅgā bhinnapravāhā yamunātaraṅgaiḥ // Ragh_13.57 //
analyzed: paśya anavadya aṅgi vibhāti gaṅgā bhinna pravāhā yamunā taraṅgaiḥ

original: tamisrayā śubhraniśeva bhinnā kundasrag indīvaramālayeva /
analyzed: tamisrayā śubhra niśā iva bhinnā kunda sraj indīvara mālayā iva

original: kṛttir hareḥ kṛṣṇamṛgatvaceva bhūtiḥ smarārer iva kaṇṭhabhāsā // Ragh_13.57A //
analyzed: kṛttiḥ hareḥ kṛṣṇa mṛga tvacā iva bhūtiḥ smarāreḥ iva kaṇṭha bhāsā

original: dṛśyārdhayā śāradameghalekhā nirdhūtanistriṃśarucā viśeva /
analyzed: dṛśya ardhayā śārada megha lekhā nirdhūta nistriṃśa rucā viśā iva

original: gavākṣakālāgurudhūmarājyā harmyasthalīlepasudhā naveva // Ragh_13.57B //
analyzed: gavākṣa kālāguru dhūma rājyā harmya sthalī lepa sudhā navā iva

original: tuṣārasaṃghātaśilā himādrer jātyāñjanaprastaraśobhayeva /
analyzed: tuṣāra saṃghāta śilā himādreḥ jātyā añjana prastara śobhayā iva

original: patatriṇāṃ manasagocarāṇāṃ T śreṇīva kādambavihaṃgapaṅktyā // Ragh_13.57C //
analyzed: patatriṇām manasa gocarāṇām śreṇī iva kādamba vihaṃga paṅktyā

original: nitāntaśuddhasphuṭikāśayogād vaiḍūryakāntyā raśanāvalīva /
analyzed: nitānta śuddha sphuṭi kāśa yogāt vaiḍūrya kāntyā raśanā āvalī iva

original: gaṅgā raver ātmajayā sametā puṣpyaty udāraṃ parabhāgalekhā // Ragh_13.57D //
analyzed: gaṅgā raveḥ ātmajayā sametā puṣpī ati udāram parabhāga lekhā

original: samudrapatnyor jalasaṃnipāte pūtātmanām atra kilābhiṣekāt /
analyzed: samudra patnyoḥ jala saṃnipāte pūta ātmanām atra kila abhiṣekāt

original: tattvāvabodhena vināpi bhūyas tanutyajāṃ nāsti śarīrabandhaḥ // Ragh_13.58 //
analyzed: tattva avabodhena vinā api bhūyas tanutyajām nā asti śarīra bandhaḥ

original: puraṃ niṣādādhipater idaṃ tad yasmin mayā maulimaṇiṃ vihāya /
analyzed: puram niṣāda adhipateḥ idam tat yasmin mayā mauli maṇim vihāya

original: jaṭāsu baddhāsv arudat sumantraḥ kaikeyi kāmāḥ phalitās taveti // Ragh_13.59 //
analyzed: jaṭāsu baddhāsu arudat sumantraḥ kaikeyi kāmāḥ phalitāḥ tava iti

original: payodharaiḥ puṇyajanāṅganānāṃ nirviṣṭahemāmbujareṇu yasyāḥ /
analyzed: payodharaiḥ puṇyajana aṅganānām nirviṣṭa hema ambuja reṇu yasyāḥ

original: brāhmaṃ saraḥ kāraṇam āptavāco buddher ivāvyaktam udāharanti // Ragh_13.60 //
analyzed: brāhmam saraḥ kāraṇam āpta vācaḥ buddheḥ iva avyaktam udāharanti

original: jalāni yā tīranikhātayūpā vahaty ayodhyām anu rājadhānīm /
analyzed: jalāni yā tīra nikhāta yūpā vahati ayodhyām anu rājadhānīm

original: turaṃgamedhāvabhṛtavatīrṇair ikṣvākubhiḥ puṇyatarīkṛtāni // Ragh_13.61 //
analyzed: turaṃgamedha avabhṛta avatīrṇaiḥ ikṣvākubhiḥ puṇyatarīkṛtāni

original: yāṃ saikatotsaṅgasukhocitānāṃ prājyaiḥ payobhiḥ parivardhitānām /
analyzed: yām saikata utsaṅga sukha ucitānām prājyaiḥ payobhiḥ parivardhitānām

original: sāmānyadhātrīm iva mānasaṃ me saṃbhāvayaty uttarakosalānām // Ragh_13.62 //
analyzed: sāmānya dhātrīm iva mānasam me saṃbhāvayati uttarakosalānām

original: seyaṃ madīyā jananīva tena mānyena rājñā sarayūr viyuktā /
analyzed: sā iyam madīyā jananī iva tena mānyena rājñā sarayūḥ viyuktā

original: dūre vasantaṃ śiśirānilair māṃ taraṅgahastair upagūhatīva // Ragh_13.63 //
analyzed: dūre vasantam śiśira anilaiḥ mām taraṅga hastaiḥ upagūhati iva

original: viraktasaṃdhyākapiśaṃ purastād yato rajaḥ pārthivam ujjihīte /
analyzed: virakta saṃdhyā kapiśam purastāt yatas rajaḥ pārthivam ujjihīte

original: śaṅke hanūmatkathitapravṛttiḥ pratyudgato māṃ bharataḥ sasainyaḥ // Ragh_13.64 //
analyzed: śaṅke hanūmat kathita pravṛttiḥ pratyudgataḥ mām bharataḥ sa sainyaḥ

original: addhā śriyaṃ pālitasaṃgarāya pratyarpayiṣyaty anaghāṃ sa sādhuḥ /
analyzed: addhā śriyam pālita saṃgarāya pratyarpayiṣyati anaghām sa sādhuḥ

original: hatvā nivṛttāya mṛdhe kharādīn saṃrakṣitāṃ tvām iva lakṣmaṇo me // Ragh_13.65 //
analyzed: hatvā nivṛttāya mṛdhe khara ādīn saṃrakṣitām tvām iva lakṣmaṇaḥ me

original: asau puraskṛtya guruṃ padātiḥ paścādavasthāpitavāhinīkaḥ /
analyzed: asau puraskṛtya gurum padātiḥ paścāt avasthāpita vāhinīkaḥ

original: vṛddhair amātyaiḥ saha cīravāsā mām arghyapāṇir bharato 'bhyupaiti // Ragh_13.66 //
analyzed: vṛddhaiḥ amātyaiḥ saha cīra vāsāḥ mām arghya pāṇiḥ bharataḥ bhyupaiti

original: pitrā nisṛṣṭāṃ madapekṣayā yaḥ śriyaṃ yuvāpy aṅkagatām abhoktā /
analyzed: pitrā nisṛṣṭām mad apekṣayā yaḥ śriyam yuvā api aṅka gatām abhoktā

original: iyanti varṣāṇi tayā sahogram abhyasyatīva vratam āsidhāram // Ragh_13.67 //
analyzed: iyanti varṣāṇi tayā saha ugram abhyasyati iva vratam āsi dhāram

original: etāvad uktavati dāśarathau tadīyām icchāṃ vimānam adhidevatayā viditvā /
analyzed: etāvat uktavati dāśarathau tadīyām icchām vimānam adhidevatayā viditvā

original: dyotiṣpathād avatatāra savismayābhir udvīkṣitaṃ prakṛtibhir bharatānugābhiḥ // Ragh_13.68 //
analyzed: dyotiṣpathāt avatatāra sa vismayābhiḥ udvīkṣitam prakṛtibhiḥ bharata anugābhiḥ

original: tasmāt puraḥsaravibhīṣaṇadarśitena sevāvicakṣaṇaharīśvaradattahastaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt puraḥsara vibhīṣaṇa darśitena sevā vicakṣaṇa hari īśvara datta hastaḥ

original: yānād avātarad adūramahītalena mārgeṇa bhaṅgiracitasphaṭikena rāmaḥ // Ragh_13.69 //
analyzed: yānāt avātarat adūra mahī talena mārgeṇa bhaṅgi racita sphaṭikena rāmaḥ

original: ikṣvākuvaṃśagurave prayataḥ praṇamya sa bhrātaraṃ bharatam arghyaparigrahānte /
analyzed: ikṣvāku vaṃśa gurave prayataḥ praṇamya sa bhrātaram bharatam arghya parigraha ante

original: paryaśrur asvajata mūrdhani copajaghrau tadbhaktyapoḍhapitṛrāhyamahābhiṣeke // Ragh_13.70 //
analyzed: paryaśruḥ asvajata mūrdhani ca upajaghrau tad bhakti apoḍha pitṛ rāhya mahā abhiṣeke

original: śmaśrupravṛddhijanitānanavikriyāṃś ca plakṣān prarohajaṭilān iva mantrivṛddhān /
analyzed: śmaśru pravṛddhi janita ānana vikriyān ca plakṣān praroha jaṭilān iva mantri vṛddhān

original: anvagrahīt praṇamataḥ śubhadṛṣṭipātair vārttānuyogamadhurākṣarayā ca vācā // Ragh_13.71 //
analyzed: anvagrahīt praṇamataḥ śubha dṛṣṭipātaiḥ vārttā anuyoga madhura akṣarayā ca vācā

original: durjātabandhur ayam ṛkṣaharīśvaro me paulastya eṣa samareṣu puraḥ prahartā /
analyzed: durjāta bandhuḥ ayam ṛkṣa hari īśvaraḥ me paulastyaḥ eṣa samareṣu puras prahartā

original: ity ādṛtena kathitau raghunandanena vyutkramya lakṣmaṇam ubhau bharato vavande // Ragh_13.72 //
analyzed: iti ādṛtena kathitau raghunandanena vyutkramya lakṣmaṇam ubhau bharataḥ vavande

original: saumitriṇā tadanu saṃsasṛje sa cainam utthāpya namraśirasaṃ bhṛśam āliniṅga /
analyzed: saumitriṇā tadanu saṃsasṛje sa ca enam utthāpya namra śirasam bhṛśam āliniṅga

original: rūḍhendrajitpraharaṇavraṇakarkaśena kliśyann ivāsya bhujamadhyam uraḥsthalena // Ragh_13.73 //
analyzed: rūḍha indrajit praharaṇa vraṇa karkaśena kliśyan iva asya bhuja madhyam uraḥ sthalena

original: rāmājñayā haricamūpatayas tadānīṃ kṛtvā manuṣyavapur āruruhur gajendrān /
analyzed: rāma ājñayā hari camū patayaḥ tadānīm kṛtvā manuṣya vapuḥ āruruhuḥ gaja indrān

original: teṣu kṣaratsu bahudhā madavāridhārāḥ śailādhirohaṇasukhāny upalebhire te // Ragh_13.74 //
analyzed: teṣu kṣaratsu bahudhā mada vāri dhārāḥ śaila adhirohaṇa sukhāni upalebhire te

original: sānuplavaḥ prabhur api kṣaṇadācarāṇāṃ bheje rathān daśarathaprabhavānuśiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: sa anuplavaḥ prabhuḥ api kṣaṇadā carāṇām bheje rathān daśaratha prabhava anuśiṣṭaḥ

original: māyāvikalparacitair api ye tadīyair na syandanais tulitakṛtrimabhaktiśobhāḥ // Ragh_13.75 //
analyzed: māyā vikalpa racitaiḥ api ye tadīyaiḥ na syandanaiḥ tulita kṛtrima bhakti śobhāḥ

original: bhūyas tato raghupatir vilasatpatākam adhyāsta kāmagati sāvarajo vimānam /
analyzed: bhūyas tatas raghu patiḥ vilasat patākam adhyāsta kāmagati sa avarajaḥ vimānam

original: doṣātanaṃ budhabṛhaspatiyogadṛśyas tārāpatis taralavidyud iv'ābhravṛndam // Ragh_13.76 //
analyzed: doṣātanam budha bṛhaspati yoga dṛśyaḥ tārāpatiḥ tarala vidyut iva abhra vṛndam

original: tatreśvareṇa jagatāṃ pralayād ivorvīṃ varṣātyayena rucam abhraghanād ivendoḥ /
analyzed: tatra īśvareṇa jagatām pralayāt iva urvīm varṣa atyayena rucam abhra ghanāt iva indoḥ

original: rāmeṇa maithilasutāṃ daśakaṇṭhakṛcchrāt pratyuddhṛtāṃ dhṛtimatīṃ bharato vavande // Ragh_13.77 //
analyzed: rāmeṇa maithila sutām daśakaṇṭha kṛcchrāt pratyuddhṛtām dhṛtimatīm bharataḥ vavande

original: laṅkeśvarapraṇatibhaṅgadṛḍhavrataṃ tad (?)
analyzed: laṅkā īśvara praṇati bhaṅga dṛḍha vratam tat

original: vandyaṃ yugaṃ caraṇayor janakātmajāyāḥ /
analyzed: vandyam yugam caraṇayoḥ janakātmajāyāḥ

original: jyeṣṭhānuvṛttijaṭilaṃ ca śiro 'sya sādhor anyonyapāvanam abhūd ubhayaṃ sametya // Ragh_13.78 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭha anuvṛtti jaṭilam ca śiraḥ sya sādhoḥ anyonya pāvanam abhūt ubhayam sametya

original: krośārdhaṃ prakṛtipuraḥsareṇa gatvā kākutsthaḥ stimitajavena puṣpakeṇa /
analyzed: krośa ardham prakṛti puraḥsareṇa gatvā kākutsthaḥ stimita javena puṣpakeṇa

original: śatrughnaprativihitopakāryam āryaḥ sāketopavanam udāram adhyuvāsa // Ragh_13.79 //
analyzed: śatrughna prativihita upakāryam āryaḥ sāketa upavanam udāram adhyuvāsa

original: uttiṣṭha vatse nanu sānujo 'sau daśāntaraṃ tatra samaṃ prapanne /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha vatse nanu sa anujaḥ sau daśā antaram tatra samam prapanne

original: apaśyatāṃ dāśarathī jananyau chedād ivopaghnataror vratatyau // Ragh_14.1 //
analyzed: apaśyatām dāśarathī jananyau chedāt iva upaghna taroḥ vratatyau

original: ubhāv ubhābhyāṃ praṇatau hatārī yathākramaṃ vikramaśobhinau tau /
analyzed: ubhau ubhābhyām praṇatau hata arī yathākramam vikrama śobhinau tau

original: vispaṣṭam asrāndhatayā na dṛṣṭau jñātau sutasparśasukhopalambhāt // Ragh_14.2 //
analyzed: vispaṣṭam asra andha tayā na dṛṣṭau jñātau suta sparśa sukha upalambhāt

original: ānandajaḥ śokajam aśru bāṣpas tayor aśītaṃ śiśiro bibheda /
analyzed: ānanda jaḥ śoka jam aśru bāṣpaḥ tayoḥ aśītam śiśiraḥ bibheda

original: gaṅgāsarayvor jalam uṣṇatpataṃ himādrinisyanda ivāvatīrṇaḥ // Ragh_14.3 //
analyzed: gaṅgā sarayvoḥ jalam uṣṇat patam himādri nisyande iva avatīrṇaḥ

original: te putrayor nairṛtaśastramārgān ārdrān ivāṅge sadayaṃ spṛśantyau /
analyzed: te putrayoḥ nairṛta śastra mārgān ārdrān iva aṅge sa dayam spṛśantyau

original: apīpsitaṃ kṣatrakulāṅganānāṃ na vīrasūśabdam akāmayetām // Ragh_14.4 //
analyzed: api īpsitam kṣatra kula aṅganānām na vīrasū śabdam akāmayetām

original: kleśāvahā bhartur alakṣaṇāhaṃ sīteti nāma svam udīrayantī /
analyzed: kleśa āvahā bhartuḥ alakṣaṇā aham sītā iti nāma svam udīrayantī

original: svargapratiṣṭhasya guror mahiṣyāv abhaktibhedena vadhūr vavande // Ragh_14.5 //
analyzed: svarga pratiṣṭhasya guroḥ mahiṣyau abhakti bhedena vadhūḥ vavande

original: uttiṣṭha vatse nanu sānujo 'sau vṛttena bhartā śucinā tavaiva /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha vatse nanu sa anujaḥ sau vṛttena bhartā śucinā tava eva

original: kṛcchraṃ mahat tīrṇa iti priyārhāṃ tām ūcatus te priyam apy amithyā // Ragh_14.6 //
analyzed: kṛcchram mahat tīrṇaḥ iti priya arhām tām ūcatuḥ te priyam api a mithyā

original: athābhiṣekaṃ raghuvaṃśaketoḥ prārabdham ānandajalair jananyoḥ /
analyzed: athā abhiṣekam raghu vaṃśa ketoḥ prārabdham ānanda jalaiḥ jananyoḥ

original: nirvartayām āsur amātyavṛddhās tīrthāhṛtaiḥ kāñcanakumbhatoyaiḥ // Ragh_14.7 //
analyzed: nirvartayām āsuḥ amātya vṛddhāḥ tīrtha āhṛtaiḥ kāñcana kumbha toyaiḥ

original: saritsamudrān sarasīś ca gatvā rakṣaḥkapīndrair upapāditāni /
analyzed: sarit samudrān sarasīḥ ca gatvā rakṣaḥ kapi indraiḥ upapāditāni

original: tasyāpatan mūrdhni jalāni jiṣṇor vindhyasya meghaprabhavā ivāpaḥ // Ragh_14.8 //
analyzed: tasya apatan mūrdhni jalāni jiṣṇoḥ vindhyasya megha prabhavāḥ iva apaḥ

original: tapasviveṣakriyayāpi tāvad yaḥ prekṣaṇīyaḥ sutarāṃ babhūva /
analyzed: tapasvi veṣa kriyayā api tāvat yaḥ prekṣaṇīyaḥ sutarām babhūva

original: rājendranepathyavidhānaśobhā rasyoditāsīt punaruktadoṣā // Ragh_14.9 //
analyzed: rāja indra nepathya vidhāna śobhā rasya uditā āsīt punar ukta doṣā

original: sa maularakṣoharimiśrasainyas tūryasvanānanditapauravargaḥ /
analyzed: sa maula rakṣaḥ hari miśra sainyaḥ tūrya svana ānandita paura vargaḥ

original: viveṣa saudhodgatalājavarṣām uttoraṇām anvayarājadhānīm // Ragh_14.10 //
analyzed: viveṣa saudha udgata lāja varṣām uttoraṇām anvaya rājadhānīm

original: saumitriṇā sāvarajena mandam ādhūtavālavyajano rathasthaḥ /
analyzed: saumitriṇā sa avarajena mandam ādhūta vāla vyajanaḥ ratha sthaḥ

original: dhṛtātapatro bharatena sākṣād upāyasaṃghāta iva pravṛddhaḥ // Ragh_14.11 //
analyzed: dhṛta ātapatraḥ bharatena sākṣāt upāya saṃghātaḥ iva pravṛddhaḥ

original: prāsādakālāgurudhūmarājis tasyāḥ puro vāyuvaśena bhinnā /
analyzed: prāsāda kālāguru dhūma rājiḥ tasyāḥ puras vāyu vaśena bhinnā

original: vanān nivṛttena raghūdvahena muktā svayaṃ veṇir ivābhāse // Ragh_14.12 //
analyzed: vanāt nivṛttena raghūdvahena muktā svayam veṇiḥ iva ābhāse

original: śvaśrūjanānuṣṭhitacāruveṣāṃ karṇīrathasthāṃ raghuvīrapatnīm /
analyzed: śvaśrū jana anuṣṭhita cāru veṣām karṇīratha sthām raghu vīra patnīm

original: prāsādavātāyanadṛśyabandhaiḥ sāketanāryo 'ñjalibhiḥ praṇemuḥ // Ragh_14.13 //
analyzed: prāsāda vātāyana dṛśya bandhaiḥ sāketa nāryaḥ ñjalibhiḥ praṇemuḥ

original: sphuratprabhāmaṇḍalam ānusūyaṃ sā bibhratī śāśvatam aṅgarāgam /
analyzed: sphurat prabhā maṇḍalam ānusūyam sā bibhratī śāśvatam aṅgarāgam

original: rarāja śuddheti punaḥ svapuryai saṃdarśita vahnigateva bhartrā // Ragh_14.14 //
analyzed: rarāja śuddhā iti punar sva puryai saṃdarśita vahni gatā iva bhartrā

original: veśmāni rāmaḥ paribarhavanti viśrāṇya sauhārdhanidhiḥ suhṛdbyaḥ /
analyzed: veśmāni rāmaḥ paribarhavanti viśrāṇya sauha ardha nidhiḥ suhṛdbyaḥ

original: bāṣpāyamāṇo balimanniketam ālekhyaśeṣasya pitur viveśa // Ragh_14.15 //
analyzed: bāṣpāyamāṇaḥ balimat niketam ālekhya śeṣasya pituḥ viveśa

original: kṛtāñjalis tatra yad amba satyān nābhraśyata svargaphalād gurur naḥ /
analyzed: kṛtāñjaliḥ tatra yat amba satyāt na abhraśyata svarga phalāt guruḥ naḥ

original: tac cintyamānaṃ sukṛtaṃ taveti jahāra lajjāṃ bharatasya mātuḥ // Ragh_14.16 //
analyzed: tat cintyamānam su kṛtam tava iti jahāra lajjām bharatasya mātuḥ

original: tathā ca sugrīvavibhīśaṇādīn upācarat kṛtrimasaṃvidhābhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca sugrīva vibhīśaṇa ādīn upācarat kṛtrima saṃvidhābhiḥ

original: saṃkalpamātroditasiddhayas te krāntā yathā cetasi vismayena // Ragh_14.17 //
analyzed: saṃkalpa mātra udita siddhayaḥ te krāntāḥ yathā cetasi vismayena

original: sabhājanāyopagatān sa divyān munīn puraskṛtya hatasya śatroḥ /
analyzed: sabhājanāya upagatān sa divyān munīn puraskṛtya hatasya śatroḥ

original: śuśrāva tebhyaḥ prabhavādi vṛttaṃ svavikrame gauravam ādadhānam // Ragh_14.18 //
analyzed: śuśrāva tebhyaḥ prabhava ādi vṛttam sva vikrame gauravam ādadhānam

original: pratiprayāteṣu tapodhaneṣu sukhād avijñātagatārdhamāsān /
analyzed: pratiprayāteṣu tapodhaneṣu sukhāt a vijñāta gata ardha māsān

original: sītāsvahastopahṛtāgryapūjān rakṣaḥkapīndrān visasarja rāmaḥ // Ragh_14.19 //
analyzed: sītā sva hasta upahṛta agrya pūjān rakṣaḥ kapi indrān visasarja rāmaḥ

original: tac cātmacintāsulabhaṃ vimānaṃ hṛtaṃ surāreḥ saha jīvitena /
analyzed: tat ca ātma cintā sulabham vimānam hṛtam surāreḥ saha jīvitena

original: kailāsanāthodvahanāya bhūyaḥ puṣpaṃ divaḥ puṣpakam anvamaṃsta // Ragh_14.20 //
analyzed: kailāsa nātha udvahanāya bhūyas puṣpam divaḥ puṣpakam anvamaṃsta

original: pitur niyogād vanavāsam evaṃ nistīrya rāmaḥ pratipannarājyaḥ /
analyzed: pituḥ niyogāt vana vāsam evam nistīrya rāmaḥ pratipanna rājyaḥ

original: dharmārthakāmeṣu samāṃ prapede yathā tathaivāvarajeṣu vṛttim // Ragh_14.21 //
analyzed: dharma artha kāmeṣu samām prapede yathā tathā eva avarajeṣu vṛttim

original: sarvāsu mātṛṣv api vatsalatvāt sa nirviśeṣapratipattir āsīt /
analyzed: sarvāsu mātṛṣu api vatsala tvāt sa nirviśeṣa pratipattiḥ āsīt

original: ṣaḍānanāpītapayodharāsu netā camūnām iva kṛttikāsu // Ragh_14.22 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ ānana āpīta payodharāsu netā camūnām iva kṛttikāsu

original: tenārthavāṃl lobhaparāṅmukhena tena ghnatā vighnabhayaṃ kriyāvān /
analyzed: tena arthavān lobha parāṅmukhena tena ghnatā vighna bhayam kriyāvān

original: tenāsa lokaḥ pitṛmān vinetrā tenaiva śokāpanudena putrī // Ragh_14.23 //
analyzed: tena āsa lokaḥ pitṛmān vinetrā tena eva śoka apanudena putrī

original: sa paurakāryāṇi samīkṣya kāle reme videhādhipater duhitrā /
analyzed: sa paura kāryāṇi samīkṣya kāle reme videha adhipateḥ duhitrā

original: upasthitaś cāru vapus tadīyaṃ kṛtvopabhogotsukayeva lakṣmyā // Ragh_14.24 //
analyzed: upasthitaḥ cāru vapuḥ tadīyam kṛtvā upabhoga utsukayā iva lakṣmyā

original: tayor yathāprārthitam indriyārthān āseduṣoḥ sadmasu citravatsu /
analyzed: tayoḥ yathā prārthitam indriyārthān āseduṣoḥ sadmasu citravatsu

original: prāptāni duḥkhāny api daṇḍakeṣu saṃcintyamānāni sukhāny abhūvan // Ragh_14.25 //
analyzed: prāptāni duḥkhāni api daṇḍakeṣu saṃcintyamānāni sukhāni abhūvan

original: athādhikasnigdhavilocanena mukhena sītā śarapāṇḍureṇa /
analyzed: atha adhika snigdha vilocanena mukhena sītā śara pāṇḍureṇa

original: ānandayitrī pariṇetur āsīd anakṣaravyañjitadohadena // Ragh_14.26 //
analyzed: ānandayitrī pariṇetuḥ āsīt anakṣara vyañjita dohadena

original: tām aṅkam āropya kṛśāṅgayaṣṭiṃ varṇāntarākrāntapayodharāgrām /
analyzed: tām aṅkam āropya kṛśa aṅgayaṣṭim varṇa antara ākrānta payodhara agrām

original: vilajjamānāṃ rahasi pratītaḥ prapraccha rāmāṃ ramaṇo 'bhilāṣam // Ragh_14.27 //
analyzed: vilajjamānām rahasi pratītaḥ prapraccha rāmām ramaṇaḥ bhilāṣam

original: sā daṣṭanīvārabalīnihiṃsraiḥ saṃbaddha vaikhānasakanyakāni /
analyzed: sā daṣṭa nīvāra balī nihiṃsraiḥ vaikhānasa kanyakāni

original: iyeṣa bhūyaḥ kuśavanti gantuṃ bhāgīrathītīratapovanāni // Ragh_14.28 //
analyzed: iyeṣa bhūyas kuśavanti gantum bhāgīrathī tīra tapovanāni

original: tasyai pratiśrutya raghupravīras tad (?)
analyzed: tasyai pratiśrutya raghu pravīraḥ tat

original: īpsitaṃ pārśvacarānuyātaḥ /
analyzed: īpsitam pārśvacara anuyātaḥ

original: ālokayiṣyan muditām ayodhyāṃ prāsādam abhraṃliham āruroha // Ragh_14.29 //
analyzed: ālokayiṣyan muditām ayodhyām prāsādam abhraṃliham āruroha

original: ṛddhāpaṇaṃ rājapathaṃ sa paśyan vigāhyamānāṃ sarayūṃ ca naubhiḥ /
analyzed: ṛddhāpaṇam rāja patham sa paśyan vigāhyamānām sarayūm ca naubhiḥ

original: vilāsibhiś cādhyuṣitāni pauraiḥ puropakaṇṭhopavanāni reme // Ragh_14.30 //
analyzed: vilāsibhiḥ ca adhyuṣitāni pauraiḥ pura upakaṇṭha upavanāni reme

original: sa kiṃvadantīṃ vadatāṃ purogaḥ svaṛttam uddiśya viśuddhavṛttaḥ /
analyzed: sa kiṃvadantīm vadatām purogaḥ sva ṛttam uddiśya viśuddha vṛttaḥ

original: sarpādhirājorubhujo 'pasarpaṃ papraccha bhadraṃ vijitāribhadraḥ // Ragh_14.31 //
analyzed: sarpa adhirāja ūru bhujaḥ pasarpam papraccha bhadram vijita ari bhadraḥ

original: nirbandhapṛṣṭaḥ sa jagāda sarvaṃ stuvanti paurāś caritaṃ tvadīyam /
analyzed: nirbandha pṛṣṭaḥ sa jagāda sarvam stuvanti paurāḥ caritam tvadīyam

original: anyatra rakṣobhavanoṣitāyāḥ parigrahān mānavadeva devyāḥ // Ragh_14.32 //
analyzed: anyatra rakṣaḥ bhavana uṣitāyāḥ parigrahāt mānavadeva devyāḥ

original: kalatranindāguruṇā kilaivam abhyāhataṃ kīrtiviparyayeṇa /
analyzed: kalatra nindā guruṇā kila evam abhyāhatam kīrti viparyayeṇa

original: ayoghanenāya ivābhitaptaṃ vaidehibandhor hṛdayaṃ vidadre // Ragh_14.33 //
analyzed: ayaḥ ghanena ayaḥ iva abhitaptam vaidehi bandhoḥ hṛdayam vidadre

original: kim ātmanirvādakathām upekṣe jāyām adoṣām uta saṃtyajāmi /
analyzed: kim ātma nirvāda kathām upekṣe jāyām adoṣām uta saṃtyajāmi

original: ity ekapakṣāśrayaviklavatvād āsīt sa dolācalacittavṛttiḥ // Ragh_14.34 //
analyzed: iti eka pakṣa āśraya viklava tvāt āsīt sa dolā acala cittavṛttiḥ

original: niścitya cānanyanivṛtti vācyaṃ tyāgena patnyāḥ parimārṣṭum aicchat /
analyzed: niścitya ca ananya nivṛtti vācyam tyāgena patnyāḥ parimārṣṭum aicchat

original: api svadehāt kim utendriyārthād yaśodhanānāṃ hi yaśo garīyaḥ // Ragh_14.35 //
analyzed: api sva dehāt kim uta indriya arthāt yaśaḥ dhanānām hi yaśaḥ garīyaḥ

original: sa saṃnipātyāvarajān hataujās tadvikriyādarśanaluptaharṣān /
analyzed: sa saṃnipātya avarajān hata ojāḥ tad vikriyā darśana lupta harṣān

original: kaulīnam ātmāśrayam ācacakṣe tebhyaḥ punaś cedam uvāca vākyam // Ragh_14.36 //
analyzed: kaulīnam ātma āśrayam ācacakṣe tebhyaḥ punar ca idam uvāca vākyam

original: rājarṣivaṃśasya raviprasūter upasthitaḥ paśyata kīdṛśo 'yam /
analyzed: rājarṣi vaṃśasya ravi prasūteḥ upasthitaḥ paśyata kīdṛśaḥ yam

original: mattaḥ sadācāraśuceḥ kalaṅkaḥ payodavātād iva darpaṇasya // Ragh_14.37 //
analyzed: mattaḥ sat ācāra śuceḥ kalaṅkaḥ payoda vātāt iva darpaṇasya

original: paureṣu so 'haṃ vahulībhavantam apāṃ taraṅgeṣv iva tailabindum /
analyzed: paureṣu saḥ ham vahulībhavantam apām taraṅgeṣu iva taila bindum

original: soḍhuṃ na tatpūrvam avarṇam īśe ālānikaṃ sthāṇum iva dviependraḥ // Ragh_14.38 //
analyzed: soḍhum na tad pūrvam avarṇam īśe ālānikam sthāṇum iva

original: tasyāpanodāya phalapravṛttāv upasthitāyām api nirvyapekṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasya apanodāya phala pravṛttau upasthitāyām api nirvyapekṣaḥ

original: tyakṣyāmi vaidehasutāṃ purastāt samudranemiṃ pitur ājñayeva // Ragh_14.39 //
analyzed: tyakṣyāmi vaideha sutām purastāt samudra nemim pituḥ ājñayā iva

original: avaimi cainām anagheti kiṃ tu lokāpavādo balavān mato me /
analyzed: avaimi ca enām anaghā iti kim tu loka apavādaḥ balavān mataḥ me

original: chāyā hi bhūmeḥ śaśino malatvenāropitā śuddhimataḥ prajābhiḥ // Ragh_14.40 //
analyzed: chāyā hi bhūmeḥ śaśinaḥ mala tvena āropitā śuddhimataḥ prajābhiḥ

original: rakṣovadhānto na ca me prayāso vyarthaḥ sa vairapratimocanāya /
analyzed: rakṣaḥ vadha antaḥ na ca me prayāsaḥ vyarthaḥ sa vaira pratimocanāya

original: amarṣaṇaḥ śoṇitakāṅkṣayā kiṃ padā spṛśantaṃ daśati dvijihvaḥ // Ragh_14.41 //
analyzed: amarṣaṇaḥ śoṇita kāṅkṣayā kim padā spṛśantam daśati dvijihvaḥ

original: tad eṣa sargaḥ karuṇārdracittair na me bhavadbhiḥ pratiṣedhanīyaḥ /
analyzed: tat eṣa sargaḥ karuṇā ārdra cittaiḥ na me bhavadbhiḥ pratiṣedhanīyaḥ

original: yady arthitā nirhṛtavācyaśalyān prāṇān mayā dhārayituṃ ciraṃ vaḥ // Ragh_14.42 //
analyzed: yadī arthitā nirhṛta vācya śalyān prāṇān mayā dhārayitum ciram vaḥ

original: ity uktavantaṃ janakātmajāyāṃ nitāntarūkṣābhiniveśam īśam /
analyzed: iti uktavantam janakātmajāyām nitānta rūkṣa abhiniveśam īśam

original: na kaścana bhrātṛṣu teṣu śakto niṣeddhum āsīd anuvartituṃ vā // Ragh_14.43 //
analyzed: na kaścana bhrātṛṣu teṣu śaktaḥ niṣeddhum āsīt anuvartitum vā

original: sa lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvajanmā vilokya lokatrayagītakīrtiḥ /
analyzed: sa lakṣmaṇam lakṣmaṇa pūrva janmā vilokya loka traya gīta kīrtiḥ

original: saumyeti cābhāṣya yathārthabhāṣī sthitaṃ nideśe pṛthag ādideśa // Ragh_14.44 //
analyzed: saumya iti ca ābhāṣya yathārtha bhāṣī sthitam nideśe pṛthak ādideśa

original: prajāvatī dohadaśaṃsinī te tapovaneṣu spṛhayālur eva /
analyzed: prajāvatī dohada śaṃsinī te tapaḥ vaneṣu spṛhayāluḥ eva

original: saumyeti cābhāṣya yathārthabhāṣī prāpayya vālmīkipadaṃ tyajainām // Ragh_14.45 //
analyzed: saumya iti ca ābhāṣya yathārtha bhāṣī prāpayya vālmīki padam tyaja enām

original: sa śuśruvān mātari bhārgaveṇa pitur niyogāt prahṛtam dviṣadvat /
analyzed: sa śuśruvān mātari bhārgaveṇa pituḥ niyogāt prahṛtam dviṣadvat

original: pratyagrahīd agrajaśāsanaṃ tad ājñā gurūṇāṃ hy avicāraṇīyā // Ragh_14.46 //
analyzed: pratyagrahīt agraja śāsanam tat ājñā gurūṇām hi a vicāraṇīyā

original: athānukūlaśravaṇapratītām atrasnubhir yuktadhuraṃ turaṃgaiḥ /
analyzed: atha anukūla śravaṇa pratītām atrasnubhiḥ yukta dhuram turaṃgaiḥ

original: rathaṃ sumantra pratipannaraśmim āropya vaidehasutāṃ pratasthe // Ragh_14.47 //
analyzed: ratham sumantra pratipanna raśmim āropya vaideha sutām pratasthe

original: sā nīyamānā rucirān pradeśān priyaṃkaro me priya ity anandat /
analyzed: sā nīyamānā rucirān pradeśān priyaṃkaraḥ me priyaḥ iti anandat

original: nābuddha kalpadrumatāṃ vihāya jātaṃ tam ātmany asipattravṛkṣam // Ragh_14.48 //
analyzed: na abuddha kalpadruma tām vihāya jātam tam ātmani asi pattra vṛkṣam

original: jugūha tasyāḥ pathi lakṣmaṇo yat savyetareṇa sphuratā tad akṣṇā /
analyzed: jugūha tasyāḥ pathi lakṣmaṇaḥ yat savyetareṇa sphuratā tat akṣṇā

original: ākhyātam asyai guru bhāvi duḥkham atyantaluptapriyadarśanena // Ragh_14.49 //
analyzed: ākhyātam asyai guru bhāvi duḥkham atyanta lupta priya darśanena

original: sā durnimittopagatād viṣādāt sadyaḥ parimlānamukhāravindā /
analyzed: sā durnimitta upagatāt viṣādāt sadyas parimlāna mukha aravindā

original: rājñaḥ śivaṃ sāvarajasya bhūyād ity āśaśaṃse karaṇair abāhyaiḥ // Ragh_14.50 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ śivam sāvarajasya bhūyāt iti āśaśaṃse karaṇaiḥ abāhyaiḥ

original: guror niyogād vanitāṃ vanānte sādhvīṃ sumitrātanayo vihāsyan /
analyzed: guroḥ niyogāt vanitām vanānte sādhvīm sumitrā tanayaḥ vihāsyan

original: avāryatevotthitavīcihastair jahnor duhitrā shitayā purastāt // Ragh_14.51 //
analyzed: a vāryata iva utthita vīci hastaiḥ jahnoḥ duhitrā shitayā purastāt

original: rathāt sa yantrā nigṛhītavāhāt tāṃ bhrātṛhyāyāṃ puline 'vatārya /
analyzed: rathāt sa yantrā nigṛhīta vāhāt tām bhrātṛhyāyām puline vatārya

original: gaṅgāṃ niṣādāhṛtanauviśeṣas tatāra saṃdhām iva satyasaṃdhaḥ // Ragh_14.52 //
analyzed: gaṅgām niṣāda āhṛta nau viśeṣaḥ tatāra saṃdhām iva satya saṃdhaḥ

original: atha vyavasthāpitavāk kathaṃcit saumitrir antargatabāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ /
analyzed: atha vyavasthāpita vāc kathaṃcid saumitriḥ antargata bāṣpa kaṇṭhaḥ

original: autpātiko megha ivāśmavarṣaṃ mahīpateḥ śāsanam ujjagāra // Ragh_14.53 //
analyzed: autpātikaḥ meghaḥ iva aśma varṣam mahīpateḥ śāsanam ujjagāra

original: tato 'bhiṣaṅgānilavipraviddhā prabhraśyamānābharaṇasprasūnā /
analyzed: tatas bhiṣaṅga anila vipraviddhā prabhraśyamāna ābharaṇa sprasūnā

original: svamūrtilābhaprakṛtiṃ dharitrīṃ lateva sītā sahasā jagāma // Ragh_14.54 //
analyzed: sva mūrti lābha prakṛtim dharitrīm latā iva sītā sahasā jagāma

original: ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavaḥ kathaṃ tvāṃ tyajed akasmāt patir āryavṛttaḥ /
analyzed: ikṣvāku vaṃśa prabhavaḥ katham tvām tyajet akasmāt patiḥ ārya vṛttaḥ

original: iti kṣitiḥ saṃśayiteva tasyai dadau praveśaṃ jananī na tāvat // Ragh_14.55 //
analyzed: iti kṣitiḥ saṃśayitā iva tasyai dadau praveśam jananī na tāvat

original: sā luptasaṃjñā na viveda duḥkhaṃ pratyāgatāsuḥ samatapyatāntaḥ /
analyzed: sā lupta saṃjñā na viveda duḥkham pratyāgata asuḥ samatapyata antar

original: tasyāḥ sumitrātmajayatnalabdho mohād abhūt kaṣṭataraḥ prabodhaḥ // Ragh_14.56 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ sumitrā ātmaja yatna labdhaḥ mohāt abhūt kaṣṭataraḥ prabodhaḥ

original: na cāvadad bhartur avarṇam āryā nirākariṣṇor vṛjinād ṛte 'pi /
analyzed: na ca avadat bhartuḥ avarṇam āryā nirākariṣṇoḥ vṛjināt ṛte

original: ātmānam eva sthiraduḥkhabājaṃ punaḥ punar duṣkṛtinaṃ nininda // Ragh_14.57 //
analyzed: ātmānam eva sthira duḥkha bājam punar punar duṣkṛtinam nininda

original: āśvāsya rāmāvarajaḥ satīṃ tām ākhyātavālmīkiniketamārgaḥ /
analyzed: āśvāsya rāma avarajaḥ satīm tām ākhyāta vālmīki niketa mārgaḥ

original: nighnasya me bhartṛnideśaraukṣyaṃ devi kṣamasveti babhūva namraḥ // Ragh_14.58 //
analyzed: nighnasya me bhartṛ nideśa raukṣyam devi kṣamasva iti babhūva namraḥ

original: sītā samutthāpya jagāda vākyaṃ prītāsmi te saumyacirāya jīva /
analyzed: sītā samutthāpya jagāda vākyam prītā asmi te saumya cirāya jīva

original: viḍaujasā viṣṇur ivāgrajena bhrātrā yad itthaṃ paravān asi tvam // Ragh_14.59 //
analyzed: viṣ ojasā viṣṇuḥ iva agrajena bhrātrā yat ittham paravān asi tvam

original: śvaśrūjanaṃ sarvam anukrameṇa vijñāpaya prāpitamatpraṇāmaḥ /
analyzed: śvaśrū janam sarvam anukrameṇa vijñāpaya prāpita mad praṇāmaḥ

original: prajāniśekaṃ mayi vartamānaṃ sūnor anudhyāyata cetaseti // Ragh_14.60 //
analyzed: prajā niśekam mayi vartamānam sūnoḥ anudhyāyata cetasā iti

original: vācyas tvayā madvacanāt sa rājā vahnau viśuddhām api yat samakṣam /
analyzed: vācyaḥ tvayā mad vacanāt sa rājā vahnau viśuddhām api yat samakṣam

original: māṃ lokavādaśravaṇād ahāsīḥ śrutasya kiṃ tat sadṛśaṃ kulasya // Ragh_14.61 //
analyzed: mām lokavāda śravaṇāt ahāsīḥ śrutasya kim tat sadṛśam kulasya

original: kalyāṇabuddher atha vā tavāyaṃ na kāmacāro mayi śaṅkanīyaḥ /
analyzed: kalyāṇa buddheḥ atha vā tava ayam na kāmacāraḥ mayi śaṅkanīyaḥ

original: mamaiva janmāntarapātakānāṃ vipākavisphūrjathur aprasahyaḥ // Ragh_14.62 //
analyzed: mama eva janma antara pātakānām vipāka visphūrjathuḥ aprasahyaḥ

original: upasthitāṃ pūrvam apāsya lakṣmīṃ vanaṃ mayā sārdham asi prapannaḥ /
analyzed: upasthitām pūrvam apāsya lakṣmīm vanam mayā sārdham asi prapannaḥ

original: tad āspadaṃ prāpya tayātiroṣāt soḍhāsmi na tvadbhavane vasantī // Ragh_14.63 //
analyzed: tat āspadam prāpya tayā ati roṣāt soḍhā asmi na tvad bhavane vasantī

original: niśācaropaplutabhartṛkāṇāṃ tapasvinīnāṃ bhavataḥ prasādāt /
analyzed: niśācara upapluta bhartṛkāṇām tapasvinīnām bhavataḥ prasādāt

original: bhūtvā śaraṇyā śaraṇārtham anyāṃ kathaṃ prapatsye tvayi dīpyamāne // Ragh_14.64 //
analyzed: bhūtvā śaraṇyā śaraṇa artham anyām katham prapatsye tvayi dīpyamāne

original: kiṃ vā tavātyantaviyogamoghe kuryām upekṣāṃ hatajīvite 'smin /
analyzed: kim vā tava atyanta viyoga moghe kuryām upekṣām hata jīvite smin

original: syād rakṣaṇīyaṃ yadi me na tejas tvadīyam antargatam antarāyaḥ // Ragh_14.65 //
analyzed: syāt rakṣaṇīyam yadi me na tejaḥ tvadīyam antargatam antarāyaḥ

original: sāhaṃ tapaḥ sūryaniviṣṭadṛṣṭir ūrdhvaṃ prasūtes caritum yatiṣye /
analyzed: sā aham tapaḥ sūrya niviṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ ūrdhvam prasūteḥ caritum yatiṣye

original: tathā yathā me jananāntare 'pi tvam eva bhartā na ca viprayogaḥ // Ragh_14.66 //
analyzed: tathā yathā me janana antare tvam eva bhartā na ca viprayogaḥ

original: nṛpasya varṇāśramarakṣaṇaṃ yat sa eva dharmo manunā praṇītaḥ /
analyzed: nṛpasya varṇa āśrama rakṣaṇam yat saḥ eva dharmaḥ manunā praṇītaḥ

original: nirvāsitāpy evam atas tvayāhaṃ tapasvisāmānyam avekṣaṇīyā // Ragh_14.67 //
analyzed: nirvāsitā api evam atas tvayā aham tapasvi sāmānyam avekṣaṇīyā

original: tatheti tasyāḥ pratigṛhya vācaṃ rāmānuje dṛśṭipathaṃ vyatīte /
analyzed: tathā iti tasyāḥ pratigṛhya vācam rāma anuje dṛśṭi patham vyatīte

original: sā muktakaṇṭhaṃ vyasanātibhārāc cakranda vignā kurarīva bhūyaḥ // Ragh_14.68 //
analyzed: sā mukta kaṇṭham vyasana ati bhārāt cakranda vignā kurarī iva bhūyas

original: nṛtyaṃ mayūrāḥ kusumāni vṛkṣā darbhān upāttān vijahur hariṇyaḥ /
analyzed: nṛtyam mayūrāḥ kusumāni vṛkṣāḥ darbhān upāttān vijahuḥ hariṇyaḥ

original: tasyāḥ prapanne samaduḥkhabhāvam atyantam āsīd ruditaṃ vane 'pi // Ragh_14.69 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ prapanne sama duḥkha bhāvam atyantam āsīt ruditam vane

original: tām abhyagacchad ruditānusārī kaviḥ kuśedhmāharaṇāya yātaḥ /
analyzed: tām abhyagacchat rudita anusārī kaviḥ kuśa idhma āharaṇāya yātaḥ

original: niṣādaviddhāṇḍajadarśanotthaḥ ślokatvam āpadyata yasya śokaḥ // Ragh_14.70 //
analyzed: niṣāda viddha aṇḍaja darśana utthaḥ śloka tvam āpadyata yasya śokaḥ

original: tam aśru netrāvaraṇaṃ pramṛjya sītā vilāpād viratā vavande /
analyzed: tam aśru netra āvaraṇam pramṛjya sītā vilāpāt viratā vavande

original: tasyai munir dohadaliṅgadarśī dāśvān supurtrāśiṣam ity uvāca // Ragh_14.71 //
analyzed: tasyai muniḥ dohada liṅga darśī dāśvān su purtrāśiṣam iti uvāca

original: jāne viṣṛśṭāṃ praṇidhānatas tvāṃ mithyāpavādakṣubhitena bhartrā /
analyzed: jāne viṣṛśṭām praṇidhānataḥ tvām mithyā apavāda kṣubhitena bhartrā

original: tan mā vyathiṣṭhā viṣayāntarasthaṃ prāptāsi vaidehi pitur niketam // Ragh_14.72 //
analyzed: tat mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ viṣaya antara stham prāptā asi vaidehi pituḥ niketam

original: uthkātalokatrayakaṇṭake 'pi satyapratijñe 'py avikatthane 'pi /
analyzed: satya pratijñe pi a vikatthane pi

original: tvāṃ praty akasmāt kaluṣapravṛttāv asty eva manyur bharatāgraje me // Ragh_14.73 //
analyzed: tvām prati akasmāt kaluṣa pravṛttau asti eva manyuḥ bharatāgraje me

original: tavendukīrtiḥ śvaśuraḥ sakhā me satāṃ bhavocchedakaraḥ pitā te /
analyzed: tava indu kīrtiḥ śvaśuraḥ sakhā me satām bhava uccheda karaḥ pitā te

original: dhuri sthitā tvaṃ patidevatānāṃ kiṃ tan na yenāsi mamānukampyā // Ragh_14.74 //
analyzed: dhuri sthitā tvam pati devatānām kim tat na yena asi mama anukampyā

original: tapasvisaṃsargavinitatsattve tapovane vītabhayā vasāsmin /
analyzed: tapasvi saṃsarga vinitat sattve tapaḥ vane vīta bhayā vasa asmin

original: ito bhaviṣyaty anaghaprasūter apatyasaṃskāramayo vidhis te // Ragh_14.75 //
analyzed: itas bhaviṣyati anagha prasūteḥ apatya saṃskāra mayaḥ vidhiḥ te

original: aśūnyatīrāṃ munisaṃniveśais tamo'pahantrīṃ tamasāṃ vigāhya /
analyzed: a śūnya tīrām muni saṃniveśaiḥ tama upahantrīm tamasām vigāhya

original: tatsaikatotsaṅgabalikriyābhiḥ saṃpatsyate te manasaḥ prasādaḥ // Ragh_14.76 //
analyzed: tat saikata utsaṅga bali kriyābhiḥ saṃpatsyate te manasaḥ prasādaḥ

original: puṣpaṃ phalaṃ cārtavam āharantyo bījaṃ ca bāleyam akṛṣṭarohi /
analyzed: puṣpam phalam ca ārtavam āharantyaḥ bījam ca bāleyam a kṛṣṭa rohi

original: vinodayiṣyanti navābhiṣaṅgām udāravāco munikanyakās tvām // Ragh_14.77 //
analyzed: vinodayiṣyanti nava abhiṣaṅgām udāra vācaḥ muni kanyakāḥ tvām

original: payoghaṭair āśramabālavṛkṣān saṃvardhayantī svabalānurūpaiḥ /
analyzed: payaḥ ghaṭaiḥ āśrama bāla vṛkṣān saṃvardhayantī sva bala anurūpaiḥ

original: asaṃśayaṃ prāk tanayopapatteḥ stanaṃdhayaprītim avāpsyasi tvam // Ragh_14.78 //
analyzed: asaṃśayam prāk tanaya upapatteḥ stanaṃdhaya prītim avāpsyasi tvam

original: anugrahapratyabhinandinīṃ tāṃ vālmīkir ādāya dayārdracetāḥ /
analyzed: anugraha pratyabhinandinīm tām vālmīkiḥ ādāya dayā ārdra cetāḥ

original: sāyaṃ mṛgādhyāsitavedipārśvaṃ svam āśramaṃ śāntamṛgaṃ nināya // Ragh_14.79 //
analyzed: sāyam mṛga adhyāsita vedi pārśvam svam āśramam śānta mṛgam nināya

original: tām arpayām āsa ca śokadīnāṃ tadāgamaprītiṣu tāpasīṣu /
analyzed: tām āsa ca śoka dīnām tad āgama prītiṣu tāpasīṣu

original: nirviṣṭasārāṃ pitṛbhir himāṃśor antyāṃ kalāṃ darśa ivauṣadhīṣu // Ragh_14.80 //
analyzed: nirviṣṭa sārām pitṛbhiḥ himāṃśoḥ antyām kalām darśe iva oṣadhīṣu

original: tā iṅgudīsnehakṛtapradīpam āstīrṇamedhyājinatalpam antaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ iṅgudī sneha kṛta pradīpam āstīrṇa medhya ajina talpam antar

original: tasyai saparyānupadaṃ dinānte nivāsahetor uṭajaṃ viteruḥ // Ragh_14.81 //
analyzed: tasyai saparyā anupadam dina ante nivāsa hetoḥ uṭajam viteruḥ

original: tatrābhiṣekaprayatā vasantī prayuktapūjā vidhinātithibhyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra abhiṣeka prayatā vasantī prayukta pūjā vidhinā atithibhyaḥ

original: vanyena sā valkalinī śarīraṃ patyuḥ prajāsaṃtataye babhāra // Ragh_14.82 //
analyzed: vanyena sā valkalinī śarīram patyuḥ prajā saṃtataye babhāra

original: api prabhuḥ sānuśayo 'dhunā syāt kim utsukaḥ śakrajito 'pi hantā /
analyzed: api prabhuḥ sa anuśayaḥ dhunā syāt kim utsukaḥ hantā

original: śaśaṃsa sītāparidevanāntam anuṣṭhitaṃ śāsanam agrajāya // Ragh_14.83 //
analyzed: śaśaṃsa sītā paridevanā antam anuṣṭhitam śāsanam agrajāya

original: babhūva rāmaḥ sahasā sabāṣpas tuṣāravarṣīva sahasyacandraḥ /
analyzed: babhūva rāmaḥ sahasā sa bāṣpaḥ tuṣāra varṣī iva sahasya candraḥ

original: kaulīnabhītena gṛhān nirastā na tena vaidehasutā manastaḥ // Ragh_14.84 //
analyzed: kaulīna bhītena gṛhān nirastāḥ na tena vaideha sutāḥ manastaḥ

original: nigṛhya śokaṃ svayam eva dhīmān varṇāśramāvekṣaṇajāgarūkaḥ /
analyzed: nigṛhya śokam svayam eva dhīmān varṇa āśrama avekṣaṇa jāgarūkaḥ

original: sa bhrātṛsādhāraṇabhogam ṛddhaṃ rājyaṃ rajoriktamanāḥ śaśāsa // Ragh_14.85 //
analyzed: sa bhrātṛ sādhāraṇa bhogam ṛddham rājyam rajaḥ rikta manāḥ śaśāsa

original: tām ekabhāryāṃ parivādabhīroḥ sādhvīm api tyaktavato nṛpasya /
analyzed: tām eka bhāryām parivāda bhīroḥ sādhvīm api tyaktavataḥ nṛpasya

original: vakṣasy asaṃghaṭṭasukhaṃ vasantī reje sapatnīrahiteva lakṣmīḥ // Ragh_14.86 //
analyzed: vakṣasi a saṃghaṭṭa sukham vasantī reje sapatnī rahitā iva lakṣmīḥ

original: sītāṃ hitvā daśamukharipur nopayema yad anyāṃ tasyā eva pratikṛtisakho yat kratūn ājahāra /
analyzed: sītām hitvā daśamukha ripuḥ na upayema yat anyām tasyāḥ eva pratikṛti sakhaḥ yat kratūn ājahāra

original: vṛttāntena śravaṇaviṣayaprāpiṇā tena bhartuḥ sā durvāraṃ katham api parityāgaduḥkhaṃ viṣehe // Ragh_14.87 //
analyzed: vṛttāntena śravaṇa viṣaya prāpiṇā tena bhartuḥ sā durvāram katham api parityāga duḥkham viṣehe

original: kṛtasītāparityāgaḥ sa ratnākaramekhalām /
analyzed: kṛta sītā parityāgaḥ sa ratnākara mekhalām

original: bubhūje pṛthivīpālaḥ pṛthivīm eva kevalām // Ragh_15.1 //
analyzed: bubhūje pṛthivī pālaḥ pṛthivīm eva kevalām

original: lavaṇena viluptejyās tāmisreṇa tam abhyayuḥ /
analyzed: lavaṇena vilupta ijyāḥ tāmisreṇa tam abhyayus

original: munayo yamunābhājaḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇārthinaḥ // Ragh_15.2 //
analyzed: munayaḥ yamunā bhājaḥ śaraṇyam śaraṇa arthinaḥ

original: avekṣya rāmaṃ te tasmin na prajahruḥ svatejasā /
analyzed: avekṣya rāmam te tasmin na prajahruḥ sva tejasā

original: trāṇābhāve hi śāpāstrāḥ kurvanti tapaso vyayam // Ragh_15.3 //
analyzed: trāṇa abhāve hi śāpa astrāḥ kurvanti tapasaḥ vyayam

original: pratiśuśrāva kākutsthas tebhyo vighnapratikriyām /
analyzed: pratiśuśrāva kākutsthaḥ tebhyaḥ vighna pratikriyām

original: dharmasaṃrakṣaṇāyaiva pravṛttir bhuvi śārṅgiṇaḥ // Ragh_15.4 //
analyzed: dharma saṃrakṣaṇāya eva pravṛttiḥ bhuvi śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: te rāmāya vadhopāyam ācakhyur vibudhaviṣaḥ /
analyzed: te rāmāya vadha upāyam ācakhyuḥ vibudha viṣaḥ

original: durjayo lavaṇaḥ śūlī viśūlaḥ prārthyatām iti // Ragh_15.5 //
analyzed: durjayaḥ lavaṇaḥ śūlī viśūlaḥ prārthyatām iti

original: ādideśātha śatrughnaṃ teṣāṃ kṣemāya rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: ādideśa atha śatrughnam teṣām kṣemāya rāghavaḥ

original: kariṣyann iva nāmāsya yathārtham arinigrahāt // Ragh_15.6 //
analyzed: kariṣyan iva nāma asya yathārtham ari nigrahāt

original: yaḥ kaścana raghūṇāṃ hi param ekaḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kaścana raghūṇām hi param ekaḥ paraṃtapaḥ

original: apavāda ivotsargaṃ vyāvartayitum īśvaraḥ // Ragh_15.7 //
analyzed: apavādaḥ iva utsargam vyāvartayitum īśvaraḥ

original: agrajena prayuktāśīs tadā dāśarathī rathī /
analyzed: agrajena prayuktā āśīḥ tadā dāśarathiḥ rathī

original: yayau vanstahliḥ paśyan puṣpitāḥ surabhīr abhīḥ // Ragh_15.8 //
analyzed: yayau vanstahliḥ paśyan puṣpitāḥ surabhīḥ abhīḥ

original: rāmādeśād anupadaṃ senāṅgaṃ tasya siddhaye /
analyzed: rāma ādeśāt anupadam senā aṅgam tasya siddhaye

original: paścād adhyayanārthasya dhātor adhir ivābhavat // Ragh_15.9 //
analyzed: paścāt adhyayana arthasya dhātoḥ adhiḥ iva abhavat

original: ādiṣṭavartmā munibhiḥ sa gacchaṃs tapatāṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: ādiṣṭa vartmā munibhiḥ sa gacchan tapatām varaḥ

original: virarāja rathapṛṣṭhair vālakhilyair ivāṃśumān // Ragh_15.10 //
analyzed: virarāja ratha pṛṣṭhaiḥ vālakhilyaiḥ iva aṃśumān

original: tasya mārgavaśād ekā babhūva vasatir yataḥ /
analyzed: tasya mārga vaśāt ekā babhūva vasatiḥ yatas

original: rathasvanotkaṇṭhamṛge vālmīkīye tapovane // Ragh_15.11 //
analyzed: ratha svana utkaṇṭha mṛge vālmīkīye tapovane

original: tam ṛṣiḥ pūjayām āsa kumāraṃ klāntavāhanam /
analyzed: tam ṛṣiḥ pūjayām āsa kumāram klānta vāhanam

original: tapaḥprabhāvasiddhābhir viśeṣapratipattibhiḥ // Ragh_15.12 //
analyzed: tapaḥ prabhāva siddhābhiḥ viśeṣa pratipattibhiḥ

original: tasyām evāsya yāminyām antarvatnī prajāvatī /
analyzed: tasyām eva asya yāminyām antarvatnī prajāvatī

original: sutāv asūta saṃpannau kośadaṇḍāv iva kṣitiḥ // Ragh_15.13 //
analyzed: sutau asūta saṃpannau kośa daṇḍau iva kṣitiḥ

original: saṃtānaśravaṇād bhrātuḥ saumitriḥ saumanasyavān /
analyzed: saṃtāna śravaṇāt bhrātuḥ saumitriḥ saumanasyavān

original: prāñjalir munim āmantrya prātar yuktaratho yayau // Ragh_15.14 //
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ munim āmantrya prātar yukta rathaḥ yayau

original: sa ca prāpa madhūpaghnaṃ kumbhīnasyāś ca kukṣijaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca prāpa madhu upaghnam kumbhīnasyāḥ ca kukṣi jaḥ

original: vanāt karam ivādāya sattvarāśim upasthitaḥ // Ragh_15.15 //
analyzed: vanāt karam iva ādāya sattva rāśim upasthitaḥ

original: dhūmadhūmro vasāghandhī jvālābabhruśiroruhaḥ /
analyzed: dhūma dhūmraḥ vasā ghandhī jvālā babhru śiroruhaḥ

original: kravyādgaṇaparīvāraś citāgnir iva jaṅgamaḥ // Ragh_15.16 //
analyzed: kravyād gaṇa parīvāraḥ citā agniḥ iva jaṅgamaḥ

original: apaśulaṃ tam āsādya lavaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇānujaḥ /
analyzed: apaśulam tam āsādya lavaṇam lakṣmaṇa anujaḥ

original: rurodha saṃmukhīno hi jayo randhraprahāriṇām // Ragh_15.17 //
analyzed: rurodha saṃmukhīnaḥ hi jayaḥ randhra prahāriṇām

original: nātiparyāptam ālakṣya matkukṣer adya bhojanam /
analyzed: na ati paryāptam ālakṣya mad kukṣeḥ adya bhojanam

original: diṣṭyā tvam asi me dhātrā bhīgtenevopapāditaḥ // Ragh_15.18 //
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvam asi me dhātrā bhīgtena iva upapāditaḥ

original: iti saṃtarjya śatrughnaṃ rākṣasas tajjighāṃsayā /
analyzed: iti saṃtarjya śatrughnam rākṣasaḥ tad jighāṃsayā

original: prāṃśum utpāṭayām āsa mustāstambam iva drumam // Ragh_15.19 //
analyzed: prāṃśum utpāṭayām āsa mustā stambam iva drumam

original: saumitrer niśitair bāṇair antarā śakalīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: saumitreḥ niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ antarā śakalīkṛtaḥ

original: gātraṃ puṣparajaḥ prāpa na śākhī nairṛteritaḥ // Ragh_15.20 //
analyzed: gātram puṣparajaḥ prāpa na śākhī nairṛta īritaḥ

original: vināśāt tasya vṛkṣasya rakṣas tasmai mahopalam /
analyzed: vināśāt tasya vṛkṣasya rakṣaḥ tasmai mahā upalam

original: prajighāya kṛtāntasya muṣṭiṃ pṛthag iva sthitam // Ragh_15.21 //
analyzed: prajighāya kṛtāntasya muṣṭim pṛthak iva sthitam

original: aindram astram upādāya śatrughnena sa tāḍitaḥ /
analyzed: aindram astram upādāya śatrughnena sa tāḍitaḥ

original: sikatābhyo 'pi hi parāṃ prapede paramāṇutām // Ragh_15.22 //
analyzed: sikatābhyaḥ pi hi parām prapede parama aṇu tām

original: dakṣiṇaṃ doṣam udyamya rākṣasas tam upādravat /
analyzed: dakṣiṇam doṣam udyamya rākṣasaḥ tam upādravat

original: ekatāla ivopātapavanaprerito giriḥ // Ragh_15.23 //
analyzed: eka tālaḥ iva upātapa vana preritaḥ giriḥ

original: kārṣnena pattrinā śatruḥ sa bhinnarhṛdayaḥ patan /
analyzed: kārṣnena pattrinā śatruḥ sa bhinna rhṛdayaḥ patan

original: ānināya bhuvaḥ kampaṃ jahārāśramavāsinām // Ragh_15.24 //
analyzed: ānināya bhuvaḥ kampam jahāra āśrama vāsinām

original: vayasāṃ paṅktayaḥ petur hatasyopari rakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: vayasām paṅktayaḥ petuḥ hatasya upari rakṣasaḥ

original: tatpratidvandino mūrdhni divyāḥ kusumavṛṣṭayaḥ // Ragh_15.25 //
analyzed: tad pratidvandinaḥ mūrdhni divyāḥ kusuma vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: sa hatvā lavaṇaṃ vīras tadā mene mahaujasaḥ /
analyzed: sa hatvā lavaṇam vīraḥ tadā mene mahā ojasaḥ

original: bhrātuḥ sodaryam ātmānam indrajidvadhaśobhinaḥ // Ragh_15.26 //
analyzed: bhrātuḥ sodaryam ātmānam indrajit vadha śobhinaḥ

original: tasya saṃstūyamānasya caritārthais tapasvibhiḥ /
analyzed: tasya saṃstūyamānasya caritārthaiḥ tapasvibhiḥ

original: śuśubhe vikramodagraṃ vrīḍayāvanataṃ śiraḥ // Ragh_15.27 //
analyzed: śuśubhe vikrama udagram vrīḍayā avanatam śiraḥ

original: upakūlaṃ sa kālindyāḥ purīṃ pauruṣabhūṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: upakūlam sa kālindyāḥ purīm pauruṣa bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: nirmame nirmamo 'rtheṣu mathurāṃ madhurākṛtiḥ // Ragh_15.28 //
analyzed: nirmame nirmamaḥ rtheṣu mathurām madhura ākṛtiḥ

original: yā saurājyaprakāśābhir babhau pauravibhūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: yā saurājya prakāśābhiḥ babhau paura vibhūtibhiḥ

original: svargābhiṣyandavamanaṃ kṛtvevopaniveśitā // Ragh_15.29 //
analyzed: svarga abhiṣyanda vamanam kṛtvā iva upaniveśitā

original: tatra saudhagataḥ paśyan yamunāṃ cakravākinīm /
analyzed: tatra saudha gataḥ paśyan yamunām cakravākinīm

original: hema bhaktimatīṃ bhūmeḥ praveṇīm iva pripiye // Ragh_15.30 //
analyzed: hema bhaktimatīm bhūmeḥ praveṇīm iva pripiye

original: sakhā daśarathasyātha janakasya ca mantrakṛt /
analyzed: sakhā daśarathasya atha janakasya ca mantra kṛt

original: saṃcaskārobhayaprītyā maithileyau yathāvidhi // Ragh_15.31 //
analyzed: saṃcaskāra ubhaya prītyā maithileyau yathāvidhi

original: sa tau kuśalavonmṛṣṭagarbhakledau tadākhyayā /
analyzed: sa tau kuśa lava unmṛṣṭa garbha kledau tad ākhyayā

original: kaviḥ kuśalavāv eva cakāra kila nāmataḥ // Ragh_15.32 //
analyzed: kaviḥ kuśa lavau eva cakāra kila nāmataḥ

original: sāṅgaṃ ca vedam adhyāpya kiṃcidutkrāntaśaiśavau /
analyzed: sa aṅgam ca vedam adhyāpya kiṃcid utkrānta śaiśavau

original: svakṛtiṃ gāpayām āsa kaviprathamapaddhatim // Ragh_15.33 //
analyzed: sva kṛtim gāpayām āsa kavi prathama paddhatim

original: rāmasya madhuraṃ vṛttaṃ gāyantau mātur agrataḥ /
analyzed: rāmasya madhuram vṛttam gāyantau mātuḥ agratas

original: tadviyogavyathāṃ kiṃcic chithilīcakratuḥ sutau // Ragh_15.34 //
analyzed: tad viyoga vyathām kiṃcid śithilīcakratuḥ sutau

original: itare 'pi raghor vaṃśyās trayas tretāgnitejasaḥ /
analyzed: itare pi raghoḥ vaṃśyāḥ trayaḥ tretāgni tejasaḥ

original: tadyogāt pativatnīṣu patnīṣv āsan dvisūnavaḥ // Ragh_15.35 //
analyzed: tad yogāt pativatnīṣu patnīṣu āsan dvi sūnavaḥ

original: śatrughātini śatrughnaḥ subāhau ca bahuśrute /
analyzed: śatrughātini śatrughnaḥ subāhau ca bahuśrute

original: mathurāvidiśe sūnvor nidadhe pūrvajotsukaḥ // Ragh_15.36 //
analyzed: mathurā vidiśe sūnvoḥ nidadhe pūrvaja utsukaḥ

original: bhūyas tapovyayo mā bhūd vālmīker iti so 'tyagāt /
analyzed: bhūyas tapaḥ vyayaḥ mā bhūt vālmīkeḥ iti saḥ tyagāt

original: maithilītanayodgītaniṣpandamṛgam āśramam // Ragh_15.37 //
analyzed: maithilī tanaya udgīta niṣpanda mṛgam āśramam

original: vaśī viveśa cāyodhyāṃ rathyāsaṃskāraśobhinīm /
analyzed: vaśī viveśa ca ayodhyām rathyā saṃskāra śobhinīm

original: lavaṇasya vadhāt paurair atigauravam īkṣitaḥ // Ragh_15.38 //
analyzed: lavaṇasya vadhāt pauraiḥ ati gauravam īkṣitaḥ

original: sa dadarśa sabhāmadhye sabhāsadbhir upasthitam /
analyzed: sa dadarśa sabhā madhye sabhāsadbhiḥ upasthitam

original: rāmaṃ sītāparityāgād asāmaṇyapatiṃ bhuvaḥ // Ragh_15.39 //
analyzed: rāmam sītā parityāgāt asāmaṇya patim bhuvaḥ

original: tam abhyanandat praṇataṃ lavaṇāntakam agrajaḥ /
analyzed: tam abhyanandat praṇatam lavaṇāntakam agrajaḥ

original: kālanemivadhāt prītas turāṣāḍ iva śārṅgiṇam // Ragh_15.40 //
analyzed: kālanemi vadhāt prītaḥ turāṣāh iva śārṅgiṇam

original: sa pṛṣṭaḥ sarvato vārttām ākhyād rājñe na saṃtatim /
analyzed: sa pṛṣṭaḥ sarvatas vārttām ākhyāt rājñe na saṃtatim

original: pratyarpayiṣyataḥ kāle kaver ādyasya śāsanāt // Ragh_15.41 //
analyzed: pratyarpayiṣyataḥ kāle kaveḥ ādyasya śāsanāt

original: atha jānapado vipraḥ śiśum aprāptayauvanam /
analyzed: atha jānapadaḥ vipraḥ śiśum a prāpta yauvanam

original: avatāry' āṅkaśayyāsthaṃ dvāri cakranda bhūpateḥ // Ragh_15.42 //
analyzed: avatārī āṅka śayyā stham dvāri cakranda bhūpateḥ

original: śocanīyāsi vasudhe yā tvaṃ daśarathāc cyutā /
analyzed: śocanīyā asi vasudhe yā tvam daśarathāt cyutā

original: rāmahastam anuprāpya kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataraṃ gatā // Ragh_15.43 //
analyzed: rāma hastam anuprāpya kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataram gatā

original: śrutvā tasya śuco hetuṃ goptā jihrāya rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā tasya śucaḥ hetum goptā jihrāya rāghavaḥ

original: na hy akālabhavo mṛtyur ikṣvākupadam aspṛśat // Ragh_15.44 //
analyzed: na hi akāla bhavaḥ mṛtyuḥ ikṣvāku padam aspṛśat

original: sa muhūrtaṃ sahasveti dvijam āśvāsya duḥkhitam /
analyzed: sa muhūrtam sahasva iti dvijam āśvāsya duḥkhitam

original: yānaṃ sasmāra kauberaṃ vaivasvatajigīṣayā // Ragh_15.45 //
analyzed: yānam sasmāra kauberam vaivasvata jigīṣayā

original: āttaśastras tad adhyāsya pratisthaḥ sa raghūdvahaḥ /
analyzed: ātta śastraḥ tat adhyāsya pratisthaḥ sa raghūdvahaḥ

original: uccacāra puras tasya gūḍharūpā sarasvatī // Ragh_15.46 //
analyzed: uccacāra puras tasya gūḍha rūpā sarasvatī

original: rājan prajāsu te kaścid apacāraḥ pravartate /
analyzed: rājan prajāsu te kaścid apacāraḥ pravartate

original: tam anviṣya praśamayer bhavitāsi tataḥ kṛtī // Ragh_15.47 //
analyzed: tam anviṣya praśamayeḥ bhavitāsi tatas kṛtī

original: ity āptavacanād rāmo vineṣyan varṇavikriyām /
analyzed: iti āpta vacanāt rāmaḥ vineṣyan varṇa vikriyām

original: diśaḥ papāta pattreṇa veganiṣkampaketunā // Ragh_15.48 //
analyzed: diśaḥ papāta pattreṇa vega niṣkampa ketunā

original: atha dhūmābhitāmrākṣaṃ vṛkṣākhāvalambinam /
analyzed: atha dhūma abhitāmra akṣam vṛkṣa ākhā avalambinam

original: dadarśa kaṃcid aikśvākas tapasyantam adhomukham // Ragh_15.49 //
analyzed: dadarśa kaṃcid aikśvākaḥ tapasyantam adhomukham

original: pṛṣṭanāmānvayo rājñā sa kilācaṣṭa dhūmapaḥ /
analyzed: pṛṣṭa nāma anvayaḥ rājñā sa kila ācaṣṭa dhūmapaḥ

original: ātmānaṃ śambukaṃ nāma śūdraṃ surapadārthinam // Ragh_15.50 //
analyzed: ātmānam śambukam nāma śūdram sura padārthinam

original: tapasy anadhikāritvāt prajānāṃ tam aghāvaham /
analyzed: tapasi anadhikāri tvāt prajānām tam agha āvaham

original: śīrṣacchedyaṃ paricchidya niyantā śastram ādade // Ragh_15.51 //
analyzed: śīrṣa chedyam paricchidya niyantā śastram ādade

original: sa tadvaktraṃ himakliṣṭakiñjalkam iva paṅkajam /
analyzed: sa tad vaktram hima kliṣṭa kiñjalkam iva paṅkajam

original: jyotiṣkaṇāhataśmaśru kaṇṭhanālād apāharat // Ragh_15.52 //
analyzed: jyotiṣkaṇā hata śmaśru kaṇṭha nālāt apāharat

original: kṛtaṇḍaḥ svayam rājñā lebhe śūdraḥ satāṃ gatim /
analyzed: kṛtaṇḍaḥ svayam rājñā lebhe śūdraḥ satām gatim

original: tapasā duścareṇāpi na svamārgavilaṅghinā // Ragh_15.53 //
analyzed: tapasā duścareṇa api na sva mārga vilaṅghinā

original: raghunātho 'py agastyena mārgasaṃdarśitātmanā /
analyzed: raghunā atho pi agastyena mārga saṃdarśita ātmanā

original: mahaujasā saṃyuyuje śaratkāla ivendunā // Ragh_15.54 //
analyzed: mahā ojasā saṃyuyuje śarad kāle iva indunā

original: kumbhayonir alaṃkāraṃ tasmai divyaparigraham /
analyzed: kumbhayoniḥ alaṃkāram tasmai divya parigraham

original: dadau dattaṃ samudreṇa pītenevātmaniṣkrayam // Ragh_15.55 //
analyzed: dadau dattam samudreṇa pītena iva ātma niṣkrayam

original: taṃ dadhan maithilīkaṇṭhanirvyāpāreṇa bāhunā /
analyzed: tam dadhan maithilī kaṇṭha nirvyāpāreṇa bāhunā

original: paścān nivavṛte rāmaḥ prāk parāsur dvijātmajaḥ // Ragh_15.56 //
analyzed: paścāt nivavṛte rāmaḥ prāk parāsuḥ dvija ātmajaḥ

original: tasya pūrvoditāṃ nindāṃ dvijaḥ putrasamāgataḥ /
analyzed: tasya pūrva uditām nindām dvijaḥ putra samāgataḥ

original: stutyā nivartayām āsa trātur vaivasvatād api // Ragh_15.57 //
analyzed: stutyā nivartayām āsa trātuḥ vaivasvatāt api

original: tam adhvarāya muktāśvaṃ rakṣaḥkapinareśvarāḥ /
analyzed: tam adhvarāya mukta aśvam rakṣaḥ kapi nara īśvarāḥ

original: meghāḥ sasyam ivāmbhobhir abhyavarṣann upāyanaiḥ // Ragh_15.58 //
analyzed: meghāḥ sasyam iva ambhobhiḥ abhyavarṣan upāyanaiḥ

original: digbhyo nimantritāś cainam abhijagmur maharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: digbhyaḥ nimantritāḥ ca enam abhijagmuḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: na bhaumāny eva dhiṣṇyāni hitvā jyotirmayāny api // Ragh_15.59 //
analyzed: na bhaumāni eva dhiṣṇyāni hitvā jyotiḥ mayāni api

original: upaśalyaniviṣṭais taiś caturdvāramukhī babhau /
analyzed: upaśalya niviṣṭaiḥ taiḥ catur dvāra mukhī babhau

original: ayodhyā sṛṣṭalokeva sadyaḥ paitāmahī tanuḥ // Ragh_15.60 //
analyzed: ayodhyā sṛṣṭa lokā iva sadyas paitāmahī tanuḥ

original: ślāghyas tyāgo 'pi vaidehyāḥ patyuḥ prāgvaṃśavāsinaḥ /
analyzed: ślāghyaḥ vaidehyāḥ patyuḥ prāc vaṃśa vāsinaḥ

original: ananyahāneḥ tasyāsīt saiva jāyā hiraṇmayī // Ragh_15.61 //
analyzed: an anya hāneḥ tasya āsīt sā eva jāyā hiraṇmayī

original: vidher adhikasaṃbhāras tataḥ pravavṛte makhaḥ /
analyzed: vidheḥ adhika saṃbhāraḥ tatas pravavṛte makhaḥ

original: āsan yatra kriyāvighnā rākṣasā eva rakṣiṇaḥ // Ragh_15.62 //
analyzed: āsan yatra kriyā vighnāḥ rākṣasāḥ eva rakṣiṇaḥ

original: atha prācetasopajñaṃ rāmāyaṇam itas tataḥ /
analyzed: atha prācetasa upajñam rāmāyaṇam itas tatas

original: maithileyau kuśalavau jagatur gurucoditau // Ragh_15.63 //
analyzed: maithileyau kuśa lavau jagatuḥ guru coditau

original: vṛttaṃ rāmasya vālmīkeḥ kṛtis tau kiṃnarasvanau /
analyzed: vṛttam rāmasya vālmīkeḥ kṛtiḥ tau kiṃnara svanau

original: kiṃ tad yena mano hartum alaṃ syātāṃ na śṛṇvatām // Ragh_15.64 //
analyzed: kim tat yena manaḥ hartum alam syātām na śṛṇvatām

original: rūpe gīte ca mādhuryam tayos tajjñair niveditam /
analyzed: rūpe gīte ca mādhuryam tayoḥ tad jñaiḥ niveditam

original: dadarśa sānujo rāmaḥ śuśrāva ca kutūhalī // Ragh_15.65 //
analyzed: dadarśa sa anujaḥ rāmaḥ śuśrāva ca kutūhalī

original: tadgītaśravaṇaikāgrā saṃsad aśrumukhī babhau /
analyzed: tad gīta śravaṇa ekāgrā saṃsad aśru mukhī babhau

original: himanisyandinī prātar nivāgteva vanasthalī // Ragh_15.66 //
analyzed: hima nisyandinī prātar nivāgtā iva vana sthalī

original: vayoveṣavisaṃvādi rāmasya ca tayoś ca sā /
analyzed: vayaḥ veṣa visaṃvādi rāmasya ca tayoḥ ca sā

original: janatā prekṣya sādṛśyaṃ nākśikampaṃ vyatiṣṭhata // Ragh_15.67 //
analyzed: janatā prekṣya sādṛśyam nākśikampam vyatiṣṭhata

original: ubhayor na tathā lokaḥ prāvīṇyena visiṣmiye /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ na tathā lokaḥ prāvīṇyena visiṣmiye

original: nṛpateḥ prītidāneṣu vītaspṛhatayā yathā // Ragh_15.68 //
analyzed: nṛpateḥ prīti dāneṣu vīta spṛha tayā yathā

original: geye kena vinītau vāṃ kasya ceyaṃ kaveḥ kṛtiḥ /
analyzed: geye kena vinītau vām kasya ca iyam kaveḥ kṛtiḥ

original: iti rājñā svayaṃ pṛṣṭau tau vālmīkim aśaṃsatām // Ragh_15.69 //
analyzed: iti rājñā svayam pṛṣṭau tau vālmīkim aśaṃsatām

original: atha sāvarajo rāmaḥ prācetasam upeyivān /
analyzed: atha sa avarajaḥ rāmaḥ prācetasam upeyivān

original: urikrtyātmano dehaṃ rājyam asmai nyavedayat // Ragh_15.70 //
analyzed: urikrtyā ātmanaḥ deham rājyam asmai nyavedayat

original: sa tāv ākhyāya rāmāya maithileyau tad ātmajau /
analyzed: sa tau ākhyāya rāmāya maithileyau tad ātmajau

original: kaviḥ kāruṇiko vavre sītāyāḥ saṃparigraham // Ragh_15.71 //
analyzed: kaviḥ kāruṇikaḥ vavre sītāyāḥ saṃparigraham

original: tāta śuddhā samakṣaṃ naḥ snuṣā te jātavedasi /
analyzed: tāta śuddhā samakṣam naḥ snuṣā te jātavedasi

original: daurātmyād rakṣasas tāṃ tu nātratyāḥ śraddadhuḥ prajāḥ // Ragh_15.72 //
analyzed: daurātmyāt rakṣasaḥ tām tu na atratyāḥ śraddadhuḥ prajāḥ

original: tāḥ svacāritram uddiśya pratyāyayatu maithilī /
analyzed: tāḥ sva cāritram uddiśya pratyāyayatu maithilī

original: tataḥ putravatīm enāṃ pratipatsye tadājñayā // Ragh_15.73 //
analyzed: tatas putravatīm enām pratipatsye tad ājñayā

original: iti pratiśrute rājñā jānakīm āsramān muniḥ /
analyzed: iti pratiśrute rājñā jānakīm āsramāt muniḥ

original: śiṣyair ānāyayām āsa svasiddhiṃ niyamair iva // Ragh_15.74 //
analyzed: śiṣyaiḥ ānāyayām āsa sva siddhim niyamaiḥ iva

original: anyedyur atha kākutsthaḥ saṃnipātya puraukasaḥ /
analyzed: anyedyus atha kākutsthaḥ saṃnipātya puraukasaḥ

original: kavim āhvāyayām āsa prastutapratipattaye // Ragh_15.75 //
analyzed: kavim āhvāyayām āsa prastuta pratipattaye

original: svarasaṃskāravatyeva putrābhyāṃ saha sītayā /
analyzed: svara saṃskāravatyā iva putrābhyām saha sītayā

original: ṛcevodarciṣaṃ sūryaṃ rāmaṃ munir upasthitaḥ // Ragh_15.76 //
analyzed: ṛcā iva udarciṣam sūryam rāmam muniḥ upasthitaḥ

original: kāṣāyaparivītena svapadārpitacakṣuṣā /
analyzed: kāṣāya parivītena sva pada arpita cakṣuṣā

original: kavim āhvāyayām āsa śāntena vapuṣaiva sā // Ragh_15.77 //
analyzed: kavim āhvāyayām āsa śāntena vapuṣā eva sā

original: janās tadālokapathāt pratisaṃhṛtacakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: janāḥ tad āloka pathāt pratisaṃhṛta cakṣuṣaḥ

original: tasthus te 'vāṅmukhāḥ sarve phalitā iva sālayaḥ // Ragh_15.78 //
analyzed: tasthuḥ te vāṅmukhāḥ sarve phalitāḥ iva sa ālayaḥ

original: tāṃ dṛṣṭiviṣaye bhartur munir āsthitaviṣṭaraḥ /
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭi viṣaye bhartuḥ muniḥ āsthita viṣṭaraḥ

original: kuru niḥsaṃśayaṃ vatse svavṛtte lokam ity aśāt // Ragh_15.79 //
analyzed: kuru niḥsaṃśayam vatse sva vṛtte lokam iti aśāt

original: atha vālmīkśiṣyeṇa puṇyam āvarjitaṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: atha vālmīk śiṣyeṇa puṇyam āvarjitam payaḥ

original: ācamyodīrayām āsa sītā satyāṃ sarasvatīm // Ragh_15.80 //
analyzed: ācamya udīrayām āsa sītā satyām sarasvatīm

original: vāṅmanaḥkarmabhiḥ patyau vyabhicāro yathā na me /
analyzed: vāc manaḥ karmabhiḥ patyau vyabhicāraḥ yathā na me

original: tathā viśvaṃbhare devi mām antardhātum arhasi // Ragh_15.81 //
analyzed: tathā viśvaṃbhare devi mām antardhātum arhasi

original: evam ukte tayā sādhvyā randhrāt sadyobhavād bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: evam ukte tayā sādhvyā randhrāt sadyobhavāt bhuvaḥ

original: śātahradam iva jyotiḥ prabhāmaṇḍalam udyayau // Ragh_15.82 //
analyzed: śātahradam iva jyotiḥ prabhā maṇḍalam udyayau

original: tatra nāgaphaṇotkṣiptasiṃhāsananiṣeduṣī /
analyzed: tatra nāga phaṇa utkṣipta siṃhāsana niṣeduṣī

original: samudraraśanā sākṣāt prādurāsīd vasuṃdharā // Ragh_15.83 //
analyzed: samudraraśanā sākṣāt prādurāsīt vasuṃdharā

original: sā sītām aṅkam āropya bhartari prahitekṣaṇām /
analyzed: sā sītām aṅkam āropya bhartari prahita īkṣaṇām

original: mā meti vyāharaty eva tasmin pātālam abhyagāt // Ragh_15.84 //
analyzed: mā mā iti vyāharati eva tasmin pātālam abhyagāt

original: dharāyāṃ tasya saṃrambhaṃ sītāpratyarpaṇaiṣiṇaiḥ /
analyzed: dharāyām tasya saṃrambham sītā pratyarpaṇa eṣiṇaiḥ

original: gurur vidhibalāpekṣī śamayāṃ āsa dhanvinaḥ // Ragh_15.85 //
analyzed: guruḥ vidhi bala apekṣī śamayān āsa dhanvinaḥ

original: ṛṣīn visṛjya yajñānte suhṛdaś ca puraskṛtān /
analyzed: ṛṣīn visṛjya yajña ante suhṛdaḥ ca puraskṛtān

original: rāmaḥ sītāgataṃ snehaṃ nidadhe tadapatyayoḥ // Ragh_15.86 //
analyzed: rāmaḥ sītā gatam sneham nidadhe tad apatyayoḥ

original: yudhājitas tu saṃdeśāt sa deśa sindhunāmakam /
analyzed: yudhājitaḥ tu saṃdeśāt sa deśa sindhu nāmakam

original: dadau dattaprabhāvāya bharatāya dhṛtaprajaḥ // Ragh_15.87 //
analyzed: dadau datta prabhāvāya bharatāya dhṛta prajaḥ

original: bharatas tatra gandharvān yudhi nijitya kevalam /
analyzed: bharataḥ tatra gandharvān yudhi nijitya kevalam

original: ātodyaṃ grāhayām āsa samatyājayad āyudham // Ragh_15.88 //
analyzed: ātodyam grāhayām āsa samatyājayat āyudham

original: sa takṣapuṣkalau putrau rājadhānyos tadākhyayoḥ /
analyzed: sa takṣa puṣkalau putrau rājadhānyoḥ tad ākhyayoḥ

original: abhiṣicyābhiṣekārhau rāmāntikam agāt punaḥ // Ragh_15.89 //
analyzed: abhiṣicya abhiṣeka arhau rāma antikam agāt punar

original: aṅgadaṃ candraketuṃ ca lakṣmaṇo 'py ātmasaṃbhavau /
analyzed: aṅgadam candraketum ca lakṣmaṇaḥ pi ātmasaṃbhavau

original: śāsanād raghunāthasya cakre kārāpatheśāvarau // Ragh_15.90 //
analyzed: śāsanāt raghunāthasya cakre kārāpatha īśāvarau

original: ity āropitaputrās te jananīnāṃ janeśvarāḥ /
analyzed: iti āropita putrāḥ te jananīnām janeśvarāḥ

original: bhartṛlokaprapannānāṃ nivāpān vidadhuḥ kramāt // Ragh_15.91 //
analyzed: bhartṛ loka prapannānām nivāpān vidadhuḥ kramāt

original: upetya muniveṣo 'tha kālaḥ provāca rāghavam /
analyzed: upetya kālaḥ provāca rāghavam

original: rahaḥsaṃvādinau pāsyed āvāṃ yas taṃ tyajer iti // Ragh_15.92 //
analyzed: rahaḥ saṃvādinau pāsyet āvām yaḥ tam tyajeḥ iti

original: tatheti pratipannāya vivṛtātmā nṛpāya saḥ /
analyzed: tathā iti pratipannāya vivṛta ātmā nṛpāya saḥ

original: ācakhyau divam adhyāsva śāsanāt parameṣṭhinaḥ // Ragh_15.93 //
analyzed: ācakhyau divam adhyāsva śāsanāt parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: vidvān api tayor dvāḥstahaḥ samayaṃ lakṣmaṇo 'bhinat /
analyzed: vidvān api tayoḥ dvāḥsta haḥ samayam lakṣmaṇaḥ bhinat

original: bhīto durvāsasaḥ śāpād rāmasaṃdarśanārthinaḥ // Ragh_15.94 //
analyzed: bhītaḥ durvāsasaḥ śāpāt rāma saṃdarśana arthinaḥ

original: sa gatvā sarayūtīraṃ dehatyāgena yogavit /
analyzed: sa gatvā sarayū tīram dehatyāgena yoga vid

original: cakāra vitathāṃ bhrātuḥ pratijñāṃ pūrvajanmanaḥ // Ragh_15.95 //
analyzed: cakāra vitathām bhrātuḥ pratijñām pūrva janmanaḥ

original: tasminn ātmacaturbhāge prāṅ nākam adhitasthuṣi /
analyzed: tasmin ātma caturbhāge prāk nākam adhitasthuṣi

original: rāghavaḥ śithilaṃ tasthau bhuvi dharmas tripād iva // Ragh_15.96 //
analyzed: rāghavaḥ śithilam tasthau bhuvi dharmaḥ tripād iva

original: sa niveśya kuśāvatyāṃ ripunāgāṅkuṣaṃ kuśam /
analyzed: sa niveśya kuśāvatyām ripu nāga aṅkuṣam kuśam

original: śarāvatyāṃ satāṃ sūktair janitāśrulavaṃ lavam // Ragh_15.97 //
analyzed: śarāvatyām satām sūktaiḥ janita aśru lavam lavam

original: udak pratasthe sthiradhīḥ sānujo 'gnipuraḥsaraḥ /
analyzed: udak pratasthe sthira dhīḥ sa anujaḥ gni puraḥsaraḥ

original: anvitaḥ pativātsalyād gṛhavarjam ayodhyayā // Ragh_15.98 //
analyzed: anvitaḥ pati vātsalyāt gṛha varjam ayodhyayā

original: jagṛhus tasya cittajñāḥ padavīṃ harirākṣasāḥ /
analyzed: jagṛhuḥ tasya citta jñāḥ padavīm hari rākṣasāḥ

original: kadambamukulasthūlair abhivṛṣṭaṃ prajāśrubhiḥ // Ragh_15.99 //
analyzed: kadamba mukula sthūlaiḥ abhivṛṣṭam prajā aśrubhiḥ

original: upasthitavimānena tena bhaktānukampinā /
analyzed: upasthita vimānena tena bhakta anukampinā

original: cakre tridivaniḥṣreṇiḥ sarayūr anuyāyinām // Ragh_15.100 //
analyzed: cakre tridiva niḥṣreṇiḥ sarayūḥ anuyāyinām

original: yad gopratarakalpo 'bhut saṃmardas tatra majjatām /
analyzed: yat go pratara kalpaḥ bhuj saṃmardaḥ tatra majjatām

original: atas tadākhyayā tīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ bhuvi paprathe // Ragh_15.101 //
analyzed: atas tad ākhyayā tīrtham pāvanam bhuvi paprathe

original: sa vibhur vibudhāṃśeṣu pratipannātmamūrtiṣu /
analyzed: sa vibhuḥ vibudha aṃśeṣu pratipanna ātma mūrtiṣu

original: tridaśībhūtapaurāṇāṃ svargāntaram akalpayat // Ragh_15.102 //
analyzed: tridaśībhūta paurāṇām svarga antaram akalpayat

original: nirvartyaivaṃ daśamukhaśiraśchedakāryaṃ surāṇāṃ viṣvaksenaḥ svatanum aviśat sarvalokapratiṣṭhām /
analyzed: nirvartya evam daśamukha śiraḥ cheda kāryam surāṇām viṣvaksenaḥ sva tanum aviśat sarva loka pratiṣṭhām

original: laṅkānāthaṃ pavanatanayaṃ cobhayaṃ sthāpayitvā kīrtistambhadvayam iva girau dakṣiṇe cottare ca // Ragh_15.103 //
analyzed: laṅkā nātham pavanatanayam ca ubhayam sthāpayitvā kīrti stambha dvayam iva girau dakṣiṇe ca uttare ca

original: athetare sapta raghupravīrā jyeṣṭhaṃ purojanmatayā juṇaiś ca /
analyzed: athā itare sapta raghu pravīrāḥ jyeṣṭham purojanma tayā juṇaiḥ ca

original: cakruḥ kuśaṃ ratnaviśeṣabhājaṃ saubhrātram eṣāṃ hi kulānusāri // Ragh_16.1 //
analyzed: cakruḥ kuśam ratna viśeṣa bhājam saubhrātram eṣām hi kula anusāri

original: te setuvārttāgajabandhamukhyair abhyucchritāḥ karmabhir apy avandhyaiḥ /
analyzed: te setu vārttā gajabandha mukhyaiḥ abhyucchritāḥ karmabhiḥ api avandhyaiḥ

original: anyonyadeśapravibhāgasīmāṃ velāṃ samudrā iva na vyatīyuḥ // Ragh_16.2 //
analyzed: anyonya deśa pravibhāga sīmām velām samudrāḥ iva na vyatīyuḥ

original: caturbhujāṃśaprabhavaḥ sa teṣāṃ dānapravṛtter anupāratānām /
analyzed: caturbhuja aṃśa prabhavaḥ sa teṣām dāna pravṛtteḥ anupāratānām

original: suradvipānām iva sāmayonir bhinno 'ṣṭhadā viprasasāra vaṃśaḥ // Ragh_16.3 //
analyzed: sura dvipānām iva sāmayoniḥ bhinnaḥ u sthadāḥ viprasasāra vaṃśaḥ

original: athārdharātre stimitapradīpe śayyāgṛhe suptajane prabuddhaḥ /
analyzed: atha ardharātre stimita pradīpe śayyā gṛhe supta jane prabuddhaḥ

original: kuśaḥ pravāsasthakalatraveṣām adṛṣṭapūrvāṃ vanitām apaśyat // Ragh_16.4 //
analyzed: kuśaḥ pravāsa stha kalatra veṣām a dṛṣṭa pūrvām vanitām apaśyat

original: sā sādhusādhāraṇapārthivarddheḥ sthitvā purastāt puruhūtabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: sā sādhu sādhāraṇa pārthiva ṛddheḥ sthitvā purastāt puruhūta bhāsaḥ

original: jetuḥ pareṣāṃ jayaśabdapūrvaṃ tasyāñjaliṃ bandhumato babandha // Ragh_16.5 //
analyzed: jetuḥ pareṣām jaya śabda pūrvam tasya añjalim bandhumataḥ babandha

original: athānupoḍhārgalam apy agāraṃ chāyām ivādarśatalaṃ praviṣṭām /
analyzed: athā an upoḍha argalam api agāram chāyām iva ādarśa talam praviṣṭām

original: savismayo dāśarathes tanūjaḥ provāca pūrvārdhaviṣṛṭatalpaḥ // Ragh_16.6 //
analyzed: sa vismayaḥ dāśaratheḥ tanūjaḥ provāca pūrva ardha viṣṛṭa talpaḥ

original: labhdāntarā sāvaraṇe 'pi gehe yogaprabhāvo na ca lakṣyate te /
analyzed: sa āvaraṇe gehe yoga prabhāvaḥ na ca lakṣyate te

original: bibharṣi cākāram anirvṛtānāṃ mṛṇālinī haimam ivoparāgam // Ragh_16.7 //
analyzed: bibharṣi ca ākāram anirvṛtānām mṛṇālinī haimam iva uparāgam

original: kā tvaṃ śubhe kasya parigraho vā kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te /
analyzed: kā tvam śubhe kasya parigrahaḥ vā kim vā mad abhyāgama kāraṇam te

original: ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ parastrīvimukhapravṛtti // Ragh_16.8 //
analyzed: ācakṣva matvā vaśinām raghūṇām manaḥ para strī vimukha pravṛtti

original: tam abravīt sā guruṇā navadyā yā nītapaurā svapadonmukhena /
analyzed: tam abravīt sā guruṇā navadyā yā nīta paurā sva pada unmukhena

original: tasyāḥ puraḥ saṃprati vītanāthāṃ jānīhi rājann adhidevatāṃ mām // Ragh_16.9 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ puras saṃprati vīta nāthām jānīhi rājan adhidevatām mām

original: vasaukasārām abhibhūya sāhaṃ saurājyabaddhotsavayā vibhūtyā /
analyzed: vasaukasārām abhibhūya sā aham saurājya baddha utsavayā vibhūtyā

original: samagraśaktau tvayi sūryavaṃṣye sati prapannā karuṇām avasthām // Ragh_16.10 //
analyzed: samagra śaktau tvayi sūrya vaṃṣye sati prapannā karuṇām avasthām

original: viśīrṇatalpāṭṭaśato niveśaḥ paryastaśālaḥ prabhuṇā vinā me /
analyzed: viśīrṇa talpa aṭṭa śataḥ niveśaḥ paryasta śālaḥ prabhuṇā vinā me

original: viḍambayaty astanimagnasūryaṃ dināntam ugrānilabhinnamegham // Ragh_16.11 //
analyzed: viḍambayati asta nimagna sūryam dina antam ugra anila bhinna megham

original: niśāsu bhāsvatkalanūpurāṇāṃ yaḥ saṃcaro 'bhūd abhisārikāṇām /
analyzed: niśāsu bhāsvat kala nūpurāṇām yaḥ saṃcaraḥ bhūt abhisārikāṇām

original: nadanmukholkāvicitāmiṣābhiḥ sa vāhyate rājapathaḥ śivābhiḥ // Ragh_16.12 //
analyzed: nadat mukha ulkā vicita āmiṣābhiḥ sa vāhyate rāja pathaḥ śivābhiḥ

original: āsphālitaṃ yat pramadākarāgrair mṛdaṅgadhīradhvanim anvagacchat /
analyzed: āsphālitam yat pramadā kara agraiḥ mṛdaṅga dhīra dhvanim anvagacchat

original: vanyair idānīṃ mahiṣais tad ambhaḥ śṛṅgāhataṃ krośati dīrghikāṇām // Ragh_16.13 //
analyzed: vanyaiḥ idānīm mahiṣaiḥ tat ambhaḥ śṛṅga āhatam krośati dīrghikāṇām

original: citradvipāḥ padmavanāvatīrṇāḥ kareṇubhir dattamṛṇālabhaṅgāḥ /
analyzed: citra dvipāḥ padma vana avatīrṇāḥ kareṇubhiḥ datta mṛṇāla bhaṅgāḥ

original: nakhāṅkuśāghātavibhinnakumbhāḥ saṃrabdhasiṃhaprahṛtaṃ vahanti // Ragh_16.16 //
analyzed: nakha aṅkuśa āghāta vibhinna kumbhāḥ saṃrabdha siṃha prahṛtam vahanti

original: stambheṣu yoṣitpratiyātanānām utkrāntavarṇakramadhūsarāṇām /
analyzed: stambheṣu yoṣit pratiyātanānām utkrānta varṇa krama dhūsarāṇām

original: stanottarīyāṇi bhavanti saṅgān nirmokapaṭṭāḥ phaṇibhir vimuktāḥ // Ragh_16.17 //
analyzed: stana uttarīyāṇi bhavanti saṅgāt nirmoka paṭṭāḥ phaṇibhiḥ vimuktāḥ

original: kālāntaraśyāmasudheṣu naktam itas tato rūḍhatṛṇāṅkureṣu /
analyzed: kāla antara śyāma sudheṣu naktam itas tatas rūḍha tṛṇa aṅkureṣu

original: ta eva muktāguṇaśuddhayo 'pi harmyeṣu mūrchanti na candrapādāḥ // Ragh_16.18 //
analyzed: te eva mukta guṇa śuddhayaḥ harmyeṣu mūrchanti na candra pādāḥ

original: āvarjya śākhāḥ sadayaṃ ca yāsāṃ puṣpāṇy upāttāni vilāsinībhiḥ /
analyzed: āvarjya śākhāḥ sa dayam ca yāsām puṣpāṇi upāttāni vilāsinībhiḥ

original: vanyaiḥ pulindair iva vānarais tāḥ kliśyanta udyānalatā madīyāḥ // Ragh_16.19 //
analyzed: vanyaiḥ pulindaiḥ iva vānaraiḥ tāḥ kliśyante udyāna latāḥ madīyāḥ

original: rātrāv anāviṣkṛtadīpabhāsaḥ kāntāmukhaśrīviyutā divāpi /
analyzed: rātrau an āviṣkṛta dīpa bhāsaḥ kāntā mukha śrī viyutāḥ divā api

original: tiraskriyante kṛmitantujālair vicchinnadhūmaprasarā gavākṣāḥ // Ragh_16.20 //
analyzed: tiraskriyante kṛmi tantu jālaiḥ vicchinna dhūma prasarāḥ gavākṣāḥ

original: balikriyāvarjitasaikatāni snānīyasaṃsargam anāpanuvanti /
analyzed: bali kriyā varjita saikatāni snānīya saṃsargam an āpanuvanti

original: upāntavānīragṛhāṇi dṛṣṭvā śūnyāni dūye sarayūjalāni // Ragh_16.21 //
analyzed: upānta vānīra gṛhāṇi dṛṣṭvā śūnyāni sarayū jalāni

original: tad arhasīmāṃ vasatiṃ visṛjya mām abhyupaituṃ kularājadhānīm /
analyzed: tat arhasi imām vasatim visṛjya mām abhyupaitum kula rājadhānīm

original: hitvā tanuṃ kāraṇamānuṣīṃ tāṃ yathā gurus te paramātmamūrtim // Ragh_16.22 //
analyzed: hitvā tanum kāraṇa mānuṣīm tām yathā guruḥ te paramātma mūrtim

original: tatheti tasyāḥ praṇayaṃ pratītaḥ pratyagrahīt prāgraharo raghūṇām /
analyzed: tathā iti tasyāḥ praṇayam pratītaḥ pratyagrahīt prāgraharaḥ raghūṇām

original: pūr apy abhivyaktamukhaprasādā śarīrabandhena tirobabhūva // Ragh_16.23 //
analyzed: pūḥ api abhivyakta mukha prasādā śarīra bandhena tirobabhūva

original: tad adbhutaṃ saṃsadi rārtrivṛttaṃ prātar dvijebhyo nṛpatiḥ śaśaṃsa /
analyzed: tat adbhutam saṃsadi rārtri vṛttam prātar dvijebhyaḥ nṛpatiḥ śaśaṃsa

original: śrutvā ta enaṃ kularājadhānyā sākṣāt patitve vṛtam abhayanandan // Ragh_16.24 //
analyzed: śrutvā te enam kula rājadhānyā sākṣāt pati tve vṛtam abhayanandan

original: kuśāvatīṃ śrotriyasāt sa kṛtvā yātrānukūle 'hani sāvarodhaḥ /
analyzed: kuśāvatīm śrotriyasāt sa kṛtvā yātrā anukūle hani sa avarodhaḥ

original: anudruto vāyur ivābhravṛndaiḥ sainyair ayodhyābhimukhaḥ pratasthe // Ragh_16.25 //
analyzed: anudrutaḥ vāyuḥ iva abhra vṛndaiḥ sainyaiḥ ayodhyā abhimukhaḥ pratasthe

original: sā ketumālopavanā bṛhadbhir vihāraśailānugateva nāgaiḥ /
analyzed: sā ketumāla upavanā bṛhadbhiḥ vihāra śaila anugatā iva nāgaiḥ

original: senā rathodāragṛhā prayāṇe tasyābhavaj jaṅgamarājadhānī // Ragh_16.26 //
analyzed: senā ratha udāra gṛhā prayāṇe tasya abhavat jaṅgama rājadhānī

original: tenātapatrāmalamaṇḍalena prasthāpitaḥ pūrvanivāsabhūmim /
analyzed: tena ātapatra amala maṇḍalena prasthāpitaḥ pūrva nivāsa bhūmim

original: babhau balaughaḥ śaśinoditena velām udanvān iva nīyamānaḥ // Ragh_16.27 //
analyzed: babhau bala oghaḥ śaśinā uditena velām udanvān iva nīyamānaḥ

original: tasya prayātasya varūthinīnāṃ pīḍām aparyāptavatīva soḍhum /
analyzed: tasya prayātasya varūthinīnām pīḍām a paryāptavatī iva soḍhum

original: vasuṃdharā viṣṇupadaṃ dvitīyam adhyāruroheva rajaśchalena // Ragh_16.28 //
analyzed: vasuṃdharā viṣṇu padam dvitīyam adhyāruroha iva rajaḥ chalena

original: udyacchamānā gamanāya paścāt puro niveśe pathi ca vrajantī /
analyzed: udyacchamānā gamanāya paścāt puras niveśe pathi ca vrajantī

original: sā yatra senā dadṛṣe nṛpasya tatraiva sāmagryamatiṃ cakāra // Ragh_16.29 //
analyzed: sā yatra senā dadṛṣe nṛpasya tatra eva sāmagrya matim cakāra

original: tasya dvipānāṃ madavārisekāt khurābhighātāc ca turaṃgamāṇām /
analyzed: tasya dvipānām mada vāri sekāt khura abhighātāt ca turaṃgamāṇām

original: reṇuḥ prapede pathi paṅkabhāvaṃ paṅko 'pi reṇutvam iyāya netuḥ // Ragh_16.30 //
analyzed: reṇuḥ prapede pathi paṅka bhāvam paṅkaḥ u pi reṇu tvam iyāya netuḥ

original: mārgaiṣiṇī sā kaṭakāntareṣu vaindhyeṣu senā bahudhā vibhinnā /
analyzed: mārga eṣiṇī sā kaṭaka antareṣu vaindhyeṣu senā bahudhā vibhinnā

original: cakāra reveva mahāvirāvā baddhapratiśrunti guhāmukhāni // Ragh_16.31 //
analyzed: cakāra revā iva mahā virāvā baddha pratiśrunti guhā mukhāni

original: sa dhātubhedāruṇayānanemiḥ prabhuḥ prayāṇadhvanimiśratūryaḥ /
analyzed: sa dhātu bheda aruṇa yāna nemiḥ prabhuḥ prayāṇa dhvani miśra tūryaḥ

original: vyalaṅghayad vindhyam upāyanāni paśyan pulindair upapāditāni // Ragh_16.32 //
analyzed: vyalaṅghayat vindhyam upāyanāni paśyan pulindaiḥ upapāditāni

original: tīrthe tadīye gajasetubandhāt pratīpagām uttarato 'sya gaṅgām /
analyzed: tīrthe tadīye gaja setu bandhāt pratīpa gām uttaratas sya gaṅgām

original: ayatnavālagvyajanībabhūvur haṃsā nabholaṅghanalolakpakṣāḥ // Ragh_16.33 //
analyzed: ayatna vālagvya janībabhūvuḥ haṃsāḥ nabhaḥ laṅghana lolak pakṣāḥ

original: sa pūrvajānāṃ kapilena roṣād bhasmāvaśeṣīkṛtavigrahāṇām /
analyzed: sa pūrvajānām kapilena roṣāt bhasma avaśeṣīkṛta vigrahāṇām

original: surālayaprāptinimittam ambhas traisrotasaṃ naululitaṃ vavande // Ragh_16.34 //
analyzed: surālaya prāpti nimittam ambhaḥ traisrotasam nau lulitam vavande

original: ity adhvanaḥ kaiścid ahobhir ante kūlaṃ samāsādya kuśaḥ sarayvāḥ /
analyzed: iti adhvanaḥ kaiścid ahobhiḥ ante kūlam samāsādya kuśaḥ sarayvāḥ

original: vedipratiṣṭhān vitatādhvarāṇāṃ yūpān apaśyac chataśo raghūṇām // Ragh_16.35 //
analyzed: vedi pratiṣṭhān vitata adhvarāṇām yūpān apaśyat śataśas raghūṇām

original: ādhūya śākhāḥ kusumadrumāṇāṃ spṛṣṭvā ca śītān sarayūtaraṅgān /
analyzed: ādhūya śākhāḥ kusuma drumāṇām spṛṣṭvā ca śītān sarayū taraṅgān

original: taṃ klāntasainyaṃ kularājadhānyāḥ pratyujjagāmopavanāntavāyuḥ // Ragh_16.36 //
analyzed: tam klānta sainyam kula rājadhānyāḥ pratyujjagāma upavana anta vāyuḥ

original: athopaśalye ripumagnaśalyas tasyāḥ puraḥ paursakhaḥ sa rājā /
analyzed: atha upaśalye ripu magna śalyaḥ tasyāḥ puras paursakhaḥ sa rājā

original: kuladhvajas tāni caladhvajāni niveśayām āsa balī balāni // Ragh_16.37 //
analyzed: kula dhvajaḥ tāni cala dhvajāni niveśayām āsa balī balāni

original: tāṃ śilpisaṃghāḥ prabhuṇā niyuktās tathāgatāṃ saṃbhṛtasādhanatvāt /
analyzed: tām śilpi saṃghāḥ prabhuṇā niyuktāḥ tathāgatām saṃbhṛta sādhana tvāt

original: puraṃ navīcakrur apāṃ visargān meghā nidāghaglapitām ivorvīm // Ragh_16.38 //
analyzed: puram navīcakruḥ apām visargāt meghāḥ nidāgha glapitām iva urvīm

original: tataḥ saparyāṃ sapaśūpahārāṃ puraḥ parārdhyapratimāgṛhāyāḥ /
analyzed: tatas saparyām sa paśu upahārām puras parārdhya pratimā gṛhāyāḥ

original: upoṣitair vāstuvidhānavidbhir nirvartayām āsa raghupavīraḥ // Ragh_16.39 //
analyzed: upoṣitaiḥ vāstu vidhāna vidbhiḥ nirvartayām āsa raghu pavīraḥ

original: tasyāḥ sa rājopapadaṃ niśāntaṃ kāmīva kāntāhṛdayaṃ praviśya /
analyzed: tasyāḥ sa rāja upapadam niśā antam kāmī iva kāntā hṛdayam praviśya

original: yathārham anyair anujīvilokaṃ saṃbhāvayām āsa gṛhais tadīyaiḥ // Ragh_16.40 //
analyzed: yathārham anyaiḥ anujīvi lokam saṃbhāvayām āsa gṛhaiḥ tadīyaiḥ

original: sā mandurāsaṃśrayibhis turaṃgaiḥ śālāvidhistambhagataiś ca nāgaiḥ /
analyzed: sā mandurā saṃśrayibhiḥ turaṃgaiḥ śālā vidhi stambha gataiḥ ca nāgaiḥ

original: pūr ābabhāse vipaṇisthapaṇyā sarvāṅganaddhābharaṇeva nārī // Ragh_16.41 //
analyzed: pūḥ ābabhāse vipaṇi sthapaṇyā sarva aṅga naddha ābharaṇā iva nārī

original: vasan sa tasyāṃ vasatau raghūṇāṃ purāṇaśobhām adhiropitāyām /
analyzed: vasan sa tasyām vasatau raghūṇām purāṇaśobhām adhiropitāyām

original: na maithileyaḥ spṛhayāṃ babhūva bhartre divo nāpy alakeśvarāya // Ragh_16.42 //
analyzed: na maithileyaḥ babhūva bhartre divaḥ nā api alakeśvarāya

original: athāsya ratnagrathitottarīyam ekāntapāṇḍustanalambihāram /
analyzed: atha asya ratna grathita uttarīyam ekānta pāṇḍu stana lambi hāram

original: niḥśvāsahāryāṃśukam ājagāma gharmaḥ priyā veṣam ivopadeṣṭum // Ragh_16.43 //
analyzed: niḥśvāsa hārya aṃśukam ājagāma gharmaḥ priyāḥ veṣam iva upadeṣṭum

original: agastyacihnād ayanāt samīpaṃ dig uttarā bhāsvati saṃnivṛtte /
analyzed: agastya cihnāt ayanāt samīpam diś uttarā bhāsvati saṃnivṛtte

original: ānandaśītam iva bhāṣpavṛṣṭiṃ himasrutiṃ haimavatīṃ sasarja // Ragh_16.44 //
analyzed: ānanda śītam iva bhāṣpa vṛṣṭim hima srutim haimavatīm sasarja

original: pravṛddhatāpo divaso 'timātram atyartham eva kṣaṇadā ca tanvī /
analyzed: pravṛddha tāpaḥ timātram atyartham eva kṣaṇadā ca tanvī

original: ubhau virodhakriyayā vibhinnau jāyāpatī sānuśayāv ivāstām // Ragh_16.45 //
