analyzed: ubhau virodha kriyayā vibhinnau jāyā patī sa anuśayau iva āstām

original: dine dine śaivalavanty adhastāt sopānaparvāṇi vimuñcad ambhaḥ /
analyzed: dine dine śaivalavanti adhastāt sopāna parvāṇi vimuñcat ambhaḥ

original: uddaṇḍapadmaṃ gṛhadīrghikāṇāṃ nārīnitambadvayasaṃ babhūva // Ragh_16.46 //
analyzed: uddaṇḍa padmam gṛha dīrghikāṇām nārī nitamba dvayasam babhūva

original: vaneṣu sāyanatanamallikānāṃ vijṛmbhaṇodgandhiṣu kuḍ maleṣu /
analyzed: vaneṣu sāyanatanamallikānām vijṛmbhaṇa udgandhiṣu maleṣu

original: pratyekanikṣiptapadaḥ saśabdaṃ saṃkhyām ivaiṣāṃ bhramaraś cakāra // Ragh_16.47 //
analyzed: pratyeka nikṣipta padaḥ sa śabdam saṃkhyām iva eṣām bhramaraḥ cakāra

original: svedānuviddhārdranakhakṣatāṅke saṃdaṣṭabhūyiṣṭhaśikhaṃ kapole /
analyzed: sveda anuviddha ārdra nakha kṣata aṅke saṃdaṣṭa bhūyiṣṭha śikham kapole

original: cyutaṃ na karṇād api kāminīnāṃ śirīṣapuṣpaṃ sahasā papāta // Ragh_16.48 //
analyzed: cyutam na karṇāt api kāminīnām śirīṣa puṣpam sahasā papāta

original: yantrapravāhaiḥ śiśiraiḥ parītān rasena dhautān malayodbhavasya /
analyzed: yantra pravāhaiḥ śiśiraiḥ parītān rasena dhautān malaya udbhavasya

original: śilāviśeṣān adhiśayya ninyur dhārāgṛheṣv ātapam ṛddhimantaḥ // Ragh_16.49 //
analyzed: śilā viśeṣān adhiśayya ninyuḥ dhārāgṛheṣu ātapam ṛddhimantaḥ

original: snānārdramukteṣv anudhūpavāsaṃ vinyastasāyantanamallikeṣu /
analyzed: snāna ārdra mukteṣu anu dhūpa vāsam vinyasta sāyantana mallikeṣu

original: kāmo vasantātyayamandavīryaḥ keśeṣu lebhe balam aṅganānām // Ragh_16.50 //
analyzed: kāmaḥ vasanta atyaya manda vīryaḥ keśeṣu lebhe balam aṅganānām

original: āpiñjarā baddharajaḥkaṇatvān mañjary udārāśuśubhe 'rjunasya /
analyzed: āpiñjarā baddha rajaḥ kaṇa tvāt mañjarī udārā āśuśubhe rjunasya

original: dagdhvāpi dehaṃ giriśena roṣāt khaṇḍīkṛtā jyeva manobhvasya // Ragh_16.51 //
analyzed: dagdhvā api deham giriśena roṣāt khaṇḍīkṛtā jyā iva manobhvasya

original: manojñagandhaṃ sahakārabhaṅgaṃ purāṇasīdhuṃ navapāṭalaṃ ca /
analyzed: manojñagandham sahakārabhaṅgam purāṇa sīdhum navapāṭalam ca

original: saṃbadhnatā kāijaneṣu doṣāḥ sarve nidāghāvadhinā pramṛṣṭāḥ // Ragh_16.52 //
analyzed: saṃbadhnatā kāi janeṣu doṣāḥ sarve nidāgha avadhinā pramṛṣṭāḥ

original: janasya tasmin samaye vigāḍhe babhūvatur dvau saviśeṣakāntau /
analyzed: janasya tasmin samaye vigāḍhe babhūvatuḥ dvau sa viśeṣa kāntau

original: tāpāpanodakṣamapāda sa codayastho nṛpatiḥ śaśī ca // Ragh_16.53 //
analyzed: tāpa apanoda kṣamapāda sa ca udaya sthaḥ nṛpatiḥ śaśī ca

original: athormilolonmadarājahaṃse rodholatāpuṣpavahe sarayvāḥ /
analyzed: atha ūrmi lola unmada rājahaṃse rodhaḥ latā puṣpa vahe sarayvāḥ

original: vihartum icchā vanitāsakhasya tasyāmbhasi grīṣmasukhe babhūva // Ragh_16.54 //
analyzed: vihartum icchā vanitā sakhasya tasya ambhasi grīṣma sukhe babhūva

original: sa tīrabhūmau vihitopakāryām ānāyibhis tām apakṛṣṭanakrām /
analyzed: sa tīra bhūmau vihita upakāryām ānāyibhiḥ tām apakṛṣṭa nakrām

original: vigāhituṃ śrīmahimānurūpaṃ pracakrame cakradharaprabhāvaḥ // Ragh_16.55 //
analyzed: vigāhitum śrī mahima anurūpam pracakrame cakradhara prabhāvaḥ

original: sā tīrasopānapathāvatārād anyonyakeyūravighaṭṭinībhiḥ /
analyzed: sā tīra sopāna patha avatārāt anyonya keyūra vighaṭṭinībhiḥ

original: sanūpurakṣobhapadābhir āsīd udvignahaṃsā sarid aṅganābhiḥ // Ragh_16.56 //
analyzed: sa nūpura kṣobha padābhiḥ āsīt udvigna haṃsā sarit aṅganābhiḥ

original: parasparābhyukṣaṇatatparāṇāṃ tāsāṃ nṛpo majjanarāgadarśī /
analyzed: paraspara abhyukṣaṇa tatparāṇām tāsām nṛpaḥ majjana rāga darśī

original: nausaṃśrayaḥ pārśvagatāṃ kirātīm upāttavālavyajanāṃ babhāṣe // Ragh_16.57 //
analyzed: nau saṃśrayaḥ pārśva gatām kirātīm upātta vāla vyajanām babhāṣe

original: paśyāvarodhaiḥ śataśo madīyair vigāhyamāno galitāṅgarāgaiḥ /
analyzed: paśya avarodhaiḥ śataśas madīyaiḥ vigāhyamānaḥ galita aṅgarāgaiḥ

original: saṃdhyodayaḥ sābhra ivaiṣa varṇaṃ puṣyaty anekaṃ sarayūpravāhaḥ // Ragh_16.58 //
analyzed: saṃdhyā udayaḥ sa abhraḥ iva eṣa varṇam puṣyati anekam sarayū pravāhaḥ

original: viluptam antaḥpurasundarīṇāṃ yad añjanaṃ naululitābhir adbhiḥ /
analyzed: viluptam antaḥpura sundarīṇām yat añjanam nau lulitābhiḥ adbhiḥ

original: tad badhnatībhir madarāgaśobhāṃ vilocaneṣu pratimuktam āsām // Ragh_16.59 //
analyzed: tat badhnatībhiḥ mada rāga śobhām vilocaneṣu pratimuktam āsām

original: etā guruśroṇipayodharatvād ātmānam udvohuḍhum aśaknuvantyaḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ guru śroṇi payodhara tvāt ātmānam a śaknuvantyaḥ

original: gāḍhāṅgadair bāhubhir aspu bālāḥ kleśottaraṃ rāgavaśāt plavante // Ragh_16.60 //
analyzed: gāḍha aṅgadaiḥ bāhubhiḥ bālāḥ kleśa uttaram rāga vaśāt plavante

original: amī śirīṣaprasavāvataṃsāḥ prabhraṃśino vārivihāriṇīnām /
analyzed: amī śirīṣa prasava avataṃsāḥ prabhraṃśinaḥ vāri vihāriṇīnām

original: pāriplavāḥ srotasi nimnagāyāḥ śaivālalolāṃś chalayanti mīnān // Ragh_16.61 //
analyzed: pāriplavāḥ srotasi nimnagāyāḥ śaivāla lolān chalayanti mīnān

original: āsāṃ jalāsphālanatatparāṇāṃ muktāphalaspardhiṣu śīkareṣu /
analyzed: āsām jala āsphālana tatparāṇām muktāphala spardhiṣu śīkareṣu

original: payodharotsarpiṣu śīryamāṇāḥ saṃlakṣyate na cchiduro 'pi hāraḥ // Ragh_16.62 //
analyzed: payodhara utsarpiṣu śīryamāṇāḥ saṃlakṣyate na hāraḥ

original: āvartaśobhā natanābhikānter bhaṅgyo bhruvāṃ dvandvacarāḥstanānām /
analyzed: āvarta śobhāḥ nata nābhi kānteḥ bhaṅgyaḥ bhruvām dvandva carāḥ stanānām

original: jātāni rūpāvayavopamānāny adūravartīni vilāsinīnām // Ragh_16.63 //
analyzed: jātāni rūpa avayava upamānāni adūra vartīni vilāsinīnām

original: tīrasthalībarhibhir utkalāpaiḥ prasnigdhakekair abhinandyamānam /
analyzed: tīra sthalī barhibhiḥ utkalāpaiḥ prasnigdha kekaiḥ abhinandyamānam

original: śrotreṣu saṃmūrchati raktam āsāṃ gītānugaṃ vārimṛdaṅgavādyam // Ragh_16.64 //
analyzed: śrotreṣu saṃmūrchati raktam āsām gīta anugam vāri mṛdaṅga vādyam

original: saṃdaṣṭavastreṣv abalānitambeṣv induprakāśāntaritoḍukalpāḥ /
analyzed: saṃdaṣṭa vastreṣu abalā nitambeṣu indu prakāśa antarita uḍu kalpāḥ

original: amī jalāpūritasūtramārgā maunaṃ bhajante raśanākalāpāḥ // Ragh_16.65 //
analyzed: amī jala āpūrita sūtra mārgāḥ maunam bhajante raśanā kalāpāḥ

original: etāḥ karotpīḍitavāridhārā darpāt sakhībhir vadaneṣu siktāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ kara utpīḍita vāri dhārāḥ darpāt sakhībhiḥ vadaneṣu siktāḥ

original: vakretarāgrair alakais taruṇyaś cūrṇāruṇān vārilavān vamanti // Ragh_16.66 //
analyzed: vakretara agraiḥ alakaiḥ taruṇyaḥ cūrṇa aruṇān vāri lavān vamanti

original: udbaddhakeśaś cyutapattrarekho viśleṣimuktāphalapattraveṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: udbaddha keśaḥ cyuta pattra rekhaḥ viśleṣi muktāphala pattra veṣṭaḥ

original: manojña eva pramadāmukhānām ambhovihārākulito 'pi veṣaḥ // Ragh_16.67 //
analyzed: manojñaḥ eva pramadā mukhānām ambhaḥ vihāra ākulitaḥ pi veṣaḥ

original: sa nauvimānād avatīrya reme vilolahāraḥ saha tābhir apsu /
analyzed: sa nau vimānāt avatīrya reme vilola hāraḥ saha tābhiḥ apsu

original: skandhāvalagnoddhṛtapadminīkaḥ kareṇubhir vanya iva dvipendraḥ // Ragh_16.68 //
analyzed: skandha avalagna uddhṛta padminīkaḥ kareṇubhiḥ vanyaḥ iva dvipa indraḥ

original: tato nṛpenānugatāḥ striyas tā bhrājiṣṇunā sātiśayaṃ virejuḥ /
analyzed: tatas nṛpena anugatāḥ striyaḥ tāḥ bhrājiṣṇunā sa atiśayam virejuḥ

original: prāg eva muktā nayanābhirāmāḥ prāpyendranīlaṃ kim utonmayūkham // Ragh_16.69 //
analyzed: prāk eva muktāḥ nayana abhirāmāḥ prāpya indranīlam kim uta unmayūkham

original: varṇodakaiḥ kāñcanaśṛṅgamuktais tam āyatākṣyaḥ praṇayād asiñcan /
analyzed: varṇa udakaiḥ kāñcana śṛṅga muktaiḥ tam āyata akṣyaḥ praṇayāt asiñcan

original: tathāgataḥ so 'tirarāṃ babhāse sadhātunisyanda ivādrirājaḥ // Ragh_16.70 //
analyzed: tathāgataḥ saḥ tirarām babhāse sa dhātu nisyandaḥ iva adrirājaḥ

original: tenāvarodhapramadāsakhena vigāhanānena saridvarāṃ tām /
analyzed: tena avarodha pramadā sakhena vigāhanānena saridvarām tām

original: ākāśagaṅgāratir apsarobhir vṛto marutvān anuyātalīlaḥ // Ragh_16.71 //
analyzed: ākāśagaṅgā ratiḥ apsarobhiḥ vṛtaḥ marutvān anuyāta līlaḥ

original: yat kumbhayoner adigamya rāmaḥ kuśāya rājyena samaṃ dideśa /
analyzed: yat kumbhayoneḥ a digamya rāmaḥ kuśāya rājyena samam dideśa

original: tad asya jaitrābharaṇaṃ vihartur ajñātapātaṃ salile mamajja // Ragh_16.72 //
analyzed: tat asya jaitra ābharaṇam vihartuḥ ajñāta pātam salile mamajja

original: snātvā yathākāmam asau sadāras tīropakāryāṃ gatamātra eva /
analyzed: snātvā yathākāmam asau sa dāraḥ tīropakāryām gata mātraḥ eva

original: divyena śūnyaṃ valayena bāhum upoḍhanepathyavidhir dadarśa // Ragh_16.73 //
analyzed: divyena śūnyam valayena bāhum upoḍha nepathya vidhiḥ dadarśa

original: jayaśriyaḥ saṃvananaṃ yatas tad āmuktapūrvaṃ guruṇā ca yasmāt /
analyzed: jaya śriyaḥ saṃvananam yatas tat āmukta pūrvam guruṇā ca yasmāt

original: sehe 'sya na bhraṃśam ato na lobhāt sa tulyapuṣpābharaṇo hi dhīraḥ // Ragh_16.74 //
analyzed: sehe sya na bhraṃśam atas na lobhāt sa tulya puṣpa ābharaṇaḥ hi dhīraḥ

original: tataḥ samājñāpayad āśu sarvān ānāyinas tadvicaye nadīṣṇān /
analyzed: tatas samājñāpayat āśu sarvān ānāyinaḥ tad vicaye nadīṣṇān

original: vandhyaśramās te sarayūṃ vigāhya tam ūcur āmlānamukhaprasādāḥ // Ragh_16.75 //
analyzed: vandhya śramāḥ te sarayūm vigāhya tam ūcuḥ ā mlāna mukha prasādāḥ

original: kṛtaḥ prayatno na ca deva labdhaṃ magnaṃ payasy ābharaṇottamaṃ te /
analyzed: kṛtaḥ prayatnaḥ na ca deva labdham magnam payasi ābharaṇa uttamam te

original: nāgena laulyāt kumudena nūnam upāttam antarhradavāsinā tat // Ragh_16.76 //
analyzed: nāgena laulyāt kumudena nūnam upāttam antar hrada vāsinā tat

original: tataḥ sa kṛtvā dhanur ātatajyaṃ dhanurdharaḥ kopavilohitākṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa kṛtvā dhanuḥ ātata ajyam dhanurdharaḥ kopa vilohita akṣaḥ

original: gārutmataṃ tīragatas tarasvī bhujaṃganāśāya samādade 'stram // Ragh_16.77 //
analyzed: gārutmatam tīra gataḥ tarasvī bhujaṃga nāśāya samādade stram

original: tasmin hradaḥ saṃhitamātra eva kṣobhāt samāviddhataraṅgahastaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin hradaḥ saṃhita mātraḥ eva kṣobhāt samāviddha taraṅga hastaḥ

original: rodhāṃsy abhighnann avapātamagnaḥ karīva vanyaḥ paruṣaṃ rarāsa // Ragh_16.78 //
analyzed: rodhāṃsi abhighnan avapāta magnaḥ karī iva vanyaḥ paruṣam rarāsa

original: tasmāt samudrād iva mathyamānād udvṛttanakrāt sahasonmamajja /
analyzed: tasmāt samudrāt iva mathyamānāt udvṛtta nakrāt sahasā unmamajja

original: lakṣmyeva sārdhaṃ surarājavṛkṣaḥ kanyāṃ puraskṛtya bhujaṃgarājaḥ // Ragh_16.79 //
analyzed: lakṣmyā iva sārdham surarāja vṛkṣaḥ kanyām puraskṛtya bhujaṃga rājaḥ

original: vibhūṣaṇapratyupahārahastam upasthitaṃ vīkṣya viśāṃpatis tam /
analyzed: vibhūṣaṇa pratyupahāra hastam upasthitam vīkṣya viśām patiḥ tam

original: sauparṇam astraṃ pratisaṃjahāra praheṣv anirbandharuṣo hi santaḥ // Ragh_16.80 //
analyzed: sauparṇam astram pratisaṃjahāra praheṣu a nirbandha ruṣaḥ hi santaḥ

original: trailokyanāthaprabhavaṃ prabhāvāt kuśaṃ dviṣām aṅkuśam astravidvān /
analyzed: trailokya nātha prabhavam prabhāvāt kuśam dviṣām aṅkuśam astra vidvān

original: mānonantenāpy abhivandya mūrdhnā mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ kumudo babhāṣe // Ragh_16.81 //
analyzed: mānonantena api abhivandya mūrdhnā mūrdha abhiṣiktam kumudaḥ babhāṣe

original: avaimi kāryāntaramānuṣasya viṣṇoḥ sutākhyām aparāṃ tanuṃ tvām /
analyzed: avaimi kārya antara mānuṣasya viṣṇoḥ suta ākhyām aparām tanum tvām

original: so 'haṃ kathaṃ nāma tavācareyam ārādhanīyasya dhṛter vibhātam // Ragh_16.82 //
analyzed: saḥ u ham katham nāma tava ācareyam ārādhanīyasya dhṛteḥ vibhātam

original: karābhighātotthitakandukeyam ālokya bālātikutūhalena /
analyzed: kara abhighāta utthita kandukā iyam ālokya bālā ati kutūhalena

original: javāt pataj jyotir ivāntarikṣād ādatta jatrābharaṇaṃ tvadīyam // Ragh_16.83 //
analyzed: javāt patat jyotiḥ iva antarikṣāt ādatta jatra ābharaṇam tvadīyam

original: tad etad ājānuvilambinā te jyāghātarekhākiṇa lāñchanena /
analyzed: tat etat ājānu vilambinā te jyā ghāta rekhā kiṇa lāñchanena

original: bhujena rakṣāparigheṇa bhūmer upaitu yogaṃ punar aṃsalena // Ragh_16.84 //
analyzed: bhujena rakṣā parigheṇa bhūmeḥ upaitu yogam punar aṃsalena

original: imāṃ svasāraṃ ca yavīyasīṃ me kumudvatīṃ nārhasi nānumantum /
analyzed: imām svasāram ca yavīyasīm me kumudvatīm na arhasi na anumantum

original: ātmāparādhaṃ nudatīṃ cirāya śuśrūṣayā pārthiva pādayos te // Ragh_16.85 //
analyzed: ātma aparādham nudatīm cirāya śuśrūṣayā pārthiva pādayoḥ te

original: ity ūcivān upahṛtābharaṇaḥ kṣitīśaṃ ślāghyo bhavān svajana ity anubhāṣitāram /
analyzed: iti ūcivān upahṛta ābharaṇaḥ kṣitīśam ślāghyaḥ bhavān sva janaḥ iti anubhāṣitāram

original: saṃyojayāṃ vidhivad āsa sametabandhuḥ kanyāmayena kumudaḥ kulabhūṣaṇena // Ragh_16.86 //
analyzed: vidhivat āsa sameta bandhuḥ kanyā mayena kumudaḥ kula bhūṣaṇena

original: tasyāḥ spṛṣṭe manujapatinā sāhacaryāya haste māṅgalyorṇāvalayini puraḥ pāvakasyocchikhasya /
analyzed: tasyāḥ spṛṣṭe manuja patinā sāhacaryāya haste māṅgalya ūrṇā valayini puras pāvakasya ucchikhasya

original: divyas tūryadhvanir udacarad vyaśnuvāno digantān gandhodagraṃ tadanau vavṛṣuḥ puṣpam āścaryameghāḥ // Ragh_16.87 //
analyzed: divyaḥ tūrya dhvaniḥ udacarat vyaśnuvānaḥ diś antān gandha udagram tad anau vavṛṣuḥ puṣpam āścarya meghāḥ

original: itthaṃ nāgas tribhuvanaguror aurasaṃ maithileyaṃ labdhvā bandhuṃ tam api ca kuśaḥ pañcamaṃ takṣakasya /
analyzed: ittham nāgaḥ tribhuvana guroḥ aurasam maithileyam labdhvā bandhum tam api ca kuśaḥ pañcamam takṣakasya

original: ekaḥ śaṅkāṃ pitṛvadharipor atyajad vainateyāc chāntavyālām avanim aparaḥ paurakāntaḥ śaśāsa // Ragh_16.88 //
analyzed: ekaḥ śaṅkām pitṛ vadha ripoḥ atyajat vainateyāt śānta vyālām avanim aparaḥ paura kāntaḥ śaśāsa

original: aithiṃ nāma kākutsthāt putraṃ āpakumudvatī /
analyzed: aithim nāma kākutsthāt putram āpa kumudvatī

original: paścimād yāminīyāmāt prasādam iva cetanā // Ragh_17.1 //
analyzed: paścimāt yāminī yāmāt prasādam iva cetanā

original: sa pituḥ pitṛmān vaṃśaṃ putraṃ āpakumudvatī /
analyzed: sa pituḥ pitṛmān vaṃśam putram āpa kumudvatī

original: apunāt savitevobhau mārgāv uttaradakṣiṇau // Ragh_17.2 //
analyzed: apunāt savitā iva ubhau mārgau uttara dakṣiṇau

original: tam ādau kulavidyānām artham arthavidāṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: tam ādau kula vidyānām artham artha vidām varaḥ

original: paścāt pārthivakanyānāṃ pāṇim agrāhayat pitā // Ragh_17.3 //
analyzed: paścāt pārthiva kanyānām pāṇim agrāhayat pitā

original: jātyas tenābhijātena śūraḥ śauryavatā kuśaḥ /
analyzed: jātyaḥ tena abhijātena śūraḥ śauryavatā kuśaḥ

original: amanyataikam ātmānam anekaṃ vaśinā vaśī // Ragh_17.4 //
analyzed: amanyata ekam ātmānam anekam vaśinā vaśī

original: sa kulocitam indrasya sāhāyakam upeyivān /
analyzed: sa kula ucitam indrasya sāhāyakam upeyivān

original: jaghāna samare daityaṃ durjayaṃ tena so 'vadhi // Ragh_17.5 //
analyzed: jaghāna samare daityam durjayam tena saḥ vadhi

original: taṃ svasā nāgarājasya kumudasya kumudvatī /
analyzed: tam svasā nāga rājasya kumudasya kumudvatī

original: anvagāt kumudānandaṃ śaśāṅkam iva kaumudī // Ragh_17.6 //
analyzed: anvagāt kumuda ānandam śaśāṅkam iva kaumudī

original: tayor divaspater āsīd ekaḥ siṃhāsanārdhabāk /
analyzed: tayoḥ divaspateḥ āsīt ekaḥ siṃhāsana ardha bāc

original: dvitīyāpi sakhī śacyāḥ pārijātāṃśabhāginī // Ragh_17.7 //
analyzed: dvitīyā api sakhī śacyāḥ pārijāta aṃśa bhāginī

original: tadātmasaṃbhavaṃ rājye mantrivṛddāḥ samādadhuḥ /
analyzed: tad ātmasaṃbhavam rājye mantri vṛddāḥ samādadhuḥ

original: smarantaḥ paścimām ājñāṃ bhartuḥ saṃgrāmayāyinaḥ // Ragh_17.8 //
analyzed: smarantaḥ paścimām ājñām bhartuḥ saṃgrāma yāyinaḥ

original: te tasya kalpayām āsur abhiṣekāya śilpibhiḥ /
analyzed: te tasya kalpayām āsuḥ abhiṣekāya śilpibhiḥ

original: vimānaṃ navam udvedi catuḥstambhapratiṣṭam // Ragh_17.9 //
analyzed: vimānam navam udvedi catur stambha pratiṣṭam

original: tatrainaṃ hemakumbheṣu saṃbhṛtais tīrthavāribhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra enam hema kumbheṣu saṃbhṛtaiḥ tīrtha vāribhiḥ

original: upatasthuḥ prakṛtayo bhadrapīṭhopaveśitam // Ragh_17.10 //
analyzed: upatasthuḥ prakṛtayaḥ bhadra pīṭha upaveśitam

original: nadadhbiḥ snigdhagambhīraṃ tūryair āhatapuṣkaraiḥ /
analyzed: nadadhbiḥ snigdha gambhīram tūryaiḥ āhata puṣkaraiḥ

original: anvamīyata kalyāṇaṃ tasyāvicchinnasaṃtati // Ragh_17.11 //
analyzed: anvamīyata kalyāṇam tasya avicchinna saṃtati

original: dūrvāyavāṅkuraplakṣatvagabhinnapuṭottarān /
analyzed: dūrvā yava aṅkura plakṣa tvac abhinna puṭa uttarān

original: jñātivṛddhaiḥ prayuktān sa bheje nīrājanāvidhīn // Ragh_17.12 //
analyzed: jñāti vṛddhaiḥ prayuktān sa bheje nīrājanā vidhīn

original: purohitapurogās taṃ jiṣṇuṃ jaitrair atharvabhiḥ /
analyzed: purohita purogāḥ tam jiṣṇum jaitraiḥ atharvabhiḥ

original: upacakramire pūrvam abhiṣektuṃ dvijātayaḥ // Ragh_17.13 //
analyzed: upacakramire pūrvam abhiṣektum dvijātayaḥ

original: tasyaughamahatī mūrdhni nipatantī vyarocata /
analyzed: tasya ogha mahatī mūrdhni nipatantī vyarocata

original: saśabdam abhiṣekaśrīr gaṅgeva tripuradviṣaḥ // Ragh_17.14 //
analyzed: sa śabdam abhiṣeka śrīḥ gaṅgā iva tripuradviṣaḥ

original: stūyamānaḥ kṣaṇe tasminn alakṣyata sa bandibhiḥ /
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ kṣaṇe tasmin alakṣyata sa bandibhiḥ

original: pravṛddha iva prajanyaḥ cātakair abhinanditaḥ // Ragh_17.15 //
analyzed: pravṛddhaḥ iva prajanyaḥ cātakaiḥ abhinanditaḥ

original: tasya san mantrapūtābhiḥ snānam adbhiḥ pratīcchataḥ /
analyzed: tasya sat mantra pūtābhiḥ snānam adbhiḥ pratīcchataḥ

original: vavṛdhe vaidyutasyāgner vṛṣṭisekād iva dyutiḥ // Ragh_17.16 //
analyzed: vavṛdhe vaidyutasya agneḥ vṛṣṭi sekāt iva dyutiḥ

original: sa tāvad abhiṣekānte snātakebhyo dadau vasu /
analyzed: sa tāvat abhiṣeka ante snātakebhyaḥ dadau vasu

original: yāvat teṣāṃ samāpyeran yajñāḥ paryāptadakṣiṇāḥ // Ragh_17.17 //
analyzed: yāvat teṣām samāpyeran yajñāḥ paryāpta dakṣiṇāḥ

original: te prītamanasas tasmai yām āśiṣam udīrayan /
analyzed: te prīta manasaḥ tasmai yām āśiṣam udīrayan

original: sā tasya karmanirvṛttair dūraṃ paścātkṛtā phalaiḥ // Ragh_17.18 //
analyzed: sā tasya karma nirvṛttaiḥ dūram paścātkṛtā phalaiḥ

original: bandhacchedaṃ sa baddhānāṃ vadhārhāṇām avadhyatām /
analyzed: bandha chedam sa baddhānām vadha arhāṇām avadhya tām

original: dhuryāṇāṃ ca dhuro mokṣam adohaṃ cādiṣad gavām // Ragh_17.19 //
analyzed: dhuryāṇām ca dhuraḥ mokṣam adoham ca ādiṣat gavām

original: krīḍāpatatriṇo 'py asya pañjarasthāḥ śukādayaḥ /
analyzed: krīḍā patatriṇaḥ pi asya pañjara sthāḥ śuka ādayaḥ

original: labdhamokṣās tadādeśād yatheṣṭagatayo 'bhavan // Ragh_17.20 //
analyzed: labdha mokṣāḥ tad ādeśāt yathā iṣṭa gatayaḥ bhavan

original: tataḥ kakṣāntaranyastaṃ gajadantāsanaṃ śuci /
analyzed: tatas kakṣa antara nyastam gaja dantāsanam śuci

original: sottaracchadam adhyāsta nepathyagrahaṇāya saḥ // Ragh_17.21 //
analyzed: sa uttaracchadam adhyāsta nepathya grahaṇāya saḥ

original: taṃ dhūpāśyānakeśāntaṃ toyanirṇiktapāṇayaḥ /
analyzed: tam dhūpa āśyāna keśāntam toya nirṇikta pāṇayaḥ

original: ākalpasādhanais tais tair upaseduḥ prasādhakāḥ // Ragh_17.22 //
analyzed: ākalpa sādhanaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ upaseduḥ prasādhakāḥ

original: te' sya muktāguṇonnaddhaṃ maulim antargatasrajam /
analyzed: te sya muktā guṇa unnaddham maulim antargata srajam

original: pratyūpuḥ padmarāgeṇa prabhāmaṇḍalaśobhinā // Ragh_17.23 //
analyzed: pratyūpuḥ padmarāgeṇa prabhā maṇḍala śobhinā

original: candanenāṅgarāgaṃ ca mṛganābhisugandhinā /
analyzed: candanena aṅgarāgam ca mṛganābhi sugandhinā

original: samāpayya tataś cakruḥ pattraṃ vinyastarocanam // Ragh_17.24 //
analyzed: samāpayya tatas cakruḥ pattram vinyasta rocanam

original: āmuktābharaṇaḥ sragvī haṃsacihnadukūlavān /
analyzed: āmukta ābharaṇaḥ sragvī haṃsa cihna dukūlavān

original: āsīd atiśayaprekṣyaḥ sa rājyaśrīvadhūvaraḥ // Ragh_17.25 //
analyzed: āsīt atiśaya prekṣyaḥ sa rājya śrī vadhū varaḥ

original: nepathyadarśinaś chāyā tasyādarśe hiraṇmaye /
analyzed: nepathya darśinaḥ chāyā tasya ādarśe hiraṇmaye

original: virarājodite sūrye merau kalpataror iva // Ragh_17.26 //
analyzed: virarāja udite sūrye merau kalpataroḥ iva

original: sa rājakakudavyagrapāṇibhiḥ pārśvavaribhiḥ /
analyzed: sa rāja kakud avyagra pāṇibhiḥ pārśva varibhiḥ

original: yayāv udīritālokaḥ sudharmānavamāṃ sabhām // Ragh_17.27 //
analyzed: yayau udīrita ālokaḥ sudharmā anavamām sabhām

original: vitānasahitaṃ tatra bheje paitṛkam āsanam /
analyzed: vitāna sahitam tatra bheje paitṛkam āsanam

original: cūḍāmaṇibhir udghṛṣṭapādapīṭhaṃ mahīkṣitām // Ragh_17.28 //
analyzed: cūḍāmaṇibhiḥ udghṛṣṭa pāda pīṭham mahīkṣitām

original: śuśubhe tena cākrāntaṃ maṅgalāyatanaṃ mahat /
analyzed: śuśubhe tena ca ākrāntam maṅgala āyatanam mahat

original: śrīvatsalakṣaṇaṃ vakṣaḥ kaustubheneva kaiśavam // Ragh_17.29 //
analyzed: śrīvatsa lakṣaṇam vakṣaḥ kaustubhena iva kaiśavam

original: babhau bhūyaḥ kumāratvād ādhirājyam avāpya saḥ /
analyzed: babhau bhūyas kumāra tvāt ādhirājyam avāpya saḥ

original: rekhā bhāvād upārūḍhaḥ sāmagryam iva candramāḥ // Ragh_17.30 //
analyzed: rekhā bhāvāt upārūḍhaḥ sāmagryam iva candramāḥ

original: prasannamukharāgaṃ taṃ smitapūrvābhibhāṣiṇam /
analyzed: prasanna mukha rāgam tam smita pūrva abhibhāṣiṇam

original: mūrtimantam amanyanta viśvāsam anujīvinaḥ // Ragh_17.31 //
analyzed: mūrtimantam amanyanta viśvāsam anujīvinaḥ

original: sa puraṃ puruhūtaśrīḥ kalpadrumanibhadhvajām /
analyzed: sa puram puruhūta śrīḥ kalpadruma nibha dhvajām

original: kramamāṇaś cakāra dyāṃ nāgenairāvataujasā // Ragh_17.32 //
analyzed: kramamāṇaḥ cakāra dyām nāgena airāvata ojasā

original: tasyaikasyocchritaṃ chattraṃ mūrdhni tenāmalatviṣā /
analyzed: tasya ekasya ucchritam chattram mūrdhni tena amala tviṣā

original: pūrvarājaviyogauṣmyaṃ kṛtsnasya jagato hṛtam // Ragh_17.33 //
analyzed: pūrva rāja viyoga auṣmyam kṛtsnasya jagataḥ hṛtam

original: dhūmād agneḥ śikhāḥ paścād udayād aṃśavo raveḥ /
analyzed: dhūmāt agneḥ śikhāḥ paścāt udayāt aṃśavaḥ raveḥ

original: so 'tītya tejasāṃ vṛttiṃ samam evotthito guṇaiḥ // Ragh_17.34 //
analyzed: saḥ tītya tejasām vṛttim samam eva utthitaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: taṃ prītiviśadair netrair anvayuḥ paurayoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: tam prīti viśadaiḥ netraiḥ anvayuḥ paura yoṣitaḥ

original: śaratprasannair jyotirbhir vibhāvarya iva dhruvam // Ragh_17.35 //
analyzed: śarad prasannaiḥ jyotirbhiḥ vibhāvaryaḥ iva dhruvam

original: ayodhyādevatāś cainaṃ praśastāyatanārcitāḥ /
analyzed: ayodhyā devatāḥ ca enam praśasta āyatana arcitāḥ

original: anudadhyur anudhyeyaṃ sāṃnidhyaiḥ pratimāgataiḥ // Ragh_17.36 //
analyzed: anudadhyuḥ anudhyeyam sāṃnidhyaiḥ pratimā gataiḥ

original: yāvan nāśyāyate vedir abhiṣekajalāplutā /
analyzed: yāvat na āśyāyate vediḥ abhiṣeka jala āplutā

original: tāvad evāsya velāntaṃ pratāpaḥ prāpa duḥsahaḥ // Ragh_17.37 //
analyzed: tāvat eva asya velā antam pratāpaḥ prāpa duḥsahaḥ

original: vasiṣṭhasya guror mantrāḥ sāyakās tasya dhanvinaḥ /
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya guroḥ mantrāḥ sāyakāḥ tasya dhanvinaḥ

original: kiṃ tat sādhyaṃ yad ubhaye sādhayeyur na saṃgatāḥ // Ragh_17.38 //
analyzed: kim tat sādhyam yat ubhaye sādhayeyuḥ na saṃgatāḥ

original: sa dharmasthasakhaḥ śaśvad arthipratyarthināṃ svayam /
analyzed: sa dharma stha sakhaḥ śaśvat arthi pratyarthinām svayam

original: dadarśa saṃśayacchedyān vyavahārān atandritaḥ // Ragh_17.39 //
analyzed: dadarśa saṃśaya chedyān vyavahārān atandritaḥ

original: tataḥ param abhivyaktāsaumanasyaniveditaiḥ /
analyzed: tatas param abhivyakta asaumanasya niveditaiḥ

original: yuyoja pākābhimukhair bhṛtyān vijñāpanāphalaiḥ // Ragh_17.40 //
analyzed: yuyoja pāka abhimukhaiḥ bhṛtyān vijñāpanā phalaiḥ

original: prajās tadguruṇā nadyo nabhaseva vivardhitāḥ /
analyzed: prajāḥ tad guruṇā nadyaḥ nabhasā iva vivardhitāḥ

original: tasmiṃs tu bhūyasīṃ vṛddhiṃ nabhasye tā ivāyayuḥ // Ragh_17.41 //
analyzed: tasmin tu bhūyasīm vṛddhim nabhasye tāḥ iva āyayuḥ

original: yad uvāca na tan mithyā yad dadau na jahāra tat /
analyzed: yat uvāca na tat mithyā yat dadau na jahāra tat

original: so 'bhūd bhagnavrataḥ śatrūn uddhṛtya pratiropayan // Ragh_17.42 //
analyzed: saḥ bhūt bhagna vrataḥ śatrūn uddhṛtya pratiropayan

original: vayorūpavibhūtīnām ekaikaṃ madakāraṇam /
analyzed: vayaḥ rūpa vibhūtīnām ekaikam mada kāraṇam

original: tāni tasmin samastāni na tasyotsiṣice manaḥ // Ragh_17.43 //
analyzed: tāni tasmin samastāni na tasya utsiṣice manaḥ

original: itthaṃ janitarāgāsu prakṛtiṣv anuvāsaram /
analyzed: ittham janita rāgāsu prakṛtiṣu anuvāsaram

original: akṣobhyaḥ sa navo 'py āsīd dṛḍhamūla iva drumaḥ // Ragh_17.44 //
analyzed: akṣobhyaḥ sa navaḥ pi āsīt dṛḍha mūlaḥ iva drumaḥ

original: anityāḥ śatravo bāhyā viprakṛṣṭāś ca te yataḥ /
analyzed: anityāḥ śatravaḥ bāhyāḥ viprakṛṣṭāḥ ca te yatas

original: ataḥ so 'bhyantarān nityān ṣaṭ pūrvam ajayad ripūn // Ragh_17.45 //
analyzed: atas saḥ bhyantarān nityān ṣaṭ pūrvam ajayat ripūn

original: prasādābhimukhe tasmiṃś capalāpi svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: prasāda abhimukhe tasmin capalā api svabhāvataḥ

original: nikaṣe hemarekheva śrīr āsīd anapāyinī // Ragh_17.46 //
analyzed: nikaṣe hema rekhā iva śrīḥ āsīt anapāyinī

original: kātaryaṃ kevalā nītiḥ śauryaṃ śvāpadaceṣṭitam /
analyzed: kātaryam kevalā nītiḥ śauryam śvāpada ceṣṭitam

original: ataḥ siddhiṃ sametābhyām ubhābhyām anviyeṣa saḥ // Ragh_17.47 //
analyzed: atas siddhim sametābhyām ubhābhyām anviyeṣa saḥ

original: na tasya maṇḍale rājño nyastapraṇidhidīdhiteḥ /
analyzed: na tasya maṇḍale rājñaḥ nyasta praṇidhi dīdhiteḥ

original: adṛṣṭam abhavat kiṃcid vyabhrasyeva vivasvataḥ // Ragh_17.48 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭam abhavat kiṃcid vyabhrasya iva vivasvataḥ

original: rātriṃdivavibhāgeṣu yad ādiṣṭaṃ mahīkṣitām /
analyzed: rātriṃdiva vibhāgeṣu yat ādiṣṭam mahīkṣitām

original: tat siṣeve niyogena sa vikalpaparāṅmukhaḥ // Ragh_17.49 //
analyzed: tat siṣeve niyogena sa vikalpa parāṅmukhaḥ

original: mantraḥ pratidinaṃ tasya babhūva saha mantribhiḥ /
analyzed: mantraḥ pratidinam tasya babhūva saha mantribhiḥ

original: sa jātu sevyamāno 'pi guptadvāro na sūcyate // Ragh_17.50 //
analyzed: sa jātu sevyamānaḥ pi gupta dvāraḥ na sūcyate

original: pareṣu sveṣu ca kṣiptair avijñātaparasparaiḥ /
analyzed: pareṣu sveṣu ca kṣiptaiḥ a vijñāta parasparaiḥ

original: so 'pasarpair jajāgāra yathākālaṃ svapann api // Ragh_17.51 //
analyzed: saḥ u pasarpaiḥ jajāgāra yathākālam svapan api

original: durgāṇi durgrhāṇy āsaṃs tasya roddhur api dviṣām /
analyzed: durgāṇi durgrhāṇi āsan tasya roddhuḥ api dviṣām

original: na hi siṃho gajāskandī bhayād giriguhāśayaḥ // Ragh_17.52 //
analyzed: na hi siṃhaḥ gaja āskandī bhayāt giri guhā āśayaḥ

original: bahvyamukhyāḥ samārambhāḥ pratyavekṣyā niratyayāḥ /
analyzed: bahvī amukhyāḥ samārambhāḥ pratyavekṣyāḥ niratyayāḥ

original: garbhaśālisadharmāṇas tasya gūḍhaṃ vipecire // Ragh_17.53 //
analyzed: garbha śāli sadharmāṇaḥ tasya gūḍham vipecire

original: apathena pravavṛte na jātūpacito 'pi saḥ /
analyzed: apathena pravavṛte na jātu upacitaḥ pi saḥ

original: vṛddhau nadīmukhenaiva prasthānaṃ lavaṇāmbhasaḥ // Ragh_17.54 //
analyzed: vṛddhau nadī mukhena eva prasthānam lavaṇāmbhasaḥ

original: kāmaṃ pratkṛtivairāgyaṃ sadyaḥ śamayituṃ kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam sadyas śamayitum kṣamaḥ

original: yasya kāryaḥ pratīkāraḥ sa tan naivodapādayat // Ragh_17.55 //
analyzed: yasya kāryaḥ pratīkāraḥ sa tat na eva udapādayat

original: śakeṣv evābhavad yātrā tasya śaktimataḥ sataḥ /
analyzed: śakeṣu eva abhavat yātrā tasya śaktimataḥ sataḥ

original: samīraṇasahāyo 'pi nāmbhaḥprārthī davānalaḥ // Ragh_17.56 //
analyzed: samīraṇa sahāyaḥ nā ambhaḥ prārthī dava analaḥ

original: na dharmam arthakāmābhyāṃ babādhe na ca tena tau /
analyzed: na dharmam artha kāmābhyām babādhe na ca tena tau

original: nārthaṃ kāmena kāmaṃ vā so 'rthena sadṛśas triṣu // Ragh_17.57 //
analyzed: na artham kāmena kāmam vā saḥ ṛthena sadṛśaḥ triṣu

original: hīnāny anupakartḥṇi pravṛddhāni vikurvate /
analyzed: hīnāni an upakartḹi pravṛddhāni vikurvate

original: tena madhyamaśaktīni mitrāṇi shtāpitāny ataḥ // Ragh_17.58 //
analyzed: tena madhyama śaktīni mitrāṇi shtāpitāni atas

original: parātmanoḥ paricchidya śaktyādīnāṃ balābalam /
analyzed: parātmanoḥ paricchidya śakti ādīnām balābalam

original: yayāv ebhir baliṣṭhaś cet parasmād āsta so 'nyathā // Ragh_17.59 //
analyzed: yayau ebhiḥ baliṣṭhaḥ ced parasmāt āsta saḥ nyathā

original: kośenāśrayaṇīyatvam iti tasyārthasaṃgrahaḥ /
analyzed: kośena āśrayaṇīya tvam iti tasya artha saṃgrahaḥ

original: ambugarbho hi jīmūtaś cātakair abhinandyate // Ragh_17.60 //
analyzed: ambu garbhaḥ hi jīmūtaḥ cātakaiḥ abhinandyate

original: parakarmāpahaḥ so 'bhūd udyataḥ sveṣu karmasu /
analyzed: para karma apahaḥ saḥ bhūt udyataḥ sveṣu karmasu

original: āvṛṇod ātmano randhraṃ randhreṣu praharan ripūn // Ragh_17.61 //
analyzed: āvṛṇot ātmanaḥ randhram randhreṣu praharan ripūn

original: pitrā saṃvardhito nityaṃ kṛtāstraḥ sāṃparāyikaḥ /
analyzed: pitrā saṃvardhitaḥ nityam kṛtāstraḥ sāṃparāyikaḥ

original: tasya daṇḍavato daṇḍaḥ svadehān na vyaśiṣyata // Ragh_17.62 //
analyzed: tasya daṇḍavataḥ daṇḍaḥ sva dehāt na vyaśiṣyata

original: sarpasyeva śiroratnaṃ nāsya śaktitrayaṃ paraḥ /
analyzed: sarpasya iva śiraḥ ratnam na asya śakti trayam paraḥ

original: sa cakarṣa parasmāt tad ayaskānta ivāyasam // Ragh_17.63 //
analyzed: sa cakarṣa parasmāt tat ayaskāntaḥ iva āyasam

original: vāpīṣv iva sravantīṣu vaneṣūpavaneṣv iva /
analyzed: vāpīṣu iva sravantīṣu vaneṣu upavaneṣu iva

original: sārthāḥ svairaṃ svakīyeṣu cerur veśmasv ivādriṣu // Ragh_17.64 //
analyzed: sārthāḥ svairam svakīyeṣu ceruḥ veśmasu iva adriṣu

original: tapo rakṣan sa vighnebhyas taskarebhyaś ca saṃpadaḥ /
analyzed: tapaḥ rakṣan sa vighnebhyaḥ taskarebhyaḥ ca saṃpadaḥ

original: yathāsvam āśramaiś cakre varṇair api ṣaḍsaṃśabhāk // Ragh_17.65 //
analyzed: yathāsvam āśramaiḥ cakre varṇaiḥ api ṣaṣ saṃśa bhāj

original: khanibhiḥ suṣuve ratnaṃ kṣetraiḥ sasyaṃ vanair gajān /
analyzed: khanibhiḥ suṣuve ratnam kṣetraiḥ sasyam vanaiḥ gajān

original: dideśa vetanaṃ tasmai rakṣāsadṛśam eva bhūḥ // Ragh_17.66 //
analyzed: dideśa vetanam tasmai rakṣā sadṛśam eva bhūḥ

original: sa guṇānāṃ balānāṃ ca ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇmukhavikramaḥ /
analyzed: sa guṇānām balānām ca ṣaṇṇām ṣaṇmukha vikramaḥ

original: babhūva viniyogajñaḥ sādhanīyeṣu vastuṣu // Ragh_17.67 //
analyzed: babhūva viniyoga jñaḥ sādhanīyeṣu vastuṣu

original: iti kramāt prayuñjāno rāja nītiṃ caturvidhām /
analyzed: iti kramāt prayuñjānaḥ rāja nītim caturvidhām

original: ā tīrthād apratīghātaṃ sa tasyāḥ phalam ānaśe // Ragh_17.68 //
analyzed: ā tīrthāt apratīghātam sa tasyāḥ phalam ānaśe

original: kūṭayuddhavidhijñe 'pi tasmin sanmārgayodhini /
analyzed: kūṭa yuddha vidhi jñe tasmin sat mārga yodhini

original: bheje 'bhisārikāvṛttiṃ jayaśrīr vīragāminī // Ragh_17.69 //
analyzed: bheje bhisārikā vṛttim jaya śrīḥ vīra gāminī

original: prāyaḥ pratāpabhagnatvād arīṇāṃ tasya durlabhaḥ /
analyzed: prāyas pratāpa bhagna tvāt arīṇām tasya durlabhaḥ

original: raṇo gandhavipasyeva gandhabhinnānyadantinaḥ // Ragh_17.70 //
analyzed: raṇaḥ gandha vipasya iva gandha bhinnāni adantinaḥ

original: pravṛddhau hīyate candraḥ samudro 'pi tathāvidhaḥ /
analyzed: pravṛddhau hīyate candraḥ samudraḥ pi tathāvidhaḥ

original: sa tu tasamavṛddhiś ca na cābhūt tāv iva kṣayī // Ragh_17.71 //
analyzed: sa tu tasama vṛddhiḥ ca na ca abhūt tau iva kṣayī

original: santas tasyābhigamanād atyarthaṃ mahataḥ kṛṣāḥ /
analyzed: santaḥ tasya abhigamanāt atyartham mahataḥ kṛṣāḥ

original: udadher iva jīmūtāḥ prāpur dātṛtvam arthinaḥ // Ragh_17.72 //
analyzed: udadheḥ iva jīmūtāḥ prāpuḥ dātṛ tvam arthinaḥ

original: stūyamānaḥ sa jihrāya stutyam eva samācaran /
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ sa jihrāya stutyam eva samācaran

original: tathāpi vavṛdhe tasya tatkāridveṣino yaśaḥ // Ragh_17.73 //
analyzed: tathā api vavṛdhe tasya tad kāri dveṣinaḥ yaśaḥ

original: duritaṃ darśanena ghnaṃs tattvārthena nudaṃs tamaḥ /
analyzed: duritam darśanena ghnan tattva arthena nudan tamaḥ

original: prajāḥ svatantrayāṃ cakre śaśvat sūrya ivoditaḥ // Ragh_17.74 //
analyzed: prajāḥ svatantrayām cakre śaśvat sūryaḥ iva uditaḥ

original: indor agatayaḥ padme sūryasya kumude 'ṃśavaḥ /
analyzed: indoḥ agatayaḥ padme sūryasya kumude ṃśavaḥ

original: guṇās tasya vipakṣe 'pi guṇino lebhire 'ntaram // Ragh_17.75 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ tasya vipakṣe pi guṇinaḥ lebhire ntaram

original: parābhisaṃdhānaparaṃ yady apy asya viceṣṭitam /
analyzed: para abhisaṃdhāna param yadi api asya viceṣṭitam

original: jigīṣor aśvamedhāya dharmyam eva babhūva tat // Ragh_17.76 //
analyzed: jigīṣoḥ aśvamedhāya dharmyam eva babhūva tat

original: evam udyan prabhāveṇa śāstgranirdiṣṭavartmanā /
analyzed: evam udyan prabhāveṇa

original: vṛṣeva devo devānāṃ rājñāṃ rājā babhūva saḥ // Ragh_17.77 //
analyzed: vṛṣā iva devaḥ devānām rājñām rājā babhūva saḥ

original: pañcamaṃ lokapālānāṃ tam ūcuḥ sāmyayogataḥ /
analyzed: pañcamam lokapālānām tam ūcuḥ sāmya yogataḥ

original: bhūtānāṃ mahatām ṣaṣṭham aṣṭamaṃ kulabhūbhṛtām // Ragh_17.78 //
analyzed: bhūtānām mahatām ṣaṣṭham aṣṭamam kula bhūbhṛtām

original: dūrāpavarjitacchattrais tasyājñāṃ śāsanārpitām /
analyzed: dūra apavarjita chattraiḥ tasya ājñām śāsana arpitām

original: dadhuḥ śirobhir bhūpālā devaḥ pauraṃdarīm iva // Ragh_17.79 //
analyzed: śirobhiḥ bhūpālāḥ devaḥ pauraṃdarīm iva

original: ṛtvijaḥ sa tathānarca dakṣiṇābhir mahākratau /
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ sa tathā anarca dakṣiṇābhiḥ mahā kratau

original: yathā sādhāraṇībhūtaṃ nāmāsya dhanadasya ca // Ragh_17.80 //
analyzed: yathā sādhāraṇībhūtam nāma asya dhanadasya ca

original: indrād vṛṣṭir niyamitagadodrekavṛttir yamo 'bhūd yādonāthaḥ śivajalapathaḥ karmaṇe naucarāṇām /
analyzed: indrāt vṛṣṭiḥ niyamita gada udreka vṛttiḥ yamaḥ bhūt yādaḥ nāthaḥ śiva jala pathaḥ karmaṇe naucarāṇām

original: pūrvāpekṣī tadanu vidadhe kośavṛddhiṃ kuberas tasmin daṇḍopanatacaritaṃ bhejire lokapālāḥ // Ragh_17.81 //
analyzed: pūrva apekṣī tadanu vidadhe kośa vṛddhim kuberaḥ tasmin daṇḍa upanata caritam bhejire lokapālāḥ

original: sa naiṣadhasyārthapateḥ sutāyām utpādayām āsa niṣiddhaśatruḥ /
analyzed: sa naiṣadhasya arthapateḥ sutāyām utpādayām āsa niṣiddha śatruḥ

original: anūnasāraṃ niṣadhān nagendrāt putraṃ yam āhur niṣadhākhyam eva // Ragh_18.1 //
analyzed: anūnasāram niṣadhāt naga indrāt putram yam āhuḥ niṣadha ākhyam eva

original: tenoruvīryeṇa pitā prajāyai kalpiṣyamāṇena nananda yūnā /
analyzed: tena uru vīryeṇa pitā prajāyai kalpiṣyamāṇena nananda yūnā

original: suvṛṣtiyogād iva jīvalokaḥ sasyena saṃpattiphalātmakena // Ragh_18.2 //
analyzed: su vṛṣti yogāt iva jīva lokaḥ sasyena saṃpatti phala ātmakena

original: śabdādi nirviśya sukhaṃ cirāya tasmin pratiṣṭhāpitarājaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: śabda ādi nirviśya sukham cirāya tasmin pratiṣṭhāpita rāja śabdaḥ

original: kaumudvateyaḥ kumudāvadātair dyām arjitāṃ karmabhir āruroha // Ragh_18.3 //
analyzed: kaumudvateyaḥ kumuda avadātaiḥ dyām arjitām karmabhiḥ āruroha

original: pautraḥ kuśasyāpi kuśeśayākṣaḥ sasāgarāṃ sāgaradhīracetāḥ /
analyzed: pautraḥ kuśasya api kuśeśaya akṣaḥ sa sāgarām sāgara dhīra cetāḥ

original: ekātapoatrāṃ bhuvam ekavīraḥ purārgalādīrghabhujo bubhoja // Ragh_18.4 //
analyzed: eka a tapaḥ atrām bhuvam eka vīraḥ purā argalā dīrgha bhujaḥ bubhoja

original: tasyānalaujās tanayas tadante vaṃśaśriyaṃ prāpa nalābhidhānaḥ /
analyzed: tasya anala ojāḥ tanayaḥ tad ante vaṃśa śriyam prāpa nala abhidhānaḥ

original: yo naḍvalānīva gajaḥ pareṣāṃ balāny amṛdnān nalinābhavaktraḥ // Ragh_18.5 //
analyzed: yaḥ naḍvalāni iva gajaḥ pareṣām balāni amṛdnāt nalina ābha vaktraḥ

original: nabhaścarair gītayaśyāmatanuṃ tanūjam nabhastalaśyāmatanuṃ tanūjam /
analyzed: nabhaḥ caraiḥ gīta yaśyāma tanum tanūjam nabhaḥ tala śyāma tanum tanūjam

original: khyātaṃ nabhaḥśabdamayena nāmnā kāntaṃ nabhomāsam iva prajānām // Ragh_18.6 //
analyzed: khyātam nabhaḥ śabda mayena nāmnā kāntam nabhaḥ māsam iva prajānām

original: tasmai viṣrjyottarakosalānāṃ dharmottaras tat prabhave prabhutvam /
analyzed: tasmai viṣrjya uttarakosalānām dharma uttaraḥ tat prabhave prabhu tvam

original: mṛgair ajaryaṃ jaraspodaiṣṭam adehabandhāya punar babandha // Ragh_18.7 //
analyzed: mṛgaiḥ ajaryam jaraspoda eṣṭam a deha bandhāya punar babandha

original: tena dvipānām iva puṇḍarīko rājñām ajayyo 'jani puṇḍarīkaḥ /
analyzed: tena dvipānām iva puṇḍarīkaḥ rājñām ajayyaḥ jani puṇḍarīkaḥ

original: śānte pitary āhṛtapuṇḍarīkā yaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣam ivāśritā śrīḥ // Ragh_18.8 //
analyzed: śānte pitari āhṛta puṇḍarīkā yam puṇḍarīkākṣam iva āśritā śrīḥ

original: sa kṣemadhanvānam amoghadhanvā putraṃ prajākṣemavidhānadakṣam /
analyzed: sa kṣemadhanvānam amoghadhanvā putram prajā kṣema vidhāna dakṣam

original: kṣmāṃ lambhayitvā kṣamayopapannaṃ vane tapaḥ kṣāntataraś cacāra // Ragh_18.9 //
analyzed: kṣmām lambhayitvā kṣamayā upapannam vane tapaḥ kṣāntataraḥ cacāra

original: anīkinīnāṃ samare 'grayāyī tasyāpi devapratimaḥ suto 'bhūt /
analyzed: anīkinīnām samare tasya api devapratimaḥ sutaḥ bhūt

original: vyaśrūyatānīkapadāvasānaṃ devādi nāma tridive 'pi yasya // Ragh_18.10 //
analyzed: vyaśrūyata anīka pada avasānam deva ādi nāma tridive yasya

original: pitā samārādhanatatpareṇa putreṇa putrī sa yathaiva tena /
analyzed: pitā samārādhana tatpareṇa putreṇa putrī sa yathā eva tena

original: putras tathaivādhikavatsalena sa tena pitrā pitṛmān babhūva // Ragh_18.11 //
analyzed: putraḥ tathā evā adhika vatsalena sa tena pitrā pitṛmān babhūva

original: pūrvas tayor ātmasame ciroḍhām ātmodbhave varṇacatuṣṭayasya /
analyzed: pūrvaḥ tayoḥ ātma same cira ūḍhām ātma udbhave varṇa catuṣṭayasya

original: dhuraṃ nidhāyaikanidhir guṇānām jagāma yajvā yajamānalokam // Ragh_18.12 //
analyzed: dhuram nidhāya eka nidhiḥ guṇānām jagāma yajvā yajamāna lokam

original: vaśī sutas tasya vaśaṃvadatvāt sveṣām ivāsīd dviṣatām apīṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: vaśī sutaḥ tasya vaśaṃvada tvāt sveṣām iva āsīt dviṣatām api iṣṭaḥ

original: sakṛd (?) vivignān api hi prayuktaṃ mādhuryam īṣṭe hariṇān grahītum // Ragh_18.13 //
analyzed: sakṛt vivignān api hi prayuktam mādhuryam īṣṭe hariṇān grahītum

original: ahīnagur nāma sa gāṃ samagrām ahīnabāhudraviṇaḥ śaśāsa /
analyzed: ahīnaguḥ nāma sa gām samagrām ahīna bāhu draviṇaḥ śaśāsa

original: yo hīna saṃsargaparāṅmukhatvād mādhuryam īṣṭe hariṇān grahītum // Ragh_18.14 //
analyzed: yaḥ saṃsarga parāṅmukha tvāt mādhuryam īṣṭe hariṇān grahītum

original: guroḥ sa cānantaram antarjñaḥ puṃsāṃ pumān ādya ivāvatīrṇaḥ /
analyzed: guroḥ sa ca anantaram antar jñaḥ puṃsām pumān ādyaḥ iva avatīrṇaḥ

original: upakramair askhalitaiś caturbhiś caturdigīśaś caturo babhūva // Ragh_18.15 //
analyzed: upakramaiḥ askhalitaiḥ caturbhiḥ catur digīśaḥ caturaḥ babhūva

original: tasmin prayāte paralokayātrāṃ jetary arīṇāṃ tanayaṃ tadīyam /
analyzed: tasmin prayāte para lokayātrām jetari arīṇām tanayam tadīyam

original: uccaiḥśirastvāj jitapāriyātraṃ lakṣmīḥ siṣeve kila pāriyātram // Ragh_18.16 //
analyzed: uccaiḥśiraḥ tvāt jita pāriyātram lakṣmīḥ siṣeve kila pāriyātram

original: tasyābhavat sūnur udāraśīlaḥ śilaḥ śilāpaṭṭaviśālavakṣāḥ /
analyzed: tasya abhavat sūnuḥ udāra śīlaḥ śilaḥ śilā paṭṭa viśāla vakṣāḥ

original: jitāripakṣo 'pi śilīmukhair yaḥ śālīnatām avrajad īḍyamānaḥ // Ragh_18.17 //
analyzed: jita ari pakṣaḥ u pi śilīmukhaiḥ yaḥ śālīna tām avrajat īḍyamānaḥ

original: tam ātmasaṃpannam aninditātmā kṛtvā yuvānaṃ yuvarājam eva /
analyzed: tam ātma saṃpannam anindita ātmā kṛtvā yuvānam yuvarājam eva

original: sukhāni so 'bhuṅkta sukhoparodhi vṛttaṃ hi rājñām uparuddhavṛttam // Ragh_18.18 //
analyzed: sukhāni saḥ bhuṅkta sukha uparodhi vṛttam hi rājñām uparuddha vṛttam

original: taṃ rāgabandhiṣv avitṛptam eva bhogeṣu saubhāgyaviśeṣabhogyam /
analyzed: tam rāga bandhiṣu a vitṛptam eva bhogeṣu saubhāgya viśeṣa bhogyam

original: vilāsinīnām aratikṣamāpi jarā vṛthā matsariṇī jahāra // Ragh_18.19 //
analyzed: vilāsinīnām arati kṣamā api jarā vṛthā matsariṇī jahāra

original: unnābha ity udagtasnāmadheyas tasyāyathārthonnatanābhhirandhraḥ /
analyzed: unnābhaḥ iti tasya ayathārtha unnata nābhhi randhraḥ

original: suto 'bhavat paṅkajanābhakalpaḥ kṛtsnasya nābhir nṛpamaṇḍalasya // Ragh_18.20 //
analyzed: sutaḥ bhavat paṅkajanābha kalpaḥ kṛtsnasya nābhiḥ nṛpa maṇḍalasya

original: tataḥ paraṃ vajradharaprabhāvas tadātmajaḥ saṃyati vajraghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatas param vajradhara prabhāvaḥ tad ātmajaḥ saṃyati vajraghoṣaḥ

original: babhūva vajrākarabhuṣaṇāyāḥ patiḥ pṛthivyāḥ kila vajranābhaḥ // Ragh_18.21 //
analyzed: babhūva vajra ākara bhuṣaṇāyāḥ patiḥ pṛthivyāḥ kila vajranābhaḥ

original: tasmin gate dyāṃ sukṛtopalabdhāṃ tatsaṃbhavaṃ śaṅkhaṇam arṇavāntā /
analyzed: tasmin gate dyām sukṛta upalabdhām tad saṃbhavam śaṅkhaṇam arṇavāntā

original: utkhātaśatruṃ vasudhopatasthe ratnopahārair uditaiḥ khanibhyaḥ // Ragh_18.22 //
analyzed: utkhāta śatrum vasudhā upatasthe ratna upahāraiḥ uditaiḥ khanibhyaḥ

original: tasyāvasāne haridaśvadhāmā pitryaṃ prapede padam aśvirūpaḥ /
analyzed: tasya avasāne harit aśva dhāmā pitryam prapede padam aśvi rūpaḥ

original: velātaṭeṣūṣitasainikāśvaṃ purāvido yaṃ dhyuṣitāśvam āhuḥ // Ragh_18.23 //
analyzed: velā taṭeṣu uṣita sainika aśvam purāvidaḥ yam dhī uṣitāśvam āhuḥ

original: ārādhya viśveśvaram īśvareṇa tena kṣiter viśvasaho 'dhijajñe /
analyzed: ārādhya viśveśvaram īśvareṇa tena kṣiteḥ viśvasahaḥ

original: pātuṃ saho viśvasakhaḥ samagrāṃ viśvaṃbharām ātmajamūrtir ātmā // Ragh_18.24 //
analyzed: pātum sahaḥ viśvasakhaḥ samagrām viśvaṃbharām ātmaja mūrtiḥ ātmā

original: aṃśe hiraṇyākśaripoḥ sa jāte hiraṇyanābhe tanaye nayajñaḥ /
analyzed: aṃśe hiraṇyākśaripoḥ sa jāte hiraṇyanābhe tanaye naya jñaḥ

original: dviṣām asahyaḥ sutarāṃ tarūṇāṃ hiraṇyaretā sānilo 'bhūt // Ragh_18.25 //
analyzed: dviṣām asahyaḥ sutarām tarūṇām hiraṇya retāḥ sa anilaḥ bhūt

original: pitā pitḥṇām anṛṇas tam ante vayasy anantāni sukhāni lipsuḥ /
analyzed: pitā pitḥṇām anṛṇaḥ tam ante vayasi anantāni sukhāni lipsuḥ

original: rājānam ājānuvilambibāhuṃ kṛtvā kṛtī valkalavān babhūva // Ragh_18.26 //
analyzed: rājānam ā jānu vilambi bāhum kṛtvā kṛtī valkalavān babhūva

original: kausalya ity uttarakosalānāṃ patyuḥ pataṃgānvayabhūṣaṇasya /
analyzed: kausalyaḥ iti uttara kosalānām patyuḥ pataṃga anvaya bhūṣaṇasya

original: tasyaurasaḥ somasutaḥ suto 'bhūn netrotsavaḥ soma iva dvitīyaḥ // Ragh_18.27 //
analyzed: tasya aurasaḥ soma sutaḥ sutaḥ bhūt netra utsavaḥ somaḥ iva dvitīyaḥ

original: kausalya ity uttarakosalānāṃ sa brahmabhūyaṃ gatim ājagāma /
analyzed: kausalyaḥ iti uttarakosalānām sa brahma bhūyam gatim ājagāma

original: brahmiṣṭham ādhāya nije 'dhikāre brahmiṣṭham eva svatanuprasūtam // Ragh_18.28 //
analyzed: brahmiṣṭham ādhāya nije dhikāre brahmiṣṭham eva sva tanu prasūtam

original: yaśobhir ābrahmasabhaṃ prakāśaḥ samyag mahīṃ śāsati śāsanāṅkām /
analyzed: yaśobhiḥ ābrahmasabham prakāśaḥ samyak mahīm śāsati śāsana aṅkām

original: prajāś ciraṃ suprajasi prajeśe nanandur ānandajalāvilākṣyaḥ // Ragh_18.29 //
analyzed: prajāḥ ciram suprajasi prajā īśe nananduḥ ānanda jala āvila akṣyaḥ

original: pātrīkṛtātmā gurusevanena spṛṣṭākṛtiḥ pattrarathendraketoḥ /
analyzed: pātrīkṛta ātmā guru sevanena spṛṣṭa ākṛtiḥ pattraratha indraketoḥ

original: taṃ putriṇāṃ puṣkarapattranetraḥ putraḥ samāropayad agrasaṃkhyām // Ragh_18.30 //
analyzed: tam putriṇām puṣkarapattra netraḥ putraḥ samāropayat agra saṃkhyām

original: vaṃśasthitiṃ vaṃśakareṇa tena saṃbhāvya bhāvī sa sakhā maghonaḥ /
analyzed: vaṃśa sthitim vaṃśa kareṇa tena saṃbhāvya bhāvī sa sakhā maghonaḥ

original: upaspṛṣan sparśanivṛttalaulyas tripuṣkareṣu tridaśatvam āpa // Ragh_18.31 //
analyzed: upaspṛṣan sparśa nivṛtta laulyaḥ tripuṣkareṣu tridaśa tvam āpa

original: tasya prabhānirjitapuṣpa-rāgaṃ pauṣyaṃ tithau puṣyam asūta patnī /
analyzed: tasya prabhā nirjita puṣparāgam pauṣyam tithau puṣyam asūta patnī

original: yasminn apuṣyann udite samagrāṃ puṣṭiṃ janāḥ puṣya iva dvitīye // Ragh_18.32 //
analyzed: yasmin apuṣyan udite samagrām puṣṭim janāḥ puṣye iva dvitīye

original: mahīṃ mahecchaḥ parikīrya sūnau manīṣiṇe jaiminaye 'rpitātmā /
analyzed: mahīm mahā icchaḥ parikīrya sūnau manīṣiṇe jaiminaye rpita ātmā

original: tasmāt sayogād adhigamya yogam ajanmane 'kalpata janmabhīruḥ // Ragh_18.33 //
analyzed: tasmāt sayogāt adhigamya yogam ajanmane kalpata janma bhīruḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ tatprabhavaḥ prapede dhruvopameyo dhruvasaṃdhir urvīm /
analyzed: tatas param tad prabhavaḥ prapede dhruva upameyaḥ dhruva saṃdhiḥ urvīm

original: yasminn abhūj jyāyasi satyasaṃdhe saṃdhir dhruvaḥ saṃnamatām arīṇām // Ragh_18.34 //
analyzed: yasmin abhūt jyāyasi satya saṃdhe saṃdhiḥ dhruvaḥ saṃnamatām arīṇām

original: sute śiśāv eva sudarśanākhye darśātyayendupriyadarśane saḥ /
analyzed: sute śiśau eva sudarśana ākhye darśa atyaya indu priya darśane saḥ

original: mṛgāyatākṣo mṛgayāvihārī siṃhād avāpad vipadaṃ nṛsiṃhaḥ // Ragh_18.35 //
analyzed: mṛgāyata akṣaḥ mṛgayā vihārī siṃhāt avāpat vipadam nṛ siṃhaḥ

original: svargāminas tasya tam aikamatyād amātyavargaḥ kulatantum ekam /
analyzed: svar gāminaḥ tasya tam aikamatyāt amātya vargaḥ kula tantum ekam

original: anāthadīnāḥ prakṛtīr avekṣya sāketanāthaṃ vidhivac cakāra // Ragh_18.36 //
analyzed: anātha dīnāḥ prakṛtīḥ avekṣya sāketa nātham vidhivat cakāra

original: vavendunā tan nabhasopameyaṃ śāvaikasiṃhena ca kānanena /
analyzed: vava indunā tat nabhasā upameyam śāva eka siṃhena ca kānanena

original: raghoḥ kulaṃ kuḍmalapaṅkajena toyena cāprauṣhanarendram āsīt // Ragh_18.37 //
analyzed: raghoḥ kulam kuḍmala paṅkajena toyena ca āprauṣha narendram āsīt

original: lokena bhāvī pitur eva tulyaḥ saṃbhāvito mauliparigrahāt saḥ /
analyzed: lokena bhāvī pituḥ eva tulyaḥ saṃbhāvitaḥ mauli parigrahāt saḥ

original: dṛṣṭo hi vṛṇvan kalabhapramāṇo 'py āśāḥ purovātam avāpya meghaḥ // Ragh_18.38 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ hi vṛṇvan kalabha pramāṇaḥ u pi āśāḥ purovātam avāpya meghaḥ

original: taṃ rājavīthyām adhihasti yāntam ādhoraṇālambitam agryaveṣam /
analyzed: tam rāja vīthyām adhihasti yāntam ādhoraṇa ālambitam agrya veṣam

original: ṣaḍvarṣadeśiyam api prabhutvāt praikṣanta paurāḥ pitṛgauraveṇa // Ragh_18.39 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ varṣa deśiyam api prabhu tvāt praikṣanta paurāḥ pitṛ gauraveṇa

original: kāmaṃ na so 'kalpata paitṛkasya siṃhāsanasya pratipūraṇāya /
analyzed: kāmam na saḥ kalpata paitṛkasya siṃhāsanasya pratipūraṇāya

original: tejomahimnā punar āvṛtātmā tad vyāpa cāmīkarapiñjareṇa // Ragh_18.40 //
analyzed: tejaḥ mahimnā punar āvṛta ātmā tat vyāpa cāmīkara piñjareṇa

original: tasmād adhaḥ kiṃcid ivāvatīrṇāv asaṃspṛśantau tapanīyapīṭham /
analyzed: tasmāt adhas kiṃcid iva avatīrṇau a saṃspṛśantau tapanīya pīṭham

original: sālaktakau bhūpatayaḥ prasiddhair vavandire maulibhir asya pādau // Ragh_18.41 //
analyzed: sa alaktakau bhūpatayaḥ prasiddhaiḥ vavandire maulibhiḥ asya pādau

original: maṇau mahānīla iti prabhāvād alpapramāṇe 'pi yathā na mithyā /
analyzed: maṇau mahā nīlaḥ iti prabhāvāt alpa pramāṇe yathā na mithyā

original: śabdo mahārāja iti pratītas tathaiva tasmin yuyuje 'rbhake 'pi // Ragh_18.42 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ mahā rājaḥ iti pratītaḥ tathā eva tasmin

original: paryantasaṃcāritacāmarasya kapolalolobhayakākapakṣat /
analyzed: paryanta saṃcārita cāmarasya kapola lola ubhaya kākapakṣad

original: tasyānanād uccarito vivādaś cakshāla velāsv api nārṇavānām // Ragh_18.43 //
analyzed: tasya ānanāt uccaritaḥ vivādaḥ cakshāla velāsu api nā arṇavānām

original: nirvṛttajāmbūnadapaṭṭaśobhe nyastaṃ lalāṭe tilakaṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: nirvṛtta jāmbūnada paṭṭa śobhe nyastam lalāṭe tilakam dadhānaḥ

original: tenaiva śūnyāny arisundarīṇāṃ mukhāni sa smeramukhaś cakāra // Ragh_18.44 //
analyzed: tena eva śūnyāni ari sundarīṇām mukhāni sa smera mukhaḥ cakāra

original: śirīṣapuṣpādhikasaukumāryaḥ khedaṃ sa yāyād api śrutavṛddhayogāt /
analyzed: śirīṣa puṣpa adhika saukumāryaḥ khedam sa yāyāt api śruta vṛddha yogāt

original: nitāntagurvīm api cānubhāvād dhuraṃ dharitryā bibharāṃ babhūva // Ragh_18.45 //
analyzed: nitānta gurvīm api ca anubhāvāt dhuram dharitryāḥ babhūva

original: nyastākṣarām akṣarabhūmikāyāṃ kārtsnyena gṛhṇāti lipiṃ na yāvat /
analyzed: nyasta akṣarām akṣara bhūmikāyām kārtsnyena gṛhṇāti lipim na yāvat

original: sarvāṇi tāvac chrutavṛddhayogāt phalāny upāyuṅkta sa daṇḍanīteḥ // Ragh_18.46 //
analyzed: sarvāṇi tāvat śruta vṛddha yogāt phalāni upāyuṅkta sa daṇḍanīteḥ

original: urasy aparyāptabhāgā prauḍhībhaviṣyantam udīkṣamāṇā /
analyzed: urasi a paryāpta bhāgā prauḍhībhaviṣyantam udīkṣamāṇā

original: saṃjātalajjeva tam ātapatrachhāyāchalenopajugūha lakṣmīḥ // Ragh_18.47 //
analyzed: saṃjāta lajjā iva tam ātapatra chhāyā chalena upajugūha lakṣmīḥ

original: anaśnuvānena yugopamānam abaddhamaurvīkiṇalāñchanena /
analyzed: an aśnuvānena yuga upamānam a baddha maurvī kiṇa lāñchanena

original: aspṛṣṭakhaḍgatsaruṇāpi cāsīd rakṣāvatī tasya bhujena bhūmiḥ // Ragh_18.48 //
analyzed: a spṛṣṭa khaḍga tsaruṇā api ca āsīt rakṣāvatī tasya bhujena bhūmiḥ

original: na kevalaṃ gacchati tasya kāle yayuḥ śarīrāvayavā vivṛddhim /
analyzed: na kevalam gacchati tasya kāle yayuḥ śarīra avayavāḥ vivṛddhim

original: vaṃśyā guṇāḥ khalv api lokakāntāḥ prārambhasūkṣmāḥ prathimānam āpuḥ // Ragh_18.49 //
analyzed: vaṃśyāḥ guṇāḥ khalu api loka kāntāḥ prārambha sūkṣmāḥ prathimānam āpuḥ

original: sa pūrvajanmāntaradṛṣṭapārāḥ smarann ivākleśakaro gurūṇām /
analyzed: sa pūrva janma antara dṛṣṭa pārāḥ smaran iva a kleśa karaḥ gurūṇām

original: tisras trivargādhigamasya mūlaṃ jagrāha vidyāḥ prakṛtīś ca pitryāḥ // Ragh_18.50 //
analyzed: tisraḥ trivarga adhigamasya mūlam jagrāha vidyāḥ prakṛtīḥ ca pitryāḥ

original: vyūhya sthitaḥ kiṃcid ivottarārdham unnaddhacūḍo 'ñcitasvyajānuḥ /
analyzed: vyūhya sthitaḥ kiṃcid iva uttara ardham unnaddha cūḍaḥ ñcita svya jānuḥ

original: ākarṇam ākṛṣṭasabānadhanvā vyarocat' āste sa vinīyamānaḥ // Ragh_18.51 //
analyzed: ākarṇam ākṛṣṭa sabāna dhanvā vyarocat āste sa vinīyamānaḥ

original: atha madhu vanitāṃ netranirveśanīyaṃ manasijatarupuṣpam rāgabandhapravālam /
analyzed: atha madhu vanitām netra nirveśanīyam manasija taru puṣpam rāga bandha pravālam

original: akṛtakavidhi sarvāṅgīṇam ākalpajātaṃ vilasitapadam ādyaṃ yauvanaṃ sa prapede // Ragh_18.52 //
analyzed: akṛtaka vidhi sarvāṅgīṇam ākalpa jātam vilasita padam ādyam yauvanam sa prapede

original: pratikṛtiracanābhayo dūtisaṃdarśitābhyaḥ samadhikatararūpāḥ śuddhasaṃtānakāmaiḥ /
analyzed: pratikṛti racanā ābhayaḥ dūti saṃdarśitābhyaḥ samadhikatara rūpāḥ śuddha saṃtāna kāmaiḥ

original: adhivividur amātyair āhṛtās tasya yūnaḥ prathamaparigṛhīte śrībhuvau rājakanyāḥ // Ragh_18.53 //
analyzed: adhivividuḥ amātyaiḥ āhṛtāḥ tasya yūnaḥ prathama parigṛhīte śrī bhuvau rāja kanyāḥ

original: agnivarṇam abhiṣicya rāghavaḥ sve pade tanayam agnitejasam /
analyzed: agni varṇam abhiṣicya rāghavaḥ sve pade tanayam agni tejasam

original: śiśriye śrutavatām apaścimaḥ paścime vayasi naimiṣaṃ vaśī // Ragh_19.1 //
analyzed: śiśriye śrutavatām apaścimaḥ paścime vayasi naimiṣam vaśī

original: tatra tīrthasalilena dīrghikās talpam antaritabhūmibhiḥ kuśaiḥ /
analyzed: tatra tīrtha salilena dīrghikāḥ talpam antarita bhūmibhiḥ kuśaiḥ

original: saudhavāsam uṭajena vismṛtaḥ saṃcikāya phalaniḥspṛhas tapaḥ // Ragh_19.2 //
analyzed: saudha vāsam uṭajena vismṛtaḥ saṃcikāya phala niḥspṛhaḥ tapaḥ

original: labdhapālanavidhau na tatsutaḥ khedam āpa guruṇā hi medinī /
analyzed: labdha pālana vidhau na tad sutaḥ khedam āpa guruṇā hi medinī

original: bhoktum eva bhujanirjitadviṣā na prasādhayitum asya kalpitā // Ragh_19.3 //
analyzed: bhoktum eva bhuja nirjita dviṣā na prasādhayitum asya kalpitā

original: so 'dhikāram abhikaḥ kulocitaṃ kāścana svayam avartayat samāḥ /
analyzed: saḥ dhikāram abhikaḥ kula ucitam kāścana svayam avartayat samāḥ

original: taṃ niveśya saciveṣv ataḥ paraṃ strīvidheyanavayauvano 'bhavat // Ragh_19.4 //
analyzed: tam niveśya saciveṣu atas param strī vidheya nava yauvanaḥ bhavat

original: kāminīsahacarasya kāminas tasya veśmasu mṛdaṅganādiṣu /
analyzed: kāminī sahacarasya kāminaḥ tasya veśmasu mṛd aṅganā ādiṣu

original: ṛddhimantam adhikarddhir uttaraḥ pūrvam utsavam apohad utsavaḥ // Ragh_19.5 //
analyzed: ṛddhimantam adhika ṛddhiḥ uttaraḥ pūrvam utsavam apohat utsavaḥ

original: indriyārthapariśūnyam akṣarmaḥ soḍhum ekam api sa kṣaṇātaram /
analyzed: indriya artha pariśūnyam akṣarmaḥ soḍhum ekam api sa kṣaṇātaram

original: antare ca viharan divāniśaṃ na vyapaikṣata samutsukāḥ prajāḥ // Ragh_19.6 //
analyzed: antare ca viharan divāniśam na vyapaikṣata samutsukāḥ prajāḥ

original: gauravād yad api jātu mantriṇāṃ darśanaṃ prakṛtikāṅkṣitaṃ dadau /
analyzed: gauravāt yat api jātu mantriṇām darśanam prakṛti kāṅkṣitam dadau

original: tad gavākṣavivarāvalambinā kevalena caraṇena kalpitam // Ragh_19.7 //
analyzed: tat gavākṣa vivara avalambinā kevalena caraṇena kalpitam

original: taṃ kṛtapraṇatayo 'nujīvinaḥ komalātmanakharāgarūṣitam /
analyzed: tam kṛta praṇatayaḥ nu jīvinaḥ komala ātma nakha rāga rūṣitam

original: bhejire navadivākarātapaspṛṣṭapaṅkajatulādhirohaṇam // Ragh_19.8 //
analyzed: bhejire nava divākara ātapa spṛṣṭa paṅkaja tulā adhirohaṇam

original: yuvanonnatavilāsinīstanakṣobhalolakamalāś ca dīrghikāḥ /
analyzed: yuvana unnata vilāsinī stana kṣobha lola kamalāḥ ca dīrghikāḥ

original: gūḍhamohanagṛhās tadambubhiḥ sa vyagāhata vigāḍhamanmathaḥ // Ragh_19.9 //
analyzed: gūḍha mohana gṛhāḥ tad ambubhiḥ sa vyagāhata vigāḍha manmathaḥ

original: tatra sekahṛtalocanāñjanair dhautarāgaparipāṭalādharaiḥ /
analyzed: tatra seka hṛta locana añjanaiḥ dhauta rāga paripāṭalā adharaiḥ

original: aṅganās tam adhikaṃ vyalobhayann arpitaprakṛtikāntibhir mukhaiḥ // Ragh_19.10 //
analyzed: aṅganāḥ tam adhikam vyalobhayan arpita prakṛti kāntibhiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: ghrāṇakāntamadhugandhakarṣiṇīḥ pānabhūmiracanāḥ priyāsakhaḥ /
abhyapadyata sa vāsitāsakhaḥ puṣpitāḥ kamalinīr iva dvipaḥ // Ragh_19.11 //
analyzed: abhyapadyata sa vā asitā sakhaḥ puṣpitāḥ kamalinīḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: sātirekamadakāraṇaṃ rahas tena dattam abhileṣur aṅganāḥ /
analyzed: sa atireka mada kāraṇam rahaḥ tena dattam abhileṣuḥ aṅganāḥ

original: tābhir apy upahṛtaṃ mukhāsavaṃ so 'pibad bakulatulyadohadaḥ // Ragh_19.12 //
analyzed: tābhiḥ api upahṛtam mukha āsavam saḥ pibat bakula tulya dohadaḥ

original: aṅkam aṅkaparivartanocite tasya ninyatur aśūnyatām ubhe /
analyzed: aṅkam aṅka parivartana ucite tasya ninyatuḥ a śūnya tām ubhe

original: vallakī ca hṛdayaṃgamasvanā valguvāg api ca vāmalocanā // Ragh_19.13 //
analyzed: vallakī ca hṛdayaṃgama svanā valgu vāc api ca vāma locanā

original: sa svayaṃ prahatapuṣkaraḥ kṛtī lolamālyavalayo haran manaḥ /
analyzed: sa svayam prahata puṣkaraḥ kṛtī lola mālya valayaḥ haran manaḥ

original: nartakīr abhinayātilaṅghinīḥ pārśvavartiṣu guruṣv alajjavat // Ragh_19.14 //
analyzed: nartakīḥ abhinaya atilaṅghinīḥ pārśva vartiṣu guruṣu alajja vat

original: cāru nṛtyavigame ca tanmukhaṃ svedabhinnatilakaṃ pariśramāt /
analyzed: cāru nṛtya vigame ca tad mukham sveda bhinna tilakam pariśramāt

original: premadattavadanāniaḥ manaḥ so 'nvajīvad amarālakeśvarau // Ragh_19.15 //
analyzed: manaḥ saḥ nu ajīvat amara alaka īśvarau

original: tasya sāvaraṇadṛṣṭasaṃdhayaḥ kāmyavastuṣu naveṣu saṅginaḥ /
analyzed: tasya sa āvaraṇa dṛṣṭa saṃdhayaḥ kāmya vastuṣu naveṣu saṅginaḥ

original: vallabhābhir upasṛtya cakrire sāmibhuktaviṣayāḥ samāgamāḥ // Ragh_19.16 //
analyzed: vallabhābhiḥ upasṛtya cakrire sāmi bhukta viṣayāḥ samāgamāḥ

original: aṅgulīkisalayāgratarjanaṃ bhrūvibhaṅgakuṭilaṃ ca vīkṣitam /
analyzed: aṅgulī kisalaya agra tarjanam bhrū vibhaṅga kuṭilam ca vīkṣitam

original: mekhalābhir asakṛc ca bandhanaṃ vañcayan praṇayinīr avāpa saḥ // Ragh_19.17 //
analyzed: mekhalābhiḥ asakṛt ca bandhanam vañcayan praṇayinīḥ avāpa saḥ

original: tena dūtividitaṃ niṣeduṣā pṛṣṭhataḥ suratavārarātriṣu /
analyzed: tena dūti viditam niṣeduṣā pṛṣṭhatas surata vāra rātriṣu

original: śuśruve priyajanasya kātaraṃ vipralambhapariśaṅkino vacaḥ // Ragh_19.18 //
analyzed: śuśruve priya janasya kātaram vipralambha pariśaṅkinaḥ vacaḥ

original: laulyam etya gṛhiṇīparigrahān nartakīṣv asulabhāsu tadvapuḥ /
analyzed: laulyam etya gṛhiṇī parigrahāt nartakīṣu a sulabhāsu tad vapuḥ

original: vartate sma sa kathaṃcid ālikhann aṅgulīkṣaraṇasannavartikaḥ // Ragh_19.19 //
analyzed: vartate sma sa kathaṃcid ālikhan aṅgulī kṣaraṇa sanna vartikaḥ

original: premagarvitavipakṣamatsarād āyatāc ca madanān mahīkṣitam /
analyzed: prema garvita vipakṣa matsarāt āyatāt ca madanāt mahīkṣitam

original: ninyur utsavavidhicchalena taṃ devya ujjitaruṣaḥ kṛtārthatām // Ragh_19.20 //
analyzed: ninyuḥ utsava vidhi chalena tam devyaḥ ujjita ruṣaḥ kṛtārtha tām

original: prātar etya paribhogaśobhinā darśanena kṛtakhaṇḍanavyathāḥ /
analyzed: prātar etya paribhoga śobhinā darśanena kṛta khaṇḍana vyathāḥ

original: prāñjaliḥ praṇayinīḥ prasādayan so 'dunot praṇayamantharaḥ punaḥ // Ragh_19.21 //
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ praṇayinīḥ prasādayan saḥ dunot praṇaya mantharaḥ punar

original: svapnakīrtitavipakṣam aṅganāḥ darśanena kṛtakhaṇḍanavyathāḥ /
analyzed: svapna kīrtita vipakṣam aṅganāḥ darśanena kṛta khaṇḍana vyathāḥ

original: pracchadāntagalitāśrubindubhiḥ krodhabhinnavalayair vivartanaiḥ // Ragh_19.22 //
analyzed: pracchada anta galita aśru bindubhiḥ krodha bhinna valayaiḥ vivartanaiḥ

original: kḷptapuṣpaśayanāṃl latāgṛhān etya dūtikṛtamārgadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: kḷpta puṣpa śayanān latā gṛhān etya dūti kṛta mārga darśanaḥ

original: anvabhūt parijanāṅganārataṃ so 'varodhabhayavepathūttaram // Ragh_19.23 //
analyzed: anvabhūt parijana aṅganā ratam saḥ varodha bhaya vepathu uttaram

original: nāma vallabhajanasya te mayā prāpya bhāgyam api tasya kāṅkṣyate /
analyzed: nāma vallabha janasya te mayā prāpya bhāgyam api tasya kāṅkṣyate

original: lolupaṃ bata mano mameti taṃ gotraviskhalitam ūcur aṅganāḥ // Ragh_19.24 //
analyzed: lolupam bata manaḥ mama iti tam gotra viskhalitam ūcuḥ aṅganāḥ

original: cūrṇababhru lulitasragākulaṃ chinnamekhalam alaktakāṅkitam /
analyzed: cūrṇa babhru lulita sraj ākulam chinna mekhalam alaktaka aṅkitam

original: utthitasya śayanaṃ vilāsinas tasya vibhramartatāny apāvṛṇot // Ragh_19.25 //
analyzed: utthitasya śayanam vilāsinaḥ tasya vibhrama ṛtatāni apāvṛṇot

original: sa svayaṃ caraṇarāgam ādadhe yoṣitaṃ na ca tathā samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: sa svayam caraṇa rāgam ādadhe yoṣitam na ca tathā samāhitaḥ

original: lobhyamānanayanaḥ ślathāṃśukair mekhalāguṇapadair nitambibhiḥ // Ragh_19.26 //
analyzed: lobhyamāna nayanaḥ ślatha aṃśukaiḥ mekhalā guṇa padaiḥ nitambibhiḥ

original: cumbane viparivartitādharaṃ hastarodhi raśanāvighaṭṭane /
analyzed: cumbane viparivartita adharam hasta rodhi raśanā vighaṭṭane

original: vighniteccham api tasya sarvato manmathendhanam abhūd vadhūratam // Ragh_19.27 //
analyzed: vighnita iccham api tasya sarvatas manmatha indhanam abhūt vadhū ratam

original: darpaṇeṣu paribhogadarśinīr narmapūrvam anupṛṣṭhasaṃsthitaḥ /
analyzed: darpaṇeṣu paribhoga darśinīḥ narma pūrvam anu pṛṣṭha saṃsthitaḥ

original: chāyayā smitamanojñayā vadhūr hrīnimīlitamukhīś cakāra saḥ // Ragh_19.28 //
analyzed: chāyayā smita manojñayā vadhūḥ hrī nimīlita mukhīḥ cakāra saḥ

original: kaṇṭhasaktamṛdubāhubandhanaṃ nyastapādatalam agrapādayoḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha sakta mṛdu bāhu bandhanam nyasta pāda talam agra pādayoḥ

original: prārthayanta śayanotthitaṃ priyās taṃ niśātyayavisargacumbanam // Ragh_19.29 //
analyzed: prārthayanta śayana utthitam priyāḥ tam niśā atyaya visarga cumbanam

original: prekṣya darpaṇatalstham ātmano rājaveṣam atiśakraśobhinam /
analyzed: prekṣya darpaṇa tal stham ātmanaḥ rāja veṣam ati śakra śobhinam

original: pipriye sa na tathā yathā yuvā vyaktalakṣma paribhogamaṇḍanam // Ragh_19.30 //
analyzed: pipriye sa na tathā yathā yuvā vyakta lakṣma paribhoga maṇḍanam

original: mitrakṛtyam apadiśya pārśvataḥ prasthitaṃ tam anavasthitaṃ priyāḥ /
analyzed: mitra kṛtyam apadiśya pārśvatas prasthitam tam anavasthitam priyāḥ

original: vidma he śaṭha palāyanacchalāny añjaseti rurudhuḥ kacagrahaiḥ // Ragh_19.31 //
analyzed: vidma he śaṭha palāyana chalāni añjasā iti rurudhuḥ kaca grahaiḥ

original: tasya nirdayaratiśramālasāḥ kaṇṭhasūtram apadiśyayoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: tasya nirdaya rati śrama alasāḥ kaṇṭha sūtram

original: adhyaśerata bṛhad (?)
analyzed: adhyaśerata bṛhat

original: bhujāntaraṃ pīvarastanaviluptacandanam // Ragh_19.32 //
analyzed: bhujāntaram pīvara stana vilupta candanam

original: saṃgamāya niśi gūḍhacāriṇaṃ cāradūtikathitaṃ puro gatāḥ /
analyzed: saṃgamāya niśi gūḍha cāriṇam cāra dūti kathitam puras gatāḥ

original: vañcayiṣyasi kutas tamovṛtaḥ kāmuketi cakṛṣus tam aṅganāḥ // Ragh_19.33 //
analyzed: vañcayiṣyasi kutas tamaḥ vṛtaḥ kāmuka iti cakṛṣuḥ tam aṅganāḥ

original: yoṣitām uḍupater ivāciṣāṃ sparśanirvṛtim asāv anāpnuvan /
analyzed: yoṣitām uḍupateḥ iva aciṣām sparśa nirvṛtim asau an āpnuvan

original: āruroha kumudākaropamāṃ rātrijāgaraparo divāśayaḥ // Ragh_19.34 //
analyzed: āruroha kumuda ākara upamām rātri jāgara paraḥ divā āśayaḥ

original: veṇunā daśanapīḍitādharā vīṇayā nakhapadāṅkitoravaḥ /
analyzed: veṇunā daśana pīḍita adharāḥ vīṇayā nakha pada aṅkita ūravaḥ

original: śilapakārya ubhayena vejitās taṃ vijihmanayanā vyalobhayan // Ragh_19.35 //
analyzed: śilapa kāryaḥ ubhayena vejitāḥ tam vijihma nayanāḥ vyalobhayan

original: aṅgasattvavacanāśrayaṃ mithaḥ strīṣu nṛtyam upadhāya darśayan /
analyzed: aṅga sattva vacana āśrayam mithas strīṣu nṛtyam upadhāya darśayan

original: sa prayoganipuṇaiḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ saṃjagharṣa saha mitrasaṃnidhau // Ragh_19.36 //
analyzed: sa prayoga nipuṇaiḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ saṃjagharṣa saha mitra saṃnidhau

original: aṃsalambikuṭajārjunasrajas tasya nīparajasāṅgarāgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: aṃsa lambi kuṭaja arjuna srajaḥ tasya nīpa rajasā aṅga rāgiṇaḥ

original: prāvṛṣi pramadabarhiṇeṣv abhūt kṛtimādriṣu vihāravibhramaḥ // Ragh_19.37 //
analyzed: prāvṛṣi pramada barhiṇeṣu abhūt kṛtima adriṣu vihāra vibhramaḥ

original: vigrahāc ca śayane parāṅmukhīr nānunetum abalāḥ sa tatvare /
analyzed: vigrahāt ca śayane parāṅmukhīḥ na anunetum abalāḥ sa tatvare

original: ācakāṅkṣa ghanaśabdaviklavās tā vivṛtya viśatīr bhujāntaram // Ragh_19.38 //
analyzed: ācakāṅkṣa ghana śabda viklavāḥ tāḥ vivṛtya viśatīḥ bhujāntaram

original: kārttikīṣu savitānaharmyabhāg yāminīṣu lalitāṅganāsakhaḥ /
analyzed: kārttikīṣu sa vitāna harmya bhāj yāminīṣu lalita aṅganā sakhaḥ

original: anvabhuṅkta surataśramāpahāṃ meghamuktaviśadāṃ sa candrikām // Ragh_19.39 //
analyzed: anvabhuṅkta surata śrama apahām megha mukta viśadām sa candrikām

original: saikataṃ ca sarayūṃ vivṛṇvatīṃ śroṇibimbam iva haṃsamekhalam /
analyzed: saikatam ca sarayūm vivṛṇvatīm śroṇi bimbam iva haṃsa mekhalam

original: svapriyāvilasitānukāriṇīṃ saudhajālvivarair vyalokayat // Ragh_19.40 //
analyzed: sva priyā vilasita anukāriṇīm saudha jālu ivaraiḥ vyalokayat

original: marmarair agurudhūpagandhibhir vyaktahemarśanais tam ekataḥ /
analyzed: marmaraiḥ aguru dhūpa gandhibhiḥ vyakta hema rśanaiḥ tam ekatas

original: jahrur āgrathanamokṣalolupaṃ haimanair nivsanaiḥ sumadhyamāḥ // Ragh_19.41 //
analyzed: jahruḥ āgrathana mokṣa lolupam haimanaiḥ nivsanaiḥ sumadhyamāḥ

original: arpitastimitadīpadṛṣṭayo garbhaveśmasu nivātakukṣiṣu /
analyzed: arpita stimita dīpa dṛṣṭayaḥ garbhaveśmasu nivāta kukṣiṣu

original: tasya sarvasuratāntarakṣamāḥ sākṣitāṃ śiśirarātrayo yayuḥ // Ragh_19.42 //
analyzed: tasya sarva surata antara kṣamāḥ sākṣi tām śiśira rātrayaḥ yayuḥ

original: dakṣiṇena pavanena saṃbhṛtaṃ prekṣya cūtakusumaṃ sapallavam /
analyzed: dakṣiṇena pavanena saṃbhṛtam prekṣya cūta kusumam sa pallavam

original: anvanaiṣur avadhūtavigrahās taṃ durutsahaviyogam aṅganāḥ // Ragh_19.43 //
analyzed: anvanaiṣuḥ avadhūta vigrahāḥ tam durutsaha viyogam aṅganāḥ

original: tāḥ svam aṅkam adhiropya dolayā preṅkhayan parijanāpaviddhayā /
analyzed: tāḥ svam aṅkam adhiropya dolayā preṅkhayan parijana apaviddhayā

original: muktarajju nibiḍaṃ bhayacchalāt kaṇṭhabandhanam avāpa bāhubhiḥ // Ragh_19.44 //
analyzed: mukta rajju nibiḍam bhaya chalāt kaṇṭha bandhanam avāpa bāhubhiḥ

original: taṃ payodharaniṣaktacandanair mauktikagrathitacārubhūṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: tam payodhara niṣakta candanaiḥ mauktika grathita cāru bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: grīṣmaveṣavidhibhiḥ siṣevire śroṇilambimaṇimekhalāḥ priyāḥ // Ragh_19.45 //
analyzed: grīṣma veṣa vidhibhiḥ siṣevire śroṇi lambi maṇi mekhalāḥ priyāḥ

original: yat sa bhagnasahakāram āsavaṃ raktapāṭalasamāgamaṃ papau /
analyzed: yat sa bhagna sahakāram āsavam rakta pāṭala samāgamam papau

original: tena tasya madhunirgamāt kṛśaś cittayonir abhavat punarnavaḥ // Ragh_19.46 //
analyzed: tena tasya madhu nirgamāt kṛśaḥ cittayoniḥ abhavat punarnavaḥ

original: evam indriyasukhāni nirviśann anyakāryavimukhaḥ sa pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: evam indriya sukhāni nirviśan anya kārya vimukhaḥ sa pārthivaḥ

original: ātmalakṣaṇaniveditān ṛtūn atyavāhayad anaṅgavāhitaḥ // Ragh_19.47 //
analyzed: ātma lakṣaṇa niveditān ṛtūn atyavāhayat anaṅga vāhitaḥ

original: taṃ pramattam api na prabhāvataḥ śekur ākramitum anyapārthivāḥ /
analyzed: tam pramattam api na prabhāvataḥ śekuḥ ākramitum anya pārthivāḥ

original: āmayas tu ratirāgasaṃbhavo dakṣaśāpa iva candram akṣiṇot // Ragh_19.48 //
analyzed: āmayaḥ tu rati rāga saṃbhavaḥ dakṣa śāpaḥ iva candram akṣiṇot

original: dṛṣṭadoṣam api tan na so 'tyajat saṅgavastu bhiṣajām anāśravaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa doṣam api tat na saḥ tyajat saṅga vastu bhiṣajām anāśravaḥ

original: svādubhis tu viṣayair hṛtas tato duḥkham indriyagaṇo nivāryate // Ragh_19.49 //
analyzed: svādubhiḥ tu viṣayaiḥ hṛtaḥ tatas duḥkham indriya gaṇaḥ nivāryate

original: tasya pāṇḍuvadanālpabhūṣaṇā sāvalambagamanā mṛdusvanā /
analyzed: tasya pāṇḍu vadana alpa bhūṣaṇā sa avalamba gamanā mṛdu svanā

original: yakṣmaṇāpi parihānir āyayau kāmayānasamavasthayā tulām // Ragh_19.50 //
analyzed: yakṣmaṇā api parihāniḥ āyayau kāmayāna samavasthayā tulām

original: vyoma paścimakalāsthitendu vā paṅkaśeṣam iva gharmapalvalam /
analyzed: vyoma paścima kalā sthita indu vā paṅka śeṣam iva gharma palvalam

original: rājñi tatkulam abhūt kṣayāture vāmanārcir iva dīpabhājanam // Ragh_19.51 //
analyzed: rājñi tat kulam abhūt kṣaya āture vāmana arciḥ iva dīpa bhājanam

original: bāḍham eṣu divaseṣu karma sādhayati putrajanmane /
analyzed: bāḍham eṣu divaseṣu karma sādhayati putra janmane

original: ity adarśitarujo 'sya mantriṇaḥ śaśvad ūcur aghaśaṅkinīḥ prajāḥ // Ragh_19.52 //
analyzed: iti adarśita rujaḥ sya mantriṇaḥ śaśvat ūcuḥ agha śaṅkinīḥ prajāḥ

original: sa tv anekavanitāsakho 'pi san pāvanīm anavalokya saṃtatim /
analyzed: sa tu aneka vanitā sakhaḥ san pāvanīm an avalokya saṃtatim

original: vaidyayatnaparibhāvinaṃ gadaṃ na pradīpa iva vāyum atyagāt // Ragh_19.53 //
analyzed: vaidya yatna paribhāvinam gadam na pradīpaḥ iva vāyum atyagāt

original: taṃ gṛhopavana eva saṃgatāḥ paścimakratuvidā purodhasā /
analyzed: tam gṛha upavane eva saṃgatāḥ paścima kratu vidā purodhasā

original: rogaśāntim apadiśya mantriṇaḥ saṃbhṛte śikhini gūḍham ādadhuḥ // Ragh_19.54 //
analyzed: roga śāntim apadiśya mantriṇaḥ saṃbhṛte śikhini gūḍham ādadhuḥ

original: taiḥ kṛtaprakṛtimukhyasaṃgrahair āśu tasya sahadharmacāriṇī /
analyzed: taiḥ kṛta prakṛti mukhya saṃgrahaiḥ āśu tasya saha dharmacāriṇī

original: sādhu dṛṣṭaśubhagarbhalakṣaṇā pratyapadyata narādhipaśriyam // Ragh_19.55 //
analyzed: sādhu dṛṣṭa śubha garbha lakṣaṇā pratyapadyata narādhipa śriyam

original: tasyās tathāvidhanarendravipattiśokād uṣṇair vilocanajalaiḥ prathamābhitaptaḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ tathāvidha narendra vipatti śokāt uṣṇaiḥ vilocana jalaiḥ prathama abhitaptaḥ

original: nirvāpitaḥ kanakakumbhamukhojjhitena vaṃśābhiṣekavidhinā śiśireṇa garbhaḥ // Ragh_19.56 //
analyzed: nirvāpitaḥ kanaka kumbha mukha ujjhitena vaṃśa abhiṣeka vidhinā śiśireṇa garbhaḥ

original: taṃ bhāvāya prasavasamayākāṅkṣiṇīnāṃ prajānām antargūḍhaṃ kṣitir iva babhau bījamuṣṭiṃ dadhānā /
analyzed: tam bhāvāya prasava samaya ākāṅkṣiṇīnām prajānām antar gūḍham kṣitiḥ iva babhau bīja muṣṭim dadhānā

original: maulaiḥ sārdhaṃ sthavirasacivair hemasiṃhāsanasthā rājñī rājyaṃ vidhivad aśiṣad bhartur avyāhatājñā // Ragh_19.57 //
analyzed: maulaiḥ sārdham sthavira sacivaiḥ hema siṃhāsana sthā rājñī rājyam vidhivat aśiṣat bhartuḥ avyāhata ājñā

original: ākīryamāṇam āsannavidhibhiḥ samidāharaiḥ /
analyzed: ākīryamāṇam āsanna vidhibhiḥ samidh āharaiḥ

original: vaikhānasair adṛśyāgnipratyudgamanavṛttibhiḥ // Ragh_1.49* //
analyzed: vaikhānasaiḥ adṛśya agni pratyudgamana vṛttibhiḥ

original: imāṃ devīm ṛtusnātāṃ smṛtvā sapadi satvaraḥ /
analyzed: imām devīm ṛtusnātām smṛtvā sapadi sa tvaraḥ

original: pradakṣiṇakriyātītas tasyāḥ kopam ajījanaḥ // Ragh_1.75* //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa kriyā atītaḥ tasyāḥ kopam ajījanaḥ

original: tāmralalāṭajāṃ rekhāṃ bibhratī sāsitetarām /
analyzed: tāmra lalāṭa jām rekhām bibhratī sā asitetarām

original: saṃdhyā prātipadeneva pratibhinnā himāṃśunā // Ragh_1.82* //
analyzed: saṃdhyā prātipadena iva pratibhinnā himāṃśunā

original: gāndharvam astraṃ tad itaḥ pratīccha prayogasaṃhāravibhaktamantram /
analyzed: gāndharvam astram tat itas pratīccha prayoga saṃhāra vibhakta mantram

original: saṃdhyā prātipadeneva na cārihiṃsā vijayaḥ svahaste // Ragh_5.57* //
analyzed: saṃdhyā prātipadena iva na ca ari hiṃsā vijayaḥ sva haste

original: nidrāvaśaṃ tvayi gate śaśinā kathaṃcid ātmānam ānanarucā bhavato viyujya /
analyzed: nidrā vaśam tvayi gate śaśinā kathaṃcid ātmānam ānana rucā bhavataḥ viyujya

original: lakṣmīr vibhātasamaye 'pi hi darśanena paryutsukā praṇayinī niśi khaṇḍiteva // Ragh_5.67* //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ vibhāta samaye hi darśanena paryutsukā praṇayinī niśi khaṇḍitā iva

original: mandaṃ vivāti himasaṃbhṛtaśītabhāvaḥ saṃsṛjyate sarasijair aruṇāṃśubhinnaiḥ /
analyzed: mandam vivāti hima saṃbhṛta śīta bhāvaḥ saṃsṛjyate sarasijaiḥ aruṇa aṃśu bhinnaiḥ

original: saurabhyam īpsur iva te mukhamārutasya yan no guṇān prati niśāpariṇāmavāyuḥ // Ragh_5.69* //
analyzed: saurabhyam īpsuḥ iva te mukha mārutasya yat naḥ guṇān prati niśā pariṇāma vāyuḥ

original: iti sa vihatanidras talpam alpetarāṃśaḥ suragaja iva gaṅgāsaikataṃ supratīkaḥ /
analyzed: iti sa vihata nidraḥ talpam alpa itara aṃśaḥ sura gajaḥ iva gaṅgā saikatam supratīkaḥ

original: parijanavanitānāṃ pādayor vyāpṛtānāṃ valayamaṇividiṣṭaṃ pracchadāntaṃ mumoca // Ragh_5.75* //
analyzed: parijana vanitānām pādayoḥ vyāpṛtānām valaya maṇi vidiṣṭam pracchada antam mumoca

original: sa tatra mañeṣcu vimānakalpeṣv ākalpasaṃmūrchitarūpaśobhān /
analyzed: sa tatra vimāna kalpeṣu ākalpa saṃmūrchita rūpa śobhān

original: siṃhāsanasthān nṛpatīn apaśyat yūpān praśastān iva haimavedīn // Ragh_6.1* //
analyzed: siṃhāsana sthān nṛpatīn apaśyat yūpān praśastān iva haimavedīn

original: yadā yadā rājakumārikāsau na pūrvapūrvaṃ ganayāṃ cakāra /
analyzed: yadā yadā rāja kumārikā asau na pūrva pūrvam cakāra

original: tadā tadā nāmitarepharekhām āśālatā pallavinī babhūva // Ragh_6.67* //
analyzed: tadā tadā nāmita repha rekhām āśā latā pallavinī babhūva

original: lalāṭabaddhabhṛkuṭītaraṅgais tanutyajāṃ dantanipīḍitoṣṭhaiḥ /
analyzed: lalāṭa baddha bhṛkuṭī taraṅgaiḥ tanutyajām danta nipīḍita uṣṭhaiḥ

original: ātastare bhallanikṛttakaṇṭhair huṃkāragarbhair dviṣatāṃ śirobhiḥ // Ragh_7.38* //
analyzed: ātastare bhalla nikṛtta kaṇṭhaiḥ huṃkāra garbhaiḥ dviṣatām śirobhiḥ

original: atha vīkṣya guṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ prakṛtiṣv ātmajam ābhigamikaiḥ /
analyzed: atha vīkṣya guṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhitam prakṛtiṣu ātma jam ābhigamikaiḥ

original: padavīṃ pariṇāmadeśinīṃ raghur ādatta vanāntagāminīm // Ragh_8.9* //
analyzed: padavīm pariṇāma deśinīm raghuḥ ādatta vanānta gāminīm

original: namas trimūrtaye tubhyaṃ guṇatrayavibhāgāya /
analyzed: namaḥ trimūrtaye tubhyam guṇatraya vibhāgāya

original: prāk sṛṣṭe[ḥ] kevalātmane paścād bhad[r]am upeyuṣe // Ragh_10.19* //
analyzed: prāk sṛṣṭeḥ kevala ātmane paścāt bhadram upeyuṣe

original: te 'pi tūrṇam avagamya śāmbhavam āsamāharaṇakarmatatparāḥ /
analyzed: te pi tūrṇam avagamya śāmbhavam āsamāharaṇa karma tatparāḥ

original: svāṃ sakṣiptatikarkaśaṃ hi tac cikṣipur daśāarathātmajāgrataḥ // Ragh_11.43* //
analyzed: svām sa kṣipta ati karkaśam hi tat cikṣipuḥ daśā aratha ātmaja agrataḥ

original: nistriṃśakalpasya nidher jalānām eṣā tamāladrumarāja nīlā /
analyzed: nistriṃśa kalpasya nidheḥ jalānām eṣā tamāla druma rāja nīlā

original: dūrād arālabhru vibhāti velā kalaṅkarekhā malineva dhārā // Ragh_13.15* //
analyzed: dūrāt arāla bhru vibhāti velā kalaṅka rekhā malinā iva dhārā

original: pratyāgatau tatra cirapravāsād apaśyatāṃ dāśarathī jananyau /
analyzed: pratyāgatau tatra cira pravāsāt apaśyatām dāśarathī jananyau

original: kumudvatī śītamarīcilekhe diveva rūpāntaradurvibhāvye // Ragh_14.1* //
analyzed: kumudvatī śīta marīci lekhe divā iva rūpa antara durvibhāvye

original: keyaṃ vane lakṣmaṇa lakṣmaṇeti dīnākṣaraṃ roditi yoṣid uccaiḥ /
analyzed: kā iyam vane lakṣmaṇa lakṣmaṇa iti dīna akṣaram roditi yoṣit uccais

original: āṃ jñātam eṣā janakātmajeti kavir vicintyāntikam ājagāma // Ragh_14.69* //
analyzed: ām jñātam eṣā janakātmajā iti kaviḥ vicintya antikam ājagāma

original: tad ākarṇya muner vākyaṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ /
analyzed: tat ākarṇya muneḥ vākyam rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ

original: samaṃ harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ yuyuje nītikovidaḥ // Ragh_15.71* //
analyzed: samam harṣa viṣādābhyām yuyuje nīti kovidaḥ

original: gaccha lakṣmaṇa śīghraṃ tvaṃ mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ /
analyzed: gaccha lakṣmaṇa śīghram tvam mā bhūt dharma viparyayaḥ

original: tyāgo vāpi vadho vāpi sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam // Ragh_15.94* //
analyzed: tyāgaḥ vā api vadhaḥ vā api sādhūnām ubhayam samam

original: tasmād babhūvātha dalābhidhāno dalānvitaḥ padmadalābhadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt babhūva atha dala abhidhānaḥ dala anvitaḥ padma dala ābha dṛṣṭiḥ

original: kundāgra danto ripudantisiṃhaḥ patiḥ pṛthivyāḥ kulakair ivenduḥ // Ragh_18.16* //
analyzed: kunda agra dantaḥ ripu danti siṃhaḥ patiḥ pṛthivyāḥ kulakaiḥ iva induḥ

original: hitvātha bhogāṃs tapasottamena triviṣṭapaṃ prāptavati kṣitīśe /
analyzed: hitvā atha bhogān tapasā uttamena triviṣṭapam prāptavati kṣitīśe

original: tadātmajaḥ sāgaradhīracetāḥ śaśāsa pṛthvīṃ sakalāṃ nṛsomaḥ // Ragh_18.19* //
analyzed: tad ātmajaḥ sāgara dhīra cetāḥ śaśāsa pṛthvīm sakalām nṛsomaḥ
